NK079(dzu)004:1: // rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud dpal
NK079(dzu)004:2: gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i spyan 'grel bzhugs
NK079(dzu)004:4: badz+ra swad ta ma ya dza la tan tra sh+ri
NK079(dzu)004:5: 'gu ha garba 'bri ta tsak+shu tig /bod skad du
NK079(dzu)004:6: / rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud
NK079(dzu)004:7: dpal gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i spyan 'grel
NK079(dzu)004:8: / pa'i / sde mdzad gter gyi bdag po mchog /lha'i lha la gnyis med 'du //
NK079(dzu)004:9: dgongs mdzad mtshan dpe gnas kyi bdag /skyes bu thugs la gnyis med 'dud //
NK079(dzu)004:11: mi g.yo gsal ba mtha' bral bas //
NK079(dzu)004:12: dpa' bo ye shes rkyen bral ba //
NK079(dzu)004:14: ci yang min las cir yang snang //
NK079(dzu)004:15: mang la 'brel pas tra ba'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:16: yul min brtag dka' zab cing 'phra //
NK079(dzu)004:17: bstan pa'i rgyu 'bras snying po'i bcud //
NK079(dzu)004:18: gzhan min de nyid do don la //
NK079(dzu)004:19: rnam gsum tshul gyis phyag 'tshal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:20: rang bzhin rkyen gyis spyan mdongs pas //
NK079(dzu)004:21: shes bya gnyis la rmongs pa dag /mthong nas thob phyi yi ge rgyud //
NK079(dzu)004:22: spyan gyi mchog gsum gsal bar phye //
NK079(dzu)004:23: de la nges pa'i don gyi rgyud //
NK079(dzu)004:24: thun mong ma yin pa'i lung //
NK079(dzu)004:25: ma bslad par ston pa'i mchog /bka' thams cad kyi 'grel pa //
NK079(dzu)004:28: bla na med pa kun gyis yum gyur pa //
NK079(dzu)004:30: don bshad pa'i rgyud 'di'i spyan rnam par dbye ba yang rnam pa gsum ste /
NK079(dzu)004:32: chos nyid rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor phyi mo'i rigs mi 'gyur ma chad pa nyid dang /
NK079(dzu)004:33: mngon du byed pa'i rnal 'byor rgyud du 'byung zhing mi gtong bar byed pa rtsol ba'i rigs dang /
NK079(dzu)004:34: mthar thug gi rnal 'byor bya ba med pa'i rgyud
NK079(dzu)004:35: du byung zin pas mi 'gyur ba 'bras pa'i rigs
NK079(dzu)004:36: so // de yang bye brag bstan pa las //
NK079(dzu)004:37: tshad ma gsum gyi dngos po yin //
NK079(dzu)004:38: rnal 'byor gsum gyi phung po la //
NK079(dzu)004:39: rigs dang snang ba'i yan lag bzhag /de nyid thun mong mchog tu nges //
NK079(dzu)004:42: rjes su 'grel ba'i lugs nyid ni 'di lta ste /
NK079(dzu)004:43: thog mar phyi mo'i rnal 'byor ni //
NK079(dzu)004:44: brtags pa'i yul spros pa dang bral ba las khyad
NK079(dzu)004:45: par du ngo bos gyur pa chos nyid kyi rigs
NK079(dzu)004:46: te / brtsal bya ril gyi dngos gzhi 'phel 'grib dang bral ba kho na ste /
NK079(dzu)004:47: de la ni ma bslad ma btags ji bzhin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:48: bye brag mi phyed pas dang po'i ming nges par 'thob bo //
NK079(dzu)004:49: de lung gis bstan par bya gzhung nyid las //
NK079(dzu)004:50: de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni kun la khyab par yod do //
NK079(dzu)004:52: nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par ces pa'i tshig bshad brgyad gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:53: de la ni tha snyad du rang bzhin gyis snang ba zhes kyang bsnyad /
NK079(dzu)004:54: 'on kyang phan tshun las grol bar 'chad pas //
NK079(dzu)004:56: dper na rgya mtsho nyid rlabs lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:57: de yang shes rab dang gtan tshigs kyis byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:59: 'di nyid kyang rnam pa med pa'i rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:60: ji bzhin rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK079(dzu)004:61: mun pa'i rang bzhin glo bur du snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:62: 'o na de rgyu ni sa snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:63: dang po la rnam med kyang gnyis pa la gnas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:64: mthong ba nges par ma byas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:65: rnam pa med pa la yod par mthong ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:66: me long g.ya' can lta bu ste //
NK079(dzu)004:68: me long g.yas yog pa dang 'dra ste /
NK079(dzu)004:69: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so //
NK079(dzu)004:71: 'di nyid kyi don nges par chud par bya ba'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:72: rgyal po drag shul can gyis zhus pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:73: gser la bzo'i rnam pa ltar //
NK079(dzu)004:74: snang ba dang po rang rig pa //
NK079(dzu)004:75: yul med gnyis phyir mthong med phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:76: brtags pas tha dad gyur pa ste //
NK079(dzu)004:78: des na ma nges chad pa'i rigs //
NK079(dzu)004:79: rang gi ngo bos dang po nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:80: skabs ming gnyis su gyur pas phye //
NK079(dzu)004:83: dper gser la 'du byed kyis mchod gnas dang /
NK079(dzu)004:85: snod ji ltar snang la ngo bo gcig pas //
NK079(dzu)004:87: ji bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor te de yang ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:88: dang mtshan nyid ril lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid
NK079(dzu)004:89: ni mtha' kun bral nyag gcig ci yang ma spangs
NK079(dzu)004:90: pa / phyogs med phyogs kyi dngos gzhi pa //
NK079(dzu)004:91: ris can ris dang bral ba ni //
NK079(dzu)004:92: sgron ma nyid kyis kyang 'di zhes brtag par mi zin pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:93: sgro skur dang ngang gis bral bas skabs las nges pa'i lung zhes kyang bsnyad de /
NK079(dzu)004:95: thams cad rang rig byang chub sems //
NK079(dzu)004:96: de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad //
NK079(dzu)004:97: tshad bzhi pa'i don yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:99: 'o na mun pa'i snang ba byung ba rigs gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:100: kyi dngos po 'di dag 'byung bar mi rigs so
NK079(dzu)004:101: snyam pa la / de ni rang gi byung tshul brgyad kyis 'brel te /
NK079(dzu)004:103: tshul dang nyes pa 'grub byed pa nye bar mtshon pas rnam par dbye /
NK079(dzu)004:104: zhor la spyi'i dgos bshad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:107: chad pa'i 'gro ba grong khyer gsum du 'khor ba dag gi rgyu ni /
NK079(dzu)004:109: ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis //
NK079(dzu)004:111: kun gzhi snang ba nyid dang bral te /
NK079(dzu)004:112: rtag tu rang mtshan gsal 'gyur kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:113: zhen pas snang bar ma gyur na /
NK079(dzu)004:114: mig gis mig bzhin ma rig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:122: mtshungs par ldan pa'i las kyis phye bas rgyu kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:123: 'khor ba'i rigs gnyis kyi rkyen ni /
NK079(dzu)004:125: bsod nams ma yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:127: nyon mongs pa brtags pa lnga 'phra rags dang mang nyung gis so sor sbyar ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:128: de yang dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa /
NK079(dzu)004:130: thams cad mnyam par ma shes na //
NK079(dzu)004:131: ma lus kun la zhe sdang cing //
NK079(dzu)004:133: yang tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa /
NK079(dzu)004:134: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par bstan to //
NK079(dzu)004:137: sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang //
NK079(dzu)004:140: thog ma med nas sems yan btang //
NK079(dzu)004:142: ltos pa'i glo bur ba yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:143: de'i tshe 'khor brten cing 'brel ba'i grangs dang phra rags kyi chas gnas so sor 'khor ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:145: phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khod ces gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:146: tshul des na yang dag pa'i lam dang bral zhing sna tshogs gtse ba myong ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:147: de yang mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur /
NK079(dzu)004:149: ye shes lnga'i don ma rtogs //
NK079(dzu)004:151: de grub par byed pa'o ni /
NK079(dzu)004:152: skad cig ma gnyis kyis snang ba'i phyogs gcig ste /
NK079(dzu)004:153: ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma //
NK079(dzu)004:154: de yis ma byas gang yang med //
NK079(dzu)004:156: de dag nye bar mtshon pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:157: rtsa dang sogs me 'khor lo bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:158: long btags rgyas shing brgyud par 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:160: de ji ltar snang yang rang gi ngo bo rtag
NK079(dzu)004:161: pa gnyis dang bral ba thog ma'i rnal 'byor nyid
NK079(dzu)004:163: spyir ni log rtog bsam yas pas //
NK079(dzu)004:164: ye nas yod pa ma yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:165: ci yang med las cir yang snang //
NK079(dzu)004:166: snang ba nyid na ngo bo med //
NK079(dzu)004:168: de dag bkod pa ni ngo bo nyid de lta bas na /
NK079(dzu)004:169: rdos po brgyad so so nas rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:170: gcig dang du ma las grol ba'i rigs rtogs par bya ba'i ched do //
NK079(dzu)004:171: de bas ming gis phye yang ngo bo la tha dad med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:172: ye nas ngo bo yod yin na //
NK079(dzu)004:173: nyon mongs spang zhing byang bsgrub med //
NK079(dzu)004:174: ces gsungs pa la sogs pas gsal te /
NK079(dzu)004:175: las nong pa tsam gyis brtsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:177: ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang //
NK079(dzu)004:178: 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste //
NK079(dzu)004:179: de bzhin nyid la gyur cing nyams pa med //
NK079(dzu)004:181: de la grub pa'i rnal 'byor mthar thug bla na med pa'i rigs bshad pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:182: bye brag bstan pa bla med rigs la rgyu 'bras kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:183: phye bas bar dang tha mar 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:184: de la skabs kyis mthar thug pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:185: snang ba de nyid rnam par dbye //
NK079(dzu)004:191: de nye bar mtshon pa dag ni bla na med
NK079(dzu)004:192: pa'i theg pa mthar thug pa dag la bye ba
NK079(dzu)004:193: ste / de yang thabs gnyis kyis rang bzhin mngon du byas pas tha mal pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:194: bcu gcig pa'i zhen pa man chad spangs pa'i ye shes ni /
NK079(dzu)004:196: skyed du bya ba med pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:197: spyod yul bral bas ming nges par grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:198: de ltar 'thob pa'i skabs kyang 'bras bu ril bdag nyid pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:199: thob bya gzhan du rag ma lus pa'i phyir na /
NK079(dzu)004:200: tha mal pa'i dbang du yang lhag ma'i lus 'di nyid dang bar mar sbyor ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:201: rang gi ngo bo ni gnyis ste /
NK079(dzu)004:202: thun mong gi sangs rgyas dang /
NK079(dzu)004:203: thun mong min pa'i sangs rgyas so //
NK079(dzu)004:204: tha ma'i yon tan la lnga ste /
NK079(dzu)004:210: bye brag lnga lngar gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:211: de dag gi mtshan nyid ni /
NK079(dzu)004:212: gcig dang du ma'i cha rnams ma bsnyigs bral bas gzung dka' ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:213: de dag nyer bar mtshon pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:214: nor bu rin po che dang /
NK079(dzu)004:220: rgyal po in tra pu tis zhus pa'i sgyu 'phrul las /
NK079(dzu)004:221: dang po sangs rgyas thun mong nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:222: smon lam tshogs snang ngo bo gsum //
NK079(dzu)004:223: thun mong tha ma'i dri can la //
NK079(dzu)004:224: kun gyi tog tu gyur snang ba //
NK079(dzu)004:225: de nyid tha ma'i tha ma yin //
NK079(dzu)004:226: dri can bdag pos dbang bskur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:227: yang dag rdzogs par rang snang ba //
NK079(dzu)004:230: de dag ni slob dpon gzhan dag gis 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
NK079(dzu)004:231: zhes bsnyad pa mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:232: yid ches pa'i tshig 'di nyid las lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa /
NK079(dzu)004:233: mthong ba'i chos las mya ngan 'das //
NK079(dzu)004:235: dper na khung dang seng ge bu //
NK079(dzu)004:237: sku nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor snang //
NK079(dzu)004:241: lhun grub ji bzhin mngon byas pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:242: btags pa tsam ste gnyis pa med //
NK079(dzu)004:243: de phyir de la de brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:245: thabs kyi zhags pa las kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:246: rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku //
NK079(dzu)004:247: sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:248: kun tu rin chen lta bu ste //
NK079(dzu)004:251: dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba //
NK079(dzu)004:252: lus las ma gos sna tshogs ston //
NK079(dzu)004:253: dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:254: stong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:255: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:257: mthon dman kun gyi gzugs snang dang //
NK079(dzu)004:258: bla med byang chub skur snang ba //
NK079(dzu)004:259: me long lta bu tshul bzhin du //
NK079(dzu)004:260: sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang //
NK079(dzu)004:262: de la ni bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba zhes kyang bsnyad do //
NK079(dzu)004:263: de la rnal 'byor bar ma'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:264: sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa las //
NK079(dzu)004:265: rang bzhin mngon byed rnal 'byor pa //
NK079(dzu)004:266: ngo bo rkyen gyis rnal 'byor dbye //
NK079(dzu)004:267: rigs dang rigs su nges pa'i sa dang po la'ang rnam pa gnyis 'gyur ba /
NK079(dzu)004:268: lnga sems ldan pa'i shes rab nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:269: skye ba'i gzhi dang skyes nges pa //
NK079(dzu)004:270: gzhi rig gcig dang lam rig bzhi //
NK079(dzu)004:271: gsang chen bla med mi ldog 'dod //
NK079(dzu)004:273: yang bye brag bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:274: gnyis pa rkyen gyi rnam par 'dod //
NK079(dzu)004:275: de nyid thun mong ma yin pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:276: dbye bas gnyis 'gyur ma yin pa'ang //
NK079(dzu)004:277: shes pa lnga yi yul min pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:278: dam pa'i shes pa gnyis pa yi //
NK079(dzu)004:280: lung gi spyir ru grags pa nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:281: rnam par shar pas lnga ru 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:283: bka'i nyid khung 'di dbu zhabs su don lnga ste /
NK079(dzu)004:286: rkyen phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:287: don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:288: rgyud kyi cha rkyen phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:290: de la rgyud kyi gzhi ni /
NK079(dzu)004:295: bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo skor //
NK079(dzu)004:296: skyes bu bka' sdod mdun na gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:297: brjod pa med bzhin go bar mdzad //
NK079(dzu)004:302: nyis 'gyur shin tu sbags pa'i gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:303: ngo bo mtha' gsum las 'das pas //
NK079(dzu)004:304: ma spangs rgyan rdzogs gzhal yas khang //
NK079(dzu)004:305: yon tan lnga'i bdag nyid de //
NK079(dzu)004:306: gru bzhi spyi bo 'khyil snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:307: de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par las //
NK079(dzu)004:308: rang snang rgyal ba sems sogs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:309: dang po sangs rgyas sa rgyal pa //
NK079(dzu)004:310: sems dpa' chen po 'joms pa che //
NK079(dzu)004:311: brjod kyis mi lang tshad rnyed dang //
NK079(dzu)004:312: rnam gnyis tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:313: 'khor gyi nang nas skal mchog ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:314: 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag /lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad //
NK079(dzu)004:315: de tshe dus nyid mtha' bral phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:316: ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:317: rgyal ba sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa //
NK079(dzu)004:318: dgongs pa rig pa rna bas brgyud //
NK079(dzu)004:319: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na //
NK079(dzu)004:320: nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung //
NK079(dzu)004:321: zhes gsungs pa dag ni gzhi ste /
NK079(dzu)004:322: skabs 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:323: de nyid dkrugs pa rgyud kyi phyir klad du ma bkod de /
NK079(dzu)004:324: rkyen yang rjes su mthun par sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:325: 'di dag gdul bya'i skabs kyis snang ba gzhan dag kyang gnyis te /
NK079(dzu)004:327: 'di zhes nye bar mtshon pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:328: e sogs rnam bzhi dbyibs can gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:329: skad ni gsal byed las ming can //
NK079(dzu)004:330: bam dbyibs thig ler bcas ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:331: me ta ma nu sdom byed yin //
NK079(dzu)004:332: las can rnam shes de dag la //
NK079(dzu)004:333: gsal bar snang ba bshad sdud 'dod //
NK079(dzu)004:334: pa sgra don dam nges pa'i rgyud //
NK079(dzu)004:335: ya na theg chen 'di yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:336: dus ni bsam gyi mi khyab dus //
NK079(dzu)004:337: na ma de ming zhes bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:340: dar ma tsag kra chos kyi gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:341: 'do bzhi e sogs dbyibs su gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:342: mi shigs thig le bam dbyibs can //
NK079(dzu)004:343: rang la bde ba gsal byed bdag /ma nu yid sogs rnam shes bzhis //
NK079(dzu)004:344: ye shes myong ba bsdus bshad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:345: ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs skyes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:346: pa ra ma rta don zab mo //
NK079(dzu)004:347: bde ba'i dus nyid snga phyi bral //
NK079(dzu)004:348: dus gsum kun gyis ngo bor gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:350: de'i phyir skal pa mchog gi gdul bya mthar nye ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:351: ma 'ongs pa'i thabs gnyis kyis 'dul ba dag la rgyu des rgyud snang bar byed do //
NK079(dzu)004:352: gnyis brgyud kyi rkyen gleng bslang ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:353: snying po le'u gnyis par bstan gyi /
NK079(dzu)004:355: rgyud kyi phyir rdos su ma gsungs te /
NK079(dzu)004:357: gsum pa ni don du gnyer bar byed pa'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:358: don du bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
NK079(dzu)004:362: de la lam ni gnyis te /
NK079(dzu)004:364: rigs kyi dbye bas lam dbye ba //
NK079(dzu)004:367: ma nges spyi'i dbye sa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:368: bzhi ni nges 'byung thun mong lam //
NK079(dzu)004:369: de bzhin rigs gcig thun mong min //
NK079(dzu)004:370: de nyid phyi nang cha snang ba //
NK079(dzu)004:371: phyi rol ltos pa'i thun mong lam //
NK079(dzu)004:372: skabs 'dir bzhi gsum thun mong gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:373: phan chad sbyangs pa rgyu'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:374: rang bzhin sngon du song ba dang //
NK079(dzu)004:375: ched du sngon du bsdur bas 'gro //
NK079(dzu)004:376: des na thun mong sngon rdzogs yul //
NK079(dzu)004:377: gzhi dang skabs nas skyes 'gyur sa //
NK079(dzu)004:378: grol thar lam du rnam par bstan //
NK079(dzu)004:379: de de'i gcig car rim 'jug pa //
NK079(dzu)004:380: snod kyi rim pas rnam par snang //
NK079(dzu)004:382: 'dir thun mong gi lam ni bzhi ste /
NK079(dzu)004:383: lha dang mi'i theg pa'i rigs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:384: nyan thos pa'i theg pa'i rigs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:385: rang rgyal pa'i theg pa'i rigs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:386: ltos pa'i bla na med pa'i rigs te //
NK079(dzu)004:387: de'i lam du cis 'gyur zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:391: lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin pa rgyu 'bras rdzogs par spyod //
NK079(dzu)004:393: sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang //
NK079(dzu)004:394: gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam //
NK079(dzu)004:395: zhes pa dag dang theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la //
NK079(dzu)004:396: theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:397: zhes pa'i don gyis the tshom med //
NK079(dzu)004:398: bya ba'i sgor bsdus la shes par bya ba yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:399: 'jug par bya ba ni ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:400: lam gyi ltungs brtag pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:401: nye lam las mi 'gyang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:402: ma nges pa dang de dag nas rkyen bzhis blo 'gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:403: sems lnga rim par skye ba'i sa 'bras bu'i theg pa 'di la'ang gdul bya sbyangs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:404: nyon mongs pa dang mos pa mi mthun pas brtsal nas /
NK079(dzu)004:405: lam gnyis su 'gyur ba ni gang zhe na //
NK079(dzu)004:409: thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis //
NK079(dzu)004:410: rang byung kun ngam lhun gyis grub //
NK079(dzu)004:412: phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:413: gsang dbang mchog gis 'byin par byed //
NK079(dzu)004:415: de la grol ba'i lam gnyis te //
NK079(dzu)004:416: cig car ba dang rim 'jug go //
NK079(dzu)004:417: de yang bye brag bstan pa las //
NK079(dzu)004:418: dgos 'brel bsnyen bsgrub mtshan nyid dang //
NK079(dzu)004:420: rtogs pa rnam bzhi dag mnyam bden //
NK079(dzu)004:421: gcig la tshul gyis gnyis 'gyur ba //
NK079(dzu)004:422: lhun gyis rtogs nas lhun gyis bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:424: skabs kyis rdzogs pa chen por brjod //
NK079(dzu)004:425: bar mas phye ba'i rim pa nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:426: mthong ba bsgom zung du 'brel bar bshad /
NK079(dzu)004:427: bsgom pa'ang dbye bas gsum gcig 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:429: cig car pa ni gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas rang
NK079(dzu)004:430: bzhin gyi don gtings phyin nas yul med pa rang
NK079(dzu)004:431: gsal du bslad pa med pas lha yar skad cig
NK079(dzu)004:432: gis gsal bas de nyid stobs su gyur pa mthar
NK079(dzu)004:433: phyin pa ste / de la skabs kyis bstan pa'i rim pa gsum las mi snang ste /
NK079(dzu)004:434: yon tan rgyas pa'i rgyur las /
NK079(dzu)004:435: ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag dang //
NK079(dzu)004:436: lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:438: gcig shos rnam par dbye ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:439: mthong ba la tshad du phyin ma phyin las thabs la bye brag med na yang /
NK079(dzu)004:440: mtshan nyid bar ma'i rig pa tha dad pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:442: dang po stong pa'i rnal 'byor dang snying rje sprul pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
NK079(dzu)004:443: phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor dang //
NK079(dzu)004:444: spros pa dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
NK079(dzu)004:445: rang dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
NK079(dzu)004:446: de yang gnas skabs kyi ming du ma'ang ngo bo gcig pa ni man ngag las /
NK079(dzu)004:447: stong pa'i sgo ni dang po ste //
NK079(dzu)004:448: bsnyen pa rnam pa de nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:449: gnyis pa mtshan ma med pa'i sgo //
NK079(dzu)004:450: bsnyen cha de nyid gsum pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:451: smon pa med sgo nye gnyen pa //
NK079(dzu)004:452: bzhi pa ni bsgrub dang bsgrub chen cha /
NK079(dzu)004:455: rang bzhin 'od gsal sgo yang nge //
NK079(dzu)004:456: lnga pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de //
NK079(dzu)004:457: dgos pa'i dgos pa mthar phyin 'gyur zhes pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:458: byang chub sems kyi rim pa dang sbyar na //
NK079(dzu)004:459: dang po g.yo lngar byang chub sems //
NK079(dzu)004:460: gnyis pa ni smon pa gsum 'jug sems /
NK079(dzu)004:461: gnas dang mthar phyin bzhi lnga pa //
NK079(dzu)004:462: gsum mthong gnas pa bzhi dang ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:463: lnga pa lnga pa nyid du sbyor //
NK079(dzu)004:464: yang na rnal 'byor gcig lngar ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:465: zhes gsungs go sla bas ma bshad do //
NK079(dzu)004:467: yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni //
NK079(dzu)004:468: phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag /dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin //
NK079(dzu)004:469: 'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:470: dngos grub myur du grub pa 'dod na //
NK079(dzu)004:471: shin tu 'phra shing zab bar bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:472: bdag dang bdag gis gzhan rnams ni //
NK079(dzu)004:473: shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:474: ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:475: thams cad sgyu ma'i dmigs yor dang //
NK079(dzu)004:476: sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:477: de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas //
NK079(dzu)004:478: de nas phra ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:481: yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:482: de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste //
NK079(dzu)004:484: nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par //
NK079(dzu)004:485: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:487: de dag kyang zhi ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:488: khro bo gnyis gnyis su mos pa'i dbang gis /
NK079(dzu)004:489: gsum pa yan chad la sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:490: thar pa'i lam dam pa ni gnyis te /
NK079(dzu)004:493: de la gcig car 'jug pa'i ni 'di nyid las //
NK079(dzu)004:494: dbang lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyir gsal te /
NK079(dzu)004:495: ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs pas ri mo dkyil 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:496: la mi rten par thig le mtshan ldan gyis rdzogs
NK079(dzu)004:497: pa ste / bla ma'i zhal du rags ma lus pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:498: rim par 'jug pa ni gnyis te /
NK079(dzu)004:499: rlung gi las kyis steng 'og gi sgo la rten pa'i bye brag go //
NK079(dzu)004:500: de yang sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las //
NK079(dzu)004:501: bye brag rlung las gyur pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:503: dgugs dang bskug pa'i thabs nyid de //
NK079(dzu)004:504: 'khor lo gsum gnyis srog shing gsum //
NK079(dzu)004:505: me rlung 'gro bas nam mkha'i ba //
NK079(dzu)004:506: bzho pa steng du rnam par grags //
NK079(dzu)004:507: bskug pa gsum gyis sems lnga'i rims //
NK079(dzu)004:508: skyed pas bcu drug sa thob pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:509: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:510: 'ching ba nyid kyis thar pa'i lam //
NK079(dzu)004:511: zhes gsungs pas rgyu 'bras kyi tshul gyis gnyis so //
NK079(dzu)004:512: lam gyi rkyen yan lag bstan pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:522: ting nge 'dzin sngon du bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:523: gnas skabs kyis yan lag tu brtsi ste /
NK079(dzu)004:524: thabs kyang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:525: de yang spyod yul thams cad ma 'da' la /
NK079(dzu)004:526: dam tshig chen pos don mdzad pa //
NK079(dzu)004:527: rtsa ba yan lag kun gyi gnyer //
NK079(dzu)004:528: gnyis med phul rtogs byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:529: zhes pas rnam par nges pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:530: de la gzhan gyi spyod pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:531: blang dor med pa rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:532: dad brtson gyi spyod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:533: rang bzhin med pa'i spyod pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:535: bye ba spangs ba'i rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:536: spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:539: de yang dang por cig char /
NK079(dzu)004:540: drug mthong sgom rim sbyar tha ma thabs la sbyar /
NK079(dzu)004:549: de la so sor dbye ba ni //
NK079(dzu)004:550: rang bzhin nyid dang mthar phyin pa //
NK079(dzu)004:551: cig kyang sku gsung thugs su 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:552: tha ma gdul bya byams dang khro //
NK079(dzu)004:553: bsod nams gter dang las bsgrub lnga'o //
NK079(dzu)004:554: de nyid rnal 'byor thog mthar shas //
NK079(dzu)004:555: gnyis pa rang rig rang snang ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:556: phung po 'byung ba la sogs pa //
NK079(dzu)004:557: snang zhing mtshon pas ming thob nges //
NK079(dzu)004:565: dang po gsum pa la sbyar ba //
NK079(dzu)004:566: gnyis pa don gyis drug tu snang //
NK079(dzu)004:567: de bzhin tha ma'i rnam gnyis lnga'o //
NK079(dzu)004:568: mi rtog ye shes lnga rdzogs pa //
NK079(dzu)004:570: gsum pa ji bzhin zhi khro tshogs //
NK079(dzu)004:571: rnam par dbye ba bdun du gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:572: de ltar tshom bu gcig gsum lnga //
NK079(dzu)004:573: bye brag lha dang rnal 'byor dang //
NK079(dzu)004:574: yo byad dus dang gnas khang ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:575: byang sems phyi nang gsang ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:576: gnas bzhi khams sum ye shes che //
NK079(dzu)004:577: rtsa bshad rgyud gnyis thun mong sbyar //
NK079(dzu)004:578: zhes sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa'i man ngag las gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:581: dgos ched nges tshig ngo bo dang /
NK079(dzu)004:582: rnam grangs skyon yon rnams ni /
NK079(dzu)004:583: bdag gzhan gnyis phyir skyon yon gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:584: ming thob ngo bo bsrung bya rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:585: mdo rgyas 'bring bsdus gcig lnga gsum //
NK079(dzu)004:586: rgya gsum bcu drug yang na bzhi'o //
NK079(dzu)004:587: tha ma rnam gnyis khyad par spyi //
NK079(dzu)004:588: bdag dang gzhan gyis mong bas bzhi'o //
NK079(dzu)004:589: de nyid shes bzhin sngon song bas //
NK079(dzu)004:590: sngo bas bzhi phyir grol thar pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:591: sngon du thob bya skabs su bsdam //
NK079(dzu)004:593: de yang man ngag gis gsal bsam bkrol lo //
NK079(dzu)004:596: bdag gzhan don phyir mdzad pa'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:597: ngo bo rnam pa yon tan dang //
NK079(dzu)004:603: dkyil 'khor thabs dang rim pa'i sa //
NK079(dzu)004:604: las kyi don rdzogs dang po bzhi //
NK079(dzu)004:605: gnyis la gsum brgyad khyad par grangs //
NK079(dzu)004:606: rnam bzhi yon tan bdag gzhan gyis //
NK079(dzu)004:607: bzhi gnyis dkyil 'khor rjes su sbyang //
NK079(dzu)004:608: bya ba hom thabs mchod rten dang //
NK079(dzu)004:609: rdzas dang bro stabs gar gyis bya //
NK079(dzu)004:610: rnal 'byor gnyis gsum goms pa bas //
NK079(dzu)004:611: dang blang gsum bzhi smos ci dgos //
NK079(dzu)004:612: gnyis pa'i gsum pa gnyis pa'i mtha' //thabs la gnas pas brtsam par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:613: dang po'i dang po dang por sbyar //
NK079(dzu)004:614: dang po'i gsum pa gsum par sbyar //
NK079(dzu)004:615: de nas gzhan rnams dbul rims bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:618: thun mong ma yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:620: thun mong ma yin pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:621: phyag rgya la brten te bsgrub pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:623: thun mong bsgrub pa la drug ste //
NK079(dzu)004:627: rgyal po chen po bsgrub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:628: lha chen po bsgrub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:630: de yang bye brag bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:631: bdag gzhan ched du gnyer ba'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:632: gnas dang yo byad rdzas sngon bya //
NK079(dzu)004:633: dkyil 'khor las rim gags gsal dang //
NK079(dzu)004:634: dngos grub blang thabs grub pas rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:635: grub pas dbye bas gnyis su 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:636: rnal 'byor gsum sogs brtan pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:637: dang po rnam gnyis sngon bya ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:638: tshe la gnas pa'i bsgrub pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:639: gsum po dag la legs nyes 'byung //
NK079(dzu)004:640: de phyir de sngon de bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:641: bdag phyir de bzhin gzhan phyir du //
NK079(dzu)004:642: rnal 'byor rjes mthun skabs su brtsa ma //
NK079(dzu)004:643: spros bcas brtan na the tshom med //
NK079(dzu)004:644: de tshe tshom bu bsgrub par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:645: de dag gi cha rkyen ni /
NK079(dzu)004:646: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:649: don rtogs pa'i cha rkyen gtan tshig gis yan lag gzhal bya rtogs par byed pa'i thabs ni /
NK079(dzu)004:652: shes rab kyi ngos par byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:654: brgyud pa nye ring gis nges pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:656: de la gtan tshigs gnyis ni tshad ma bka' gzhung gi gtan tshigs dang /
NK079(dzu)004:658: de la yang dag pa gsum bzhi dang /
NK079(dzu)004:661: bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK079(dzu)004:666: byas pa'i tshul nas gsum char du 'gyur gyis kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:669: de la thun mong la'ang bzhi ste /
NK079(dzu)004:670: mtha' dang bral ba'i gtan tshigs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:674: de dag ngo bo gsal bsam sprad na'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:675: skabs su rigs par sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:676: rgyud kyi cha rkyen la gnyis te //
NK079(dzu)004:679: de la bshad pa'i thabs ni /
NK079(dzu)004:682: rab tu spros pa'i don te /
NK079(dzu)004:683: gang zag gsum gyi ched du gsungs pas rtsa ba'i rgyud las ston te /
NK079(dzu)004:684: 'dir gnas skabs kyi don tsam gyi phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:685: rgyud nyid kyi tshigs lugs kyis rim par bstan te /
NK079(dzu)004:686: khong lugs kyi de ltar yang ston mod kyi //
NK079(dzu)004:687: 'on kyang 'dir spyi don bsdus pa'i tshig tu 'grel pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:688: rnam par dbye ba'i tshig tu 'grel pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:689: dgos par 'brel ba'i tshig tu 'grel pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:690: gnas skabs 'phen sdud kyis 'grel pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:691: don gyi bcud ston par 'grel pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:692: gnas skabs bsdu ba'i tshig tu 'grel pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:693: sgra don bsgyur bar 'grel pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:694: bye brag gi tshig tu 'grel par bshad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:695: dgos 'brel ni brjod bya dang 'brel pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:698: de yang sgyu 'phrul phyi ma las /
NK079(dzu)004:700: rkyen dang ston pas snang bar byed //
NK079(dzu)004:701: dngos lnga la rgyu 'bras tshul du zin /
NK079(dzu)004:702: ngo bo dbu ma dgos pa'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:703: mtha' ma'i rnal 'byor yang dgos pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:704: rkyen la rgyu rkyen brjod byed de //
NK079(dzu)004:705: ngo bo brjod bya dgos pa'ang de'o //
NK079(dzu)004:706: dang po gnyis rgyu gsum 'bras bu //
NK079(dzu)004:707: 'brel ba'o mthu can yang dgos don //
NK079(dzu)004:708: don rnams lam kun rgyu 'bras tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:711: skabs kyis dgos pa'i dgos par 'gyur zhe'o //
NK079(dzu)004:713: rang rig 'od gsal nam mkha' che //
NK079(dzu)004:714: bde ba'i ye shes brjod bya de //
NK079(dzu)004:715: nam mkha'i rtsi 'bebs thabs rkyen dang //
NK079(dzu)004:716: ye shes snying pos thig ler brjod //
NK079(dzu)004:717: de nyid thabs dang thabs byung tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:718: gnas bzhi'i thabs sogs dgos pa'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:719: bde ba'i khams ni des bsgrubs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:720: yo ga gsum rdzogs bstan bya'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:721: gsang yul dbang po rnam shes reg /
NK079(dzu)004:722: 'dus spyad thig les brjod byed cing //
NK079(dzu)004:723: bzhi 'dus tshe na phyag rgya bzhi //
NK079(dzu)004:724: byed sdom thabs rnams dgos pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:726: bzhi lnga'i ye shes mthar thug po //
NK079(dzu)004:728: bstan pa dar bar bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:729: sdud po dang skal ba mchog la gtad pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:731: rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma las gsal bas ma bkod do //
NK079(dzu)004:732: de dag la ni mos pa'i dbang gis gdul bya'i snang ba'o zhes bsnyad do //
NK079(dzu)004:733: de yang las cha dag pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:735: mthar zad pas phye bas tha dad par 'gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:737: de dag gi rgyud du nges par 'byung ba'i snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:738: de yang rtog pa rnams la 'khor ba'i lus //
NK079(dzu)004:739: thar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku //
NK079(dzu)004:740: ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du snang //
NK079(dzu)004:742: de bas na cha rkyen tshang ba 'di ni gnas
NK079(dzu)004:743: skabs kyi mtshan gsum gyis rgyud du ma longs pa
NK079(dzu)004:744: 'dra na yang / sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las /
NK079(dzu)004:745: bslad pa'i tshig bral sgro skur med //
NK079(dzu)004:746: rgyu rkyen 'bras bu bdag po dang /
NK079(dzu)004:749: de ltar ston pa'i rgyud 'di dag 'brel ba dang po'i /
NK079(dzu)004:751: 'di'i rnam par dbye ba'i spyan gsum yan lag dang
NK079(dzu)004:752: bcas pa'i don le'u rnams so sor bsdu zhing ngo
NK079(dzu)004:753: bstan pa ni / le'u dang pos rnal 'byor dang
NK079(dzu)004:754: po dang gsum pa'i don dang bar ma'i mthong sgom
NK079(dzu)004:755: bstan pa ni / ston to // le'u gnyis pas /
NK079(dzu)004:756: grol thar lam gnyis ka dang rnal 'byor dang po dang tha ma'ang ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:758: thabs kyi lam dang grol ba'i lam ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:760: rnal 'byor gsum dang rigs kyi ngo bo ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:763: rgyud kyi rgyu lta bur yang ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:764: le'u drug pa dang bdun pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:769: bcu gnyis pa rnams ni 'phrin las ston te /
NK079(dzu)004:770: rnal 'byor gsum char ston te bar ma shad che bar sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:771: le'u bcu gsum pa ni bdag gzhan don du tshe bsgrub pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:772: bdag sngon tu bya bar bstan to //
NK079(dzu)004:773: le'u bcu bzhi pas bdag gzhan gyi legs nyes 'dri ba ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:774: le'u bco lnga pas grol ba'i rim 'jug ston pa'i bar ma'i gsum pa ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:775: bcu drug pas grol lam rim 'jug phan yon dang bcas pa tshang bar ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:776: bcu bdun pas bdag don du bdud rtsi bsgrub pa ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:777: bco brgyad pas dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dang grangs ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:778: bcu dgu pas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:779: spros bcas rnal 'byor gyi yul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:780: nyi shus pas lha chen po dang rgyal po bsgrub pa ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:781: rnal 'byor gsum pa yan lag gi spyod yul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:782: nyer gcig pa bdag gzhan don du lhag pa gzugs brnyan bsod nams rten gyi dkyil 'khor 'chad te /
NK079(dzu)004:783: rnal 'byor kun gyi yul du ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:784: nyer gnyis pas byang chub sems kyi 'khor dang //
NK079(dzu)004:786: nyer gsum pas cig car ba dang thun mong lam ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:787: nyer bzhi pas rnal 'byor gsum gyis rdo rje zhing bsgrub ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:788: nyer lnga pas grol ba'i lam gnyis kyi grangs ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:789: nyer drug par rnal 'byor tha ma ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:790: nyer bdun pas dam tshig rtsa ba ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:791: lam gyi ngo bo'i rkyen dang gol sa ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:792: nyer brgyad pas rtsa ba bco lnga mdor bsdus pas lam dang /
NK079(dzu)004:793: rnal 'byor gnyis pa'i shas kyang ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:794: nyer dgu pa'i le'usa rnal 'byor gsum dang snang ba bzhi rgyas par ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:795: sum cu pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong le'usa
NK079(dzu)004:796: mthong lam dang bskyed rims kyi yon tan dang 'bras
NK079(dzu)004:797: bu ston to // so gcig pa dbang po yul
NK079(dzu)004:798: dus kyi le'u yis rnal 'byor gsum char ston to
NK079(dzu)004:799: bu ston to // // so gnyis pas phyag rgya
NK079(dzu)004:800: dam tshig gi rnal 'byor gsum gyi cha ston to
NK079(dzu)004:801: bu ston to // // // so gsum pa bro
NK079(dzu)004:802: gar rtse 'jo'i mthar nye ba'i spyod pa tshogs bsgrub
NK079(dzu)004:803: bu ston to // // // pa dang / thabs kyi lam dang yon tan ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:804: de ltar de bzhin gsum du bsdus nas gsum yang skabs ming tsam ste /
NK079(dzu)004:806: ngo bos shin tu gcig par ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:807: don de ltar che long rnam par gzhag par sbyang nas /
NK079(dzu)004:809: lnga bcu'i sa 'grel cing bshad pa ni tha ma'i
NK079(dzu)004:810: dbang du 'bru gnyer la 'jug pa brtsam par bya'o
NK079(dzu)004:811: // de la rnal 'byor thog mtha' dang bar ma'i mthong sgom bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:812: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos /
NK079(dzu)004:813: mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs nas //
NK079(dzu)004:814: nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par 'dus par bstan nas /
NK079(dzu)004:815: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:817: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod 'dul nyid kyis phyung ba'i tshig ste /
NK079(dzu)004:818: bka' lung gi dgos ched du 'chad do //
NK079(dzu)004:819: de la thog mar gnas skabs 'phen sdud kyi tshig smos pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:820: dam tshig mchog gi rgyud 'di nyid dgos ched dang ngo bo'i phyir dkrugs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:821: 'khrugs pa skabs kyi tshig dang por phyung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:822: rnal 'byor dang po mngon du byas pa'i bdag nyid ni /
NK079(dzu)004:823: longs spyod chen po mnga' ba'i phyir thams cad kyi
NK079(dzu)004:824: byed pa por gyur bas rnal 'byor gsum gyi don
NK079(dzu)004:825: gnyis kyi ched du brjod pa ltar snang ba de
NK079(dzu)004:826: / dgongs pa gang gi dbang zhe na //
NK079(dzu)004:827: rigs kyi bdag po nyid dngos po gnyis kyi lus can du bzhugs pa de bstan par dgongs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:828: de gzhi ci las zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:831: dngos po gnyis rang rig pas mi mnyam pa blang
NK079(dzu)004:832: dor med pa lhun gyis grub pa 'ba' zhig las
NK079(dzu)004:833: ma g.yos pa las yul med pa nyid gdul bya'i
NK079(dzu)004:834: snang bas dgongs pa gzhan par snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:835: bshad pa gzhan du sgyu 'phrul phyi ma las /
NK079(dzu)004:836: thabs kyis gnyis med bde ba che //
NK079(dzu)004:837: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes yul bral //
NK079(dzu)004:838: phung sogs lha'i rngos gzhi pa //
NK079(dzu)004:839: gsal bar snang ba brjod par 'dod //
NK079(dzu)004:841: khas blangs pa'i rnal 'byor thog ma mnyam pa dang po gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:843: 'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag /snga phyi med par mnyam yin par //
NK079(dzu)004:844: nges pa med par yang dag gsungs //
NK079(dzu)004:845: zhes pa'i ngo bo dang don bshad pa'i ni /
NK079(dzu)004:846: thun mong du grags pa'i rgyu 'bras spyad zin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:847: rgyu rkyen sbyad la 'bras bu ma spyad pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:848: rgyu rkyen 'tshogs la ma spyad pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:849: gnyis po yod la ma 'tshogs par rkyen la rag las pa'i ngo bo ni /
NK079(dzu)004:850: rtog pa'i blos de ltar gzung du zad kyang rnal
NK079(dzu)004:851: 'byor dang po'i ngo bo nyid gnyis ni rgyu rkyen
NK079(dzu)004:853: rim pa dang bye brag gi blang dor bral ba'i don ma nor bar gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:854: gzhi ngo bo yongs su ma zin pa ma nor
NK079(dzu)004:855: mi bslu bar bka' stsal pa ni rkyen gyi dbang
NK079(dzu)004:856: du gyur pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:857: de dag gi ngo bos mnyam pa dang po'o //
NK079(dzu)004:858: de dag rtogs par bya ba'i don du na /
NK079(dzu)004:859: snang ba bzhi rim pa dag ste //
NK079(dzu)004:860: de'ang yang snang ba dang po'i ngo bo las //
NK079(dzu)004:862: bzang ngan gyi rngo gzhi mi zin pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:863: ngo bos mnyam pa gnyis thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:865: rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:866: 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:867: 'khrul pa gnyis kyi ngo bo las yang dag pa'i snang brtags dang /
NK079(dzu)004:868: log pa'i snang brtags gnyis te /
NK079(dzu)004:869: de dag kyang sgra don gyi dbye bas gnyis bzhir gyur pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:870: de dag las nang rigs kyis snang ba phyogs gcig la'ang snod bcud bsam yas par snang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:871: sdud pa'i don gyis ltos pa'i 'khrul pa'i bye brag rnams te /
NK079(dzu)004:872: de dag ni mi mnyam mnyam pa lta bur snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:873: de dag gi ngo bo dang mtshan nyid ci zhes na /
NK079(dzu)004:874: sgyu ma dmig yor tshul yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:875: zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa gnyis ni /
NK079(dzu)004:878: don dam pa'i ngo bo snang stong la sogs pa'i mtha' las grol ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK079(dzu)004:879: tshul gnyis su ston pa las bye brag med do //
NK079(dzu)004:880: lhag ma ni lam dang 'grel bar ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:881: rjes su bsgom lam bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:883: skyes bu blo stsal rab ldan pas //
NK079(dzu)004:884: de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing //
NK079(dzu)004:886: ngo bos mnyam pa'i don gtan tshigs kyis go nas
NK079(dzu)004:887: thag chod pas ji lta bar rang rig pa'i mngon
NK079(dzu)004:888: gsum du byas pa'i shes rab kyi spyan su la
NK079(dzu)004:889: yod pa ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid thog ma mthong
NK079(dzu)004:891: byed pa'i sgra ni mtshan nyid bar ma'i thog ma la 'jug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:892: snyegs pa dang gzhir ston pa ni mthong ba dag
NK079(dzu)004:893: pa de bzhin nyid kyi don la spyod lam bzhir
NK079(dzu)004:894: rig pa yul med pa bzhag pa med par rang
NK079(dzu)004:895: mi g.yo ba ni blos mnyam pa ste gnyis med
NK079(dzu)004:896: pa'o // mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa la brten nas slob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:899: de dang gnyis med dbyings su sbyor zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:900: gdul bya 'khrul pa ji snyed pa ril gyi byang chub sems lnga bskyed pa'i gzhi ni /
NK079(dzu)004:901: yul dang bral ba'i snying rje chen po gdung ba
NK079(dzu)004:902: med la rgyun ma chad pa'i don de nyid rig
NK079(dzu)004:904: ye shes rang gsal du bsgom pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:905: mnyam pa'i dbyings dang mi phyed pa nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:906: ting 'dzin gsum pa gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:907: thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de //
NK079(dzu)004:908: thabs la thabs ni rnam par rol //
NK079(dzu)004:910: dngos po gnyis ril rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gsung lnga'am lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:911: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin yin pa'ang rgyu dang ngo bo don gyis ma skyes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:912: thugs kyi yi ge ste lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i thabs so //
NK079(dzu)004:913: de nyid la de ltar mthong ba'i rig pa 'jug stsol med pa ni 'bebs pa'i thabs so //
NK079(dzu)004:914: de la 'phra ba gsum dang sbom po'i rnal 'byor
NK079(dzu)004:915: du slob pa ni gnas skabs kyi chas dran pa
NK079(dzu)004:916: cig kho na'o // bzhi lnga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:917: thabs chen thabs las byung ba'i zhes pa gcig las
NK079(dzu)004:918: du ma'i tshul gyis sku gcig yul med par bstan
NK079(dzu)004:919: pa rgyal ba du ma'i skur shar ba'i ni mtsho
NK079(dzu)004:920: dang skar ma lta bu ste phyi nang med par
NK079(dzu)004:921: rang gsal ba ni snang ba mi 'gog pas thabs
NK079(dzu)004:922: so // de nyid bstan pas dbang sgyur gyi rnal
NK079(dzu)004:923: 'byor thob pa'i tshe rgyal ba grangs med par gsal
NK079(dzu)004:924: bas bcu gsum pa'i rjes su slob pa dang rdzu
NK079(dzu)004:925: 'phrul ci yang 'byin nus pa ni bsam gyis mi
NK079(dzu)004:927: de bas spros bcas kyi tshe nang shas yod mod
NK079(dzu)004:928: kyi 'di tshe cho 'phrul bzhi the tshom med par
NK079(dzu)004:929: snang ba'o // rnal 'byor tha ma bstan pa'i phyir na /
NK079(dzu)004:930: de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:931: snyegs pa ni bcu gsum pa'i rjes su slob pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:932: ting nge 'dzin de las su rung ba las rdo
NK079(dzu)004:935: bden pa gnyis med rang rig pa'i mngon sum du byas pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:936: zhen mtha' ril dag pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:937: bden pa res 'jog med pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:938: lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
NK079(dzu)004:939: snying por gyur pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:940: de yang rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma las /
NK079(dzu)004:941: ca sgra mthong med mthong ba'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:942: ma skyes sga yis mi g.yo ba //
NK079(dzu)004:943: ka sgras thugs rjes rnal 'byor spyod //
NK079(dzu)004:944: a las dbyug ldan ka sbyar ba //
NK079(dzu)004:945: dran pa gcig par rang nyid smra //
NK079(dzu)004:946: de srogs byed pa'i rnal 'byor lnga //
NK079(dzu)004:949: lam gzhan du na sgyur 'phrul rgya mtsho las //
NK079(dzu)004:950: rang bzhin ye shes mtha' bral ba thabs dang las can skyes bu yis /
NK079(dzu)004:951: spyod lam kun tu blang bya ba //
NK079(dzu)004:953: chags pa'i dam tshig blang bya bar //
NK079(dzu)004:954: kun kyang thabs dang shes rab phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:955: phan tshun 'gyed pa'i thabs nyid ni //
NK079(dzu)004:956: sems mtha' 'ong bas go phye nas //
NK079(dzu)004:957: rang snang thabs kyis gnas sbyar ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:958: zung 'jug thabs chen de las byung //
NK079(dzu)004:959: gnyis med ye shes rdo rje che //
NK079(dzu)004:960: rgyu rkyen gzhan las byung ba ni //
NK079(dzu)004:962: 'o na 'bras bu de lam gyis bstsal bas gzod 'byung ngo zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:963: ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:964: yang dag don gyi snying po ni //
NK079(dzu)004:965: gang nas btsal kyang mi snyed na //
NK079(dzu)004:966: rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin zhes rgyu 'bras
NK079(dzu)004:967: kyi theg pa kun la sbyangs te 'bras bu'i don
NK079(dzu)004:968: du gnyer yang / mi nor ba'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:969: bdag nyid kyi phyir gzhan nas mi 'byung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:970: gang zhig tshol ba ni ri dgas mi yul so 'tshams 'das pa lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:971: de'i phyir thob bya med pa las nor ba'i zhen
NK079(dzu)004:972: pa dag btsal la rnyed ces btags kyi ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:973: ni dag pa bzhi gsum du ye nas gnas pa
NK079(dzu)004:974: nyid do // de bas na 'di nyid thun mong
NK079(dzu)004:975: ma yin pa'i lam ma nor bar bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:976: nyid do // / de la rtag 'khrus goms pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:977: bsnyed pa'i dam pa de nyid yin zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:978: snyegs pa dang gzhir ston pa ni rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa'i tshig dang don do //
NK079(dzu)004:979: rang gzhan du ma lus par nges pa mthong ba mthar phyin nas /
NK079(dzu)004:980: tshul gnyis goms par 'byed pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:981: grangs dus mtshan ma las khyad par gyur pas //
NK079(dzu)004:982: dngos po lam dag pa sbyar ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:983: ma thob par thob par byar med pa ni phyin
NK079(dzu)004:984: pa med par phyin pa'i don rngos gzhi gang du'ang
NK079(dzu)004:985: mi zin pa la go 'phang chen po ma 'dres
NK079(dzu)004:986: la yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:987: de ni ma nor lam yin par //
NK079(dzu)004:988: a yis bod de rab tu bsdus //
NK079(dzu)004:990: byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid gang snyams pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:991: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ni //
NK079(dzu)004:992: gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med //
NK079(dzu)004:993: gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du med //
NK079(dzu)004:995: zhes pa de ltar lhun gyis grub pa'i don ma
NK079(dzu)004:996: bslad ma bcos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya'i mtshan
NK079(dzu)004:997: nyid ni / mtha' rnams ma spangs bral lam bsdus
NK079(dzu)004:998: rdzogs pa'i sems nyid bye brag gi chos su rang
NK079(dzu)004:999: snang bas rnam pa gcig brjod du'ang mi btub bo
NK079(dzu)004:1000: nyid ni / // des na du ma'i chos su'ang
NK079(dzu)004:1001: med de cir yang rang rig mu mtha' dang bral
NK079(dzu)004:1002: nyid ni / // ba kho na'o // 'o na
NK079(dzu)004:1003: yon tan ci yang mi snang ba zhig go zhe
NK079(dzu)004:1004: nyid ni / // ba kho na'o // na /
NK079(dzu)004:1005: mtha' yi spros pa dang bral ba'i sems nyid sku
NK079(dzu)004:1006: gsung thugs mi bzad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lor rang
NK079(dzu)004:1007: snang ba'i tshad rtog ge'i blos dpag pa las 'das
NK079(dzu)004:1008: nyid ni / // ba kho na'o // na /
NK079(dzu)004:1009: pa'i phyir / byin rlabs ya mtshan mtha' yas mchog
NK079(dzu)004:1010: nyid ni / // ba kho na'o // na /
NK079(dzu)004:1011: pa'i phyir / zhes gsungs so // 'bras bu de
NK079(dzu)004:1012: bsdu na dur 'dus snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1013: don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1014: phung po la sogs pa ril gdod nas ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:1015: kyi phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:1016: du sangs rgyas pa ni bsgrub bya dang shes bya
NK079(dzu)004:1017: dam pa kho na nges pa'i lung rang bzhin gyi
NK079(dzu)004:1018: rgyud do // de las gzhan pags par smra bas 'di mi mthong ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1019: de las lhag pa'i don smra ba /
NK079(dzu)004:1020: don ni rnam dag lam yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:1021: rang blo bsam pas 'khrul pa yin zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1023: phyogs dus rgyal ba'i ngo bo nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:1024: mi zad 'khor lo rang snang don //
NK079(dzu)004:1025: mi mthong rmongs pas 'khrul pa rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:1026: byin rlabs lha dang yon tan lhar //
NK079(dzu)004:1029: mdongs pas nam mkha' brnyebs pa bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:1030: nor pas ma nor rnyed mi 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:1032: de'i ngo bo nyid gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1033: thams cad rang rig byang chub sems //
NK079(dzu)004:1034: de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad //
NK079(dzu)004:1035: tshad bzhi phab pa'i don yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:1037: zhen pa bzhi bsdus pa'i la rang gi mtshan nyid
NK079(dzu)004:1038: rig pa dang gsal ba de nyid mtha' ma spangs
NK079(dzu)004:1039: bral ba la ril lhun gyis grub par gsal ba
NK079(dzu)004:1040: la mi g.yo ba'i don ni sgro skur dang ngang
NK079(dzu)004:1041: gis bral bar bden pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1042: de ni dpral du gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang bral te /
NK079(dzu)004:1043: phyi mo nas lung dang rig pa dang mngon gsum
NK079(dzu)004:1044: dang rjes dpag thun mong ma yin pa dag gi
NK079(dzu)004:1045: grub mtha' grub zin pas ma nor ma bslad pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1046: shes bya'o // lhag ma ni skabs kyis bsgom lam
NK079(dzu)004:1047: dag dang 'brel par 'chad pa'o bsgom lam gang zhe
NK079(dzu)004:1048: shes bya'o // na / dag pa rnam gsum tshul sgom zhing //
NK079(dzu)004:1050: snod bcud dag par bshad pa'i don gsum gyis thag bcad de /
NK079(dzu)004:1051: de nyid ji lta bar rig pa rang gsal la mi g.yo bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1053: dper nyi mas 'ong mi 'tshol ba ltar tha snyad
NK079(dzu)004:1054: du mnyam par 'jog par stsol ba skad zer yang
NK079(dzu)004:1055: dngos po bdag nyid pas blo rjes su 'brengs ba
NK079(dzu)004:1056: med pa'i phyir / bye ba med la bya mi bya //
NK079(dzu)004:1058: bdag nyid ci'i phyir yin snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1060: 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1061: chos so cog 'bras bur lngar ma 'gags par rang snang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1062: rigs drug ril rten dang rten can med par lam
NK079(dzu)004:1063: dang 'bras bu lnga'i bdag nyid du yod pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:1064: ro // gzhan don sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las //
NK079(dzu)004:1065: rtsi bcud shes pa'i ngo bo nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:1066: thabs kyis yab yum ye shes gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1067: de nyid rten can rten lnga lngar //
NK079(dzu)004:1068: rang gnas thabs kyi bdag nyid du //
NK079(dzu)004:1069: nyon mongs sa bon kun kyang gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:1070: de phyir gzhan la rag ma lus //
NK079(dzu)004:1073: de nyid dang longs spyod du bstan pa gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1074: zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod //
NK079(dzu)004:1075: bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod //
NK079(dzu)004:1076: za ma tog dang rin chen rgyal //
NK079(dzu)004:1077: gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:1078: rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1080: 'bras bu'i longs spyod ni 'phel 'grib dang bral ba dgos 'dod skong ba'i nor bu lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1081: de rgyu rkyen gzhan las ma rags pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1082: dper 'dod lha dang mi'i rgyal po dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1083: lha klu'i bum pa bzang po dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1085: rin po che za ma tog dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1086: rkyal bu'ang logs nas ma byung ste bsod nams mthu
NK079(dzu)004:1087: can du gyur pa'i rig par rang snang ba lta
NK079(dzu)004:1088: bu'o // de bas na mchog chen po'i dngos ni
NK079(dzu)004:1089: zag pa can las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:1090: bu'o // na / lha srin la sogs yod pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1091: nor 'dra rin chen ma yin te zhes gsungs te
NK079(dzu)004:1092: bu'o // na / / ngo bo dang yul gyi zag pa gnyis ga bral ba gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1093: lhag ma ni khyad par can gyi ngo bo ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1095: bo de dkor ni rin po che //
NK079(dzu)004:1096: sku gsung mi bzad par ldan pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1097: rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1098: byang chub kyi dkor ni bdun kho nar 'dus par 'chad par 'gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:1099: dpa' ni dgos 'dod skong ba dang 'phel 'grib med pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1100: rtog pa bral ba'i chos bzhis sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:1101: de'i mtshan nyid dang tshad ni gcig du ma las
NK079(dzu)004:1102: grol bas gcig la'ang ril lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dkyil
NK079(dzu)004:1103: 'khor smra brjod bsam pa las 'das pas thams cad
NK079(dzu)004:1105: de dag gi don rtogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1106: dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni //
NK079(dzu)004:1107: dang po don rtogs mtha'i mi gtong //
NK079(dzu)004:1108: chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin du //
NK079(dzu)004:1109: spyod yul kun tu tshad dpag med //
NK079(dzu)004:1111: zhes pa grub pa'i mchog du gyur pa 'bras bu'i bcud ni gang zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:1112: blog ma ni rnal 'byor de nyid de ji lta
NK079(dzu)004:1113: bar tshul bzhes rang rig pa'i mngon gsum du byas
NK079(dzu)004:1114: pa ni / dang por dbugs phyin pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1115: grangs kyi ston te gnyis su'am 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:1116: ngo bo spyan gyi mchog yod na'ang 'khor bar mi ldog pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1117: de'i chos mthun pa ni chu srin gre bar rin chen chud pa lta bu ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1118: shes pa dang yul yongs su dag pa la ldog pa'i sa rang gis med pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:1119: 'on kyang 'jug pa'i phyir mtshan nyid dor ba ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:1121: zhes pa gzhi'i rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1123: stong zhing bden pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK079(dzu)004:1124: rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med de //
NK079(dzu)004:1125: ci'ang med las cir yang snang //
NK079(dzu)004:1127: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:1128: sems kyi sgyu 'phrul chen po yin //
NK079(dzu)004:1130: mang la 'brel pas dra ba'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:1132: phyogs gzhan du dang sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las /
NK079(dzu)004:1133: shes rab thabs rol sgyu ma las //
NK079(dzu)004:1135: thabs dang thabs byung 'brel pa nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:1136: thams cad kun gyi gzhir gnas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1138: de nyid kyi nang nas yang bstan pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1139: gnas gzhi gar thabs sgyu ma las //
NK079(dzu)004:1140: nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1141: cir snang bdag nyid rig par 'brel //
NK079(dzu)004:1142: dra ba'i don du nga yis bshad zhes gsungs te /
NK079(dzu)004:1143: 'dir 'dogs su gnas pa'i tshul gyis rgyud nyid de bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:1144: 'dir le'u'i mtshan ni gang zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:1145: phyogs bcu dus bzhi snod bcud bdag las 'dus pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1146: longs spyod sku gsung thugs mi bzad par rgyan kyi
NK079(dzu)004:1147: 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u zhes pa yi ge'i go
NK079(dzu)004:1148: rim bzhin du le'u'i don gsum po dum bu gsum
NK079(dzu)004:1149: du sbyar ro // gos dang 'dra ba'i phyir skabs kyi don choms su bstan pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1150: lung gis gcod de che long rnam par bzhag pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1151: le'u dang po'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////rnal 'byor
NK079(dzu)004:1152: mi stsol ba gnyis dang bar ma'i lam gnyis bstan
NK079(dzu)004:1154: le'u gnyis pa mthong bar byed pa'i thabs la 'jug par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1155: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:1156: chos thams cad nam mkha'i mkha' dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1157: yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas /
NK079(dzu)004:1158: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:1159: zhes pa skabs kyi tshig ni rgyud dkrugs pas ming thob kyi /
NK079(dzu)004:1160: rjes thogs su sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:1161: rgyud dang ston pa thun mong du bstan pa'i gzhi las /
NK079(dzu)004:1162: gnas skabs kyi don dpe'i sgo nas chos so cog
NK079(dzu)004:1163: nang gi nam mkha' dang gsang pa'i nam mkha' dbyer
NK079(dzu)004:1164: med pa'i don 'khor gnyis kyi ched du bstan par
NK079(dzu)004:1167: don gyis nam mkha' gnyis kyang thun mong du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1168: yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni //
NK079(dzu)004:1169: bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la //
NK079(dzu)004:1170: nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:1171: yid bzhin rin chen gsal bar thim //
NK079(dzu)004:1172: a zhes pa ma nor mi slu bas lhag pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1173: don dam du 'gyur bas de myong rka ba ni
NK079(dzu)004:1174: ji lta bar gnas zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:1175: dngos po gnyis sbyong la mi 'dzin pa'i longs spyod
NK079(dzu)004:1176: mnga' bas ming bzhi pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub
NK079(dzu)004:1177: pa nyid do // de'i tshul ni kun rdzob du
NK079(dzu)004:1178: mnyam par rdzogs pas phung sogs ye shes bzhi bcu
NK079(dzu)004:1179: rtsa gnyis su sangs rgyas pa la spang bya med
NK079(dzu)004:1181: de bas rig pa'i byin rlabs 'grib 'phel med par rang lhar snang zhing gsal ba nyid /
NK079(dzu)004:1182: rang rig dngos gzhi ma skyes par bye brag med pa ni gcig gi sgra'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1183: de bas na rnal 'byor dang po'i don mtha' gsum
NK079(dzu)004:1184: dang bral ba'i phyir phyi mo'i yi ges mtshon pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:1187: gsang gsum bzhis bsgribs ye shes che //
NK079(dzu)004:1188: khams gsum 'dus pa'i thig le gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:1189: 'dres pas lhun grub ye shes nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:1190: dkyil 'khor gsal snang brtag par rka //
NK079(dzu)004:1192: de nyams su lon pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1193: thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings //
NK079(dzu)004:1194: zhes pa dngos po'i gnyis pa ril ni bdag nyid chen po mnyam pa nyid mu mtha' med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1196: sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun //
NK079(dzu)004:1197: thams cad yum gyur dbyings su thim //
NK079(dzu)004:1198: 'chad pa'i sku lnga las dag ma dag la 'gro
NK079(dzu)004:1199: 'ong med par snang ba'i bye brag ril kyang thig
NK079(dzu)004:1200: le chen po lhag pa'i dbyings su bye brag mi
NK079(dzu)004:1201: phyed pa'o // gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:1202: zhes pa don de mngon sum du byas pas zhen
NK079(dzu)004:1203: pa'i dri ma gnyis sbyangs pa ni rang rig pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1205: des rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub kyi dbang phyug du gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1208: yab yum gshi ra bcud bcas rgyu //
NK079(dzu)004:1209: thabs kyi khams lnga'i ye shes gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1210: bde skyid thig le ma rnams kun //
NK079(dzu)004:1211: sems mtha' zlog pas gnas su thim //
NK079(dzu)004:1212: bcu gsum sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur ba //
NK079(dzu)004:1213: ngo bo gzhan nas thob pa med //
NK079(dzu)004:1215: rnal 'byor dang po de'i mtshan nyid gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1216: byang chub sems kyi thig pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:1217: kun la khyab cing mi gnas pas //
NK079(dzu)004:1218: kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin zhes pa gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:1219: sems nyid ma gsal dag la ma bsdus rdzogs par
NK079(dzu)004:1220: gsal bas gdon nas drang por byung ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1221: ril gyi ngo bo bas mtshan nyid mi snyed pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1222: gzugs bral gzugs kyang rdzogs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1223: de'i 'bras bu'i bcud du gyur pa gang gi yul yin min bye brag dbye ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1224: yon tan mchog gi snying po ni //
NK079(dzu)004:1226: rtog ge'i spyod yul yong ma yin //
NK079(dzu)004:1228: mun pa'i shes pa dang log sred can gyi shes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1230: phyogs su rig pa'i shes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1231: mtha' dbus med pa'i shes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1232: yang dag phyi pa'i shes pa bdag ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1233: lhan cig skyes pa'i dri ma dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1234: ched du byas pa'i dri mas bsgribs pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1236: brgyud pa dang mos pa'i yul spangs pa ni ma yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1237: 'o na gang gi yul yin snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1238: zab cing rgya che bar sbyangs pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1239: gsal ldan bstan pa'i spyod yul te //
NK079(dzu)004:1241: gang dag shes rab rgya mtsho lta bu dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1242: nam mkha' lta bu dang glog lta bu dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1244: ri bo lta bu yod pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1246: drug las sngon du brtsal bas /
NK079(dzu)004:1247: shes rab kyi rab rim med cing rnal 'byor bying
NK079(dzu)004:1248: rgod dang bral ba'i skal ba can gyi mngon gsum
NK079(dzu)004:1249: pa'i yul lo // de bas na kho thag bcas
NK079(dzu)004:1250: nas ring du stsol ba dag ni mdongs pa nam
NK079(dzu)004:1252: lhag ma'i don ni bdag nyid du 'chad do //
NK079(dzu)004:1253: lam dang 'bras bu rag gzhan du ma lus pa'i yul du mi phyed pa'i phyir des kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:1254: gzhan nas brtsal zhing brtag tu med do //
NK079(dzu)004:1256: le'u'i don dang po'i mtshan don dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1257: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
NK079(dzu)004:1258: sna tshogs 'jig rten khams g.yos dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1259: rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:1260: nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur bar //
NK079(dzu)004:1261: dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na'ang med //
NK079(dzu)004:1263: 'chad pa'i dngos po gnyis po ril bu /
NK079(dzu)004:1264: ngo bo ma grub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1265: ngang gis mtha' bral pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1270: rgyud du mi skye mi 'jig pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1271: bdun gyis mthun pa nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1272: de nyid khas blangs pa'i dngos po 'khor ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1273: mya ngan las 'das par bsnyad pa tha dad pa nyid kyi ngo bo de lta bas /
NK079(dzu)004:1274: 'khor ba dong sprugs su gyur pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1275: log rtog las nor pa tsam las mi snyed pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1276: dus bzhi dang bcur brtsal yang mi snyed pa'i tha tshig ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1277: phyi mo'i rigs don dam pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1278: don 'dis rgyud kyi che bar yang bstan pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1279: dus gsum bder gshegs nyid mi mnga' //zhes pa bya ba byas shing khur bor ba pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1280: mdzad pa rdzogs par nyes pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1281: rtsol ba dag las sogs pa'i rgyal ba ril gyi dgongs pa'i zhes phugs su gyur pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1282: sngon gyi bder gshegs thugs chud pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1283: nam mkha'i ngang du thams cad thim //
NK079(dzu)004:1284: zhes pa lnga par 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang don
NK079(dzu)004:1285: 'di mngon du byas nas lhag pa'i chos sku chen
NK079(dzu)004:1286: po mngon gsum du byas pa gshegs shul dam pa
NK079(dzu)004:1287: ste / rnam pa gcig ni ma yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1288: de nyid gang gis bsgrub snyam pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1289: thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de //
NK079(dzu)004:1290: dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor //
NK079(dzu)004:1292: zhes pa chos so cog snang ba ma spangs par
NK079(dzu)004:1293: dag par lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyu kho na nyid
NK079(dzu)004:1294: la / de nyid bdag nyid du rtogs pas phebs par bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1295: nam mkha' dang gsal ba ltar /
NK079(dzu)004:1296: de nyid tsam du 'du shes kyis ma bzung ste yul med par rang gsal ba /
NK079(dzu)004:1297: skyed du bya ba med par gyur pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1298: rdo rje gsum gyis ngo bo gcig pas mthar phyin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:1299: byang chub rdo rje thig le yin //
NK079(dzu)004:1301: phyogs gzhan du na rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma las /
NK079(dzu)004:1302: sa ya bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha' //bde ldan nyungs 'bru gzhal yas su //
NK079(dzu)004:1303: bdag po gdung can rnam par sbyar //
NK079(dzu)004:1304: nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las //
NK079(dzu)004:1305: skyes pa chos sku chen por bshad //
NK079(dzu)004:1307: rang bzhin de nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1308: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1309: rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:1310: kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1311: yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:1313: rang byung gi ye shes dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rdos gzhir gyur pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1314: chos kyi sku nyid yin la /
NK079(dzu)004:1315: sdud pa'i don ni yon tan chad rdzogs pa des /
NK079(dzu)004:1316: bsgos pa med par kun la bsnums la /
NK079(dzu)004:1317: rnam pa ma spangs par mtshan nyid mi zin pas
NK079(dzu)004:1318: bden pa gsum pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu'o
NK079(dzu)004:1319: // lhag ma ni ngo bo snang ba'i bde gnyis kyi tha snyad 'chad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1321: ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma //
NK079(dzu)004:1322: de yis ma byas gang yang med //
NK079(dzu)004:1324: gang phyi mo'i rigs ni bslad pa med par thams
NK079(dzu)004:1325: cad du rang snang bas snang ba gsum gyi byed
NK079(dzu)004:1326: pa po'o // rgyun gyi skad cig ma rig ma rig gis rngos po gnyis su snang ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1327: rnal 'byor thog ma dang bar mar gyur te //
NK079(dzu)004:1328: cig shos 'khrul pa'i snang ba de ngo bos dang por 'gyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1329: de bas na ngo bo skye shi mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1330: rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1331: yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1332: gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs //
NK079(dzu)004:1333: phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:1334: de la bsad cing bzung du med //
NK079(dzu)004:1336: de ltar rang snang la nan brtags 'pho 'gyur du
NK079(dzu)004:1337: snang ba tsam las ngo bo la med pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:1338: / sangs rgyas dang sems can dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1340: yon tan mchog gi snying po la gzhig cing gdags su med de /
NK079(dzu)004:1342: kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin //
NK079(dzu)004:1343: zhes pa bshad zin te bsnyen po dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1344: gshig bya gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:1345: don de la bskul bar gdam pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1346: skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1347: de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis //
NK079(dzu)004:1349: byang chub chen po grub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor cig char 'jug par 'dod pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1350: rnal 'byor phyi mo'i rigs la spyod lam bzhir rtogs nas goms par tshul gnyis kyis byos shig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1351: goms pa'i grub mtha' gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1353: rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste //
NK079(dzu)004:1355: rim gyis pa dang cig char bas don la goms
NK079(dzu)004:1356: pa las su rung ba'i 'bras bu skyed du bya
NK079(dzu)004:1358: gdod nas sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas de
NK079(dzu)004:1359: mngon du gyur pa la rnam par smin pa'i snga
NK079(dzu)004:1360: phyi med pa'o // de'i ngo bo gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1361: thams cad ming tsam mtshan nyid du yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1362: dngos po thams cad brtags pa tsam las rang rgyud
NK079(dzu)004:1363: pa med pa nyid sku gsung thugs su sangs rgyas
NK079(dzu)004:1365: de'i mtshan nyid gcig dang du ma las grol bas /
NK079(dzu)004:1366: cig kyang gsum gsum du gsal ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1367: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor bsdus zhes pa gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1368: de nyid sha stag las gzhan ma dmigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1369: tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol //
NK079(dzu)004:1370: skye 'jigs med pa'i dbyings la bzhugs zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1371: yi ge 'khor lo'i sa'i bdag nyid pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1372: ye shes bla ma'i sa'i bdag nyid pas gnyis dus
NK079(dzu)004:1373: gcig tu rdzogs pa ni dman pa dag gsum rdzogs
NK079(dzu)004:1375: dgag pa ni ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:1376: de bas nas gnyis kyi bdag nyid chen po ni
NK079(dzu)004:1377: skad cig ma'i rgyun las grol ba'i phyir rtag pa
NK079(dzu)004:1378: chen po'i bdag nyid du gnas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1379: rtag pa gsum las 'das pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1380: lung gis gcod le'u mtshan gyi don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1382: mtha' yas dkyil 'khor bsam yas kun //
NK079(dzu)004:1383: zhes pa 'khrul pa'i snang ba ji snyed pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1385: rgyal ba'i snang ba ril ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1386: rang bzhin gyi rgyud rnal 'byor dang po'i ngo bor
NK079(dzu)004:1387: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mar bye brag
NK079(dzu)004:1388: med pas / dngos po gnyis pa ril byang chub chen por bsdus pa med par rdzogs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1389: rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim //
NK079(dzu)004:1390: thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus //
NK079(dzu)004:1393: rang bzhin gyis dgyes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1394: rtogs goms kyis dgyes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1397: chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid de /
NK079(dzu)004:1398: yum gyi dbyings su 'dus shing gsang ba'i le'u ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1399: zhes pa'i dngos po gnyis ni bshad zin te /
NK079(dzu)004:1400: gsang ba ni chos gnyis kyi phyir rtogs rka ba de phal gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir te /
NK079(dzu)004:1401: tshig bsnor te dngos gzung ba /
NK079(dzu)004:1402: le'u gnyis pa mthong ba'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1403: lam gnyis dang dkyil 'khor bdun gyi tha ma'i cha bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1404: le'u gsum pa mthong bar byed pa'i thabs bshad pa la 'jug par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1405: des na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lha'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs nas /
NK079(dzu)004:1406: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:1410: dgos ched dang gsungs par 'grel te //
NK079(dzu)004:1411: gdul bya'i snang bas lam gnyis kyi dgongs pa nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:1412: de yang de nyid kyis bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni nyid kyi snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1413: thabs kyi lam gang snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:1414: lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang 'bru lngar gnas pa'i byang chub ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1416: byang chub rdo rje tril las byung //
NK079(dzu)004:1418: de dag gis bstan par mi nus kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:1419: sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyar las phung sogs rtogs pa thams cad kun /
NK079(dzu)004:1420: bde ba'i ye shes lnga ru gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1421: de nyid bcu gsum sangs rgyas pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1422: ye shes dbyings rig rang gnas pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1423: khams gnyis 'dus pa'i thabs las skyes //
NK079(dzu)004:1424: skyes pa nyid na bdag du gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1426: spyir ni brjod pa thams cad kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:1427: kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a //
NK079(dzu)004:1428: skye 'jig nyid na yi ge lnga //
NK079(dzu)004:1430: bco brgyad khams sogs btags pa kun //
NK079(dzu)004:1431: rngos med lhan cig ye shes che //
NK079(dzu)004:1433: go phye nyid na ye shes lnga //
NK079(dzu)004:1434: gnyis su med par byang chub sems //
NK079(dzu)004:1435: kun spangs bral ba gang med pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1436: snang med snang ba dam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1438: de ni byang chub sems yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:1439: gnyis med byang chub mchog 'byung ba //
NK079(dzu)004:1442: zad med rin chen gter yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:1444: khams gsum thabs kyi ye shes che //
NK079(dzu)004:1445: rtse mo 'brug gsum gnas mthong ba //
NK079(dzu)004:1446: rdzas lnga'i ye shes so sor gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1447: nyi zla'i khams 'dres drangs mnyam sbyor //
NK079(dzu)004:1449: tshogs drug ye shes cha lnga gcig /thabs la bzlog pas sngon nas shes //
NK079(dzu)004:1451: brjod 'drar thos shing sa gsum mthong //
NK079(dzu)004:1452: phung khams yul gyi zag pa med //
NK079(dzu)004:1453: a li ka li bde ba nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:1454: phan tshun ma 'dres gcig par shes //
NK079(dzu)004:1455: bcu drug ngo gnyis mtshan dang ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:1456: phyogs gcig ye shes lnga ldan pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1457: brgya bcu'o bzong sogs rgyu las 'phags //
NK079(dzu)004:1459: mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang sbags //
NK079(dzu)004:1460: zhes gsungs te yon tan nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:1463: mkha' drag po'i gnas kyi lte ba'i bu ga nas nyi ma shar ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1464: bdag po ma skyes pa'i sa bon thabs kyis bskyes pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1465: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
NK079(dzu)004:1467: nyi zla 'dres pa ni gsang ba'i thig le ste
NK079(dzu)004:1468: bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas so
NK079(dzu)004:1469: // de'i thob lugs ci zhe na //
NK079(dzu)004:1470: nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba //
NK079(dzu)004:1471: kun la khyab ci nga sna tshogs smin //
NK079(dzu)004:1473: phyag rgya chen po dang bdag po'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mkha' las /
NK079(dzu)004:1474: thabs kyi chags pa'i mes bzhu bas byang chub sems kyi phung po //
NK079(dzu)004:1475: sta rtser ldings shing 'thibs pa de //
NK079(dzu)004:1476: thabs kyi sbyor bas rgyu 'bras bzlog pa'i tshe mkha'
NK079(dzu)004:1477: 'gro ma kun la mchod pas snod bcud rgyud kyi
NK079(dzu)004:1478: dngos po ril / dus gcig dag pa ni 'bras bu 'ba' zhig pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1479: 'on kyang ngo bor bos pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:1480: de dag thabs lnga pa kho nar nges pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1481: gzhan du na gnas drug lam gsum rang gnas la /
NK079(dzu)004:1482: thabs kyis drag po me byung bas //
NK079(dzu)004:1483: bzhu bas bde ba lte'i ar //
NK079(dzu)004:1484: thim pa sbrul pa'i gsang thig le //
NK079(dzu)004:1485: ye shes nam mkha' 'byung ba'i rgyu //
NK079(dzu)004:1486: bde chen rgyud las char rgyun sems //
NK079(dzu)004:1487: rim pa gnas thim khams gsum sa //
NK079(dzu)004:1490: lnga pa'i 'bras bu nyid gang zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:1491: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas bsam mi khyab //
NK079(dzu)004:1492: byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che //
NK079(dzu)004:1493: yon tan mi bzad gter du 'gyur ho //
NK079(dzu)004:1494: zhes pa rtog tshogs sku dang ye shes su lhun
NK079(dzu)004:1495: gyis grub pa'i ngang las gdul bya la snang ba
NK079(dzu)004:1496: mtha' yas pa ni rtsa ba sku gsung thugs las
NK079(dzu)004:1497: 'gro 'ong med par rang snang ba las 'grib pa
NK079(dzu)004:1498: med pa'i / ngo mtshar chen po de thabs des mngon du byas pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1499: gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1502: ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings //
NK079(dzu)004:1503: dbyings las mi gzhan ye shes thig la'i ngang //
NK079(dzu)004:1504: ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs gnyan sgyu ma'i tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:1505: snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:1507: gdod nas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyi mo'i rigs mngon
NK079(dzu)004:1508: du byas pa'i ye shes chen po mu mtha' med
NK079(dzu)004:1509: pa ni / mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid pas yul can
NK079(dzu)004:1510: du rgya ma chad pas ngo bos lhun gyis grub
NK079(dzu)004:1511: par gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1513: gdul bya las ma dag pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1515: thun mong ma yin pa dag pa rnams la //
NK079(dzu)004:1516: ji ltar bltas pa ltar snang zhing don spyod tsam
NK079(dzu)004:1517: na rgyu nyid kyi phyir rtsol bas byas pa dang
NK079(dzu)004:1518: / bya byed med pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1520: ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu lnga'i don /
NK079(dzu)004:1521: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub kyi //
NK079(dzu)004:1522: thabs dang shes rab gnyis mnyam par gnas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1523: bshad pa'i ye shes drug pa nyid bye brag cir yang rang gsal ba'i ngo bo kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1524: ye shes kyi sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1525: rdo rje gsum gyi lha rnams de sgrub bya de nyid kyi ngo bo /
NK079(dzu)004:1526: gcig dang du ma med pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:1527: de bas na bden pa gnyis ris su ma chad pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1528: zung du dbyer med pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1529: sa gnyis kyi bdag nyid pas mi rtsol bas don rdzogs par 'thad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1530: des na rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
NK079(dzu)004:1531: sku'i phyag rgya che mchog ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1533: cig char 'jug pa'i lam gsum bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1534: dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas shing //
NK079(dzu)004:1535: mnyam pa rnam bzhi don rtogs mchog gi gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:1537: thog mar dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i yan lag dang po la gnas pa'i tshe /
NK079(dzu)004:1538: gtan tshigs kyi sgo gnyis kyi gsum dang bzhis //
NK079(dzu)004:1539: rang bzhin gyi rgyud rang rig pa'i mngon gsum du byas pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:1540: 'bras bu ril gyi gzhi rtsa ste yan lag gnyis pa mthong ba'i lam rgyu'i mtshan nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:1541: de ni byang chub chen po'i rgyu yin pa'i don dang 'brel pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1542: de'i rjes su 'brang ba med par lhun gyi gnas
NK079(dzu)004:1543: pa mnyam par bzhag pa med par rang gsal ni
NK079(dzu)004:1544: / dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pas dgos pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1545: mtshan nyid bar ma'o de ltar gnyis zung du dbyer
NK079(dzu)004:1546: med pa'i stobs ni yan lag dang mtshan nyid tha
NK079(dzu)004:1547: ma ste mthar phyin pa'i lam ste yang dgos so
NK079(dzu)004:1549: rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus //
NK079(dzu)004:1550: ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyiis bsdus //
NK079(dzu)004:1552: snga ma'i grangs phyi ma'i nges tshig dang bcas pas grub pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1553: ye shes lnga lhun gyis gru ba pa'i ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:1554: ni gsum gyi'ang bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang
NK079(dzu)004:1555: / sku lnga la sogs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1556: gsung phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1557: thugs phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:1558: 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na //
NK079(dzu)004:1559: chags med bzhi'i las thig ler 'jug ces pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1560: thag chod pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1561: yang dag pa'i zhen pa nyid kyang med pa'i lam ni bsgom lam bzhi kho na ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1562: chos nyid stong pa chen po'i sgo dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1563: de nyid yul du mi 'dzin pa'i snying rje chen po stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1564: bdag nyid lhar gsal bas 'bras bu la smon pa med pa'i sgo dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1565: rig pa nyid lha dang longs spyod kyi bye brag tu gsal ba'i sgo'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1566: thabs kyi rim pa des snying po byang chub la 'jug pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1567: cig shos pa dag ni bzhi ma 'dres la yongs rdzogs par lhun gyis 'jug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1568: ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul man d+ha la /
NK079(dzu)004:1569: ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:1571: de ltar 'jal ba'i spyod yul ni ji ltar zhe na //
NK079(dzu)004:1572: drug pa'i ye shes nyid lnga'i dngos gzhir gyur pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1573: snying po'i don gyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1574: de'i mtshan nyid yul dang bral bar rang gsal ba
NK079(dzu)004:1575: ni ba sam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:1576: can kho na'o // mtshan nyid dang po'i bya byed bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1577: thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis //
NK079(dzu)004:1578: dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor //
NK079(dzu)004:1580: dngos po gnyis pa ril gyi rang gi mtshan nyid gdod nas rig par gsal ba'i bdag nyid pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1581: rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thabs dang ma ldan
NK079(dzu)004:1582: pa'i chos ril gyi ngo bo phung po 'byung ba
NK079(dzu)004:1584: khro bo lnga dang khro mo dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1585: ye shes lnga dag cing mnyam par dbyer med pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1586: de nyid kyi phyir de mthong ba med par mthong ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1587: de bas na gsum gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis 'grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1588: de'i rjes su shes pa'i rgyud nyid kyang rgyun las grub pa nyid lam du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1589: chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong //
NK079(dzu)004:1590: nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi //
NK079(dzu)004:1591: rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang //
NK079(dzu)004:1592: dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma //
NK079(dzu)004:1593: de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam //
NK079(dzu)004:1595: chos rnams ngo bo ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs kyis
NK079(dzu)004:1596: spyod yul rang bzhin la rtogs pa'i dngos por zhags
NK079(dzu)004:1598: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs bzhi yis mthar ma gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1599: gnyis po med pa'i phyir rgyan gyi rtag pa nyid
NK079(dzu)004:1600: las grol ba'i ngo bo rang gsal ba ni thar
NK079(dzu)004:1602: rag gzhan du lus pa med pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1604: phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste //
NK079(dzu)004:1605: ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1606: nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog /ces pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1607: rang bzhin log pa khams gsum pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1609: gzhan rkyen log pa ril brtags pa tsam ste las nor yang ngo bo ma nor ba'i rgyal /
NK079(dzu)004:1610: dwo bu lta bu'i lhag pa'i don dam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1611: de bas na ling thog gnyis kyang de bzhin pas
NK079(dzu)004:1612: ngo bo drug pa'i ye shes su gdod nas gsal
NK079(dzu)004:1613: bas rgyu rka nas dag pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1614: thams cad yon tan gsum gyis bsdus pa rnams rang
NK079(dzu)004:1615: rgyud med pas bde chen po'i yo lang nyid de
NK079(dzu)004:1616: / nyi ma'i snying po lta bur mun tshogs btsal
NK079(dzu)004:1617: bas mi rnyed pa'i bdag nyid du lhun gyis grub
NK079(dzu)004:1618: / pa'i phyir / thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas a ho zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1619: yi ge gnyis ni skyes pa nyid ma skyes pa chen por gsal bas /
NK079(dzu)004:1620: bde ba chen por gsal ba'i don to //
