NK079(dzu)004:1621: de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang spros pa dag gis
NK079(dzu)004:1622: dkyil 'khor gyi don dam du 'dus lugs thun mong
NK079(dzu)004:1624: phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun nges pa don bkrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar bsdus /
NK079(dzu)004:1626: sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas pa ril /
NK079(dzu)004:1627: mi slu bar bden pa'i lung ma bgres gsal bar ston pa'i don /
NK079(dzu)004:1628: gcig dang du ma'i sa grol ba'i bdag nyid kyi
NK079(dzu)004:1629: phyir bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor du bye brag
NK079(dzu)004:1630: med pa'o // de nyid kyi don ye shes lnga dang 'bras bu lnga'i ngo bo bas /
NK079(dzu)004:1631: bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar 'dus //
NK079(dzu)004:1633: lnga po don nyid 'bru gsum nang du 'dus //
NK079(dzu)004:1635: de dag kyang dngos po gsum mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:1636: gsum po de nyid yi ge ar 'dus te /
NK079(dzu)004:1637: a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thim am ho //
NK079(dzu)004:1639: sku gsung thugs tha snyad kyi phye yang ngo bo mtha' gnyis su ma lhung bas /
NK079(dzu)004:1640: gdod nas de bzhin pa la de nyid kyi bla
NK079(dzu)004:1641: dgas dang yang bral ba de nyid kyi mi rnyed
NK079(dzu)004:1642: pa kho na'o // 'on kyang grangs don 'phel 'grib
NK079(dzu)004:1643: 'dod pa ni ma yin pas dgyes pa nyid ni
NK079(dzu)004:1644: yi ge gnyis kyi don to //
NK079(dzu)004:1645: phyogs gzhan du na sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las /
NK079(dzu)004:1646: sa ya bcu gsum bde ba rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:1647: gtso bo phung sogs bde bar 'dus //
NK079(dzu)004:1648: thabs kyis bskul bas lam lngar 'jug /bde lnga ze'u 'bru gsum zhugs pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1649: rtse mo'i gnas su thig le che //
NK079(dzu)004:1650: phyi mo'i ro myong ma skyes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1651: sgra 'dres bslar la bsgrubs pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:1652: dkyil 'khor dang po'i gnas thim tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:1653: bden gnyis mnyam gsal yi ge'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:1656: stong phrag gcig sogs rang bzhin lha //
NK079(dzu)004:1657: rdo rje phung sogs rtsa lnga gcig de re'ang khams kyi bde ldan pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1658: ye shes 'bru lngas rgyas btab pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1659: gnas der sa bon rtsa yig bde //
NK079(dzu)004:1660: nyi shu brgya'i bde ba rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:1661: g.yas dang g.yon gyis me chu'i sa //
NK079(dzu)004:1662: sprul pa'i lte bar gnas gtibs pas //
NK079(dzu)004:1663: de nyid ma skyes ye shes gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1665: sems lnga thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1666: mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod mi lang //
NK079(dzu)004:1667: mi gnas de bzhin nyid kyang bsam mi khyab //
NK079(dzu)004:1668: ma skyes chos kyi dbyings kyang kun tu khyab //
NK079(dzu)004:1669: ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye shi med //
NK079(dzu)004:1672: rang bzhin gyi skabs su ni ngo bo nyid kyis spyod yul bral ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1673: mtshan nyid gtan du med pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1674: rngos gzhi gang du'ang mi zin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1676: phan tshun gya gyu ba med pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1677: gdod nas de ltar gsal ba'i sems te ril ba med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1678: de bas na de mngon du byas pa'i rnal 'byor
NK079(dzu)004:1679: kyang mtshan de nyid du son pa'i btags pas phye
NK079(dzu)004:1681: rgos pa yul dang bral ba 'jug pa'i sems chen po dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1682: cir yang mi gnas par cir yang gnas pa'i sems chen po lhun gyis grub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1683: cir yang ma g.yos pa'i thugs rje thams cad du goms pa'i sems dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1684: skye shi ma spangs bral ba'i 'jig pa'i sems dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1685: sprul pa 'gro 'ong med par khyab pa mthar phyin pa'i sems kyis don mi 'gogs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1686: thugs rje'i byin rlabs rnam par 'phro //
NK079(dzu)004:1689: ma dmigs stong pa nyid kyang zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1690: phyi nang gsang bar gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:1692: de la grol ba'i lam pa'i skabs su bye brag bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:1693: bskul phrad mthong thos skye ba ste //
NK079(dzu)004:1694: ma skyes che la g.yo zhing ldang //
NK079(dzu)004:1695: de bas dmigs pa sgor zhugs pas //
NK079(dzu)004:1696: dmigs med rang gsal 'jug pa'i sems //
NK079(dzu)004:1697: des ni slob mtha' gsum gnas pas //
NK079(dzu)004:1698: mi gnas bsam 'das rten bral tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:1699: de goms zhen pa rnam 'jig pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1701: zhen pa gnyis bral yul med pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1702: phyi nang mtho dman bskyod 'jug med //
NK079(dzu)004:1703: mig g.yo bstan pas mthar phyin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1704: rnal 'byor chen pos gzhan don rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:1706: rim pa'i dbang du g.yo ldang smon gyi dagu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1708: gnas pa ni mtshan nyid gnyis la goms ma goms
NK079(dzu)004:1709: kyi gnyis su 'jig pa ni rang rang gi zhen
NK079(dzu)004:1710: pa spong pa'o // mthar phyin pa ni mthar phyin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1712: de ltar mtshan nyid gsum ni rnal 'byor bar ma'i rim pa kho na ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1713: spyi'i gsum ni cha phye nas btags pas bsdus pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1717: ngo bos mi gzhan pa'i phyir te //
NK079(dzu)004:1718: rgyud gzhan las sbags pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1719: tha dad du zhen pa mi gtong ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1720: dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1721: thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:1724: yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu las mu mtha' med pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1725: chos rnams mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor shar ba
NK079(dzu)004:1726: nyid thabs las mi 'da' bas byung khungs su gyur
NK079(dzu)004:1727: pa'o // de bas thabs de nyid ngo bo rang
NK079(dzu)004:1728: rig ma skyes pas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin
NK079(dzu)004:1729: pas ma bsgribs pa nyid la mnyam pa'i dbyings ye
NK079(dzu)004:1730: shes su ming gis phye yang ngo bo la med
NK079(dzu)004:1731: par 'jal bgoms na brtan pa'i rig pa nyid mi
NK079(dzu)004:1732: bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rang shar ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1733: dbyings dang ye shes 'byor pas na //
NK079(dzu)004:1734: byang chub sems chogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang /
NK079(dzu)004:1737: phyogs gzhan du na yul thabs kyi nyi ma shar
NK079(dzu)004:1738: bas sku dang ye shes su snang ba ni shes
NK079(dzu)004:1739: rab nyid thabs su sbyor ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1740: yab la zla ba shar ba nor bu'i rtse mor
NK079(dzu)004:1741: mi dmigs pa'i ye shes skyes pa ni thabs nyid
NK079(dzu)004:1743: bcu drug sa la nyi ma shar ba dang zla ba 'gres pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1744: sa ya phrag gnyis kyi gsung bsam gyis mi khyab
NK079(dzu)004:1745: pa'i ye shes kyi ro dang bcas pa gnas su
NK079(dzu)004:1746: stobs pas sa bcu gsum par gnas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1747: de'i dgyes pa chen po'i sgra brjod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1748: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus par /
NK079(dzu)004:1749: mtshan nyid med par phyag rgya thim pa'i le'u ces pa khyad par du'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:1751: zhes pa'i shwa lo ka phyed dang gnyis kyis gsal bar ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:1752: rig sngags 'chang gis don bsdus nas //
NK079(dzu)004:1753: de skad ces kyang bka' stsal to //
NK079(dzu)004:1755: gnod 'dul rdo rje can nyid kyis 'og min du rgyud bsdus nas /
NK079(dzu)004:1756: 'dzam bu gling du dra ma chen po la snang bar mdzad pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1757: skyes bu'i las thun mong du bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1758: le'u grangs gsum pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////rnal
NK079(dzu)004:1759: 'byor dang rigs grangs dang ngo bo bsdu ba thun
NK079(dzu)004:1761: le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1762: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes
NK079(dzu)004:1763: pa chen po'i 'gro ba thams cad la rang bzhin
NK079(dzu)004:1764: dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1765: rigs rgyud drug tu'ang bshad zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1766: ngo bo dang 'phrin las dang longs spyod chen po
NK079(dzu)004:1767: las mtshan btags pa'i ston pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1768: rgyud 'chad pa'i byed pa po'i phyir bshad ches par
NK079(dzu)004:1769: 'grel to // ci zhig zhe na rnal 'byor dang
NK079(dzu)004:1770: po'i don 'gro drug ril rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil
NK079(dzu)004:1771: 'khor nyid yin pa ni rigs kyi phyi nyid do
NK079(dzu)004:1772: 'grel to // // sdud pas grangs 'dod pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:1773: chos nyid dang chad pa ni mi mthun pa'i sgras
NK079(dzu)004:1774: 'grel to // // / rnam par ma nges khyab pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1777: drug gi lnga rnams ni skabs kyis lam dang 'bras bu gnyis gar 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:1778: rnal 'byor thog ma bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1779: de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni kun la khyab par yod /
NK079(dzu)004:1781: bsnyebs pas 'gan pa ni brgyad drug gi rigs las chos nyid kyi rigs ston pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1783: ngo bo dngos po gnyis pa ril 'di nyid kyi
NK079(dzu)004:1784: phyir rten dang rten can ma yin pa'i ming ngo
NK079(dzu)004:1785: // de mtshon pa ni nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par gnas so //
NK079(dzu)004:1787: snang srid lam bsgoms par khyab pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1788: de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun la khyab kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:1789: mngon par thar ba'i don ma rtogs na me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1790: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so zhes gsungs nas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1791: dpe nam mkha' ltar don ye nas sangs rgyas pa ni dngos po gnas lugs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1792: mi mthun pa ni bden pa 'gro ba rnams kyis
NK079(dzu)004:1793: rtag tu mthong yang nges par ma byas pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:1794: / ma rtogs pa ste de la 'khor ba'i rgyu zhes 'dogs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1795: de bas na chos gnyis kyis me long dang mthun te 'bras bu thob pa'i nus pa med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1796: 'on kyang de nyid na mtha' rnams mi snyed pa
NK079(dzu)004:1797: ni gang yang ma spangs kyang ma 'dres pas rig
NK079(dzu)004:1798: gcig tu bgrang bar yang mi 'gal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:1799: ston pas bka' gsal ba ni chos nyid kyi rigs dang por brjod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1800: byed pa nas rtsom pa la 'jug pa'i tshig gi 'brel ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1801: lam gyi rigs rnams gsung bar 'gyur ba ste //
NK079(dzu)004:1803: mngon du brgyud ma brgyud kyis byed pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1804: dbye zhing skye sa'i rgyu dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1805: nyes pa ngo shes par byed phyir tshig gral nges pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1806: lam dam pa'i rigs nyid gang snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:1807: yang 'di skad ces rdo rje 'chang gis mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1808: rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun 'bab ltar //
NK079(dzu)004:1809: bla med don rtogs thams chen 'di dag tu //
NK079(dzu)004:1810: rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1811: rnan pa skad zer ba ni ston pas rigs rgyas par gsungs pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1812: dang por lam chen po nyid gsung pa de'ang go rims bsgyur ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1813: dpe ji lta bar mngon du byas pa'i rig pa nyid thams cad kyi dngos gzhi'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1814: de mthong bar byed pa'i thabs kyi rgyud du lam thun mong ba rnams 'dus pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1815: rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po /
NK079(dzu)004:1816: bstan pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas kyi phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:1817: 'di nyid mngon du byas pa'i thabs chen po gdul
NK079(dzu)004:1818: bya la ci yang snang ba ni sangs rgyas kyis
NK079(dzu)004:1819: dam pa'i phyir / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor kyang yin la //
NK079(dzu)004:1820: lta spyod ngo bo grub mtha' la sogs pa khyad
NK079(dzu)004:1821: par can gyi phyir bla na med pa chen po'i
NK079(dzu)004:1822: rigs so // theg pa mchog thams cad kyi rgyu 'bras su gyur pa'i don gyis dgyes pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1824: thun mong gi lam rgyu'i theg pa chen po'i rigs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1825: bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1826: sa bcu rim gyis bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK079(dzu)004:1827: sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam //
NK079(dzu)004:1828: bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:1830: theg pa chen po'i lta ba dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1831: kun rdzob tu spyod pa bcu mthar phyin par byas pa'i 'bras bu sa bcu bsdus nas /
NK079(dzu)004:1832: lam gsum dang lngas lhan cig skyes pa'i shes bya spangs te /
NK079(dzu)004:1833: sangs rgyas dang po thob pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1835: de nyid kun rdzob dang don dam par shes pa dang goms pa snyed pas gyur pa'i rigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1836: rang rgyal ba'i rigs gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1837: phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma dmigs g.yor tshul shes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1838: dngos po thogs med gzugs la rab tu 'jug /dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs //
NK079(dzu)004:1839: byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog /zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1840: rten 'brel gnyis ni yul mi 'grub 'dod pa'i 'jug sgo'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1841: tshul ni thog mar lnga'i'ang gzugs kyi phung po de'i
NK079(dzu)004:1842: sgo nas dpyod par byed pa'ang lnga par nyan thos
NK079(dzu)004:1843: kyi tshe goms pas slob dpon la mi rten par
NK079(dzu)004:1844: rjes thob kyi shes pas mngon du byas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1845: gnas skabs kyi yid bzhin bde ba mchog gi sa thob ste rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i rigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1846: de dang de ni dmigs pa chen po la sogs pa bdun gyis 'phags la /
NK079(dzu)004:1847: chung ngu gnyis kyang lta spyod 'bras bu spyod tshul gyis 'phags pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1848: nyan thos kyi rigs gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1849: bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yis //
NK079(dzu)004:1850: ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba //
NK079(dzu)004:1851: rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni /
NK079(dzu)004:1852: nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sar du 'gro //
NK079(dzu)004:1854: sngug bsngal kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi
NK079(dzu)004:1855: sgo nas chos bcu drug gi dbye ba ni 'jug
NK079(dzu)004:1856: sgo ste / gzhi de la khams gsum gyi nyon
NK079(dzu)004:1857: mongs mthong spang gnyis spong tshul ye shes bcu drug
NK079(dzu)004:1858: la shes pa dang bzod par brgyad dang rjes thob
NK079(dzu)004:1859: brgyad kyis khams gong 'og gi mthong ba rtsa ba
NK079(dzu)004:1860: drug las phye ste spong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs
NK079(dzu)004:1862: phyir 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom
NK079(dzu)004:1863: gsum gyis bsgom lam gyi nyon mongs pa 'phra ba
NK079(dzu)004:1864: spong ba'ang gnyis kyis 'dod khams kyi 'phra ba spang
NK079(dzu)004:1865: la / gcig gi gong ma gnyis kyi spong bar 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:1866: des mthar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa drug
NK079(dzu)004:1867: gi 'ang mchog mngon du byed pa dag ni byis
NK079(dzu)004:1869: rigs ma nges pa gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1870: theg pa gang du bstan par ma nges pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:1871: yang na kun la mthun par 'byam par 'jug /zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1872: skye bo'i sa phyogs la sbyangs pa'i nges pa ma yin pa nyid yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1873: mi mthun pa ni skye bo sbyangs pa phyogs med
NK079(dzu)004:1874: pa'i skal pa sgo kun nas bsdu bar slob pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1875: skal pa can nyid yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1876: yang na nges med 'di zhes bstan pa med //
NK079(dzu)004:1877: 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1878: mi mthun pa ni 'jig rten phyal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1879: kun gyi skal ba'i 'phro can rkyen la rag las pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1880: sems skyes ste rigs nges pa can du mi zin de rgyun dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1881: phyal pa dang rigs ma nges pa ni gsum yin par ston pa gnyis kyis bka' gsal /
NK079(dzu)004:1882: lha dang mi'i rigs gang snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:1883: dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1884: 'dod khams lha dang mir ni skye ba'i rgyu zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:1885: rnam par dkar gnag las legs nyes dang sbyor ba'i don gyis dge sdig ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1886: bcu bcu'i sa spang ba tshabs che chung dang dag ma dag gis /
NK079(dzu)004:1887: bcu gnyis kyi mi dang drug gi lhar skye ba
NK079(dzu)004:1888: ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ste rkyen dang thun
NK079(dzu)004:1889: mong pa'o // zla zlog nas gnas tha ma mun pa pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1891: ya nga ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur pa ste //
NK079(dzu)004:1892: de spangs pas thob pa'i sa ni lam stegs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1893: tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo bsgom byed pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1894: tshangs gnas las sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:1896: byams pa dang snying rje dga' ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1897: btang snyoms dag re re'ang bzhi bzhir 'gyur ba las
NK079(dzu)004:1898: 'dir 'jig rten pa'i tshad med pa bzhi gtod pa
NK079(dzu)004:1899: can te yul gyi ming yul can la btags pas
NK079(dzu)004:1901: de nyid bsgom pa bsam gtan bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin
NK079(dzu)004:1902: mi g.yo ba'i las kyis bcu gnyis bcu bdun gyi
NK079(dzu)004:1904: 'bras bu'i dngos po gzhan bsdu ba ni bshad pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1905: gzugs med pa'i khams bzhi ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1906: snyoms par zhugs pa bzhi'i las mi g.yo bas 'grub pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1907: rigs chad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1908: chos kyi dbyings kun la khyab 'gyur yang //
NK079(dzu)004:1910: ngo bo nyid kun kyang chos nyid kyi rigs yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1911: mi mthun pa ni thabs dang bral bas nges par ma byas te ltung bar ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1912: rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi ldan na //
NK079(dzu)004:1913: ji ltar rmus longs mdun du mdog bstan bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:1914: 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:1916: 'chad pa'i rgyu ma rig pa gnyis kyis shes rab spyan mdongs nas /
NK079(dzu)004:1917: dpe ji ltar ba ye nas log pas rang rgyud du gol ba ni chad pa'i sa pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1918: rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa las kyang 'byung ste yun ring du 'gyangs ba tsam la brjod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1919: gdul bya'i snang ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1920: chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:1921: bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang //
NK079(dzu)004:1922: so so rang rig blo la snang bar zad zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1923: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis theg pa mtho dman gyi bstan pa bka' gsal bar snang ba yang /
NK079(dzu)004:1924: ched du rtsol bar thal ba med de gsung lnga lhun grub kyi rlabs 'tsham bar snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1925: 'khrul pa'i snang ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:1926: ngan song 'gro drug snang tshogs rgyu ba yang //
NK079(dzu)004:1927: 'khrul pa'i blo rtog pa nyid snang ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1928: zhes pa gsum dang drug gi sems can phyi nang du snang ba ni rang rgyud pa med de /
NK079(dzu)004:1929: spyi la rang gi mtshan nyid du mthong ba nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:1930: 'o na de kho na nyid ni 'gyur bas ma nges so snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1931: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med //
NK079(dzu)004:1933: ngo bo nyid kyi rtag pa'i phyir 'phel 'grib dang 'pho 'gyur med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1934: de ltar rtogs goms pa nyid mthong sgom gyis lam gyis /
NK079(dzu)004:1935: mngon du byas pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa'ang de nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1936: mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:1937: chad pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin 'gyur na /
NK079(dzu)004:1938: dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:1940: gzung 'dzin mthu rtas pas ngo bo la med kyang bde sdug ji snyed pa myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1941: de bas na lta ba dang bral bas khams gsum
NK079(dzu)004:1942: sangs rgyas kyi sa la zhen pas bslang bas 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:1944: yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na //
NK079(dzu)004:1945: bde bar gshegs kyang ngan song gnas su mthong //
NK079(dzu)004:1947: skyes bu'i yul bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1948: theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:1949: ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:1951: gang dang gang 'tshams pa dang spangs thob med par mthar phyin pa'i phyir ming 'grub pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1952: lta spyod las sogs pa'i rtsal khyad par du 'phags pas dbye gsal med pa'i don mthong nas /
NK079(dzu)004:1953: log pa'i yul nyid yang dag pa'i gnas so //
NK079(dzu)004:1954: de bas na bkra shis ma dang sna nag pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:1955: bud med ltar log pa dang ma log pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:1956: / yul cig rig ma rig gis phye ba tsam pas rigs so sor gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1957: 'o na rang rgyud kyis gnyis par 'gyur te bzang ngan yod med de snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:1958: nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par ces pa //
NK079(dzu)004:1960: mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las rmad 'byung dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1961: 'jig rten gtso mchog sna tshogs thams cad dang //
NK079(dzu)004:1963: rang gi ngo bo rnam pa ma spangs bral bas
NK079(dzu)004:1964: gzung du mi btub pa nyid ril gyi 'byung gnas
NK079(dzu)004:1965: mu mtha' med pa'i ngang las /
NK079(dzu)004:1966: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos tha dad du rtog pa gnyis kyis snang ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:1967: mi mthun pa ni ngo bo la gnyis ma grub pas /
NK079(dzu)004:1968: dngos po rnams kyi de kho na nyid la 'phel 'grib med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:1969: 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang //
NK079(dzu)004:1970: de bzhin nyid la zhu zhing bri ba med //
NK079(dzu)004:1972: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
NK079(dzu)004:1973: thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:1975: rigs brgyad so sor phye ba'i mdo bshad pa'i le'u /
NK079(dzu)004:1977: gnyis nges par zlas dbye ba dang bcas par bstan
NK079(dzu)004:1978: pa'i phyir drug po ma yin par mngon te drug
NK079(dzu)004:1979: dang brgyad do // de dag rgyas par ma bkod de ngo bo tsam bshad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1980: a ni rigs cir snang yang rig gcig pa'i ngo bor ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1981: le'u gzhi pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////rgyud kyi
NK079(dzu)004:1982: rgyu dang dkyil 'khor thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:1983: / le'u lnga'i spyan rnam par dbye ba la brtsams par 'jug par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1984: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs /
NK079(dzu)004:1985: zhes pa ston pa dang 'khor dbang thob pa ril
NK079(dzu)004:1986: gcig tu ma las grol ba'i bdag nyid du bzhugs
NK079(dzu)004:1987: pa'o // byed pa ni bdag nyid chen po'i mchod pa mdzad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:1988: 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:1989: nyid la nyid mnyes pas mchod cing kun tu bzang po dgyes te /
NK079(dzu)004:1991: nyid las mi gzhan pa'i rgyal ba dang sems dpa' las sogs pa rdul snyed /
NK079(dzu)004:1992: rgyud dag pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang
NK079(dzu)004:1993: chub sems dpa' mang po 'khor ltar snang ba dang
NK079(dzu)004:1995: rjes su mthun pa ni mchod pa byed pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:1996: 'khor dbang thob pas rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba
NK079(dzu)004:1997: mngon du byas pas ston pa spyi'i gzugs can nyid
NK079(dzu)004:1998: dang tha mi dad par 'gyur ba ni so sor
NK079(dzu)004:1999: nyid mnyes pa'ang yin la mchod chen gnas su stobs
NK079(dzu)004:2000: pa'ang yin pa'i phyir mchod pas dgyes par snang ba
NK079(dzu)004:2002: lhag ma ni gnas su bzhugs nas chos ston par 'byung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2003: gzhan du na rgya mtsho las /
NK079(dzu)004:2004: sa ya bcu gsum gnyis kyi lha //
NK079(dzu)004:2005: thig le chen por 'dus pa'i tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:2006: sems mtha' ldog pas go phye nas //
NK079(dzu)004:2007: gnas su son tshe rang bzhin 'khor //
NK079(dzu)004:2008: rang rang bde bas rang mchod tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:2009: rigs bdag nyid dang gnyis med phul //
NK079(dzu)004:2010: bde ba lnga las khyad 'gyur phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2011: dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa brjod //
NK079(dzu)004:2013: phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas /
NK079(dzu)004:2014: gzhal med khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2016: rgyas pa mtha' dbus med par khyab cing //
NK079(dzu)004:2017: 'od zer sgrib pa med par rang 'byung ba la //
NK079(dzu)004:2018: zhugs gnas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:2020: dus gsum rgyal ba ril gyi bzhugs gnas kyi ngo bo dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2023: rtse mo mtho dman gyi dbyibs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2026: 'od zer sna tshogs su snang ba ni rgyu rkyen
NK079(dzu)004:2027: rnam par chad pas rig pa rang snang ba'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:2028: / bden pa res 'jog tu thal ba med do //
NK079(dzu)004:2029: ci byed ce na 'khor gyi ched du rgyud kyi rgyu dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2031: gzhan du sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud las /
NK079(dzu)004:2032: gsang ba'i thig le sku mchog des //
NK079(dzu)004:2033: rgyal ba dus gsum gzhugs pa'i gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:2034: las dang ngo bos tshad med pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2035: yon tan kun 'byung brjod mi lang //
NK079(dzu)004:2036: gnyis drug brgyad gcig sor nyungs spags //
NK079(dzu)004:2037: bcu drug bcu gnyis nyi shar gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:2038: de nyid 'dres bzhugs ston pa nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:2039: nang zhugs las kyis snang bar byed //
NK079(dzu)004:2041: gnas gyi rgyu rkyen tshang bas gzhal yas khang du
NK079(dzu)004:2042: longs bar byed pa ni le'u'i mtshan kyang 'grub pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:2043: don bshad pa las tshad bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2044: nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba tshad dpag med zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2045: kun tu bzang po ston pa'i bdag nyid ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:2046: drug pa'i ngo bo las gzhan bcas pa ni khyad
NK079(dzu)004:2048: de nyid gdul bya la 'og min chen por snang ba rtse mo rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2050: kun las dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2052: rang rig gis phyogs kun tu phyin pa med par khyab pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:2054: srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te //
NK079(dzu)004:2056: de yul med par gsal ba ni rgyal ba nyid kyi yul la /
NK079(dzu)004:2057: de yul du mthong na ni slob pa ngang mi
NK079(dzu)004:2058: slob pa'i bye brag gis 'khor gnyis kyi yul lo
NK079(dzu)004:2060: mtshan 'dzin 'das pa'i mchog gi rgyu las byung zhes pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2061: mtshan ma gnyis kyi zhen pa las grol ba'i ye shes drug la ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2062: lhun grub nyid kyi phyir gnas su rang snang ba kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2063: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2064: dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2065: skad cig mas go phye ba med par cir yang
NK079(dzu)004:2066: snang ba'i ye shes chen po mtha' dang bral ba
NK079(dzu)004:2067: nyid ni kun bzang po nyid de /
NK079(dzu)004:2068: sprul pa rang 'byung gi ston pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2069: rgyal tshab rgyud kyi ston pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2070: lung bstan rgyud kyi ston pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2071: mnga' dbang rdzogs pa'i ston pa dang bzhi las /
NK079(dzu)004:2073: de gang du ltar bzhugs she na /
NK079(dzu)004:2074: 'og min gnas bzhugs nas zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2079: ye shes chen po'i 'og min dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2081: gdul bya'i snang ba tha ma nyid du'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2085: dgongs pa gcig par bzhugs 'khor gyis cha bye bas so //
NK079(dzu)004:2086: nyid ni dkyil mo bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs te /
NK079(dzu)004:2087: byed pa ni chos ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2089: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2091: log pa dang yang dag pa'i ched du bya ba'i spyod yul las grol ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2092: rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2093: byang chub sems dpa' mthar phyin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2094: sa chen po'i rjes su de ma thag par byung ba rgyu so so'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2095: byang chub sems dpa' rdul snyed rnams so //
NK079(dzu)004:2096: 'jig rten 'khor gyi gtso 'os bskur dbang phyug dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2097: zhes pa chos kyi 'brel pa dang pas gtam nyan par 'dus pa'i 'khor mthar phyin pa'i lam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2098: gzhan yang 'jig rten yang 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i khams gnas pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2100: go phye ba'i 'khor drug dang lam gnyis la gnas pa rnams so //
NK079(dzu)004:2102: bdud rtsi ro'i dga' ba'i bde chen 'grub /
NK079(dzu)004:2104: chos kyi bdud rtsis dgyes pa chen po mngon du byas pa ni lhan cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2105: thos pa dang sgom pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2106: gnas pas grub pa ni 'khor gcig shos pa rnams so //
NK079(dzu)004:2107: dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2108: 'das dang ma 'das de bzhin nyid du sbyor //
NK079(dzu)004:2110: ston pa'i mdzad pas kun sbyor gsum po bcas cing gcod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2113: 'chi bdag dang lha'i bu rnams dam tshig du 'chad pa ltar bcos zhing 'joms pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2114: rtsol ba med par gdul bya las dag pa gnyis dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2115: ma dag pa'i ril chos sku chen po la dgod par mdzad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2116: rjes 'jug du ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2117: shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don 'byung ba //
NK079(dzu)004:2118: rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2119: gang mi dmigs pa nyid du'ang zhe bas 'dod pa'i sems med pa'i lta ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2120: de nyid bye brag gi chos su ma 'gags par
NK079(dzu)004:2121: rang shar bar rtogs pa su la yod pa las
NK079(dzu)004:2122: / gnyis med kyi 'bras bu 'char bar 'dod na
NK079(dzu)004:2123: de ltar rtogs pa'i rig pa nyid mi zad rgyan
NK079(dzu)004:2124: gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du snang bas yul med
NK079(dzu)004:2125: par gsal la mi g.yo ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2126: stong pa nyid du bsgooms nas don mdzad pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2127: pha blang bu yis blangs pa lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2128: de lam pa'i dbang du sgo gang nas bsgom zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2129: stong smyon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2130: rang bzhin nyid ni ngang gis mtha' gsum med pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2132: de kho na nyid du'ang mi rtog par /
NK079(dzu)004:2133: rang bzhin cis kyang ma bsgribs pa'i ngo bor gsal bas dus gcig tu bsgom pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2134: rims kyis bdag dang por de bzhin bsgom pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2135: de nyid du'ang mi 'dzin par ye shes sgyu ma bsgom pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2136: rang rig 'bras bu'i ngo bor bsgom pa phyag rgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2137: rang rig pa'i cho 'phrul bye brag gi lhar gsal
NK079(dzu)004:2138: ba spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin nas 'jug pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:2139: sgo bzhi pa'o // zad med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2140: mthong bsgom mtshan nyid gnyis kyis mthar phyin pas //
NK079(dzu)004:2141: yul dang phung po dang khams kyi zag pa bral
NK079(dzu)004:2142: nas mtshan dang dpe byad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye
NK079(dzu)004:2143: shes kyi sku grub pa ni go rims bzhin no
NK079(dzu)004:2145: rang byung rin chen pad+ma nyi zla rgyas la bzhugs //
NK079(dzu)004:2148: sems dpa' yab yum ni sum rtseg go //
NK079(dzu)004:2149: sgo ba nyi rtseg nyi ma steng ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:2151: byed pa po yab yum dkyil 'khor gyi tshe sum rtseg go //
NK079(dzu)004:2152: chos 'chad pa'i tshe lnga rtseg go //
NK079(dzu)004:2153: de'i tshe ni mi bskyod pa dang bzhugs tshul ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2156: bdag po kun bzang 'khor rnams la //
NK079(dzu)004:2158: mi bskyod rgyal ba'i mdun na gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:2160: gtso bo ni shes rab la spyod pa'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2161: nang gi chu skyes nyi ma la zla ba la brten pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2162: ri 'ong can steng na gnas so //
NK079(dzu)004:2163: yum rnams ni zla zlog go zhes 'chad na //
NK079(dzu)004:2164: 'khril sbyor gyi phyir gcig par yang mi 'gal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:2165: sgo ba dang thub pa ni rang gi las kyi phyir nges pa gzhag pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2166: de'i steng du su zhig ci mdzad zhe na //
NK079(dzu)004:2167: rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs chud pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2168: mnyam rdzogs chen po'i lhun la rol pa mdzad zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2170: rdo rje ni bden pa gsum pa nyid de //
NK079(dzu)004:2171: de nyid rang rig pa'i mngon gsum du byas pa'i ston pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2172: dngos po gnyis che chung med par btar la //
NK079(dzu)004:2173: mi 'dzin pa ni longs spyod chen po'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2174: sku de de na bzhugs pa ni gdul bya'i ngo brtsan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2175: ston pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2176: bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2177: dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2178: rgyal ba drug pa nyid mnyam pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bor gnas pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2179: sangs rgyas dus bzhi pa'i spyi'i gzugs can du bzhugs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2180: thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs gang las byung snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:2181: de nyid las byung bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2182: thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2183: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las 'byung //
NK079(dzu)004:2185: rang 'byung ye shes rang bzhin dkyil 'khor mngon du
NK079(dzu)004:2186: byas pas mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid
NK079(dzu)004:2187: du bzhugs pa'i stong nyid 'gro 'ong med par thams
NK079(dzu)004:2188: cad snang ba'o // de'i yul gyi tshad bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2189: spyod yul phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes
NK079(dzu)004:2190: pa rnam pa'i chos rnams su rang gsal ba ni
NK079(dzu)004:2191: / yul shes gnyis med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2192: klan ka mi rnyed pa ni tshig gis kyang phebs par dka' ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2194: thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro drug dus nas bzhugs //
NK079(dzu)004:2196: mi g.yo khyab brdal chen po'i shugs kyis grub pa'i ston pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2197: sems can gyi gnas so sor dus bzhi rten dang
NK079(dzu)004:2198: rten can med par zhugs par nyon cig par drang
NK079(dzu)004:2199: ba'i don to // de'i mtshan gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:2200: de dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2201: mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can zhes bya //
NK079(dzu)004:2203: 'dzin pa gnyis grol bas blang dor med pa'i ye shes chen po mngon du byas pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2204: bya ba byas zin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2205: rdo rje lnga pa'i bdag nyid pas //
NK079(dzu)004:2206: 'dul bya la rdo rje dang ldan par snang yang /
NK079(dzu)004:2207: res 'jog du thal ba med do //
NK079(dzu)004:2208: des mtshan don las btags pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2210: rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje sku //
NK079(dzu)004:2212: mi rtog pa gsum gyi bye brag las ngang gis
NK079(dzu)004:2213: grol ba'i ye shes chen po ni yul med pa
NK079(dzu)004:2214: dang / ngo bo mi rnyed pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2215: mi rtogs pa nyid du'ang 'dod pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:2216: las dang po bos rdo rje ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2218: dgongs pa dang nges tshig bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2219: shes rab mchog gis ma la yongs bsdus pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2220: bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon //
NK079(dzu)004:2222: gang ltar bltas par rang gsal ba ni mi dmigs
NK079(dzu)004:2223: pa'i lta ba las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:2224: / ngo bo mi zin pas blang dor med pa'i dbyings mngon du byas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2225: 'gro ba med par phyin pa ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2226: de bzhin gshegs pa dang bde bar gshegs pa sgra nges pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2227: gzhan dag sdud pa por 'chad pa'ang mi 'gog go //
NK079(dzu)004:2228: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de lam pa gang gi yul yin snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:2229: thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par thar pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:2230: dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2231: thabs dang shes rab nyid dbyings dam pa'i mchog zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2232: lhun gyis rdzogs pas rtsol ba med par rig pa cir yang snang ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2233: long thug lta bu ma yin pas //
NK079(dzu)004:2234: mtha' las grol ba'i phyir yul med par mngon du byas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2235: snang stong gnyis su med pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:2236: lta ba'i phul yang thog ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2237: de ni tha snyad bcu bzhi rtsad bcad pa'i grub mtha' chen po pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2238: phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings nas mthas gtug pa zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:2239: 'on kyang gzhan las ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2240: rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:2242: gang zag blo rab kyis bden pa gnyis med mthong bar 'gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2243: la la dag rgyud nas 'dod de //
NK079(dzu)004:2244: da ltar yul min no zhes pa dag lung gis gsal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:2245: nyid la nyid brjod pa bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:2246: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig du'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2248: ngo bo mthong rka ba nyid mtshon pa'i tshig du phyung ba'ang yin la /
NK079(dzu)004:2250: thog ma tha ma med dus nas //
NK079(dzu)004:2251: rdo rje can gyi gsang ba sdud //
NK079(dzu)004:2252: las dang thugs rje 'brel ba yis //
NK079(dzu)004:2253: tra ma che la gsang tshig snang zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:2254: le'u'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2255: gzhal yas khang du ldang ba'i thabs mang la 'brel bar bcas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2256: lugs gzhan bsdu ba'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2257: shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chad pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2258: thugs rje'i byin rlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2259: bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:2260: yid bzhin rin chen mi bzad par ldan 'phro zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2261: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i rgyal ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:2262: sku gnyis kyi bye brag ma 'dres 'tshams par snang
NK079(dzu)004:2263: ba ril gyi bzhugs gnas rang rig pa gzung 'dzin
NK079(dzu)004:2264: dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2265: lam pa'i rig pa'i phal 'grib med par gzhal yas khang du bsgoms par rang gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2266: 'on kyang 'bras bu nyid du mi 'dod pa ma yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2269: nyungs kar sor spags spros med tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:2270: chu skyes 'dab ma'i rtsibs brgyad ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2271: de nyid sa bon gsum rtseg gdan //
NK079(dzu)004:2272: rim bral rnam thar brgyad dang ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:2273: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la //
NK079(dzu)004:2274: phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:2275: dar mo ta ya'i 'khyams phyi rol //
NK079(dzu)004:2276: gru bzhi dbyibs ni rgyas pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2277: rim gsum la sogs sgo brgyad dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2278: phun sum tshogs phyir gsang ba'i gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:2280: gzhal yas khang yang de ltar dbub po zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2282: bsdu ba'i dbang du mi mthun par bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2283: le'u lnga pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2285: drug pa'i spyan rnam par bshad par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2286: de la de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2287: 'di brjod do zhes par sbyar te //
NK079(dzu)004:2288: dgos cha da gang gi phyir gzhi'i 'phrin las kyis
NK079(dzu)004:2289: don mdzad pa'i dgongs pa la bzhugs par snang ba'o
NK079(dzu)004:2290: // thugs rje hom gyi dpe don bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2291: nam mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:2292: yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam 'byung ba //
NK079(dzu)004:2294: dpe'i nam mkha'i sprin char dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2296: byin rlabs kyis gdul bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs te /
NK079(dzu)004:2297: grub par mdzad pa'i phyir ram zhes gsungs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2298: shes rab kyi hom bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2299: srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:2300: yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar //
NK079(dzu)004:2302: srid gsum gyi shing nyid yid rang 'byung gi ye
NK079(dzu)004:2303: shes rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis gnyen po med par
NK079(dzu)004:2305: ting nge 'dzin gyi hom bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2306: dbang po dang po'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK079(dzu)004:2307: spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni //
NK079(dzu)004:2308: lhang nge lhan ne 'od du zhi zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2309: shes rab kyi dbang po rab ri bdag pa ye
NK079(dzu)004:2310: shes lhar gsal bar shes pa brgyad dang yul ril
NK079(dzu)004:2311: de nyid du gsal ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2312: tha dad med pas ngo bo mi g.yo bar rang
NK079(dzu)004:2313: gsal ba'i rig pa ma skyes pa chen pos don
NK079(dzu)004:2314: gyis 'dzin pa bral bas dngos grub rang snang ba
NK079(dzu)004:2315: la spyod yul sbyangs pas nges tshig du 'gyur te
NK079(dzu)004:2318: rang rig pa ma skyes par gcig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2319: zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2320: rims kyis sam cig char du mi rtog pa'i ngang las lhar bskyed pas spyod yul dag pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2321: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi hmo ste res 'jog pa med pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2323: thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che zhes pa dag
NK079(dzu)004:2324: ni thabs sna tshogs kyi mdzad pa lnga ni rmad
NK079(dzu)004:2325: du byung ste / ye shes chen po nyid snang bas //
NK079(dzu)004:2326: thugs kyi yi ge smos te /
NK079(dzu)004:2327: 'gro ba brtsal ba med par don med 'gog pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2328: 'di ni bden gnyis dbyer med pas sems las spags pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2329: dgyes pa ni 'gro don ma brtsal bar grub pa'i dgyes pa chen por bzhugs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2330: bzhi po mjoms shi ngan song tra tam zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2331: gang dag gi phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2332: 'chi ba dang lha'i bu bdud dang chu bo bzhi
NK079(dzu)004:2333: dag gsal nas rnam par smin pa med par mdzad
NK079(dzu)004:2334: pa ni / 'bras bu dang lam pa thun mong du sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:2335: de bas na 'dral ba'i yi ge yang smos so //
NK079(dzu)004:2336: sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong zhing //
NK079(dzu)004:2337: phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag /bdag med gnyis kyis 'dag par byed //
NK079(dzu)004:2339: bsal zhing gzhag par bya ba med //
NK079(dzu)004:2341: shes rab kyi hmo rjes te /
NK079(dzu)004:2342: dpe ji lta bar gzung 'dzin dang bdag gnyis gzhi la med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2343: thams cad bdag yin pa las bdag thams cad pa yin pa'i don gyis gnas su dag pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:2344: gang yang ma bral bas mtshan ma ma spangs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:2345: grub mtha' la blo gzhag par bya ru med par
NK079(dzu)004:2346: shes pa nyid ma nor ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2347: don gyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:2348: nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du //
NK079(dzu)004:2349: snang dang mi snang gnyis ga med zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2350: dpe nyi ma shar ba'i 'od ltar //
NK079(dzu)004:2351: gdon nas mtha' gnyis grol bar gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2353: de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:2354: thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2355: don de ltar go bas gnyis pa med pa'i lta bas spyod yul /
NK079(dzu)004:2356: thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings su gsal ba goms par gyis shig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2357: +amo dang rig ye shes rgyal po yis /
NK079(dzu)004:2358: phyogs bcu'i khams rnams dbang bsdus nas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2359: dag phyir mo'i rnal 'byor brtsan par rang bzhin gyi hom 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:2360: yon tan rdzogs pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi
NK079(dzu)004:2361: khyab pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:2362: / thams cad kyi byed pa po'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2363: bcu'i gsum gyi chos ril gdod nas de nyid du byungs btab pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2364: zhen snang tha dad med par rang rig du gsal bas dngos po bcom pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2365: kun kyang ye shes tshan por khro bo kho na ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2366: ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pas dbung che ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2367: rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2368: shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings su thim zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2369: gang rtag chad bdag mtshan gyi ngo bo nyid ma
NK079(dzu)004:2370: spangs rang bzhin gyis mtha' bzhi dang bral bas ngo
NK079(dzu)004:2371: bo yul med pa'i 'byungs gnas su gsal ba ni
NK079(dzu)004:2372: / rang bzhin gyi khro mo la log bzhi med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2373: de ni khro bo khro mor rang bzhin sku phyag rgyar spangs pa med pa kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2374: de dbyer med par ston pa'i phyir na /
NK079(dzu)004:2375: thabs dang shes rab gnyis min dbyings gyur pas zhes
NK079(dzu)004:2376: pa dag /khro bo dang khro mo zhes bsnyad kyang
NK079(dzu)004:2377: / ngo bo la snang ba nyid na mi dmigs pa'i phyir dbyer med pa'i lhag pa'i dbyings so //
NK079(dzu)004:2378: gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ni rang bzhin gyi ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2379: snga ma'i don gyis 'joms pa ma yin pa med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2380: le'u mtshan don las btags te /
NK079(dzu)004:2381: rang bzhin dang mthong bsgom lam dbang du brjod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2382: le'u drug pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////de nas
NK079(dzu)004:2383: le'u bdun pa'i shin tu gsang ba'i khro bo bshad
NK079(dzu)004:2384: par bya'o // de la de nas de bzhin gshegs
NK079(dzu)004:2385: pa khro bo rgyal pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan
NK079(dzu)004:2386: pa las zhes pa dag /ston pas brjod pa'ang ched
NK079(dzu)004:2387: par bya'o // gnyis kyi phyir / ston pa'i ngo
NK079(dzu)004:2388: bo nyid rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid dang tha mi
NK079(dzu)004:2389: dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rtag pas yongs su
NK079(dzu)004:2390: rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2391: 'byung khungs su'ang thal ba med de /
NK079(dzu)004:2392: byin rlabs khro bor snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2393: dang por de bzhin nyid bsgom par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2394: byang chub mchog gi snying po ni //
NK079(dzu)004:2395: mtshan pas btsal ba ma yin te zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2396: rig pa rang 'byung gi ye shes lhun grub de
NK079(dzu)004:2397: mtshan ma de bzhin la zhen pas rnyed pa ma
NK079(dzu)004:2398: yin pa'o // 'o na gang gis zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2399: dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing zhes pa dag
NK079(dzu)004:2400: /snod bcud rgyud rnams ngo bos dag pa'i don rang
NK079(dzu)004:2401: rig pa'i mngon gsum byas te de nyid la ting
NK079(dzu)004:2403: thob pa med pa'i dngos grub mngon du byed pas thog mar mthong bsgom lam gnyis mngon du bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2404: lhag pa rdzas kyi las bya thabs ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2405: drag po gtum po bsgrub pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2406: bag ni ling ga zhes pa dag /khro bo bsgom pa'i don du gnyer te /
NK079(dzu)004:2407: dmigs gang yin pa bsgral ba'i thabs ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2408: 'brub khung gsum du bzas pa'i dri ma las byas pa'i ling ga bzhag ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2409: snying khar rus dpral bar ming /
NK079(dzu)004:2410: 'doms su gsod pa'i yi ge bri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2411: khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung //
NK079(dzu)004:2412: lan gsum lan bdun rtag bsgom zhing zhes pa dag /lha sngar gang la goms pa'am /
NK079(dzu)004:2413: gang la mos pa de las kyi sngon du nyin mtshan thun gsum gsum dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2415: phyag rgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin las su rung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2417: gzhi'i de las bdag spros bcas kyi lhar gsal ba dang las brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2418: las byed pa'i tshe mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:2420: ling ga yang nas yang bstus te //
NK079(dzu)004:2421: dbyings kyi dkyil du gnyis par bya zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2422: pho nya snga sa la su gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2423: gzas pa lan grangs mang du bkug ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2424: hmo khung gi ling ka la bstims te /
NK079(dzu)004:2426: dbab pa'i phyag rgya byas la bzhir bcings te /
NK079(dzu)004:2427: phye ma 'am ril bu zhal du mchod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2428: nas spang ba gang snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:2429: h'u gis bsdu zhing phata kyis 'phang zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2430: sa bon drug sbyangs pa'i shes pa hu nyid ring por byas te drangs la /
NK079(dzu)004:2431: mkha' la chog gsum gyis skur bskyed de /
NK079(dzu)004:2432: zla rlung steng du spro ba'i sngags kyis 'og min du 'phangs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2434: zhal gyi rang sngags khri 'bum du zhes pa dag /bsnyen pa khri 'bum bzlas pa'i tshul ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2435: gsal ba gsum dang ldan par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2437: yang nas yang du gsol bar bya zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2439: de'i yon tan gang zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2440: 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad kun ces pa gnyis gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:2442: ya ma ya yang lhag par 'jebs //
NK079(dzu)004:2443: sku mdog dud ka zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2444: lngas cha lugs dang de la bsgom pa dang gzhan lha gang goms par bsgom pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2446: bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2447: nyid lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la dkar gnag mtshams nas bzung ste che ge mo ji zhes bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2448: tshad ni mngon par dmigs gis bltar yod par zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2449: rmig rnon nyams can yan chad dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2452: ril bus bsdus nas dbyings su mchod zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2454: phung po phur pa mi gdab par dug gsum mchod par 'bul ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2455: the tshom med par 'grub par nges zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2456: las kyi dngos grub mi slu ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2458: dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2460: dag ni zhing bcu'i rim pa la gtogs pa rnams
NK079(dzu)004:2461: thog mar bdag sgrol zin pas gzhan gyi ngan rgyu
NK079(dzu)004:2462: 'joms pa'i mthu can gyis gnyis kyi phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2463: bzhi'i phyir sgrol cing par gdam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2464: ho ces pas yal bar mi 'dor bar dgyes pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2465: h'u dang dza dang skal sogs zhes pa dag /zhags pa lcags kyu lcags sgrogs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2466: bsdu ba'i dril bu ste ba dgug pa'i thabs dam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2468: mtshan ma ming du bsdus pa'ang zhes pa dag /ling
NK079(dzu)004:2469: ka ming dang bcas pa la bkug pa'i shes pa
NK079(dzu)004:2470: de / sngon rgyal bas bdud bsgral ba ltar //
NK079(dzu)004:2471: da ltar kun gyis thob bya'i sa 'og min du 'phang ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2472: de yang ngang la mtshan ma'i bag chags med par bya zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2473: ram yam kham gis chos nyid du bsgral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2474: dbyings nas spro zhing a la bstim zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2475: shes pa 'jug du h'u mum gi mkha' la yod
NK079(dzu)004:2476: pas spros 'od du zhu ba ma skyes pa las
NK079(dzu)004:2477: thugs mtshan dang skur gyur pa de bshad pa ltar
NK079(dzu)004:2478: 'og min du yab yum gyi sbyor ba'i ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:2482: las ngan bag chags rtsad nas bcad de /
NK079(dzu)004:2483: gnyis med la sbyar bar dgyes pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2484: thugs la thugs brjod do zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2485: 'khor dbang thob pa la dgongs pa'i byin rlabs kyis brtan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2486: shin tu gsal ba'i khro bo zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2487: bsgrub thabs phal pa'i yul min pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2488: le'u bdun pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////lhag pa spyi ho bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2489: le'u brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa la 'jug par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2490: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyis zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2491: 'di brjod do zhes par sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:2492: gang gi ched du zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2493: spyod yul thams cad gdug pa can la khro bo
NK079(dzu)004:2494: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'i phyir la'ang don
NK079(dzu)004:2495: de ston to // gzhi gang las zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2496: gdul bya'i snang ba khro bo'i bdag po khrag 'thung gi tshogs su snang par gyur nas gsungs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2497: las rngos su gang gis brtsam zhes na /
NK079(dzu)004:2498: sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2499: rgyud kyi mtshan na lam gyi don ting nge 'dzin
NK079(dzu)004:2500: gyi rim pa gang rung rdeng du gyur pas brtsam
NK079(dzu)004:2501: pa ste / slob pa'i dus su ni g.yeng ba'ang yod de /
NK079(dzu)004:2502: de bas skabs su mthar phyin pa'i tshe'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2504: phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2505: brum dang tsag tra'i 'khor lor sru zhes pa dag
NK079(dzu)004:2506: /e bam mam yam ram gyis snod bcud las bzhi
NK079(dzu)004:2507: dkyil 'khor du rig pa'i cho 'phrul snang ba de
NK079(dzu)004:2508: / ye shes kyi me dpung skal pa'i me ltar bsal bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2509: nyi ma thod sprul mang po gzi zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2511: 'phreng ba gsum dang chas brgyad kyi gzi byin can no //
NK079(dzu)004:2512: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:2516: sprul pa 'byung ba'i khro gnyer dang glog stong lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2517: rngam pa nga ro 'brug stong ldir zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2518: stong pa chen po'i zhal rngams pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2519: 'bar ba chen po'i ljags rngams pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2520: sgrol ba tshems rngams pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2521: zha bcos zil gnon gsung rngams pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2525: khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar //
NK079(dzu)004:2527: spros pa kho na 'di nyid ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2528: 'gro ba med pa khro bos gang ba'i sku me
NK079(dzu)004:2529: ri rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga par 'bar ba
NK079(dzu)004:2530: dang / gzhal yas khang gi me rdo rje 'khor lo rtse mor 'bar ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2531: khros pa'i me dpung rdo rje 'bar zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2534: khro bo khro mo tshogs kyis bskor zhes pa dag ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2535: 'khor lo la rigs lnga khro bo yab yum bcu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2536: brtsibs mchan dang bar khyams la khro mo brgyad dang
NK079(dzu)004:2537: 'phra men ma brgyad he ho las bskyed khyams tha
NK079(dzu)004:2538: ma sgo dang bcas pa la dbang phyug ma rnams
NK079(dzu)004:2539: bka' sdod pho nya gnas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2540: sti ra rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2542: lag cha 'di dag thogs pa'i pho nya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2543: shin tu rngams pa'i gzugs su gnas zhes pa rnams /
NK079(dzu)004:2544: sku cha lugs dang ral pa kha nag me 'bar ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2545: rdo rje khyung gshogs gtso bo rnams so //
NK079(dzu)004:2546: rdo rje gtags pan 'og gi gdan me dpung can no //
NK079(dzu)004:2547: so sor rang skad ces pa rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:2548: so so rang sngags h'u dang ha dang he dang
NK079(dzu)004:2549: phata dang b+h+yo la ru lu brtags pa 'don pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:2550: // khro bo chen po 'tshogs pa zhes pa rnams /
NK079(dzu)004:2551: khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad tshangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:2552: rang rig gi 'phrul snang bas yul med par gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2553: so so rang sngags bzlas nas su zhes pa 'dzab bya ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2554: rgyud drug sems can thams cad dang //
NK079(dzu)004:2555: zhes pa'i tshig bshad lngas gzas pa spyi dang khyad
NK079(dzu)004:2556: par rgya bzhis bkug la lan grangs med par ling
NK079(dzu)004:2558: rjes thogs su phur bu las byas la dug gsum mchod pa 'bul ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2560: lha'ang rung ste brlag par 'gyur ba drag po'i 'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2561: gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas na zhes pa dag /las bzhi'i yo byad 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:2562: lang ka sha rus khrag las mi mthun pa'i mchod pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2563: me'i rdzas dang gtor ma rdzas rnams bsreg rdzas 'byor tshad 'bul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:2564: khyad par du drag po la ni tshil chen dang til mar dbul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:2567: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i mchod pas dgyes pa chen por gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2568: grangs ni sgra ji bzhin te /
NK079(dzu)004:2571: nag po tsher ma can dang dug gi shing //
NK079(dzu)004:2574: gzhan yang bsreg rdzas dug gsum dang zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2575: ling ka phyi ma dug gsum mchod par dbul ba barnga'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2576: sgra ji lta bar na gdug pa'i phyi ma dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2578: gdug pa'i dug ra brtsa na dug go //
NK079(dzu)004:2579: sdud pa na gnan pa'i tshe'ang dgos pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2580: gnan pa'i cho ga kun gyis bya //
NK079(dzu)004:2582: las bzhi gang rung 'jug gi las te /
NK079(dzu)004:2583: rgya gram lam dang rkang cig shing la sogs pa
NK079(dzu)004:2584: thabs dbyings su brus la der ling ga mtshan ma
NK079(dzu)004:2586: g.yam gnag rdo rje rgya gram can gyis kha bcad la /
NK079(dzu)004:2587: su las gser gyi ri rab las kyis rgyal po pho brang chas par bskyed pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2590: de nas slar log pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2591: bsdu ba la sogs pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2593: thugs rje rol pa dkyil spyir ston pa'i hmo //
NK079(dzu)004:2594: h'u t+r+aam h+r+aih+aah zhes pa dag /las bzhi'i spyir ston pa'i phyir las lnga tshang bas /
NK079(dzu)004:2595: gtso bo rtsa sngags smos pa ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2596: lung gi las kyi lus mdor gzhags //
NK079(dzu)004:2598: le'u brgyad pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel ba'o ////las khyad
NK079(dzu)004:2599: par du hmo gyi sgo nas bya ba drug po'i
NK079(dzu)004:2601: le'u dgu pa'i rnam par bshad par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2602: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo rgyal pos thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2603: zhes dag /tshig gi 'brel pa bshad pa bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:2604: 'dir drug pa'i ston pa nyid khro bo rgyal por
NK079(dzu)004:2605: snang bas lha kun rdo rje rigs su bsdus pa
NK079(dzu)004:2606: na / khyad par drag po'i las kyi phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:2607: sngon du bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2608: dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing //
NK079(dzu)004:2609: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba bstan par gnas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2610: lta bas thag chod nas cir char bsgom pa las su rung ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2611: yang rjes su bsgom lam bzhi gang yang rung ba bstan zin pas brtsam te /
NK079(dzu)004:2612: de ma yin pa la stobs med pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:2613: lam ngo bo'i dbang du na /
NK079(dzu)004:2614: dang po gnyis na lha la rten pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2615: phra ba las su rung ba yan chad kyis brtsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2616: thams cad h'u du bsdus nas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2617: drag po'i sems te smos kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:2618: dang po pa ched du bka' lung gi rim par ring du bzhag ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2619: man ngag gi rim pa la 'jug pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2620: dkyil 'khor rtsom pa'i gnas dang por gzhung dang mthun par dus ma nor pa la gtad de /
NK079(dzu)004:2622: dang por yo byad bsag ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2623: yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang mthun zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2624: lhag pa spyi'i hmo ltar ling ga'i rdzas dang me'i rdzas dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2626: gtor ma rdzas dang bsreg rdzas dang sngags mkhan gyi rdzas rnams gzhi nag po las bsog pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2627: der sa bya ba rdzogs nas ci byed zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2630: lhag pa gzugs brnyan las kyi 'khor gru gsum khru gang ba gsum rtseg du bya /
NK079(dzu)004:2632: bang rim bar ma rdo rje gdeng po /
NK079(dzu)004:2636: mda' bzhi zhags pa nag pos bre //
NK079(dzu)004:2637: me dar sngon pos gdab po //
NK079(dzu)004:2638: shing thab dbyibs su rtsig go //
NK079(dzu)004:2639: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du /
NK079(dzu)004:2640: spyod yul rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes su gsal ba las /
NK079(dzu)004:2641: e ram gyis gzugs brnyan ci 'dra bar bskyed pa ni me lha'i bzhugs gnas so //
NK079(dzu)004:2643: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi h'u /
NK079(dzu)004:2644: zhal dgrad spyan gdangs khro zhal bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:2645: rdo rje gtams pa gdengs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2646: zhes pa dag gru gsum las mi mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan khro zhal sum rtsig tu bya /
NK079(dzu)004:2647: nang ma rdo rje gdeng bo /
NK079(dzu)004:2649: phyi rol lcags kyus bsgor te bsgom pa rjes su mthun no //
NK079(dzu)004:2650: de dag gi lho phyogs su thab dang mthun pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:2651: 'brub khung du ling khra gzhag /rang gi phur pa
NK079(dzu)004:2653: de nas dpal gyi mchod pa rnam gsum logs su bzhag ste las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
NK079(dzu)004:2655: khro bo tshogs kyi sngags rnams dang ces pa nas
NK079(dzu)004:2656: ha he byo ces pa'i bar ni khro bo'i las
NK079(dzu)004:2657: gzhung srang mchod pa'i rim pa zin nas 'dzab bya'o
NK079(dzu)004:2658: // pho nya'i rjes su'ang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:2660: dza h'u bam hos bkug nas su //
NK079(dzu)004:2661: rgyu drug sems can kun bkug nas zhes pa phyag rgya bzhis rje dbang gis rgyu drug dgug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2662: h'u sgra drag po'i tshogs kyis 'bar //
NK079(dzu)004:2663: 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa nas //
NK079(dzu)004:2664: gtod pa'i tshul du sbod gtong bya zhes pa dag
NK079(dzu)004:2665: /e ram gyis snod bcud dkyil 'khor nga ro dang
NK079(dzu)004:2667: pho nya bskyed la lcags kyus bzung ste dgug /
NK079(dzu)004:2668: 'khor gyi tshogs kyang snga ma bzhin pho nyar bkye la dgug go //
NK079(dzu)004:2669: gtum po dmar smug mchu ring po zhes pa nas brdubs h'u /
NK079(dzu)004:2671: drag po'i lha'i mtshan nyid dang sku mdog dang me dpung rtse lngar 'bar ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2672: 'od zer dang chas pas gdug pa bkug ste zhal du gsol bar byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2673: de stims la lha dang phral nas gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma bzhin zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2674: lhag ma spyi dang mthun par phur ba'i las bya ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2675: de nas rnal 'byor gyi longs spyod rol pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2677: me dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs ched du zhes pa dag ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2678: thabs gzhal yas su gsal ba'i der me lha gdan bskyed /
NK079(dzu)004:2680: yan lag lha dang ldan par bskyed do //
NK079(dzu)004:2681: de nas me spar ba la /
NK079(dzu)004:2682: ye shes kyi me lha a ni de ba ri
NK079(dzu)004:2683: shi dza's spyan drangs bstims brtan pa la me mchod
NK079(dzu)004:2684: rdzogs par bya'o // de nas me lha'i lto snying
NK079(dzu)004:2685: la dkyil 'khor bskyed la sbyin sreg bya ba'i ched
NK079(dzu)004:2686: du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun /
NK079(dzu)004:2687: zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par bya zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2688: gsal 'dris blo yis rtag tu bsgom zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2689: khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor ril drag po'i skabs su zhe
NK079(dzu)004:2690: sdang rdo rje gtso bo byas pa rdo rje rigs
NK079(dzu)004:2692: rigs lnga h'u las bskyed do //
NK079(dzu)004:2693: de dag me dpung 'bar ba mdog gnag pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2696: sems can gson ma spong gtong pho nya'i phyag rgya
NK079(dzu)004:2697: thog pa mtshon cha mang po thogs pa dag lto
NK079(dzu)004:2698: ba'i gzhal yas na rim par bzhugs par rang rang
NK079(dzu)004:2699: yi ge las bskyed de khros par bsgom pa'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:2700: gzhan ma yin rang rig khro tshogs kyi ngang du
NK079(dzu)004:2701: shar ba de la gsal la 'dris par bsgom pa
NK079(dzu)004:2702: sngon du snyon pa yang yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:2703: de yan lag lha dang ldan pa la spyan drang bstim sogs bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2704: de la sbyin sreg dbul ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2705: mchod sa'i grangs spyi dang mthun /
NK079(dzu)004:2707: so so'i bstod tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags 'jug la
NK079(dzu)004:2708: che ge ma ra ya phata ces gtso 'khor cha
NK079(dzu)004:2710: a ni de nyid du 'dus ma byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por 'gyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2711: khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya //
NK079(dzu)004:2713: ling kha dug gsum mchod par dbul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:2714: yon tan ni lha yang rung ste klag par 'gyur /
NK079(dzu)004:2716: yang zhal du gtims ni lhag par 'grub /
NK079(dzu)004:2717: rdul cha tsam yang med par byed //
NK079(dzu)004:2719: de nas dbul thabs kyi las bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2720: gzhan yang bstod tshig 'di dag gis zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2721: brlag par ma gyur gang yang med h'u zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2722: don gyis bsreg pa'i tshe bstod pa'i las mi mthun
NK079(dzu)004:2723: bro thabs las mched kun hmo tha mar rdo rje
NK079(dzu)004:2725: e ram gyis dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
NK079(dzu)004:2726: tshig bzhi gong 'og gang rung brjod de /
NK079(dzu)004:2727: sum man nes bskul bas stong khams mer mer g.yos
NK079(dzu)004:2728: sprul pas gang bya be de bkug la bod kyis
NK079(dzu)004:2730: me lha la gtang rag gtang /
NK079(dzu)004:2731: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba las sogs pa bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2732: le'u dgu pa'i spyan 'grel pa'o ////dbang gi las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2733: le'u bcu pa'i rnam pa bshad par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2734: de nas de bzhin gshegs khro bo'i rgyal po pad+ma sdud pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2738: 'di skabs kyi ston pa pad+ma he ru kar snang
NK079(dzu)004:2739: nas dbang gi las byed pas 'gro don du gsungs
NK079(dzu)004:2740: pa kho na'o // de yang rnal 'byor pa gang
NK079(dzu)004:2741: zhig gis don gyi sems gang dang ldan pas bya
NK079(dzu)004:2742: pa kho na'o // zhe na / shes rab thabs su 'byor pa yis zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2745: de bzhin nyid dang sgyu ma las su rung ba ni rnal 'byor ba'i brtsam /
NK079(dzu)004:2746: dngos po bzang ngan ril rig par ma bsdus gcig par rtogs pa don gyi sems yod pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2747: rang rig thams cad kyi rgyu nyid cir yang ma
NK079(dzu)004:2748: 'gags la de nyid yul sems dang dngos po gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:2749: pa ril rig pa gnyis med rtogs pas thag bcad
NK079(dzu)004:2750: de bsnyen pa goms par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2751: dkyil 'khor zla gam gdengs pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:2752: zhes pa dag /man ngag gi rim par 'chad de //
NK079(dzu)004:2753: dbang gi gnas su sa'i bya ba byas te //
NK079(dzu)004:2754: lhag pa gzugs brnyan las kyi dkyil 'khor brtsam pa
NK079(dzu)004:2755: zla gam sum rtseg gi nang du 'jim pa'i pad+ma
NK079(dzu)004:2756: la h+r+ai bris pa gzhag zabs dang gyen tshan mthun
NK079(dzu)004:2757: / bang rim nang ma la me ri dmar po gtang /
NK079(dzu)004:2760: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mang po'i tshogs //
NK079(dzu)004:2761: dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i zhal 'dra ba zhes pa dag dkyil
NK079(dzu)004:2762: 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad la lte ba'i bang rim sum
NK079(dzu)004:2766: tha ma la ljon shing bri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2767: gzhan yang rgyan gyi dam pa'i mchog /kun gyis de la brgyan cing skor zhes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2768: gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:2769: dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par brgyan zhes pa me dar dmar po /
NK079(dzu)004:2770: mda' bzhi zhags pa dmar pos bri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2771: las dang bstan pa thabs bzhi ka la brgyan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2772: yang 'brub khung zla gam du ling kha gzhag /der phur pa lngas bskor bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2773: shing la sogs pa'i rdzas lnga tshang bar dgram mo //
NK079(dzu)004:2774: de nas las gzhung bsrang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2775: bdag nyid ma chags rdo rje ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2777: phyi rol tu mgon po tshim byas las bcol ba byas te /
NK079(dzu)004:2778: 'dus pa dang dkyil 'khor bskyed la bdag gtso bo pad+ma he ru kar bsgom /
NK079(dzu)004:2779: tshig gi rim pas gong du smos pa'i lha lnga
NK079(dzu)004:2780: bcu rtsa brgyad pad+ma rigs su bsgoms la macha da
NK079(dzu)004:2783: gdug pa yid can ma lus kun //
NK079(dzu)004:2784: dza h'u ba hos bkug nas su //
NK079(dzu)004:2786: dbang gi gzas pa pho nyas dgug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2787: de la phur pa'i las la sogs pa rdzogs nas sbyin bsreg brtsam pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2788: ma lha spyan dang snga ma bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:2790: bam ram gyis thab gzhal yas su bskyed de gdan par byas /
NK079(dzu)004:2791: der dbang gi me lha bskyed ye shes me lha
NK079(dzu)004:2792: spyan drang ba khro bo dang mthun par byas te
NK079(dzu)004:2794: zin nas sbyin sreg bya ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2795: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun //
NK079(dzu)004:2797: me lha'i lto bar dbang gi gzhal yas khang bskyed la der lha rnams pad+ma rigs su bskyed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2798: de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2799: de lam mchod pa ni bdag nyid pad+ma'i lhar gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:2801: lan grangs gong du smos pa bzhin zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2802: sreg bardzasa su gtogs ril bdag lha gsal bas stod
NK079(dzu)004:2803: tshig bya zhing so so'i sngags mjug la pa shi
NK079(dzu)004:2804: man ye ba sham ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK079(dzu)004:2806: de yang sngags ni yi ge rang dang hri //
NK079(dzu)004:2807: zhes pa rtsa ba'i nyid dam hri'i sa bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2808: de ni bskyed sngags kyang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:2809: mdog ni dmar smug ces pa dag yi ge'i kha
NK079(dzu)004:2810: dog ste 'dzab kyi 'phro 'du'i tshe na 'dir ltar
NK079(dzu)004:2811: bya'o // dgyes pa'i glu dang gar gyis mchod zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:2812: bstod tshig sbyangs dang chas pas gar bya zhing mchod pa rdos so //
NK079(dzu)004:2814: dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya zhes pa dug
NK079(dzu)004:2815: gsum mchod pa dgos ched dang bcas yon tan dang
NK079(dzu)004:2816: bcas pa'o // de ltar spyir mchod pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2817: rtag tu mchod pa byas na ni //
NK079(dzu)004:2820: hri rdo rje pad+ma 'bar ba yis /
NK079(dzu)004:2821: zhes pa nas smos ci dgos zhes pa bstod tshig dang thun mong du ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:2822: bro thabs bya ba'i tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2823: hri 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas zhes pa dag ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2824: bsam pa rjes su mthun te skabs bsgyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:2825: de nas dkyil 'khor snying la bsdu ba la sogs pa rjes su mthun par sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:2826: le'u bcu pa'i spyan 'grel pa'o ////rgyas pa'i las bstan
NK079(dzu)004:2827: pa'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam pa bshad par
NK079(dzu)004:2828: bya'o // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba /
NK079(dzu)004:2829: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi dbyings nas phyung nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2830: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:2832: tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid legs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:2833: yon tan du bya ba du mar snang ba'i thabs
NK079(dzu)004:2834: rgyas pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'phrin gdul bya la
NK079(dzu)004:2835: snang ba'o // man ngag gi rim pa brtsam par bya ba'i ched du //
NK079(dzu)004:2836: tram ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2837: rgyas pa'i gnas su sa chog byas dus ma nor
NK079(dzu)004:2838: bar ye shes bzhi'i phyir thab gru bzhir brtsam pa'ang
NK079(dzu)004:2839: khru gang sum rtseg du bya /
NK079(dzu)004:2843: gzhan mda' bzhi zhags pa ser pos bri ba las sogs pa bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2844: nang du 'jim pa'i zur brgyad la tram bris pa gzhag go //
NK079(dzu)004:2845: yang bzo dang mos pa'i dbang gis 'di ltar brtsam ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2846: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas ni //
NK079(dzu)004:2847: rin chen dbyibs la rdo rje 'bar //
NK079(dzu)004:2848: zhes pa dag /gru bzhi las mi mthun par dkyil 'khor rin po che zur brgyad du brtsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:2849: ho khung bang rim gcig ste ba la rdo rjes bskor /
NK079(dzu)004:2850: de dar la sogs pa bshad pa bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:2851: der 'brub khung thab lta bur ling kha'i mtha' phur pa bzhis bskor ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2852: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gzhung bsrang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2853: bdag nyid rin chen rab 'bar nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2854: t+r+aam dkar yi ge 'od du 'bar zhes pa la sogs pa mgon po mchod mtshams bcad nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2855: gzhal yas khang bskyed de nas bdag rat+na he ru
NK079(dzu)004:2856: kar gsal ba'i thugs kar rin po che lte ba
NK079(dzu)004:2857: la ta ma 'od 'bar ba'i tha ma bzlas pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:2859: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ril kyang rin po che rigs kyi lha tshogs su gsal bar bsgom ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2860: mchod 'dzab kun zin nas tshogs rol pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2862: mngon du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK079(dzu)004:2865: lha gsal bas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas pa'i gzas pa bkug ling ga la bstims te /
NK079(dzu)004:2866: bcing phur bas btab tshe sogs yon tan snying kar
NK079(dzu)004:2867: bdag la gtims ste bdag gzi byin bya dang ldan
NK079(dzu)004:2868: par bsam mo // de nas me mchod mthun par brtsams la sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:2869: khro bo kun kyang dga' 'phro ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2871: zhes pa'i tshig bshad gcig gis /
NK079(dzu)004:2872: me lha'i lto bar khro bo ril rat+na he ru
NK079(dzu)004:2873: ka 'khor bcas gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas par
NK079(dzu)004:2874: bskyed / spyan drang stims brtan par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2875: de la sbyin sreg dbul ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2876: mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang zhes pa nas dbul zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2877: rgyas pa'i bsreg rdzas ril dang /
NK079(dzu)004:2879: 'od ni zhi ba dang bsnol te 'dir ser po'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2880: mchod pa 'byor gyis lha rnams la thim par //
NK079(dzu)004:2881: bstod tshig dang rang gi sngags kyi rjes la pus ting ku ru s+w+aa h+aa zhes sreg go //
NK079(dzu)004:2882: gzhan yang lha dang lha mo yis zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:2883: glu dang gar gyis mchod pa bya zhes pa mchod
NK079(dzu)004:2884: pa'i tshe rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor las mchod pa spros
NK079(dzu)004:2885: pa de phyogs bcu rgyal ba la'ang mchod pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:2889: glu gar rjes su mthun pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2890: yon tan rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2892: 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug ces pa nas mnyam zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2893: rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa don
NK079(dzu)004:2894: gnyis kyi phyir bsnol mar 'byung ba de ltar bsgom
NK079(dzu)004:2895: pa ni yon tan gyi rgyu kho na ste mchog
NK079(dzu)004:2896: tu rgyas par byed pa'i las brtsams na /
NK079(dzu)004:2898: 'o na ma thob pa thob par byar yod dam zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:2899: thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam //
NK079(dzu)004:2901: sgyu ma'i ye shes brtan pa yin //
NK079(dzu)004:2903: ril 'bras bu'i ngo bo bas rgyu 'bras dbyer med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2904: rag gzhan du ma lus te /
NK079(dzu)004:2905: rtogs pa brtan pa'i rig pa 'bras bur snang ba ste las kun mthun pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2906: glu tshig dang yon tan thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2907: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams ma lus kun /
NK079(dzu)004:2908: mchod yon rin chen zhes pa la sogs /
NK079(dzu)004:2909: nam mkha'i khams rgyas pa'i mchod pas gang bar phul ba bzhes la dgyes par mdzod cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2910: h+r+aam nga rgyal rdo rje zhes pa dag blo'i las bya ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:2911: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbus su bkug pa la 'od ser po phab ste rgyas par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2912: de dag phan yon gyi sngon du 'byung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2913: de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu gtang rag byas te me lha gshegs pa las sogs pa bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2914: le'u bcu gcig pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////zhi
NK079(dzu)004:2915: ba lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK079(dzu)004:2917: le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2918: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen po 'di brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:2920: gang gi ched du zhen 'khor gnyis kyi ched du
NK079(dzu)004:2921: dkyil 'khor thams cad zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor du bya
NK079(dzu)004:2922: la snang ba'o // drug pa'i ston pa'ang skabs kyis rnam par snang mdzad du 'byung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2923: ye shes dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa yis /
NK079(dzu)004:2924: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun //
NK079(dzu)004:2925: bde gshegs nyid las mi gzhan pas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2927: man ngag gi rim pa rjes su go sla bas ma sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:2928: rang 'byung ba'i ye shes ni ye shes ril gyi
NK079(dzu)004:2929: snying po bas mtha' gsum las 'das pas rang gis
NK079(dzu)004:2930: zhi ba'i phyir thab kyi don to //
NK079(dzu)004:2931: de nyid la rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:2932: khro zhi lha kun drug pa'i rgyal ba nyid las mi gzhan pa'i phyir zhi ba'i lhar byung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2933: de bas na de nyid ni gzhan ma yin rang rig ngos zhi ba nyid lhar shar ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2938: me thab zlum po khru gang zabs dang phyin du phyed phyed bang rim gsum du bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2939: bang rim nang ma la 'khor lo //
NK079(dzu)004:2941: tha ma la 'od ser po rgyas pa dang bsnor te dkar po'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2942: nang du 'jim pa'i 'khor lo la bris pa gzhug go //
NK079(dzu)004:2943: lho ru 'brub khung thab dbyibs la ling kha gzhug /phur pa dkar po drug gis bskor //
NK079(dzu)004:2944: thab tu shing brtsig /mda' bzhi zhags pa dkar pos bri //
NK079(dzu)004:2945: me dar dkar pos dgab pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2946: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i phyir rmad du byung ba'i sku la sogs /
NK079(dzu)004:2949: de nas mgon po mchod de phyi nang mtshams bcad la /
NK079(dzu)004:2950: bdag nyid snang mdzad mtshan dpes khyad par du 'phags
NK079(dzu)004:2951: pa'am 'bu ta he ru ka la sogs bzhi ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:2952: dkyil 'khor du rig pa'i cho 'phrul rang snang bar
NK079(dzu)004:2953: bsgom ste / mchod bstod bzlas pa dang tshogs kyi
NK079(dzu)004:2954: 'khor lo byas na zhi ba'i dngos grub thob bo
NK079(dzu)004:2955: bsgom ste / // de nas 'gug gdab gtub pa'i las la sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:2956: me mchod bya pa'i phyir sa bon yi ge ser po /
NK079(dzu)004:2957: me lha spyan drang snga ma bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:2959: thab yar gyis gzhal yas khang bskyed rdo rje brag
NK079(dzu)004:2960: steng du dim a las ra skyes nyi zla dang
NK079(dzu)004:2961: chas par bskyed pa'i steng du gyi sa bon dkar
NK079(dzu)004:2962: po las bzhi ba'i me lha zhi ba'i tshul can
NK079(dzu)004:2963: 'gun ne 'grang 'phreng can yan lag dang bcas par
NK079(dzu)004:2964: bskyed / de nas ye shes me lha sbyan drangs bstims mchod pa rdzas su mthun par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2966: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun //
NK079(dzu)004:2967: kun kyang gti mug rdo rje ste //
NK079(dzu)004:2970: lha'i lto snying zhi ba'i gzhal yas su bskyed /
NK079(dzu)004:2971: khro bo'i lhe ril 'bu ta he ru kas gtso
NK079(dzu)004:2972: bo byas pa'i zhi ba'i cha lug gtso dang mthun
NK079(dzu)004:2974: de yang kun sku la 'od sna lnga 'phro zhing
NK079(dzu)004:2975: 'khor lo thogs pa gtso bo 'khor du rigs bzhi
NK079(dzu)004:2976: yab yum nas sgo ma dbang phyug ma yan cad
NK079(dzu)004:2977: kyis bskor ba / lha'i gdan dang gzhal yas khang yang zhi ba'i cha lugs kho nar bskyed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2978: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu //
NK079(dzu)004:2979: phyogs bcu gnas pa zhes pa nas //
NK079(dzu)004:2980: zhi bar gyur zhes pa dgug gdab kyi las yon tan dang bcas par ston te /
NK079(dzu)004:2981: snga las kyi 'khor bskyed pa de de dag gis
NK079(dzu)004:2982: zhi ba'i gzas pa bkug 'brub khung gi ling kha
NK079(dzu)004:2983: la phab bcings gtubs spar te /
NK079(dzu)004:2984: de dag dug gsum mchod pa phul na las kyi khro bo ril zhi ba kho nar gyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:2985: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te /
NK079(dzu)004:2986: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:2987: thab zlum po las mi mthun par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad du bya /
NK079(dzu)004:2988: lte ba bang rim sum rtseg du bya /
NK079(dzu)004:2989: nang du 'jim 'khor lo la +amo bri ba mthun /
NK079(dzu)004:2990: nang dang bar ma mthun +amo dang ser 'go spel mas phyi rim skor /
NK079(dzu)004:2991: der rdzas rnams tshang bar bya'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:2992: rdzogs ldan zhi bas bskor bar bya //
NK079(dzu)004:2994: ro bsreg pa'i las brtsom na /
NK079(dzu)004:2995: sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa las //
NK079(dzu)004:2996: gang zhig 'pho bar gyur sbyod na //
NK079(dzu)004:2997: spos dang bdud rtsi chu bkrus te //
NK079(dzu)004:2998: bar ma'i shes pa bkug bstims la //
NK079(dzu)004:2999: phyag rgya gnas su tshang bar gdags //
NK079(dzu)004:3000: las kyi dkyil 'khor gzhung bsrang la //
NK079(dzu)004:3002: tshogs kyi 'khor lo legs par brtag /phun nus skal pas sbyin byas te //
NK079(dzu)004:3004: brgo dang kha khyer tshul bzhin bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3005: rgyal ba'i pho brang gang yin bri //
NK079(dzu)004:3006: steng du 'og min mtshan ma gdags //
NK079(dzu)004:3007: dkyil 'khor gnyis po gsal byas la //
NK079(dzu)004:3008: gnyis med dkyil 'khor gnyis la bstab //
NK079(dzu)004:3009: thugs rje lcags kyus grangs te gzhug /me la spyan drangs mchod sogs bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3011: gzhan rnams gdung bas nyes byas bshags //
NK079(dzu)004:3012: gar mas glu blangs gar bstod bsregs te //
NK079(dzu)004:3013: gnas kyi smon lam tshul bzhin bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3014: dam pa zhig na gdung yang brtag /rgyal mtshan rtse mor mchod bsogs bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3015: thal ba zab mo'i sku gdung dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3016: bdud rtsi sman du bsgrub par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3019: rgyan rnams bzhi la dkar ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3020: byang chub zhes pa dag /zhi ba'i gtso bo shin
NK079(dzu)004:3021: tu dod pa rgyan tshang ba 'khor lo can rgyan
NK079(dzu)004:3022: kun rin chen 'phreng ba zlum la dkar bzhi ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:3023: tshul can ltar 'khor kun de bzhin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3024: mkha' la rgyu ces pa dag yon tan te sgra ji bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:3027: gdug rtsub la sogs zhi ba'i dngos thob par dgyes pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3028: bro thabs kyis bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3029: gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:3031: yang ram gyis dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas lu gu rgyud du sbrel la /
NK079(dzu)004:3032: brjod de sum ban nes bskul bas stong gsum g.yos
NK079(dzu)004:3033: pa'i gzas dbus su bkug pa la 'od dkar po
NK079(dzu)004:3034: gtims te zhi bar bya ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3035: de nas bsdu ba la sogs rjes su sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:3036: le'u bcu gnyis pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////bdag
NK079(dzu)004:3037: gzhan gyi don du tshe bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:3038: / le'u bcu gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3039: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po tshe mtha'
NK079(dzu)004:3040: yas su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
NK079(dzu)004:3041: do zhes pa kun tu bzang po nyid tshe sgrub
NK079(dzu)004:3042: pa'i skabs su tshe bdag nyid snang ba mtha' yas
