NK079(dzu)004:3043: su gdul bya la skabs kyis snang nas gsungs pa
NK079(dzu)004:3044: ltar snang ba'ang ched gnyis kyi phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3045: spyir tshe sgrub ba'ang ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyis sgrub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3047: rdzas la brten te bsgrub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3048: rdzas kyang bdud rtsi sman la brten te bsgrub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3049: zla rgyas dang 'dza' gang la brten te bsgrub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3050: de yang sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las /
NK079(dzu)004:3051: bdag nyid mtha' lam 'dod pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:3052: stong pa chen por goms gyur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:3053: rgyal ba'i sku tshe mi 'chi nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:3054: mtshan ma'i rgyun gyis tshe bsdus na'ang //
NK079(dzu)004:3056: steng sgo rlung la dbang thob pa //
NK079(dzu)004:3057: bar ma'i rkyen gyis slu ba med //
NK079(dzu)004:3058: mtshan bzangs thig le bcu drug sogs //
NK079(dzu)004:3059: dben pa'i gnas su zla dang bcas //
NK079(dzu)004:3060: zhu chen la sogs bcud kyis gso //
NK079(dzu)004:3061: gang rgyas bdud rtsi gsal ba'i lces //
NK079(dzu)004:3062: barngubasa na mi 'chi nges par myong //
NK079(dzu)004:3063: lnga'i rtsa ba yan lag bcas //
NK079(dzu)004:3064: bdud rtsi rigs brgya lnga gcig sbyangs //
NK079(dzu)004:3065: rtags phyin 'thungs na'ang the tshom med //
NK079(dzu)004:3066: ra sa ya na sna tshogs la //
NK079(dzu)004:3067: bsgrub cing brten na'ang de bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:3068: tshe mchog las byas zla rgyas sogs //
NK079(dzu)004:3069: rtags ldan zos pa'ang nges par 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:3070: gzhan pa tha ma la sbyar te //
NK079(dzu)004:3071: bdag nyid kun la nges par 'gro //
NK079(dzu)004:3072: sngon song pa'i snga rol nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:3073: yang na mthar nye'i lam gnas tsho'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3075: de la 'dir bdag gzhan don du bya ba'ang man
NK079(dzu)004:3076: ngag gi rim pa la 'jug par bya ste thog
NK079(dzu)004:3077: mar gang zag gang giis bya zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:3078: sngags mkhan rab ldan blo brtan pas //
NK079(dzu)004:3079: yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom zhes pa rnal
NK079(dzu)004:3080: 'byor pa shes rab yod cing ting nge 'dzin brtan
NK079(dzu)004:3081: pas spros bcas kyi rnal 'byor la dbang thob ste
NK079(dzu)004:3082: / sngags kyi yan lag lnga lha gsum dang dbu
NK079(dzu)004:3083: rgyan lha dang ye shes sems dpa' gsal ba bzlas
NK079(dzu)004:3084: pa tshad du phyin pas cho ga lnga dang yo
NK079(dzu)004:3085: byad lnga tshang bas brtsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3086: skabs gzhan du phra mo man chad kyang 'gal ba ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:3087: des gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas su bsgrub bzhis gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3088: tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3089: tshe bsgrub dang ni tshe bsgrub pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:3090: thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:3093: de yang yo byad btsal zhing bsogs pa dang stegs bu brtsigs tee bris nas rdzas bgod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3094: 'phro 'dus dgug bstim las bar chad med par byed pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3095: tshe bstim zhing dngos grub blang ba'i las so //
NK079(dzu)004:3096: las kyi bye brag ci'ang mi 'gog pa nyid rang rig du shes pas bsgrub na 'grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3097: gzhan du na sgyu 'phrul phyi ma las /
NK079(dzu)004:3098: bcu drug phyag rgya mtshan bcud can //
NK079(dzu)004:3099: zla gsal dkar dmar rlung kar lci //
NK079(dzu)004:3100: brtsal nas dgag bslob bsnyen pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3101: gsal ldan ma'am byin rlabs nas //
NK079(dzu)004:3102: tshe yis skul ba nye ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3103: phyag brgya bzhi'i gar thabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:3104: h'u phata bskyod pa bsgrub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3105: rlung gis sbyor bas rdub byed pa //
NK079(dzu)004:3106: bsgrub pa chen po brjod pa yin //
NK079(dzu)004:3107: de ltar yab yum 'byor dgyes pas //
NK079(dzu)004:3108: dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub ces gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:3109: de la phyi rol gyi bsnyen pa'i dbang du yo byad bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3110: yid bzhin thub pa rin po che //
NK079(dzu)004:3111: rgyan dang rin chen 'phreng bas brgyan //
NK079(dzu)004:3113: yo byad phyir na bsgrub pa rdzas kyi yo byad dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3114: rkyen bzlog dgos pa'i yo byad dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3115: 'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad do //
NK079(dzu)004:3116: de la bsgrub rdzas la dkyil 'khor rgyan dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3119: rkyen zlog la'ang dgra bzlog pa'i go mtshon dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3120: nad bzlog pa'i sman cha dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3121: bgegs bzlog pa'i gu gul dang nyung kar rgyal po dang bsrung ba'i thabs rnams so //
NK079(dzu)004:3122: de la 'dir bsgrub pa'i rdzas te /
NK079(dzu)004:3123: bub rgyu lcags gsum las byas pa lto 'grin phyed pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:3124: rin po che rgyan dang 'phreng bas brgyan par rdzas
NK079(dzu)004:3125: bcu gnyis dang nyungs kar bslugs te mar ram mchang
NK079(dzu)004:3126: gis bstam pa gcig gam lha grangs dang mthun pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:3129: rgyan chas lnga ldan byas nas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3130: dbu rgyan stod smad kyi g.yogs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3133: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3134: sngags brgyan ldan gyis 'grub nges pa'i yon tan bod pa la bskul ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3135: yo byad tshang nas lhag pa gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor brtsam pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3136: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba bstan bsdus te //
NK079(dzu)004:3137: brum dang bi shi'i dkyil 'khor du zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3140: slob dpon sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sgom lam gyi ting
NK079(dzu)004:3141: nge 'dzin brtan pas rdzas dang yo byad kun bsogs
NK079(dzu)004:3142: nas stegs bu brtsam pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3143: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dbus dang mthar rdo
NK079(dzu)004:3144: rje 'phreng ba gnyis sgo rgyan yan chad ldan pa
NK079(dzu)004:3145: / dbus su zla gam sgo khyud can kha sprod //
NK079(dzu)004:3147: stegs bu brtsigs thig dang bri ba la sogs pa tshul bzhin bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3148: gdan ni ma dang a'i sgras nyi zla bri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3149: 'di dag lhag pa gzugs brnyan la bum pa bzhag nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3151: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtsom na /
NK079(dzu)004:3152: sngags pa ting nge 'dzin brtan pas chos so cog rang rig par gsal ba'i ngang las /
NK079(dzu)004:3153: bru bi shwa bi shu de des dkyil 'khor gdan
NK079(dzu)004:3154: dang ldan pa 'byung ba rims rtsegs dang bcas par
NK079(dzu)004:3155: bskyed pa'o // yi ge gnyis ni mkha' la tshe
NK079(dzu)004:3156: rten bcas rgya gram gyis bsdams pa'i mdo' zhes kyang
NK079(dzu)004:3157: bskyed pa'o // 'chad do // bdag gzhan don du rten gzhag pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3158: n+ri nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod //
NK079(dzu)004:3159: bum pa'i mchog ni bzang po'i //
NK079(dzu)004:3160: tshe gzhag gnas ni 'di yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:3162: tshe brten ni bdag rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin byed
NK079(dzu)004:3163: dam gzhan 'byor pa dang ma ldan nam btsal rkan
NK079(dzu)004:3164: r+n+ri nyid do // 'dam kha ni 'byor cing sgrub na bum pa 'dis bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3165: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa ltar bskyed de /
NK079(dzu)004:3167: de nas tshe bsgrub pa'i zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3168: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3169: de'ang dar la zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3170: sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:3171: rgyal po tshe dpag med par bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:3173: de la las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa rdzogs nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3174: gzugs brnyan gyis mtshon pas ci 'dra ba cig /bum
NK079(dzu)004:3175: pa gzhal yas khang du bskyed gdan dang ldan par
NK079(dzu)004:3176: byas pa der sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo bdag
NK079(dzu)004:3177: nyid tshe dpag med dkar po rin po che rgyan
NK079(dzu)004:3178: 'phreng mang po phyag na bdud rtsi bum pa rin
NK079(dzu)004:3179: po che rgyu las byas pa thogs pa yab yum
NK079(dzu)004:3180: bskyed do // yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3183: rdo rje nyi ma rin po che bsnabs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3184: snang mdzad rin chen 'phreng ba bsnabs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3185: mi bskyod pa za ma tog thogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3186: rgyal bu can gyi don grub yab yum g.yas kun
NK079(dzu)004:3187: rang rtags bsnabs pa'i rigs bzhi rang rang gi bum
NK079(dzu)004:3188: pa'am de nyid kyi phyogs bzhir bskyed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3189: bum pa ni bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:3190: gzhan 'gro don du phyag mtshan g.yas rang rtags g.yon
NK079(dzu)004:3191: bum pa zla tshes can thogs pa'i sgo srungs dang
NK079(dzu)004:3192: thub pa yan cad bskyed do //
NK079(dzu)004:3193: de dag gtso bo'i phyag mtshan nges med du'ang 'chad do //
NK079(dzu)004:3194: gtso bo la der a yu gnas pa mkha' la tshe rten bca' ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3195: de la mchod pa rdzogs nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3197: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te //
NK079(dzu)004:3198: de yis phyogs bcu gang bar gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:3199: bru dza h'u dang ba hos dgug zhes pa de
NK079(dzu)004:3200: ltar bzhi bcu gnyis la byin rlabs gsum gyi lha
NK079(dzu)004:3201: bsgom ste de'i sprul pas phyogs bcu gang bas phyag
NK079(dzu)004:3202: rgya bzhis tshe dpag btso ma ste phrogs la tshe
NK079(dzu)004:3204: rgya gram lcags sgrog gis bsdams la rta mgrin bsrung ba bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3205: de nas tshe 'dzab bya ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3207: rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar zhes pa las sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3208: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi tshe 'dzab bya
NK079(dzu)004:3209: ba ni gsal ba gsum dang ldan zhing skyon bcu
NK079(dzu)004:3210: spangs pas bya ba yang mi tshig bsal sbrid la
NK079(dzu)004:3211: sogs pas bar ma chod par sngags dang ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:3215: rigs so so'i bzlas pa'i dbang du bstan pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3216: de'ang bsnor la dang por bru badz+ra a yu she h'u a /
NK079(dzu)004:3218: de nas bru badz+ra a she h'u a /
NK079(dzu)004:3219: swa bru badz+ra a yu she a /
NK079(dzu)004:3220: h'u bru badz+ra a yu she h'u a /
NK079(dzu)004:3221: h'u bru badz+ra a yu she h'u a /
NK079(dzu)004:3223: de ltar a yu bzlas pa'i glo glor dgug bsdam bsrung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3224: rtags ni yang nas yang du bkug byas te /
NK079(dzu)004:3225: mngon du smin par gyur pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3227: pho nya dang ting nges a yu brnan zhing bkug pas /
NK079(dzu)004:3228: rtags mngon du byung ste bum pa bdud rtsir khol ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3229: 'od 'bar ba las sogs pa 'byung ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3230: a yu ga ti ma pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3231: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog /lus dang sems la gtim par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3233: tshe'i dngos po 'bru gsum du gsal ba bdag gam gzhan gyi lus ngag yid gsum la bstims pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3234: de nas a yu sba bar ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3235: dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3237: 'bru gsum h'u la thim pa zhu nas mi dmigs pa mtha' bral du gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3238: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a ti ta sti s+w+aa h+aa //
NK079(dzu)004:3239: zhes tshe sbas pa de bstan par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3240: de nas a yu bsrung ba ni //
NK079(dzu)004:3241: rdo rje go cha bsrung ba yis //
NK079(dzu)004:3242: brtan zhing 'khor los gdab par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3244: de'i ngang las tshe dpag med du bskyed la rgya ram gyi go bsgo na /
NK079(dzu)004:3245: 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas lus bsrung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3246: de 'di badz+ra ka pa tsa rag k+sha h'u //
NK079(dzu)004:3247: ma tum zhes go bgo lus bsrung ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:3249: snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du gtim //
NK079(dzu)004:3251: tshe 'bru lngar bsdus la 'bru lnga gnas lngar thim
NK079(dzu)004:3252: nas 'bru lnga gcig du gyur pa mi dmigs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3253: sba ba'o // de nas 'bru lnga yi ge 'bru gcig ste //
NK079(dzu)004:3254: 'bru gcig dmigs med dbyings su thim a zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:3255: de nas bum pas dbang bskur te dngos grub len pa ni bsgrub pa chen pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3256: zhi ba'i ma grub na spogs pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3257: tshe rnams dbang du ma grub na //
NK079(dzu)004:3258: bde gshegs lnga'ang tshe dpag med //
NK079(dzu)004:3260: thabs de dag gis ma grub na rigs lnga tshe dpag med she dag du bsgoms la /
NK079(dzu)004:3261: a yu dgug ste de'i sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pas dgug pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3262: phyi ma snga ma ji bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:3263: tshe khro bos bsgrub pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3264: bgegs kyi n+ri rnams mi ster na //
NK079(dzu)004:3265: tshe dpag med kyang khro ba ste zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3266: zhi bas ma grub na tshe spogs pa'ang yin la dang po nas kyang rung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3267: 'dir spogs pa'i dbang du bgegs kyis n+ri'i tshe ma ster na /
NK079(dzu)004:3268: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor khro bor bsgyur la /
NK079(dzu)004:3269: gtso bo pad+ma he ru kar byas te a yu gnas par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3270: de nas a yu dgug cing 'phrog pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3271: bi sha badz+ra'i sngags brjod de khro bo sprul pas
NK079(dzu)004:3272: bgegs btul tshe dbang du byas te bsgrub pa'ang bsdam
NK079(dzu)004:3275: tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma //
NK079(dzu)004:3278: tshe la dbang byed pa'i tsan da li ni rgyud 'phel ba'i las kyang byed de /
NK079(dzu)004:3279: sku mdog dkar mo g.yas kyi ga ta g.yon rin po che bum pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3280: gzhan mtshe bdag 'joms pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs bsnabs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3281: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la zhes pa dag /
NK079(dzu)004:3282: 'gro drug la tshe dbang ster ba'i lha mo 'di
NK079(dzu)004:3283: las lhag pa'i lha med pas 'di bsgom bzlas la
NK079(dzu)004:3285: 'di'i bzlas pa ni 'khrul pa med par /
NK079(dzu)004:3286: badz+ra tsan da li ha dza dza h'u n+ri bru
NK079(dzu)004:3287: badz+ra a yu she a zhes srog dang ldan par
NK079(dzu)004:3288: bya'o // yum bzhi bskul zhing bsdam bsrung bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3289: de'i sprul pas a yu dbrog pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3290: phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3291: 'og gi gshin rje gshed sogs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3292: steng gi bgegs ma h+aa de ba dang mkha' 'gro
NK079(dzu)004:3293: byad ma la sogs pa bcom la dgug pa ste
NK079(dzu)004:3295: a yu bstim pa ni 'khor lo'i 'bru la gtibs nas ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3296: de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de /
NK079(dzu)004:3297: n+ri'i gnas lngar gtim par bya /
NK079(dzu)004:3299: tshe bkug pa bum pa'i tshe rten la bstims la /
NK079(dzu)004:3300: bum pa'i lha yang zhu ba 'bru lngar gsal ba
NK079(dzu)004:3301: bdag gzhan gyi gnas lngar bstims pas 'bru lngar gsal
NK079(dzu)004:3302: nas lus med pa de 'bru gcig du gyur pa
NK079(dzu)004:3303: de yongs su gyur pa ni a yu sba ba
NK079(dzu)004:3304: yang yin no // gzhan dag zhi ba'i rjes su sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3305: de dngos grub blang ba'i las brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3306: de ltar dbang mchog ster ba'i bla ma la btang rag gtang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3307: de nas rigs kyi bu de yis //
NK079(dzu)004:3308: zhes pa la sogs pa yon tan bcas par bstan to //
NK079(dzu)004:3309: tshe'i cho ga dbang pa shin tu gsang ba zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3311: g.yung drung lhun gyi tshe dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3313: mthar phyin bde chen rdo rje'i tshe'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3314: de la 'gyur ba las kyi tshe ngo bo ye
NK079(dzu)004:3315: shes snying po thig le rlung gi ngo bos kun
NK079(dzu)004:3316: rdzob kyi rlung rtsa ba dang yan lag phyi nang
NK079(dzu)004:3317: du rgyu ba 'byung ba bzhi'i dbus su snang ba'o
NK079(dzu)004:3318: // 'on kyang rlung bcud gnyis ste gnas pa yun ring thung gi dus la bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3319: cho ga ni sgrub thabs bshad pa'i las rnams so //
NK079(dzu)004:3320: de'ang dngos po la dkyil 'khor snying po gser sgrom
NK079(dzu)004:3321: nyi zla'i nang na ye shes snying po thig le
NK079(dzu)004:3322: gnas la / de gshir bzhi rgya gram sna de
NK079(dzu)004:3323: nyid mdud sgrog gis bsdams pa'i lte ba na khrag
NK079(dzu)004:3324: sha sran chung tsam dbang gi khro bos bsrungs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3325: phyir bsgrubs pas 'grub tu btub pa'i thabs thun mong
NK079(dzu)004:3326: gnas la / ma yin pa'o // le'u bcu gsum
NK079(dzu)004:3327: pa'i spyan 'grel pa'o ////bdag gzhan gyi legs nyes dri
NK079(dzu)004:3328: gnas la / ma yin pa'o // ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3329: le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par
NK079(dzu)004:3330: gnas la / ma yin pa'o // ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3331: bya'o // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
NK079(dzu)004:3332: sdud pa pos 'gro ba lnga rang dbang med par
NK079(dzu)004:3333: gnas la / ma yin pa'o // ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3334: bya'o // smra ba / zhes bya bar bsdus nas
NK079(dzu)004:3335: gnas la / ma yin pa'o // ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3336: bya'o // smra ba / / ched du brjod pa
NK079(dzu)004:3337: gnas la / ma yin pa'o // ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3342: dbra bshad pa'ang ril rang rig pa'i phyir rang bzhin
NK079(dzu)004:3343: gyis 'grel pa'i thabs kyis 'gro ba lnga rang la
NK079(dzu)004:3344: dbang med par legs nyes ston pa'i don tshig don
NK079(dzu)004:3346: skabs kyis ston pa ni rdo rje rigs lta bur snang ba las kyi gzhag pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3347: sngags mkhan ji lta bas bya snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:3348: sngon goms blo brtan 'dris pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:3349: yang nas yang du mang mngon gsal du zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3350: rnal 'byor pa bsgrub pa'i sngon rol du cig char dang rim gyis pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3351: thabs lam gnyis po gang rung la goms brded can du gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:3352: lam gyi rim pa la goms par bya ba'am /
NK079(dzu)004:3353: bra'i ting nge 'dzin kyang lha bsgoms te /
NK079(dzu)004:3354: sngon du snyen pa gyis shig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3355: sngon du bya ba rngos bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3356: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings zhes pa nas sbyar bar bya zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3357: rang gis mthong dka' ba ni blang dor med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid de /
NK079(dzu)004:3358: de ngo bo nyid spyod yul yongs su dag pas
NK079(dzu)004:3359: ril gnyis med du 'grel pa'i ngo bo lhun gyis
NK079(dzu)004:3360: grub pa'i blar gyur de bdag nyid yin pas gsum
NK079(dzu)004:3362: ting nge 'dzin la sbyar ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3363: rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis //
NK079(dzu)004:3365: thams cad dbyings su thim par bya zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3366: ye shes rdo rje rtogs rka ba'i don mthong ba'i mis /
NK079(dzu)004:3367: khams gsum nyid rdo rje lnga'i ngo bor rtogs pa
NK079(dzu)004:3368: gsal ba'i rig pa nyid thabs shes rab kyi bdag
NK079(dzu)004:3369: nyid kyi phyir / yi ge sa bon gnyis las
NK079(dzu)004:3370: skad cig gam rim pas lha yab yum du bsgom
NK079(dzu)004:3371: ste zhen pa'i yul med par lhar bsgom pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3372: thabs kyis lam la 'jug pa'ang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:3373: de ltar bstan pas dang por bra dbab pa'i gnas
NK079(dzu)004:3374: btsal ba'i bstan pa'i phyir gzhag cing dbab pa'i sa
NK079(dzu)004:3375: de ni / byis pa lo grangs bcu gnyis pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3377: pra'i byis pa gtsang ba lo grangs nges pa ni g.yo rdzun dang ldab ldib spang ba'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3378: grangs rnyed na lnga'am ma rnyed na gcig la bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3379: yang na thig le bo mo'am rngos so //
NK079(dzu)004:3380: me long dang bum pa dang par bu dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3381: de dag ma yin pa'i dbab rten gang yang rung
NK079(dzu)004:3382: ba la bra'i cho ga rdzogs par byas te goms
NK079(dzu)004:3383: pa'i yul de yo byad du'ang 'chad do //
NK079(dzu)004:3384: de nas gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor brtsam pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3385: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3386: thig le man tra de dag tu /
NK079(dzu)004:3387: zhes nas rgyu dang ldan pa bya zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3388: lhag pa gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor thun mong ma yin brtson pa dang 'di ltar bya ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3389: brda'i don sngags kyi stegs bu tshad dang mthun pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3391: der rgyu bred kyi thig skud byin gyis brlabs la /
NK079(dzu)004:3392: thal chen gyis thig chal byas la gdab bo //
NK079(dzu)004:3393: 'debs pa'i tshe man tra'i sngags bazla'am /
NK079(dzu)004:3394: sa dang ye shes kyi sngags rngos su brjod la gdab bo //
NK079(dzu)004:3395: bri ba'ang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rta babs brgyan dang chas par bri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3396: mgo bo rdo rje rtse gcig pa can gyi kyo bzung re sgo ra bri /
NK079(dzu)004:3397: rdo rje rtse gsum pas rab dang gur du bskor ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3398: de lta bu'ang rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u dgu pa ltar gzhung ma nor bar rtsams te rgyan dgram mo //
NK079(dzu)004:3399: der bum pa lnga byin gyis rlabs la gzugs /
NK079(dzu)004:3400: thal chen nyungs kar g.yas su gzhag go //
NK079(dzu)004:3401: byis pa rnams kyang khrus byas la dkyil 'khor lha la phyag btsal te gzhag go //
NK079(dzu)004:3402: mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3403: zhes pa rmad du 'byung ba'i mchod ba la sogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3404: dris pa'i lha mchod pa'i rdzas bshams te skabs la bab par mchod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3405: de nas phyi nang mtshams bcad de rtags gsum gdab pa'ang bya /
NK079(dzu)004:3406: las kyi dkyil 'khor gzhung khro bor brtsams te rdzogs par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3407: bdag nyid rta ka'i h'u bsgoms la /
NK079(dzu)004:3408: zhes pa bdag nyid gtso bo ta ki ra tsa 'am h'u ka ra gang rung du bsgom /
NK079(dzu)004:3409: ta ki h'u dang rang sngags kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:3410: lan 'bum bzlas shing bgug par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3412: khro bo gnyis kyi sngags las dang bcas pa gang rung ba'i 'jug la /
NK079(dzu)004:3413: 'jig rten pa rang gang 'bebs pa'i srog snying btags te bzlas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3415: badz+ra kro ta ta ki ra tsa h'u ch+gee mo
NK079(dzu)004:3416: dza dza h'u pra be sha ya dza h'u bam
NK079(dzu)004:3418: bum bya ba ni sngon du bya ba dang bsnyen pa gnyis gar sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3419: a dang n+ri la sogs pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:3420: lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung //
NK079(dzu)004:3422: 'jig rten pa gang rung srog snying dang ting nge 'dzin gyis dgug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3423: pra be shas kyang bzlas par bya /
NK079(dzu)004:3425: khugs par byas pa'i khong phye la bstim pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3426: gzhan yang dza h'u bam ho ste //
NK079(dzu)004:3428: dgug thabs phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3429: bzlas pa'i dbang du na sngags de kun sbrel ba bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:3430: de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gyis gang dgug pa'i thabs ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3431: yam bdud ka ye shes 'od 'phros nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3434: yam las bsgrub bya 'og du rlung bskyed pa'ang yam gyi 'phro 'du las dud kar gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3435: a gyur pa las zla ba'i steng du gzhag pa de /
NK079(dzu)004:3436: bdag gi thugs khar 'chad pa ltar nyi steng du
NK079(dzu)004:3437: dza bsam pa'i 'od bkye bar gyur bas bzung ste
NK079(dzu)004:3438: byis pa'i snying la zhugs par bsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:3439: yang na a dza zla ba kyo ga ta byis
NK079(dzu)004:3440: pa'i snying la bsam ste dgug zhes la la dag
NK079(dzu)004:3441: 'chad do // bdag la bsgom pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3442: ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK079(dzu)004:3444: khar gzhug pa bya zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3445: bdag lhar gsal ba'i snying khar ma yongs su gyur
NK079(dzu)004:3446: pa las nyi ma'i steng dza dza dmar po bsam
NK079(dzu)004:3447: la de las kyo ga ta rgyud dmar spros te
NK079(dzu)004:3448: lha chen po la sogs pa gang dgug pa de'i
NK079(dzu)004:3449: snying nas kyogs grangs te byis pa'i ngag lam la
NK079(dzu)004:3450: bstim par bya'o // de'i tshe sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3453: smrar gzhugs pa'i sngags te gang ltar 'dod pa smros shig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3454: dbab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3455: lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te //
NK079(dzu)004:3457: a a zhes pa dag gsungs te bstims pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3458: thal ba nyungs dkar drag du brdeg /mi de'i khong du gzhug par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:3460: rtags 'dar ba 'byung na rdzas gnyis byis pa la
NK079(dzu)004:3461: brab cing byis pa'i khong du zhugs par bsam mo
NK079(dzu)004:3462: // dgug thabs gzhan yang phyag rgya rdo rje spar mo ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3464: bcol zhing bya ba'ang de bzhin no zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3465: sbar shad kyi phyag rgya bcas la g.yab pa'i tshul
NK079(dzu)004:3466: du bya ste dgug /gzhan phyag rgya bzhi las sogs
NK079(dzu)004:3467: pas dgug ste yi ge ni phyag rgya gnyis kyi
NK079(dzu)004:3468: barda'o // dngos ma ha de ba dang bsdu ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:3469: don gyis rgyal po bzhi la sogs pa dgug pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:3470: barda'o // // de la smra ba la sogs pa'i las bcos pa'ang bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3471: babs pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3472: babs na zhags pa rdo rje lcags sgrog cing zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3473: 'od zer gyi phyag rgya bzhis bsdam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3475: gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni //
NK079(dzu)004:3478: de ma yin na lha 'dre gang yin pa dang la dri /
NK079(dzu)004:3479: lha ma ha de ba las sogs pa yin na
NK079(dzu)004:3480: gong gi mchod yon gyis dgyes par byas na rdzun
NK079(dzu)004:3481: mi 'byung ngo // gdon yin na dam chu blud
NK079(dzu)004:3482: na dam las mi 'da' bar drang por smra ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:3483: mi 'byung ngo // phyir ro // de nas gang 'dod pa dri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3484: gal te smra ma btub na rang dbang med par smra gzhug par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3485: gal te smra ru ma btub na zhes pa la
NK079(dzu)004:3486: sogs pa dbab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya drag tu
NK079(dzu)004:3487: bya ba'o // bsam pa ni ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga' /
NK079(dzu)004:3488: bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam //
NK079(dzu)004:3489: zhes pa nas smra bar 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3490: ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyal ba'i gsung bden pa'i byis pa'i khong du zhugs par bsgom /
NK079(dzu)004:3491: byis pa'i lce rtse la ar gyur pa'i zla steng
NK079(dzu)004:3492: du +amo di dmar po bsams na dang med par
NK079(dzu)004:3493: smra ste legs nyes dri bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3494: gam grub na spogs pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3495: ta ki h'u dzas mi btub na //
NK079(dzu)004:3496: ha ya gri ba gnas dang yul //
NK079(dzu)004:3497: zur phyin mgo 'jug bsnan nas ni //
NK079(dzu)004:3499: bshad pa'i khro bos ma grub na rta mgrin la
NK079(dzu)004:3500: bra mo ha dang sri la ma dang bcas pa
NK079(dzu)004:3501: bsgom ste / dgug pa ni lha'i rang sngags la
NK079(dzu)004:3502: dang che ge mo dza dza mgo mjug tu bsnan
NK079(dzu)004:3503: te dgug pa'ang bzlas pa zur phyin pa drag tu
NK079(dzu)004:3505: 'jig rten pa gang yin pa'i srog snying ma nor ba nas grangs te byis pa la gzhug go //
NK079(dzu)004:3507: dgug pa'i zhes pa dag /gzhan dgug thabs gnyis po gang yod pas le lo med par bkug ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3508: dbab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya gyis ba la dbab pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3509: phyag rgya spar shad du'ang sbrel lo //
NK079(dzu)004:3510: de nas legs nyes dri ba la sogs pa bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3511: byis pa chud mi gsan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3512: bgegs phye ste dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3513: dbab ba'i las kyi rim pa rdzogs nas sngar byas
NK079(dzu)004:3514: bum pa lnga la snying po blugs pa yum lngar
NK079(dzu)004:3516: las thams cad pa'i bum pa bdud rtsi 'khyil bar brlabs pa bgegs bsad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3517: de'ang 'bu ta yo tsa ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK079(dzu)004:3518: zhes pa lnga ste dbang ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:3520: zhes pa bsad pa'i sngags so //
NK079(dzu)004:3521: yon tan ni ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3522: gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang zhes pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3523: dbu'i gsang ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nges tshig
NK079(dzu)004:3524: dang gdam ngag dang dbang gi yon tan du'ang bstan
NK079(dzu)004:3525: pa'i phyir / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa de //
NK079(dzu)004:3526: ye shes lnga zhes pa gsum gsungs te //
NK079(dzu)004:3527: sdud pa 'khor dang ma 'ongs pa la brgyud de gdam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3528: pra'i dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3529: de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni //
NK079(dzu)004:3532: pra bsgrub pa lnga bzhin byas na //
NK079(dzu)004:3533: kun dang smra ba'i dngos la the tshom med pas brtson pa la bskul ba'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3534: 'di dag ni bdag don du tshe bsgrub la sogs
NK079(dzu)004:3535: pa gang byed pa'i snga rol tu brtsam mo zhe'o
NK079(dzu)004:3536: // le'u bcu bzhi pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:3537: ////phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor dang lam rim thun
NK079(dzu)004:3539: le'u bco lnga pa'i rnam par bshad par brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3540: dang po de bzhin nyid gsal zhing 'gris par bsgom zhes pa phra mo'i sngon du bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3541: de nas bdag gi snying kar a kar zhing 'tsher
NK079(dzu)004:3542: ba cig bsgom zhes pa rten dang brten pa med
NK079(dzu)004:3543: par rig pa nyid ar gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3545: zhes pa a la blo brtan nas a phyogs bcur spros te slar gzhi po la thim par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3546: gdan bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3547: ma dang a las nyi ma zla ba /
NK079(dzu)004:3549: nang du 'dab brgyad rtsa dang tsi ti dkar dmar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3550: gsang bar dkar dmar sa bon chu skyes brgyad thig le chen po'i gdan gyi phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3551: yi ge gsum du gyur pa las gdan gsum phyi rol du'ang bsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3554: de nas gdan thog tu rig pa h'u nyid sngon por bsam pa bstan pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3556: de nas sku yongs su rdzogs pa 'phral 'dus par
NK079(dzu)004:3557: 'chad pa bzhin bskyed pa'i snying la ye shes sems
NK079(dzu)004:3558: dpa' bsgom / de la dbang dang byin rlabs kyi lha brgyad kyang bsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:3559: de nas spros bcas la bslab pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3560: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3564: phra mo'i bshad pa lhag pa'i lha brgyad do //
NK079(dzu)004:3566: phyogs gzhan du rdo rje gsum gyi sngags 'byung rdub 'dug pa la 'bad pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3567: rigs lnga so so la'ang de ltar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3568: spros bcas ltar bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su ma 'phror gyur pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3569: stong gi lha la sogs pa la yang sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3572: lte snying kha dang spyi gtsug tu h'u bzhi bkod la khro bo bzhi'i sngags brjod la bsrung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3574: zhes pa longs spyod kyi hmo bya ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3575: bza' btung gi ting nge 'dzin te lhag par skabs 'dir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3576: tshogs dang mchod pa yang dbul zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3577: bza' btung tshogs gnyis su gyur pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3578: mchod pa'i las bzhi gang byed kyang las kyi dkyil
NK079(dzu)004:3579: 'khor lto bar gsal ba'i gtso bo las dang sbyar
NK079(dzu)004:3580: ro // bza' btung sna tshogs g.yas g.yon gzar bu gnyis kyis blangs la /
NK079(dzu)004:3581: me lha myong byed zhal nas dbul ba'ang las bzhi sngags yis bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3582: de dag lhag par gzugs brnyan ltar bya ba ni 'di slob pa'i tshe 'gal te /
NK079(dzu)004:3583: goms nas don gnyis phyir mi 'dod pa ma yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3584: de'i su'i yul yin zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:3585: mang po mi nus pa'i don du'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3587: dman pa nyid dam phyag rgya gcig pa'i ched du bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3588: mang po mi nus pa'i cha rkyen phyag rgya gang zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:3590: phyag rgya chen po dang chos kyi phyag rgya dang
NK079(dzu)004:3591: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang las kyi phyag rgya
NK079(dzu)004:3598: bsam pa chos nyid dang bden pa'i chos nyid dang bzlas pa'i chos so //
NK079(dzu)004:3599: yum dam tshig dang 'dzin pa dam tshig dang bca' ba dang bsam pa dam tshig go //
NK079(dzu)004:3600: bsam pa'i las dang bca' ba'i las dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3602: don gyis rnal 'byor gsum kar 'gyur te sku gcig
NK079(dzu)004:3603: la tshang ba ni mang po mi nus pa'i dbang
NK079(dzu)004:3604: ngo // rgyas pa ni spros bcas kyi rnal 'byor du'ang 'gyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3605: thams cad thabs dang shes rab du 'byor pa'i phyag
NK079(dzu)004:3606: rgya zhes pa de nyid bzhi dang ldan pa yab
NK079(dzu)004:3608: rtogs pa'i don du 'di nyid las rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3609: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:3610: thabs dang shes rab ngang du gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:3614: mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u las de bzhin ting nge 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis /
NK079(dzu)004:3615: thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni //
NK079(dzu)004:3616: nyid kyi thugs la gtim byas te //
NK079(dzu)004:3617: yang dag chos sku'i phyag rgya che zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:3618: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya /
NK079(dzu)004:3620: phyag rgya dam tshig gi le'u las //
NK079(dzu)004:3621: lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK079(dzu)004:3622: nang gi rtags ni phyi ru ste //
NK079(dzu)004:3623: mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3625: de dag ni 'di'i bzhi dang sngon du song ba
NK079(dzu)004:3626: dang ngos gzung ba'am phyis bslab pa'i phyir bstan pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:3627: // rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las mang po bsgom mi nus pa'i le'u zhes /
NK079(dzu)004:3628: rim par 'jug pa re re nas slob pa dang
NK079(dzu)004:3629: phyag rgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin te le'u mtshan
NK079(dzu)004:3630: bstan pa'o // le'u bco lnga pa'i spyan rnam par
NK079(dzu)004:3631: 'grel pa'o ////bsgom lam gyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:3632: bstan pa'o // / le'u bcu drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3633: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub myur du len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3634: dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya thun mong tshe 'di la
NK079(dzu)004:3635: mthar phyin pa lam thob pa nyid kyis go 'phang
NK079(dzu)004:3636: chen po 'thob pa'i thabs chen gnyis phyir bka' gsal
NK079(dzu)004:3637: pa'o // dang po'i phyir man ngag gi rim pa
NK079(dzu)004:3638: la 'jug pa mthong lam thag gcad nas bsgom pa
NK079(dzu)004:3639: pa'o // bstan pa'i phyir / dam pa'i don zhes
NK079(dzu)004:3640: pa bsgom lam gyi dgos byed dang dam bca' bar
NK079(dzu)004:3641: pa'o // bstan pa'i phyir / 'grel to // lam gnyis bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3642: byang chub tshogs la gzung bar gnas zhes pa nas gzung zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3643: gdam pa ste de bzhin nyid dang sgyu ma ni
NK079(dzu)004:3644: byang chub sems rnam gnyis te gcig kyang ngo bos
NK079(dzu)004:3645: gnyis su med pa'i don las yengs par mi bya'o
NK079(dzu)004:3647: shin tu sku dang ye shes kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3648: bzang ngan med par rdzogs pa'i don la rim par
NK079(dzu)004:3649: bsgoms te ring nge 'dzin gyi skyon lnga'i dbang du
NK079(dzu)004:3651: bsgom pa la gzhag thabs gang snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:3652: bya ba med las bya med bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3653: mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:3655: yal bar mi dor ba'i bya ba med pa'i brtson
NK079(dzu)004:3656: 'grus kyis bsgom pa ni lam dang po spyod pa'ang
NK079(dzu)004:3657: yin te / des byang sems rnam gnyis mtshan nyid
NK079(dzu)004:3658: mtha' bral du tha snyad tsam du gnas pa la
NK079(dzu)004:3659: yin te / / de nyid rig pa yin pas
NK079(dzu)004:3660: yul du 'jug tu med par shes pas rang mi
NK079(dzu)004:3661: g.yo ba ni 'jug thabs dam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3662: de nas phra ba la blo sbyang ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3663: b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a //
NK079(dzu)004:3665: b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3666: dkyil 'khor snying gser sgrom nang du chu skyes 'dab
NK079(dzu)004:3667: brgyad kyi lte ba la a thung du dkar la
NK079(dzu)004:3668: 'tsher ba gcig rang gsal du bsgom /
NK079(dzu)004:3669: brtan pa dang a 'phra mo 'od dang bcas pa 'phros /
NK079(dzu)004:3670: phyogs bcu gang ste 'dus pas de nyid gang de'i
NK079(dzu)004:3671: tshe dug gsum dang sa bon drug shes pa bzhi
NK079(dzu)004:3672: dang gnyid du bcas pa sbyangs /
NK079(dzu)004:3673: de nas lus gang de las sgo gsum ma dmigs /
NK079(dzu)004:3674: de nas phyogs bcu rang rig gi phyir rdul phra rab ril ar gsal bas /
NK079(dzu)004:3675: gzhan pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa kun sbyangs /
NK079(dzu)004:3676: slar bzhi po la thim nas 'phel 'grib med pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:3677: ma skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3679: a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las /
NK079(dzu)004:3681: de nas gdan bskyed pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3682: thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3683: rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab //
NK079(dzu)004:3685: ma skyes pa'i ngang las rang rig pa nyid gsung
NK079(dzu)004:3686: gi phyag rgya a ma dkar dmar du gsal ba
NK079(dzu)004:3687: las / spros pas don gnyis byas /
NK079(dzu)004:3688: bsdus pas nyi zla gang brtsegs mar gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:3689: nyi mas ma rig pa sel ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3690: zla bas gdung ba gsal ba la sogs pa'i thugs rje dang mdzad pa bsam yas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3691: gzhal yas bskyed par bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3693: pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che //
NK079(dzu)004:3695: rang rig pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3696: gdan la 'od kyi gzhal yas khang du gyur pa der /
NK079(dzu)004:3697: rang rig ma gos dag la yon tan gyi bdag nyid kyi phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3698: khris stong 'dab bteg ste bzhi rtseg tu gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3699: der chog dang po bsam pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3700: mkha' la mja' sprin mang yang zhes pa gnyis rgyu
NK079(dzu)004:3701: ma goms pas spyod yul h'u cig tu bsdur btub
NK079(dzu)004:3703: thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang zhes pa dag /rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3704: mngon gsum du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ji snyed du rig ma rig la snang yang /
NK079(dzu)004:3705: rang rig pa nyid kyi phyir mtha' gsum bral ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:3706: de kho na nyid du tha mi dad pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:3707: gtan tshigs so // thams cad yi ge h'u du 'gyur zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:3708: dngos po ril byang chub sems nyid h'u du rang shar pas rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3709: de gang du zhe na gdan rnams rig pa mtha'
NK079(dzu)004:3710: bral ba rtag dka' ba'i dkyil du bsam pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:3711: / h'u nyid gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:3712: de spro bsdu bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3713: shes rab spyan la 'gris pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3714: zhes pa la sogs pa rang rig h'u du yul
NK079(dzu)004:3715: du med par gsal ba spyan lnga'i dam pa de
NK079(dzu)004:3716: goms pa dang / n+ri'i dbang po mngon gsum du
NK079(dzu)004:3717: h'u phra mo brtan par yod pa ni brtan pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3718: goms pa dang / tshad do // de ltar brtan zhing goms nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3719: h'u phra mo phyogs bcur spros kyang rig pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:3720: gzhi po la 'grib pa med slar bsdus pas gzhir
NK079(dzu)004:3721: 'phel zhing phyogs bcu 'grib pa med de 'phel 'grib
NK079(dzu)004:3722: med pa gcig ma bral ba'i rig par gsal ba
NK079(dzu)004:3723: de 'od du gyur te chos nyid gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3724: thugs kyi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3727: rdo rje dril bu nas tsam du gyur pa brtan
NK079(dzu)004:3728: pa'i 'phro 'du las sku 'phra mo bsgom ste 'phro
NK079(dzu)004:3729: 'dus yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa'
NK079(dzu)004:3730: yab yum 'od dang chas pa zhal gcig gam gsum
NK079(dzu)004:3732: phyag rgya sku nyid gsal bar bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:3734: de la yan lag gi lha bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3735: gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3736: gnas lnga dag tu bsgom zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:3737: snying la ye shes sems dpa' bsam //
NK079(dzu)004:3738: glang 'grin snying rtse la lha gsum sgyu 'phrul dang gi rgyud ltar bsam /
NK079(dzu)004:3739: spyi bo gnas lnga dbang gi lha lnga bsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3740: de la gnas gcig du bsam pa gang zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:3741: sen zlum zla ba gang ba'i /
NK079(dzu)004:3742: thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya zhes pa gdan
NK079(dzu)004:3743: de'i steng ye shes sems dpa' tshan gang ba bsam
NK079(dzu)004:3744: / de'i thugs kar rdo rje nyi steng du bsam pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3745: nyi ma'i dkyil du 'khor gang ba'i zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:3746: de'i bum pa la h'u gi mtha' ma g.yas skor du bzlas pa'i snying po bskor ba'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3747: de dkyil yi ge h'u gnas pa zhes pa gnyis gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:3748: de la ye shes sems dpa' snyan gsan dbab /
NK079(dzu)004:3750: brtan par bya rim par mchod bstod la /
NK079(dzu)004:3752: phyi nang gi bzlas pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3753: gnas gsum gyi bzlas pa byas te //
NK079(dzu)004:3755: skyon rdzogs rim la 'bad pa bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3756: phyag rgya gcig pa 'phrab brtan nas rags pa bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3757: yang na phyag rgya chen po ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3759: mi mthun pa'i sgras dang po nas //
NK079(dzu)004:3760: 'phra ba dor te rags pa 'ba' zhig bslab pa'ang yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:3761: de'i gzhal yas dang gdan dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3762: bskyed rim mkho na ltar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3767: 'dir gtso bo la bstan du zad kyi rigs gang la dga' bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3768: khro bo la slob na'ang de ltar rim pa nges par 'bad do //
NK079(dzu)004:3769: de nas spros pa'i rnal 'byor la slob pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3772: lnga po don spros bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:3774: rigs lnga la bslab pa'i rim pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3775: tshom bu la bslab pa thun mong du bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3776: rigs kyi dbang du lnga goms nas bzhi bcu gnyis la bslab pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3778: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog /ma bcos dang gis /
NK079(dzu)004:3779: zhes pa dag /de goms nas bslab pa mi mthun pa mang por bslab pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:3780: bdag nyid rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3781: gzhi de la lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yan lag stong la sogs pa bsgom ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3782: bshad pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3783: sgyu 'phrul dbang gi rgyud las gsungs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3784: stangs dpyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3785: sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor yang //
NK079(dzu)004:3786: ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du //
NK079(dzu)004:3787: dpe byad mtshan gyis brgyan spras pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3789: mthar phyin pa'i lam brtsis las 'das pa'am dbang sgyur gyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3790: phyag rgya chen po de dag las /
NK079(dzu)004:3791: phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus gzhal yas khang //
NK079(dzu)004:3793: spros bcas kyi lha mang yang drangs nges par bsgom
NK079(dzu)004:3794: pa de brtan nas gzhi de las tshogs sgrub bas
NK079(dzu)004:3795: dbang sgyur gyi rnal 'byor thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK079(dzu)004:3796: ni / snod bcud gzhal yas khang gi ngo bo la //
NK079(dzu)004:3797: nyi zla brgyad dang bcu gnyis brgyad kyi gza' skar la sogs pa lha'i gdan dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3799: lha'ang rtsis las 'das te zhi khro la sogs kun dus gcig gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3801: thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'gro don mdzad zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:3803: tshe la dbang thob pa yan cad kyis drod rtags dang cho 'phrul bzhi dang mngon shes thob pas /
NK079(dzu)004:3804: thabs mang pos 'gro ba rnams kyi don yang mdzad /
NK079(dzu)004:3805: 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'ang chos bstan nas theg pa chen po la bskul ba /
NK079(dzu)004:3806: thabs gnyis lam gyis byed do //
NK079(dzu)004:3807: sa bcu pa'i shes bya'ang gsang sngags rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pas sbyangs te /
NK079(dzu)004:3808: bden pa gnyis med sa dang po la sbyor bar byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3809: sprul pa'i 'khor mos pa dang longs spyod kyi 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:3810: de dag la'ang cha lugs de nyid kyis ston nus
NK079(dzu)004:3811: te / bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i sa la nye ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3812: lam bsgom pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3813: 'di ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog stee /
NK079(dzu)004:3814: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3815: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub pa'i le'u zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3817: 'di ltar sngar rgyal po dza dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3818: sras dang slon dpon 'bu ta ku ga ta la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3819: so so'i tshom bu dang bcas pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i dral 'thob pas mchod cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3820: le'u bcu drug pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel ba'o ////bdag
NK079(dzu)004:3821: gzhan gyi don du bdud rtsi sman sgrub pa bstan
NK079(dzu)004:3822: pa'i phyir / le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3823: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba
NK079(dzu)004:3824: las thugs rje 'gro ba 'dul ba'i bdud rtsi 'byung
NK079(dzu)004:3825: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
NK079(dzu)004:3826: zhugs nas / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:3827: zhes pa rgyud dang ston pa tha mi dad pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3828: ngang las gdul bya la bdud rtsi bsgrub thabs phan
NK079(dzu)004:3829: yon dang bcas pa 'byung ba'ang dgongs pa de nyid
NK079(dzu)004:3830: kyi ngo bor bzhugs pa gdul bya la skabs bsgyur
NK079(dzu)004:3832: e ma ho ye nas dag chos las //
NK079(dzu)004:3834: dang po bla mas gzhi rtogs par byas lam thob par bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3835: de nas rgos ched gang yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3836: bdud rtsi rgyu gang las bsgrub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3837: ban da lngar sman rigs dbye ba'am sib lugs su bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3838: phyi mtshams bcad dkyil 'khor bris pa'i steng du bkod la /
NK079(dzu)004:3839: dam pa rigs brgya'i bsnyen pas sbyang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3840: bdag btsag byas la dam rigs lnga'i bsnyen pas sbyang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3841: bum pa cig tu dril la de kho na nyid
NK079(dzu)004:3842: gsang chen rigs gcig pa'i bsnyen pas sbyang ba dang
NK079(dzu)004:3843: / nang nub tshogs grang zhing brlab la sogs pa bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3844: rtags byung nas dngos grub blang ba'i thabs rnams dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3845: gzhan don bya ba'i thabs dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3847: bsgrubs pa'i yon tan rnams su shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3848: de la dang po'i don nyid 'dis 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:3849: dam pa ni 'chad pa'i don bdud rtsi bde ba
NK079(dzu)004:3850: chen por gasuma'am bzhi kar dag pa'i gzhi la ma
NK079(dzu)004:3851: rtog 'khor ba lang ma pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3852: nges pa'i shes pa med pa sa dug sman dang gtsang smer nan gyis mthong ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3853: de gang zhe na thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes /
NK079(dzu)004:3854: zhes pa nas gang yang med zhes pa ril rig
NK079(dzu)004:3855: pa nyid snang ba'i 'byung ba lnga las skyes pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3856: ril / gzhi dngos po gnyis dag pa las rtog
NK079(dzu)004:3857: pa'i rkyen gyis snang ba ni lan tsha dug lta
NK079(dzu)004:3858: bu'i phyir na dngos po ma nges pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3859: 'o na tha dad do zhes na //
NK079(dzu)004:3860: thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3861: ngo bo nyid kyi rig pa ci'ang ma yin pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3862: phyir cir yang snang du btub pa'i phyir snang ngo
NK079(dzu)004:3863: // cir yang snang ba nyid 'khrul tog tsam las byed pa po med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3864: sus kyang ma byas su byed yod //
NK079(dzu)004:3866: de bas na rtog pa tsam las ngo bo de
NK079(dzu)004:3867: nyid na bdud rtsi bde ba chen po yin pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3868: don kho na thag chod par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3869: dgos ched la gnyis las spyi'i dgos ched bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3870: rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings //
NK079(dzu)004:3871: lus gnas longs spyod sna tshogs dang zhes pa nas sbyong zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3872: sman bsgrubs pas 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras dag par byed pa'i phyir gnyer ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3873: rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed //
NK079(dzu)004:3875: gang thun mong brgyad dang sgo gsum la gnas pa
NK079(dzu)004:3876: rnams theg pa chen po bden pa gsum mthar thug
NK079(dzu)004:3877: la sbyor zhing / bcu pa'i sems dpa' chen po'ang
NK079(dzu)004:3878: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis mthar 'byin par
NK079(dzu)004:3879: la sbyor zhing / byed la / bcud dang gsum
NK079(dzu)004:3880: gyis dus gcig tu mthar phyin par byed pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:3881: la sbyor zhing / byed la / / nye lam dam pa yis 'di don du gnyer ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3883: zhes pa spyod pa blang dor med par gdam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3884: rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs //
NK079(dzu)004:3887: sems nyid kyi don mthong bsgom la bskul ba dang
NK079(dzu)004:3888: spyod pa'i snying po chen pos zin chags med par
NK079(dzu)004:3889: spyod cig par gdams pa ste bsgom lam gnyis pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3890: 'ang spyod pa'o // bdud rtsi'i che ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3891: bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings //
NK079(dzu)004:3893: rdzas kyi bdud rtsi spyi dang khyad par la drags pa'i phyi nang dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3894: chos kyi bdud rtsi thun mong dang zab mo dag
NK079(dzu)004:3895: gi'ang bdud rtsir gyur pa bden pa gnyis med pa
NK079(dzu)004:3896: nyid de / lnga'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:3897: de bas na de la rgyu rkyen gyis skad cig ma'i rgyun med pa ni bsgrub shes par bya'oo //
NK079(dzu)004:3898: don de 'byung ba'i gnas ni nyi zla gnyis te /
NK079(dzu)004:3899: grags pa'i lnga 'byung ba'ang yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:3900: de'i las gtsang sme la sogs pa ma spangs bral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3901: de bas na bdag gi bsgrub bya phun sum tshogs
NK079(dzu)004:3902: pa'i bdag nyid 'gro ba rigs lnga'i don ji lta
NK079(dzu)004:3904: lnga la sogs pa'i phyir byin rlabs tshad med de dgos pa gnyis kyang yod do //
NK079(dzu)004:3905: gser sgyur sman dang mun sel zhing //
NK079(dzu)004:3906: zhes pa rtag pa bdud rtsi gnas 'gyur gyi dpe' bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3907: khyad par gyi dpe' bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:3908: gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub pa zhes pa
NK079(dzu)004:3909: spyi'i dgos pa gnyis las mi mthun pa dag kyang
NK079(dzu)004:3910: 'grub pa'i phyir / khyad par du dug gdul ba gang zhe na //
NK079(dzu)004:3911: rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3912: zhes pa nas gdul ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3914: kha zas mi 'phrod pa las gyur pa la sogs pa dag dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3915: gang dag rtsa ba las gyur pa dngos dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3916: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthu can 'dus pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3918: gzhan dag gi rigs ngan pa'i sbyor ba dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3919: gzhan bsdu ba ni dbyig dug dang //
NK079(dzu)004:3920: sbrang bu tree ma ti' dug la sogs pa phyi'i'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3921: gzhan du na chags sdang rkyen gyis bslang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3922: gsum lnga'i nyon mongs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3925: rkyen rgyu las byung ba'i rtog tshogs rol lo //
NK079(dzu)004:3926: de dag nyid bdud rtsi chen por gdod nas lhun
NK079(dzu)004:3927: gyis grub pa nyid de nyid sman chen du rang
NK079(dzu)004:3928: smad pa'i thabs kyis sbyang pa'i ched du dkyil 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:3929: ma lus tshang bar bsgom zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3930: rtsa ba yan lag rang rang las lhar bskyed de bsnyen pa gsum gyi lha rim par bsgom pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3931: bdag gzhan don du dngos grub blang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3932: gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lngas gtim //
NK079(dzu)004:3933: zhes pa rtags drug thon nas bum pa nyid spyi
NK079(dzu)004:3934: bo snying kha lte gsang la gdugs 'bru lnga pos
NK079(dzu)004:3935: gtim ste yongs su gyur pas 'bras bu lnga thob
NK079(dzu)004:3936: par bsam pa'o // bdag gzhan don du de las mi mthun par /
NK079(dzu)004:3937: yi ge gnyis gang rung las bdud rtsi gtim pa
NK079(dzu)004:3938: spyi bo nas brtsams te khyad par du bshad pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:3939: dug gis zin pa la de nyid bdud rtsir gyur
NK079(dzu)004:3940: par bya ste / spros bcas thob pa'i yul phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3941: rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u lnga par sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:3942: mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya a ho zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3943: de ltar bdud rtsis dbang bskur bas de'i sgo nas lhun grub nyid mngon du gyur par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3944: dbang gi yon tan ni yan lag la gtims na thams cad la thogs med par 'gro ba thob /
NK079(dzu)004:3945: ngag la gtims na smra ba'i 'khor lo 'thob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3946: ma thob pa thob par byar yang med pa'i ngang
NK079(dzu)004:3947: las dngos grub sna tshogs 'thob pa'i dgyes pa dang
NK079(dzu)004:3948: ldan pa'o // rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3950: bshad pa bzhin 'og min du gsang sngags kyi bdag
NK079(dzu)004:3951: po lag na rdo rjes bsdus te skal ldan mi
NK079(dzu)004:3953: zhi ba'i rigs lngas sbyang ba'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:3954: h'u bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3956: 'chad pa ltar sman ban da rtsa ba yan lag bkod /
NK079(dzu)004:3958: 'khrol 'u bsres pa la dar rigs dang mthun bkab la sbyang na /
NK079(dzu)004:3959: dbus kyi byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'phru
NK079(dzu)004:3960: bcu bkod pa las cho ga gsum gyis rigs lnga
NK079(dzu)004:3962: so so'i sngags kyis sbyang zhing ban d+ha lag tu
NK079(dzu)004:3963: thogs te tshig 'di dag re re nas brjod de
NK079(dzu)004:3964: de srog dang ldan par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3965: bdag nyid kyi rig pa snang ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:3966: byang chub kyi sems zhe sdang dag pa rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3967: zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms pas ril byams
NK079(dzu)004:3968: sdang gnyis med pa la sbyar ba ni rigs sbyangs
NK079(dzu)004:3969: pas byams pa chen po'i thugs so //
NK079(dzu)004:3970: bdag nyid gti mug chos sku ste zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3971: dri chen las de bzhin rigs su bskyed pa des
NK079(dzu)004:3972: gti mug dag pa'i phyir ma rig sel te rang
NK079(dzu)004:3973: byung ba'i ye shes sgrub byed dang bral ba ni
NK079(dzu)004:3974: sku'i rigs kyi phyir ril rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung
NK079(dzu)004:3975: ba'o // tri bdag nyid nga rgyal yon tan te /
NK079(dzu)004:3977: mang sa tram gi sa bon las rang rig yon tan rigs nga rgyal dag par bskyed sbyang na /
NK079(dzu)004:3978: yon tan ni snying rje chen pos don rgya chen por 'grub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3979: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen po la skul ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:3980: blo mchog dag ni sa la 'god pa la sogs pa tshang dang bral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3981: h+r+ai bdag nyid zhes pa dag rag ta gsung pa de ma rigs su bskyed pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:3982: yon tan dang ngo bo 'dod chags ma spangs bral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3983: +aa bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:3984: dri chu rang rig pa nyid don yod grub par
NK079(dzu)004:3985: bskyed pa'i 'phrin las kyis don gnyis rdzogs par byed
NK079(dzu)004:3986: cing bcu bzhir don mdzad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3987: mu zhes pa yum gyi yi ge ste bdud rtsi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la yum lngar bskyed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3988: phyi ma'i skabs su khos bos spyad par yang mi 'dod pa ma yin zhes smra'o //
NK079(dzu)004:3989: bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te /
NK079(dzu)004:3991: cha phra ba lnga'ang rang rig pa rang bzhin gyis
NK079(dzu)004:3992: 'od gsal ba ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab chen
NK079(dzu)004:3993: po yi yum du bskyed do //
NK079(dzu)004:3994: des yon tan ni le lo gnyis dang g.yeng ba
NK079(dzu)004:3995: drug spong ste ngo bo nyid la gnyis pa med
NK079(dzu)004:3996: pa'i phyir ro // de med pa'i thugs rje ni
NK079(dzu)004:3997: gang du'ang thogs pa med pa la zin chags med
NK079(dzu)004:3998: pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4000: ye shes drug gis nyon mongs sbyangs zhes pa yab
NK079(dzu)004:4001: yum gyi ye shes lnga dang de bzhin nyid kyi
NK079(dzu)004:4002: ye shes dang drug gis nyon mongs pa lnga dang
NK079(dzu)004:4004: de kho na nyid mthong bar byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4005: kha cig na re ra sa ya na la mu
NK079(dzu)004:4006: ma las sman gyi lha 'jam dpal bskyed la sbyang
NK079(dzu)004:4007: zhes 'chad na rags par mi 'dod do //
NK079(dzu)004:4008: sgral ba'i skabs su 'jam dpal byin gyis rlab par ni 'dod pa'ang ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:4009: rgyu mchog lnga'ang cig sngon du bsgral la bdud rtsi'i rgyu bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4010: skabs su thugs dam bskang ba gnyi ga'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4012: dug gsum sbyong ba sku gsum ste lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga /
NK079(dzu)004:4013: 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4014: go rims bsgyur te gang zhig bsgral bar bya ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4015: snying gi pad+ma'i 'dab bzhi lte ba dang bcas pa
NK079(dzu)004:4016: / a su n+ri tri pri du zung re go rim bzhin gnas pa de gsal bar byas la /
NK079(dzu)004:4017: de la rim pa dbus nas +amo pyam /
NK079(dzu)004:4022: de dag byang nas cho ga gsum gyi rim pas
NK079(dzu)004:4023: sa bon dang lung ngag yid sbyangs te rigs lngar
NK079(dzu)004:4024: rim par gsal ba sbyor bas re mos thim ste
NK079(dzu)004:4025: / dbus snang mdzad kyang ma dmigs par gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:4026: de ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rigs lngas sa bon lnga sbyangs nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4027: ram yam kham gsum gyis bsreg gtor bkrus pas chos nyid du sbyangs pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4028: sku gsum gyi mdzad pas dug gsum bsgral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4030: de bas na 'khor ba'i bag chags rtsad nas gcod pa shes rab kyi ral gri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4031: h'u du bsdu zhing ho yis g.yengs //
NK079(dzu)004:4032: ram gyis bsreg cing phata kyis 'phang //
NK079(dzu)004:4034: thig le dbyings su thim par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:4035: de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:4036: ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom zhes pa yi
NK079(dzu)004:4037: ge gsum gyis chos nyid du bsgral te shes pa
NK079(dzu)004:4038: sa bon drug bsregs h'u drug tu gyur pa h'u
NK079(dzu)004:4039: cig tu drangs te shangs nas brgyad de yum gyi
NK079(dzu)004:4040: mkha' la phyin pa la cho ga'i sbyor bas sku
NK079(dzu)004:4041: tshon gang bar gsal ba de zla rlung gis bteg
NK079(dzu)004:4042: ste phata kyis / 'og min du 'phangs pa 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa ltar brtsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:4043: sman spyad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4045: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4046: zhes pa nas phyag rgya gsal zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4048: khro bos kyang sbyang ba ni dam pa'i rigs brgyas sbyangs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4049: lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bskyed de de la ye
NK079(dzu)004:4050: shes sems dpa' dang byin rlabs lha gsum dang dbang
NK079(dzu)004:4051: gi lha lnga bsams te sbyang /
NK079(dzu)004:4052: tshang ba'i sgras dang sdud pa'i sgras zhi ba las khro bor yang bsgyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:4053: khro bos kyang sbyang ba ni dam pa'i rigs brgyas sbyang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4054: de bas na lha nyid bdag nyid pa'i phyir de nyid kyi 'du shes dang bral bar gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4055: bza' btung la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4056: de nas longs spyod lnga kun la zhes pa la
NK079(dzu)004:4057: sogs pa sbyang ba'i de ma thag par tshogs kyi
NK079(dzu)004:4059: 'og gi 'bru lnga bkod de ye shes lnga'i ngo bor bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4060: rigs lnga'i ngo bor bskyed pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4062: sman lnga bdud rtsi chen po lngar bsam pa gang rung du bya ba'am skabs bsgyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4064: h'u ces pa lnga dgod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4065: badz+ra a mri ta zhes pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pas gtogs shig sdus la bsregs shig pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4066: chu'i rdul phra rab khro bo sngo nag mtshon cha can du gyur pas bskrad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4067: bi shud te a mri ta h'u phata /
NK079(dzu)004:4068: zhes pa nas gyur to zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4069: sgra'i sna tshogs dag pa'i bdud rtsis thams cad dag pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4070: chos kyi bdud rtsi chos nyid du gyur /
NK079(dzu)004:4071: 'bru gsum gyis ril sku gsum thugs su gsal ba bdud rtsi bde ba chen po ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4072: bsgrub pa po rdzas gnyi ga sbyangs pas nyams chag thams cad bskang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4073: sman sbyangs ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4074: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams zhes pa nas thim par bya zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4075: gzhal bya dgos ched rnam par phye ba'i gtan tshigs
NK079(dzu)004:4076: kyis lta ba rtogs pas dang por de bzhin nyid
NK079(dzu)004:4079: man ngag las dbyings phyug bskul ba'i gar thabs kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:4080: yi ge lnga'i gnas su gsang thig le /
NK079(dzu)004:4081: khams bde gcig kyang lngar ldan pa //
NK079(dzu)004:4082: nyi shu lngar gsal thig le yis //
NK079(dzu)004:4083: ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su skye //
NK079(dzu)004:4085: de'i rjes la snying rje'i rnal 'byor gsal bar byas la dam bca' ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4086: 'byung ba che rnams de dag la //
NK079(dzu)004:4087: lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya zhes pa dang
NK079(dzu)004:4088: yan lag tu bcas pa la lhag pa'i ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:4089: 'dzin bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par dam bca' ba'o
NK079(dzu)004:4091: rags pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4094: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cha bcu la rigs lnga yab yum bskyed par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4095: de rig ye shes lnga nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:4097: de ltar bsgom pa'i don mthong ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4098: de dag nyid rang rig pa'i ye shes lnga'i ngo
NK079(dzu)004:4099: bor gsal bas ther zug par gsal ba med pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:4100: // 'byung ba las gyur pa ra sa ya na sna tshogs kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:4101: lhar bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4102: rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4103: a ho zhes pa 'byung ba lngas rgyur byas pa
NK079(dzu)004:4104: gzugs kyi phung po dang bsdu ba'i sgras rtog pa
NK079(dzu)004:4105: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i smad bkod pa dang
NK079(dzu)004:4106: / snod bcud ril rang rig rig pa de kho
NK079(dzu)004:4107: na nyid du bye brag med par sangs rgyas pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:4108: / phyir / ra sa ya na sna tshogs lha'i
NK079(dzu)004:4109: ngo bo yin pa la the tshom med par de
NK079(dzu)004:4110: ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir bsgom par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4111: ngo bo gzung rka ba'i rig pa nyid bdud rtsi
NK079(dzu)004:4112: chen po'i lhar gsal bas dgyes pa'i phyir yi ge
NK079(dzu)004:4113: gnyis so // tha mar dkyil 'khor bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4114: kye ma lhag pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:4115: bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:4117: rang rig lhar byung ba la dam zhing ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:4118: 'dzin gsal bar ye nas yod pa cir yang snang
NK079(dzu)004:4119: bas rtag chad gsal ba'i phyir bdag la rim pa
NK079(dzu)004:4120: bsdu'o // rnam pa gzhan du thams cad bdag nyid
NK079(dzu)004:4121: du gsal ba lhun grub kyi gsang chen rig gcig
NK079(dzu)004:4122: phyir snyen pa'i don dam bca' ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4123: gsang chen rigs gcig pa'i bsnyen pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4124: de nas lha dang gnyis med nas //
NK079(dzu)004:4125: bdag nyid yi ge dang m+auh zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4126: bar ma la goms te bsdus nas zhes sam /
NK079(dzu)004:4127: bdag nyid chen por gsal ba'i ting 'dzin bstan nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4128: sman bdud rtsi mun pa cig tu dril rgyas btab la sbyang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4129: bdag nyid kyi rig pa nyid yi ge gnyis su
NK079(dzu)004:4130: byung ba de yongs su gyur pas bdag 'dzin med
NK079(dzu)004:4131: pa ni gsung gi cho ga'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4132: gnyis dang bdag dang dbyibs su thim //
NK079(dzu)004:4134: bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:4136: gdan khri ldan zhes pa go sla ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4137: cho ga gsum las bskyed do //
NK079(dzu)004:4138: gom na skad cig mas m+auhls bskyed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4139: pho brang bum pa la bskyed na bdud rtsi 'khyil
NK079(dzu)004:4140: pa'i yum gyi mkha' gsang ba'i bu ga rgya dang
NK079(dzu)004:4142: der yab kyi rdo rje bcug pa nas sgo srungs zhal du babs par bsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4143: 'dzab bshad pa'i bskrad sngags gcig pus bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4144: las kyi dkyil 'khor la'ang bskyed pa mthun /
NK079(dzu)004:4147: lha dang lha mo zhes pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4149: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4150: 'khor lo lnga bcu brgyad kyis gzugs brnyan du brtsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4152: bri bsgom gnyi ga'i dbang du dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4153: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4154: thabs dang shes rab ni yab yum mo //
NK079(dzu)004:4155: phyag rgya ni bzhi ldan par ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4156: snying po 'bri tshig gsal bar bzlas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4157: las kyi dkyil 'khor la so so'i 'dzab bo //
NK079(dzu)004:4158: pho brang la 'chad pa'i dgu ba'am bshad pa nyid yan lag ma nyams par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4159: gtso bo'i phyag mtshan bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4160: de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni //
NK079(dzu)004:4161: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4162: sku mdog gi rjes su phyag mtshan ni g.yas ni yid bzhin nor bu rin po che /
NK079(dzu)004:4163: g.yon pa bdud rtsi bum pa thogs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4164: de'i las ni gdul bya'i re ba skong ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4165: nyon mongs pa'i rgyu 'bras dag par byed pa ni rim bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:4166: 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung bar byed do //
NK079(dzu)004:4167: dngos grub chen po la med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4168: zhes pa gong na med pa'i dngos grub 'thob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4169: bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4170: gdul bya la'ang 'bebs 'phro 'du'i che na'ang phyogs bcu'i bdud rtsi bsdus nas bum par 'beb pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4171: sgo bzhi phyag rgya dag dang ldan zhes pa phyag
NK079(dzu)004:4172: drug tu byed na 'og ma bzhin lcags kyu zhags
NK079(dzu)004:4173: pa dang / lcags sgrog dril bu bsnams pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4174: 'og tu gtso bo rnams smos kyi 'khor gyi lha
NK079(dzu)004:4175: ma smos pas 'di kha skong du 'thad par gsungs
NK079(dzu)004:4176: so // bdud rtsi'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4177: a mri ta'i rgyu nyid ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4178: byang chub sems dang sha chen dang zhes pa la
NK079(dzu)004:4179: sogs pa ban da lngar byang chub sems la sogs
NK079(dzu)004:4180: pa dam rdzas lnga re re'ang rtsa ba brgyad dang
NK079(dzu)004:4181: chas pa bgod / bsdu ba ni ma 'ongs pa bsdu ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4184: rtsa ba de dag gi phrad dang skyobs dang yan lag tu dabye'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4185: ra sa ya na sna tshogs yang dri dang ro dang kha dog gis kyang dabye'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4187: snod gcig tu kun bsdu ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4188: bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis rlabs zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4189: gnyis po gang kyang bsnyen pa gsum gyis sbyang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4191: rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir zhes pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4193: dbyings su yang ni gtim par bya zhes pa mi rtogs pas spyad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4195: zhes pa lha la lha rol par spyad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4196: bsgrub pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4197: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4199: byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4200: bdag nyid yi ge h'u gyur nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4201: zhes pa nas rtse gcig bsgom zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4202: bdag lha gsal ba'i thugs kha nas h'u 'gro ba med par spros pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4203: sman nam bza' btung skabs gang yin pa la phog ste sbyang zer /
NK079(dzu)004:4204: 'dir de nyid rang rig snang ba'i phyir gdan thog
NK079(dzu)004:4205: tu h'u du gsal ba la 'phros 'dus mtha' gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:4206: bral bar sbyang / yang +aa gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtsir bya /
NK079(dzu)004:4207: +amo gsal bas 'phros 'dus ye shes lnga dang ldan
NK079(dzu)004:4208: par gsal ba'ang yul med pas som nyi dang yid
NK079(dzu)004:4210: gzhan yang yi ge 'tshogs pas gdab zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4211: khrol bul rtags phyin nas phye ma kyang rtags phyin te ril lu'am bum par byas pa'i tshe /
NK079(dzu)004:4212: bshad pa dgar zhing mi mthun pa'i 'dzab dgu pa'i sngags so //
NK079(dzu)004:4213: tshogs pa'i sgras khrol bu nyid de lnga tshang ba rigs brgya'i sngags kyis spyad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4214: rtags drug thon nas dngos grub blang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4215: 'thungs na ngan song sgrib pa 'byang zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4216: dang po cha gsum du bgos la cha gcig dus gsum du sangs rgyas la mchod /
NK079(dzu)004:4218: sum cha 'thung na sgrib pa 'dral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4219: rtag tu bsten ces pa de kha zas su bsten na tshe'i rig 'dzin dam pa 'grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4220: lus kyi nang rnams thams cad 'byang //
NK079(dzu)004:4221: zhes pa nas bzhin du 'grub zhes pa bdud rtsir
NK079(dzu)004:4222: gyur pa'i phyir dang rtag tu gnyis med du bsgom
NK079(dzu)004:4224: las su rung zhing sems la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4226: sangs rgyas zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4227: le'u bcu bdun pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////yan lag dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4228: le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4229: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4230: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4231: de nyid dang de nyid du sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:4232: de'ang rgyud ston pa thun mong pa'i gzhi las gsungs
NK079(dzu)004:4233: pa'ang lam pa'i ched du lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:4234: kyi dngos po nye bar bstan pa rang bzhin mngon
NK079(dzu)004:4235: du byed pa'o // des na gsum thun mong du ston te skabs 'gyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4236: nang dang gsang ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4237: e ma ho ye nas rnam par dag pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:4238: zhes pa nas gsungs zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4239: rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ye yin pa la ngam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4240: de ni mtha' las grol ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4241: dkyil 'khor snying po gser sgrom thabs shes rab dbyer med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4242: nyi zla kha sprod du shar ba'i nang bzhi brgya rtsa nyid dkyil 'khor ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4243: cig shos ltar yab yum gyi nyi zla bcu gnyis bcu drug la dus gcig sher ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4244: ye shes drug pa'i bdag nyid pas gnas kyi dam par bka' gsal ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4245: rang bzhin thabs kyi don to //
NK079(dzu)004:4246: gsum thun mong du dbyibs dang don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4247: chos rnams thams cad gnyis min pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:4248: dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:4249: gcig dang zhes pa dag /rtags kyi rtogs par bya ba'ang yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:4250: dngos po gnyis pa ril ngo bos rang rig par bye brag med par rang gsal ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4251: 'dra ba'i gcig pa tsam ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:4253: de'i ngo bo ni sdud pa'i sgras bye brag du mar yang ma 'dres la /
NK079(dzu)004:4254: ngo bo dang mtshan nyid kyi spros pa dang yul shes kyi spros pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4255: rgyu 'bras kyi spros pa bral bas mtha' gnyis gam spangs bral ba ni lte ba'i don to //
NK079(dzu)004:4257: ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //
NK079(dzu)004:4261: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis sangs rgyas pa'i chos
NK079(dzu)004:4262: rang 'byung ba'i ye shes ni rgyu 'bras kyi chos
NK079(dzu)004:4263: kun gyi bdag nyid pa'i phyir bzhir rang snang ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4264: 'og rtsibs chen bzhi'i 'khor lo rang snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4265: thugs rje byin rlabs spros pa yis zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4267: drug pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po'i ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:4268: nyid bzhi dang re re'ang bzhi bzhir gsal bas rgyas
NK079(dzu)004:4269: pa'i dbang rtsibs bzhi pho brang lngar snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4270: 'bring bsdus rtsa ba bzhi'i phyir glo bur du snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4271: 'on kyang snang bas phye'i bden pa res 'jog tu
NK079(dzu)004:4272: thal ba ni med de de nyid de rang snang
NK079(dzu)004:4274: ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs zhes pa nas thabs thabs las byung zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4275: lnga'i phyir pa na tsa rang gi' rtsig par rang snang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4276: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i yon tan rang snang
NK079(dzu)004:4277: ba ni logs la dbyibs dang kha dog mang ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4278: ri mo dang rgyan du byung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4280: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:4281: thugs rje rgyas pa'i zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4282: sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mtha' dbus
NK079(dzu)004:4283: bral bas ma khyab pa med pa'i phyir dbyibs gyur
NK079(dzu)004:4284: pa'i don to // khyod ni tshad dang bral ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4285: mtha' dbus med par khyab par gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:4287: sgo bstan pa'i phyir stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal
NK079(dzu)004:4288: 'jug zhes pa dag /rnal 'byor gsum kar yang sbyar
NK079(dzu)004:4289: te / bshad pa dang dang po yul dus le'u las 'chad par 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4290: gzhan du gsang ba'i dga' ba bzhi'i rim pas ye shes chen po'i gzhal yas su 'jug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4291: der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan /
NK079(dzu)004:4293: sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:4294: theg pa brgyad kyis nges 'byung ba'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:4295: rgyu 'bras cha'i sa phyi nang gi thim skas brgyad du rnam par snang /
NK079(dzu)004:4296: de de grub pa'i mtha' rdzogs pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:4297: yon tan brgyad phyir rta rkang dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4298: chu skyes sgrom dang za ra tshags //
NK079(dzu)004:4300: khyung mgo mdzes pas rim par 'khrigs //
NK079(dzu)004:4302: gdan bstan pa'i phyir rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal zhing /
NK079(dzu)004:4303: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4304: rin po che 'bar ba ni gdung steng na btags pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4305: gdung la mdze dang migs bdun bdun no //
NK079(dzu)004:4306: ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'di'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4307: ta la'i 'jon shing rang bzhin gnas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4308: bden pa gsum pa'i ngang la dus gsum du skye ba med pa'i phyir ta la zung bzhis /
NK079(dzu)004:4312: yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis skor zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:4313: re ba skong phyir rin po che phung po brgyad kyis skor ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4314: logs kyi rgyan yang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:4315: thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir 'jig rten //
NK079(dzu)004:4317: 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyang bdag nyid du rang snang
NK079(dzu)004:4318: ba'i phyir phyi rol du ma h+aa de ba la
NK079(dzu)004:4319: sogs pa'i lha chen po rnams kyis bskor te rang
NK079(dzu)004:4320: rang gi mchod yon dang rgyan dang ldan par 'khod
NK079(dzu)004:4321: pa'o // de bas na rang bzhin kyang 'di ltar bzhugs pa bri ba'ang 'di kho na ltar bri'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4322: sgom pa'ang de bzhin ste lhag pa gnyis thun mong ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4323: gsang ba de nyid nges pa las zhes pa nas mchog ces pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4324: rgyud 'di'i dkyil 'khor lhag pa gnyis byas pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4325: spyod yul yongs su dag pa yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:4326: 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang zhes pa la sogs pa rnam grangs 'chad pa de /
NK079(dzu)004:4327: rang bzhin gnyis kyis bye brag cig shos las phye ba lnga ste lhag pa sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:4328: lhag pa gnyis la lnga lnga ste zhi khro la gsum las la bzhi bzhi /
NK079(dzu)004:4331: tshogs la gnyis las phye ba gsum gsum mo //
NK079(dzu)004:4332: shin tu gang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4333: rgyud 'di la skabs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis su'ang 'chad na cha rkyen nges pa bdun bsdus pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4334: le'u bco brgyad pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////khro
NK079(dzu)004:4335: bo lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:4336: spros bcas rnal 'byor gyi dbang du bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:4337: / le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4338: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin gyis rlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba /
NK079(dzu)004:4341: skabs 'dir bdag po nyid khro bor snang ba'i byin
NK079(dzu)004:4342: rlabs gdul bya la phyag rgya bzhi las kyang bca'
NK079(dzu)004:4343: ba dang 'dzin pa snang bar byed pa'i dgongs pa
NK079(dzu)004:4344: la zhugs pa ltar snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4345: mthong lam pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4346: dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4347: bde ba chen po'i rgya zhes pa dbang po lnga
NK079(dzu)004:4348: dang yul lnga dang dus bzhi dang shes pa brgyad
NK079(dzu)004:4349: kyi ngo bo rig pa gcig dang du ma las
NK079(dzu)004:4350: grol ba'i phyir lha yab yum gnyis su med pa
NK079(dzu)004:4351: ye nas yin pa'i don yod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4352: de nyid bden pa gsum pa'i don spyod yul med par thag chod de gsal na /
NK079(dzu)004:4353: snod bcud gnyis pa'i chos ril thabs dang shes rab
NK079(dzu)004:4354: gnyis su med pa dgyes pa chen po'i phyag rgyar
NK079(dzu)004:4355: gsal ba'o // de dag ngo bo dang spyod yul gyis rang bzhin dang lta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4356: spros bcas thobs pa'i yul ting nge 'dzin gyis tshad bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4357: bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su zhes pa nas de skad gsungs zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4358: 'chad pa ltar yan lag lnga la dkyil 'khor gdan dang ldan par bskyed de /
NK079(dzu)004:4359: rigs lnga yab yum bcu gtso bor bsgyur te yan
NK079(dzu)004:4360: lag lnga la bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal zhing
NK079(dzu)004:4361: 'od zer 'phro 'du bsgom pa rtogs pas brtan pa
NK079(dzu)004:4362: ril lha'i phyag rgyar ma gyur pa med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4363: zhes ston pas bka' gsal to //
NK079(dzu)004:4364: las bzhi'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4365: yan lag snying po rtse gcig dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4366: rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu //
NK079(dzu)004:4367: las rnams so sor zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4368: bsam pa dang bcas pa dam tshig gi ma yin
NK079(dzu)004:4369: te las kyi phyag rgya 'di mgo bo rdo rje
NK079(dzu)004:4370: rtse gcig par bsam pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4372: gzhan sor mo g.yas g.yon dbri snan gyis rtse lnga pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4373: dgu pa dang bcu gcig pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4374: zhi rgyas dbang drag gi rim pa bzhin no //
NK079(dzu)004:4375: spros bcas shin tu'ang brtan pa'i phyag rgyas /
NK079(dzu)004:4376: 'gro don byed pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4377: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs //
NK079(dzu)004:4378: rtag tu rdo rje zhes pa nas //
NK079(dzu)004:4379: byang chub shing drung skye bar 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4380: tshogs la spyod pa'i yab yum gyi zhabs g.yas g.yon nyid kyang thabs shes rab bo //
NK079(dzu)004:4381: de 'gro ba'i tshe na'ang sor mo yis rdo rje rtse lnga ba'i ngo bo nyid 'od 'bar ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4382: de goms thabs re bskyod pa'i tshe bag chags mi sogs pa'i rtags pad+ma'i rjes 'byung ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:4383: rkang pa rdo rje dang sa gzhi pad+ma 'byor ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4384: bar ci song ba'i 'gro ba ril yang bsgral te
NK079(dzu)004:4385: sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i go 'phang 'thob par
NK079(dzu)004:4386: 'gyur ba'o // bshad pa'i phyogs gzhan du /
NK079(dzu)004:4387: thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs sbyor bas gsang ba'i ye shes rdo rje gsal bar 'char ba'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:4388: sbyor ba bskyed pa'i thabs kyis zin na 'dod chags kyis segs pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:4389: ye shes pad+ma lta bu'i thegs byung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4390: thabs dang ldan na bdag gzhan ril grol thar bar byed do //
NK079(dzu)004:4391: spyi'i phyag rgya yan lag lnga la lha bkod pas
NK079(dzu)004:4392: don byed tshul yon tan dang bcas par bstan pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:4393: phyir / rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:4394: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom ste zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4396: bdag nyid la rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub
NK079(dzu)004:4397: pa'i lha rnams ngo bo mtha' las 'das pas gang
NK079(dzu)004:4398: du'ang snang ba de 'dir khro bor bsgom ste 'bras
NK079(dzu)004:4399: bu mthar phyin pa'ang de bzhin bsgyur te drang bstim
NK079(dzu)004:4400: brtan pa bya'o // de la yan lag lnga dbu la rgyal ba rigs /
NK079(dzu)004:4401: lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje rigs //
NK079(dzu)004:4404: g.yon chos kyi dkyil 'khor du bsam pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:4405: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bskul bskyod na //
NK079(dzu)004:4406: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams g.yos te 'gro don mdzad par 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4407: rdo rje dang rin po che dkyil 'khor gar thabs bskyod na /
NK079(dzu)004:4408: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams gzhan don mdzad bdag dus 'phar bar 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4409: las dang pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bro thabs mnan zhing mchongs par byas na /
NK079(dzu)004:4410: drug gi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4411: bdud sde dang mu stegs zil gyis mnan te ldang mi nus pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4412: mthon dman ni gnas kyis phye ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsal che chung du mi sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4413: spyi'i las ni yan lag thams cad sgul bsigs na zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4414: thugs rje 'dul zhing dbyings su gtim zhes pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4415: thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang zhes pa nas 'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4416: ril khro bo khro mor ma gyur pa med pas
NK079(dzu)004:4417: spyod yul dag pa ni de dag rdo rje brag
NK079(dzu)004:4418: steng na me dpung 'bar bar bzhugs par bsam mo
NK079(dzu)004:4419: // lha so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang snyam pa la /
