NK079(dzu)004:4420: steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4421: rdo rje 'khor lo r+n+ri mgo gdengs //
NK079(dzu)004:4423: phyogs skyong bcu 'dul ched du khro bcu'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4425: kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
NK079(dzu)004:4426: kun kyang dang po ban dmar 'khrug /h'u chen g.yas gnyis rdo rje skor //
NK079(dzu)004:4427: g.yon gnyis spu gri thod pa gdengs //
NK079(dzu)004:4428: ka ma ku na g.yas gnyis na /
NK079(dzu)004:4430: g.yon gnyis mthong gshol gtum chen 'gril //
NK079(dzu)004:4431: rnam rgyal dkar po g.yas gnyis na //
NK079(dzu)004:4433: g.yon gnyis stir dbyug rgya byin bsnams //
NK079(dzu)004:4434: gshed po mthing nag g.yas gnyis na //rin chen n+ri mgo'i dbyug pa thogs //
NK079(dzu)004:4435: ba tshon gshin rje'i da rkang gzung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4436: rta mgrin dmar po g.yas gnyis na //
NK079(dzu)004:4437: sbrul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa thog /de bzhin nya dbyug khyung gshog gdeng //
NK079(dzu)004:4438: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag zhal //
NK079(dzu)004:4439: g.yas gnyis rin chen dbyug to dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4440: n+ri mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to 'dzin //
NK079(dzu)004:4441: g.yon pa gnod sbyin dbyug to dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4442: de nyid phyag na thogs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4443: khams gsum rnam rgyal dkar ljang zhal //
NK079(dzu)004:4444: g.yas gnyis rdo rje dri shul dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4445: g.yon gnyis ni mgo kha gdengs dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4446: dbang ldan nyid kyi rkang bzung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4447: dbyug pa sngon po g.yas gnyis na //
NK079(dzu)004:4448: rdo rje dang ni me dpung 'bar //
NK079(dzu)004:4449: g.yon gnyis zhugs gling me lha thogs //
NK079(dzu)004:4450: mi g.yo ljang sngon g.yas gnyis na //
NK079(dzu)004:4451: rdo rje srin po'i mgo ldan dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4453: g.yon gnyis ban dmar srin po thogs //
NK079(dzu)004:4454: dpal ldan dmar skya g.yas pa na //
NK079(dzu)004:4455: rlung lha'i ba dan n+ri mgo gdengs //
NK079(dzu)004:4456: g.yon pa rag ta rlung lha bsnams //
NK079(dzu)004:4457: yang na 'og gi khro bo ni //
NK079(dzu)004:4458: du daka'o g.yas na ri rab dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4459: tho ba'i g.yon na rak+ta dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4460: phag chen sa bdag bsnabs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4462: 'di dag rgyas pa dang 'tshams kyi dus su gces par bstan to //
NK079(dzu)004:4463: gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4464: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya dbu la nyi zla dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4465: khro bo gur gyi phyi rol tu /
NK079(dzu)004:4466: me chu rlung gis bskor ba'i don mdzad tshul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:4467: rdo rje 'khor lo gri dbyug to bcas zhes pa na /
NK079(dzu)004:4468: gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4469: 'di dag phyag mtshan ma nges par 'dul ba'i dbang gis thogs te tha ma'i sa gsal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:4470: gzhan dag so sor ngo sprad pa ni nges par rigs pa yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4471: rigs lnga khro bo'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4472: dbus kyi he ru ka'i phyag rgya ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4474: khro mo rnams kyang khro dang 'thun zhes pa de yang sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las /
NK079(dzu)004:4475: khro mchog 'bu ta he ru ka /smug nag gzhal gsum phyag drug ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4476: 'khor lo rdo rje sti ra dbyug g.yas dril bu ban dmar 'khor g.yug g.yon /
NK079(dzu)004:4478: sngon nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
NK079(dzu)004:4479: g.yas pa rdo rje rdo rje dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4480: stir dbyug rab tu bsnabs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4481: g.yon pa dril bu ban dmar dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4482: gshol chen po nyid thogs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4483: rata na ser nag zhal gsum drug /g.yas pa rin chen rdo rje stir dbyug nang //
NK079(dzu)004:4484: g.yon pa rgyu zhags dung dmar dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4485: dgra sta rab tu rdebs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4486: pad+ma dmar nag zhal phyag ni //
NK079(dzu)004:4488: rdo rje sti ra rdebs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4489: g.yon pa dril bu rag ta dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4491: dpal chen karma he ru ka /dbu gsum phyag drug ljang nag che //
NK079(dzu)004:4492: g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4493: stir dbyug rab tu rdebs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4494: gshol chen ban dmar ral gri g.yon //
NK079(dzu)004:4495: kun kyang ban dmar 'khrug cing gsol //
NK079(dzu)004:4496: yum rnams sku mdog gtso bo bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:4499: 'khor kyi khro mo phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4500: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni //
NK079(dzu)004:4501: rgyud dag zhan dag dang mthun par bshad /
NK079(dzu)004:4502: zhes pa sgyu 'phrul ma'i rgyud de phyi ma ya dz+ra la dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4503: sgyu 'phrul dbang gi rgyud nas gsal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:4504: tshigs thams 'di ni ston pa'i bka' ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:4505: na pe ka'o snyam pas rgyud la the tshom za
NK079(dzu)004:4506: ba dga' byung srid na sgyu 'phrul nyid las lung
NK079(dzu)004:4507: bstan pa'i tshig tu 'gal ba med pas bsal to
NK079(dzu)004:4508: // ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni //
NK079(dzu)004:4510: zhes pa the tshom za ba ni snga ma'i tshig gis bsal to /
NK079(dzu)004:4512: srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang //
NK079(dzu)004:4513: tshangs ma dmar ser pad+ma bsnabs //
NK079(dzu)004:4514: lha chen dkar ljang dri shul la //
NK079(dzu)004:4516: gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phen //
NK079(dzu)004:4517: brgya byin dkar a n+ri tra gdengs zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:4518: le'u bcu dgu pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////thun mong sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4519: le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par bshad pa rtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4520: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po dpal sh+ri he ru kas /
NK079(dzu)004:4521: yum kro ti shwa ri dang gnyis su med pa'i 'du ba mdzad nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4522: zhes pa nas spros nas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4523: las kyi khro bo thar pa nag po gol ba de gdul ba'i ched du /
NK079(dzu)004:4524: dpal he ru kas yum dang thabs shes rab kyi rol ba mdzad pa'i byang chub sems las /
NK079(dzu)004:4525: ru tra'i snang ba la khro bo sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor sngas su byung bas /
NK079(dzu)004:4526: 'jig rten khams shig shig tor tor la sogs par
NK079(dzu)004:4527: gyur pa ni brnyen po ste rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u
NK079(dzu)004:4529: de'ang sprul pa 'byung ba'i gzhi dang rgyu dang ngo bo dang mdzad par 'grel te /
NK079(dzu)004:4530: mdzad pa ni bsgral ba dang dbang du byed pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:4531: dbang du bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4532: 'jig dbang med dang bdag po dang zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4533: dbang du bsdu bya ste go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4534: las la btsud pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4535: da ltar dang phyi ma'i dus su //
NK079(dzu)004:4536: la la ni tshe 'phel ba'i las su bskos zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4537: 'di dang phyi ma dag tu bsgrub pa po rnams
NK079(dzu)004:4538: la phan bdag shing bka' srung ba'i ched du sgo
NK079(dzu)004:4539: sgo'i las mi mthun pas bkar te rgyas pa'i las
NK079(dzu)004:4540: gnyis dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi las gsum byed pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4541: dbang gi las dang mngon spyod gnyis dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4542: spyir ci bsam pa 'grub par byed pa'i las su
NK079(dzu)004:4543: so sor las kyi dbang phyin dam tshig phog ma
NK079(dzu)004:4544: nas bsgrags pas / da ltar bsgrub pa pos gnad
NK079(dzu)004:4545: thob cing dam la gnas na ci bsam pa 'grub
NK079(dzu)004:4546: pa'i phyir ser sna spangs te brtson par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4547: byed pa'i sgra ni de ltar dam la thogs pas
NK079(dzu)004:4548: mi 'da' mi bslu ba'i phyir bsgrub thabs 'di gsungs
NK079(dzu)004:4549: pa'o // de nas lha chen po ma ha de ba bsgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4550: mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis //
NK079(dzu)004:4551: 'jig rten gtso mchog dbang bsdus nas zhes pa dag
NK079(dzu)004:4552: /sngon 'byung gi las 'chad de ston pas las kyi
NK079(dzu)004:4553: khro bo khyu shug rnams btul nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4554: sras su mdzad de thugs rje chen po'i sprul pas
NK079(dzu)004:4555: 'gro ba'i don bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan cing
NK079(dzu)004:4556: mdzad do // de'i rjes su rnal 'byor pas la blas bu yis blangs te /
NK079(dzu)004:4558: thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur bas //
NK079(dzu)004:4559: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4560: skabs gnyis su ting nge 'dzin dang po gnyis dang phyag rgya gcig pa thob bstan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4561: sgom las tha ma thob pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4562: yo byad mchog dang ldan pa des bsgrubs na gang
NK079(dzu)004:4563: bsam pa 'grub ste sems las su rung ba'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:4564: ro // 'dir ni rang 'byung lha yi lha //
NK079(dzu)004:4565: byams dang snying rje ldan par rol zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4566: lha chen dang bzhi po bsgrub pa'i tshe na he
NK079(dzu)004:4567: ru ka bsgom pa'ang rang rig lhar rang shar ba
NK079(dzu)004:4568: ni drug pa'i rgyal ba dngos ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4569: gsum las spags pa'i ye shes chen por ril 'phel cing bskyabs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4570: sdong len rim bral bar rtogs pas bdag gzhan gyi don gyis shig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4571: bsam pa des ci spyad pa rnam smin mi sogs pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4574: de'i phyir 'jig rten pa bsgrub pa'ang mi 'gal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:4575: thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs pa zhes pa dag
NK079(dzu)004:4576: /gsang sngags kyi yab brtsis zin la log spyod ming
NK079(dzu)004:4578: mos slob dang mngon gsum pa'i dbang gis lam dang po gnyis dang bar ma'i spyod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4579: cig char ba'i yod pa thun mong du bstan to //
NK079(dzu)004:4580: de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4581: zhes pa dag /blos de kho na nyid mngon du bya ba'i ched du //
NK079(dzu)004:4582: dus phyad de bzhin nyid rig pa rang gsal du bsgom pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4583: sngon du bya ba'i bsnyen pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4584: de nas bdag nyid rgyud don gong nas 'byung ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4585: lha khro bo dang zhi ba gang la goms de
NK079(dzu)004:4588: lam gnyis gang yang rung ba de kho na nyid brtan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4589: bskyed pa'i lha lam gang la bslabs pa las su rung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4590: yul gyis mi 'phrogs par 'du shes klungs su zhugs dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4592: snang mdzad dam 'bu ta he ru kar bskyed de
NK079(dzu)004:4593: bzlas pa 'bum bya ba ni byin bskyed pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:4594: sngon du bya'o // de nas man ngag gi rim par 'jug ste //
NK079(dzu)004:4595: gnas dben par yo byad dang lha chen po'i mthun
NK079(dzu)004:4596: pa'i yo byad bshams stegs bu brtsig /lha chen po'i
NK079(dzu)004:4597: gzugs bcas te bzhag /de nas mtshams bcas nas bdag
NK079(dzu)004:4598: lhar bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4599: bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4601: zhi bas bsgrub na rnam par snang mdzad sa bon las bskyed de /
NK079(dzu)004:4602: gzhal yas khang dang sku mdog phyag mtshan sngon du bsgom pa ltar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4603: de nas +amo 'dzi na 'dzig lam te sha ra ti zhes pa'am /
NK079(dzu)004:4604: bzlas sngags gsal ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par bsgrub pa'i sngon nam dus su gdon /
NK079(dzu)004:4605: zhes zer 'dir snang mdzad du gsal bas bsnyen pa sngon du thongs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4606: ma h+aa de ba'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4607: lha gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4608: rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:4609: zhes pa'i tshig snga ma ltar byas te srog shing 'bum bsgrub pa'i tshe gdon no //
NK079(dzu)004:4610: de yang lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4614: de bsam pas rang dbang med par 'ong bar bsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:4615: sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4616: mdun nas dza h'u bam hos grangs //
NK079(dzu)004:4617: zhes pa dag /phyag rgya bzhi bcas la /
NK079(dzu)004:4618: drang ba'am bsam pa 'ba' zhig ste 'od zer 'phros pa bzhis bzung nas grang /
NK079(dzu)004:4619: ting nge 'dzin gyis lha chen rgyab nas phyag na
NK079(dzu)004:4620: rdo rjes phul te gam je nye 'ongs pa gzugs
NK079(dzu)004:4623: mchod dam chu blud bsdams te las la gzhugs pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4624: lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:4626: yon tan ni lha chen 'khor bcas thams cad kyang zhes pa dag go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4627: khro bos bsgrub na 'bu ta he ru ka bsgoms pa tshad du phyin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4628: lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4629: lcags kyu zhags pa spod pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4631: dgos ched dang dgug pa'i thabs dang ting nge 'dzin dang srog snying rngos so //
NK079(dzu)004:4632: ma h+aa de'i sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4633: lha chen gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4634: rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:4635: zhes pa go sla ste de 'dra ba cig gsal bar byas la dgug pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4636: las gzhan dag rjes su mthun par sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:4637: rgyal po bzhi bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4638: de nas rgyal po bde bzhi bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:4639: zhes pa sdud po'i tshig ste lha chen po'i de ma thag par ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4640: rgyal por sgrub par spyi'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems mchog ting 'dzin gyis /
NK079(dzu)004:4641: phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:4643: yang dag don du ldan par bsgom zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4644: sgrub pa po ni bden pa rnam gnyis dbyer med pa'i ting nge 'dzin brtan pas bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4645: rgyal po bzhi phyogs bzhin gnas pa de /
NK079(dzu)004:4646: rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams don gnyis grub par bya ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4648: de sngon du bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4652: karma he ru ka phyogs bzhi dang mthun par bsgoms /
NK079(dzu)004:4653: lha chen po'i skabs dang mthun par lha'i bzlas pa 'bum gdon /
NK079(dzu)004:4654: mdor lha dang rang rig rang gsal du goms par
NK079(dzu)004:4655: byas pas byin rnyed pa dang gzod gang rung sgrub
NK079(dzu)004:4656: pa'o // rgyas par so so nas bsnyen pa'i rjes su bsgrub thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4657: de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung //
NK079(dzu)004:4659: snying rje las mtshan btags pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4660: sku mdog dang longs spyod na ma re la mi mthun pa brgya brgya ster ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4661: phyag mtshan srog gi snying po ngo bo dang grangs tshad dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4662: de'i tshe lha bsgom pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4663: dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang dbang du byas te
NK079(dzu)004:4664: las bcol ba dang bsgrub pa'i phan yon du 'grel
NK079(dzu)004:4665: te go rims bshad pa'i rjes su kun sbyar to
NK079(dzu)004:4666: // lho'i 'phags skyes po bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4667: rgyal po 'phags skyes sgrub pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4668: bdag nyid zhes pa lha gang sgom pa ste rad
NK079(dzu)004:4669: na he ru ka rtsa ba'i rgyud lhar ser nag
NK079(dzu)004:4670: tu bsgom pa'o // phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4671: phyag rgya bzhis dgug thabs snga ma ltar 'od zer gyis bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4672: srog snying bzlas pa'i tshad dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4673: lha gsal bas dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4674: 'ongs nas bsdams mchod phog ste las bcol ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4677: nub kyi rgyal po sgrubs thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4678: rgyal po mig ngan bsgrub pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:4681: pad+ma he ru ka rtsa ba'i rgyud ltar dmar nag
NK079(dzu)004:4682: tu bsgoms te bsnyen pa tshad du byas ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:4683: 'dzin la dbang thob pa dang bsgrub pa brtsams te
NK079(dzu)004:4684: sngon du bya ba'i las bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4685: rgyal po de'i gzugs mdog ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4687: rgyal po'i cha lugs dang dgos ched dang chas pas bzlas pa'i srog snying gi grangs dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4689: grub nas snga ma ltar brtsam pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4691: byang gi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4692: rgyal po rnam thos sgrub pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4693: bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4694: 'dir karma he ru ka'am bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsgom
NK079(dzu)004:4695: ste sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa la sogs pa
NK079(dzu)004:4697: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bkod cing bsgrub pa zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4698: spyi sdom dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan dbus su lha chen po dgod /
NK079(dzu)004:4699: phyogs bzhir rgyal po 'khor bcas dgod /
NK079(dzu)004:4700: lha dus gcig tu gsal bas bsnyen pa dril tshad du bya /
NK079(dzu)004:4701: srog snying sbrel lo zhes zer /
NK079(dzu)004:4702: dgos pa gcig gis rdzogs pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4703: rang gi gtso bo la 'khor gyis ming thob par 'gyur bar 'dod do //
NK079(dzu)004:4704: le'u nyi shu pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel ba'o ////lhag
NK079(dzu)004:4705: pa gzugs brnyan bsod nams rten gyi dkyil 'khor bstan
NK079(dzu)004:4706: pa'i phyir / le'u nyer gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4707: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
NK079(dzu)004:4708: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:4710: gang zhe na lhag pa gzugs brnyan bsod nams rten
NK079(dzu)004:4711: gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub rnam gsum blang ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4713: de la mchod rten gdab pa'i las kyi man ngag las lta ba dang ni rgyu dag dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4714: bya ba'i thabs dang las rim dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4715: rab gnas dgos ched yon tan no //
NK079(dzu)004:4717: don bdun te de dag las rnam par phye ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4718: lta ba gcig rgyu lnga dang rin po che ste drug bya thabs la gsum /
NK079(dzu)004:4719: las rim la byin gyis brlab pa gsum /
NK079(dzu)004:4722: yon tan gcig ste de dag gi yan lag dang
NK079(dzu)004:4723: nying lag tu bcas pa man ngag gis shes par
NK079(dzu)004:4724: bya'o // de la rnal 'byor pa gang gis bya ba'i lta ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4725: ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la //
NK079(dzu)004:4726: thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4727: chos sku'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:4728: zhes pa rang bzhin chos gcig lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:4729: ngang shes bya de rtogs pa tshad du phyin par
NK079(dzu)004:4730: byas la / byang chub sems rnam gnyis kyi ting
NK079(dzu)004:4731: nge 'dzin las rung ba'i rig pa rang 'byung ye
NK079(dzu)004:4732: byas la / shes des / bzhi spyod yul ril
NK079(dzu)004:4733: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis
NK079(dzu)004:4734: grub pa de bzhin nyid rgyal ba bzhugs gnas kyi
NK079(dzu)004:4735: ngo bo ye yin pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:4736: de nyid mngon du byas pa'i rig pas ngo bos
NK079(dzu)004:4737: mnyam pa la de nyid tsam yang yul du mi
NK079(dzu)004:4738: byed pa'i phyir mchod rten gdab par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4739: mchod rten gdab pa'i spyi'i dgos pa gang snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:4740: 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:4742: rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4743: yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don //
NK079(dzu)004:4745: rtog pa bzhi dang mi rtog pa bzhi las 'das pa'i rang rig pa mngon du bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4747: 'bras bu'i chos mchod rten la rdzogs pa mngon du
NK079(dzu)004:4748: byas pa'i phyir te dgos ched dang che ba thun
NK079(dzu)004:4749: mong pa'o // de nas rgyu 'byung ba byin gyis rlab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4753: rin po che du ma dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4754: bsdu ba ni ma 'ongs pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4755: 'byung ba lnga dang bzhi las skyes pa'i rwa dang
NK079(dzu)004:4756: ba so dang ras dang shing la sogs ril rang
NK079(dzu)004:4757: rig pa'i phyir de dag ril mchod rten rdzogs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:4758: rgyu yin pas / h'u gi 'phro 'dus gang la
NK079(dzu)004:4759: bya de rang rig cir yang snang zhing bsgyur du
NK079(dzu)004:4760: rung bar bsams te so so'i sngags kyis brlab pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:4761: rgyu yin pas / // 'o na de la dgos pa ci zhig snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:4762: gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4764: 'jim pa las dngos su byas pa dang bsdu ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4765: sgras ro dang ba so shel rdo dung la sogs
NK079(dzu)004:4766: pa la 'bur du bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4767: ri mo gsum po dag tu bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4768: kun tu bzang po nyid kyis don du 'gyur ba bzhi dang ldan par gsungs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4769: brtsam dgos pa'i phyir bru gi 'du 'phros skor phor gzhal yas khang du rlab pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4770: de'ang thog mar de bzhin nyid bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4771: de bzhin nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4772: thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya zhes pa gzhi ji
NK079(dzu)004:4773: lta ba ltar rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rig pa
NK079(dzu)004:4774: ye shes lnga'i ma 'dal du shar ba des /
NK079(dzu)004:4775: dngos po gnyis pa ril rang rig tu bye brag
NK079(dzu)004:4776: med par rtogs pas tha dad med par sems nyid
NK079(dzu)004:4777: du gcig pa ni chos kyi sku chen pos rgyas
NK079(dzu)004:4778: btab pa ste / ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK079(dzu)004:4779: nam mkha' la gdab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4780: dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4781: mkha' la 'phyo ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhes pa rang
NK079(dzu)004:4782: bzhin dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs brnyan rnams rang
NK079(dzu)004:4783: rig pa mtha' gsum dang bral bar rtogs pa'i don
NK079(dzu)004:4784: bsgom / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum du bskyed /
NK079(dzu)004:4785: nus pa dang ldan par byas /
NK079(dzu)004:4786: ye shes sku dang tha mi dad par des /
NK079(dzu)004:4787: byin gyis rlab pa gnyis byas pa'i gcig shos la gdab pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4788: gang gis gang ltar zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:4790: thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4791: rang rig bas nam mkha' rig pa'i ngo bo nyid
NK079(dzu)004:4792: sku gzugs su lbol lbal gsal ba'i nang na gtso
NK079(dzu)004:4793: bo yab yum bzhugs par bsgyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4794: de nyid rgyu 'bras ril rdzogs pa spyir dam bye brag brlabs /
NK079(dzu)004:4795: ye shes kyi sku bcug bde la mchod bstod brtan par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4796: chu la gdab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4797: yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis //
NK079(dzu)004:4799: yang dag chos sku'i phyag rgya che //
NK079(dzu)004:4802: ting nge 'dzin lnga'i rim pa gsal bar byas te /
NK079(dzu)004:4803: gdab gzhi chu ma ma ki ngo bo nyid rig pa'i skur gyur par bya ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4804: rlung la gdab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4805: de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal sgoms nas zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4806: dri med chos sku'i phyag rgya gsal zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4807: lta ba ting nge 'dzin snga ma ltar bsgoms pa
NK079(dzu)004:4808: des bdag gzhan don ril mthar phyin par bya ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:4809: ched du / rlung nyid rang rig cir yang snang
NK079(dzu)004:4810: bas mchod rten du byung gi rten rten can bral
NK079(dzu)004:4811: ched du / ba'o // me la gdab pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4812: rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis //
NK079(dzu)004:4813: ting nge 'dzin rim par gsal bsgoms ste /
NK079(dzu)004:4814: gos dkar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK079(dzu)004:4815: yang dag chos sku'i phyag rgya gsal zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4816: rim pa de nyid kyis men mtha' dkar mo'i ngo bo nyid phyag rgyar gyur par bsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4817: sa la gdab pa bstan par phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4818: de nyid mthong bas gsal bsgoms te //
NK079(dzu)004:4819: bsgrub bya ma lus lhun rdzogs phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4820: sra brtan spyan gyi rang bzhin la //
NK079(dzu)004:4821: chos sku phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsgyur zhes pa ting nge 'dzin rjes su mthun te /
NK079(dzu)004:4822: sa yum sangs rgyas spyan gyi ngo bo nyid sems nyid kyi phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4823: lugs chu lugs sku'i tshul du rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten du bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4824: spyir bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4825: dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par /
NK079(dzu)004:4826: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4827: dbyings dang ye shes bya ba'i yul dang yul can med par gnad chud nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4828: rig pa nyid thams cad du ma 'gres par ye shes sgyu ma'i ngo bor snang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4829: 'byung ba lnga po rin po che sna tshogs las
NK079(dzu)004:4830: grub pa'i mchod rten du rig pa nyid kyi phyir
NK079(dzu)004:4831: snang ba ni byas par thal ba med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4832: mchod rten gyi tshe ba'i yon tan bstod /
NK079(dzu)004:4833: tshig dang thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4834: sna tshogs 'phrin las rnam par rol zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4836: mchod rten gyis don mang po mdzad pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4837: 'khor ba ma stong bar du mdzad du gsol lo bar yang bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4838: sku gdung la 'bras bu'i chos rnams dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4839: rgyu'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4840: de ltar byin gyis rlabs dgos pa yang yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:4841: de bas na dngos po gnyis kyi 'ang bdag nyid
NK079(dzu)004:4842: pa'i phyir lha chen po rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o
NK079(dzu)004:4843: // ngo bo rig pa'i rgyu rkyen dang bral ba
NK079(dzu)004:4844: nyid yon tan de snyed dang bcas par shar bas
NK079(dzu)004:4845: // dgyes pa'i sgra'o // de dag ni lam gyi sngon dang skabs gnyis dgos ched kyis sbyang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4846: mchod rten gyi sgo nas gnyis ga'i don du 'phrin las byas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4847: chos sku'i phyag rgya de dag las //
NK079(dzu)004:4850: bshad pa ltar mchod rten gdab pa'i thabs de las
NK079(dzu)004:4851: zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun gyis grub pa'i las byar
NK079(dzu)004:4853: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:4854: zhes pa dag /bsgrub tu btub par the tshom gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4855: drag po'i las bya bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4856: drag po btum po gdul ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4858: shin tu stobs drag che dang ldan 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4859: dgos ched dang ldan pas bdag mi rtog pa las
NK079(dzu)004:4860: badz+ra he ru kar bskyed de bshad pa bzhin ting
NK079(dzu)004:4861: nge 'dzin gyi rim pa tshang bar sbyar nas mchod
NK079(dzu)004:4862: rten 'byung ba la 'debs kyang nag po gru gsum
NK079(dzu)004:4863: la khro bo sku dang chas par bsam pa'i 'od
NK079(dzu)004:4864: kyis bgegs sogs bkug la gnan par bsam /
NK079(dzu)004:4865: 'jim pa la rngos su'ang mi 'dod pa ma yin pa te phan yon go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4866: dbang gis las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4867: thams cad ma lus gnyis med dbyings bsdu phyir zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4868: ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4869: bsdu ba che chung gnyis kyi ched du dbang gi
NK079(dzu)004:4870: las rtsom pas rta mgrin du gsal bar byas te
NK079(dzu)004:4871: / mchod rten dmar po zla gam lha dang chas
NK079(dzu)004:4872: par btab pa'i 'od kyis dbang gi gzas pa bkug
NK079(dzu)004:4873: ste mnan pa gsal bas sems ma skyes bar du
NK079(dzu)004:4875: phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'du na gzhan ci smos pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4877: thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4878: bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4879: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub //
NK079(dzu)004:4881: rgyal ba la bdag yon tan gyis mngon par thob
NK079(dzu)004:4882: pa'i rat+na he ru kar bskyed de mchod rten ser
NK079(dzu)004:4884: zhi ba'i las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4885: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:4886: gtum 'khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4888: zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:4889: bdag 'bu ta he ru kar bskyed de mchod rten
NK079(dzu)004:4890: btab pa'i byin brlabs kyis gdug pa kun zhi bar
NK079(dzu)004:4891: bya'i ched du mchod rten dkar por btab ste las
NK079(dzu)004:4893: gal te mchod rten las zhi ltar rngos su bzhengs
NK079(dzu)004:4894: la sbyin sreg bzhi byas pas las 'grub par gsungs
NK079(dzu)004:4895: te / rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma /
NK079(dzu)004:4896: zhi ba'i mchod rten zlum po dkar //
NK079(dzu)004:4897: rgyas pa'i mchod rten gru bzhi ser //
NK079(dzu)004:4898: dbang gi dmar po zla gam brtsegs //
NK079(dzu)004:4899: drag po gru gsum nag po'i mdog /thab spyi bas mchod rten nyid 'drar bya //
NK079(dzu)004:4900: yam shing bud shing las bzhin te //
NK079(dzu)004:4901: rdzas kyi kha dog las dang sbyar //
NK079(dzu)004:4902: las bzhi gzas pa'i ming rung dag /grog shog dug gi lo ma sogs //
NK079(dzu)004:4903: bris te las bzhi sngags kyis bsregs //
NK079(dzu)004:4904: yang na bkug ste bab bcings la //
NK079(dzu)004:4905: so so'i mchod rten 'og tu gzhug /sbyin sreg re la'ang de bzhin bsreg /
NK079(dzu)004:4908: lhun gyis 'grub pa'i 'phrin las bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:4909: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:4911: lhun grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs /
NK079(dzu)004:4914: spyir las lnga rnal 'byor gsum char du 'gyur na'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:4916: rang rig pa nyid ye shes sgyu mar rang gsal bar rtogs pa'i rig pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4917: rig pa mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid las /
NK079(dzu)004:4918: gzhi'i dngos gzhi yin par rtogs bas ma 'dres pa la yongs su rdzogs par rig nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4919: las gang byed kyang rtsol bar thar pa med de
NK079(dzu)004:4920: byas la mi 'dzin pas don mdzad pas bzhi ka'i
NK079(dzu)004:4921: 'bras bu 'grub pa'ang byas nas byung ba min te
NK079(dzu)004:4922: / lhun grub rang la shar ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4923: de bas na las cig byas pas 'bras bu bzhi 'grub pa'ang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:4924: yi ge gnyis lhun grub kyi dgyes pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4925: mchod rten gyi sgo nas ci bsams pa thams cad 'grub pas /
NK079(dzu)004:4927: chos sku'i phyag rgya chen pos ni //
NK079(dzu)004:4928: dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges //
NK079(dzu)004:4930: the tshom dgag pa dang bshad pa'i yon tan du'ang ma 'gag go //
NK079(dzu)004:4931: mchod rten gyi sgo nas bdag don du yi dam lha bsgrub pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4932: nye ba'i lha ni gang sgrub pa zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4934: 'jim pa la brtsams te yi dam lha'i grog shog
NK079(dzu)004:4935: la bris te nang du'ang bcu ga bshad pa ltar
NK079(dzu)004:4937: lha gang yin pa nges par 'grub ste yon tan
NK079(dzu)004:4938: ni rgyal ba rnams cha gnyis las grol bas kun
NK079(dzu)004:4939: 'grub pa'ang don du gnyer ba'i sgo nas so //
NK079(dzu)004:4942: lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:4943: bshad pa'i ma h+aa de ba la sogs pa'i srog
NK079(dzu)004:4944: gi snying po bris te nang du bcug cing btab
NK079(dzu)004:4945: nas bsgoms mchod myur du 'grub ste thun mong gi
NK079(dzu)004:4947: bdag don du brgyud nas chos nyid rtogs par bya ba'i thabs bstan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4948: chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4949: skye rga na 'chi med par rtogs zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4950: shu nya ta'i sngags sam rten 'brel gyi snying po
NK079(dzu)004:4951: bris te nang du bcug nas btab na tha mal
NK079(dzu)004:4952: pa'i nang du bcug nas btab na tha mal pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:4953: rgyud thag nye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste ngo bos
NK079(dzu)004:4954: 'brel ba dang ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang ldan
NK079(dzu)004:4955: pa'i phyir ro // tshe 'das pa'i sgrib pa sbyang ba gzhan don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4956: phyag rgya chen po de dag la zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:4957: ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4958: ting nge 'dzin rim par brtsams te /
NK079(dzu)004:4959: ngan song rnam gsum sbyor sngags gsum bris te mchod rten nang du bcug te btab cing /
NK079(dzu)004:4960: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas drug nas bdag dang sku'i
NK079(dzu)004:4961: 'od kyis cha lugs snga mar bkug 'od kyi sa
NK079(dzu)004:4962: bon drug sbyangs na ngan 'gro las thar bar 'gyur
NK079(dzu)004:4963: te / bdag gi 'ang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:4964: las kyis rim pa kun yang sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:4965: de yang yi dam nar ma rtsom pa dang skabs
NK079(dzu)004:4966: su dpung bskyed pa ni 'byor pas rgyas bsdus su
NK079(dzu)004:4967: sbyar te / rgyas par man dal no bo ka'i mnga' dbul ba'ang btsom mo //
NK079(dzu)004:4968: las mang po'ang 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:4969: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang //
NK079(dzu)004:4970: tshad dpag med pa'i phyag rgya che zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:4971: mi mthun par na lha'i dkyil 'khor mang po bsgrub pa 'dis bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4972: chos kyi sku chen po nyid kyang 'dis 'grub pa'i yon tan dang /
NK079(dzu)004:4973: sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi 'chad /
NK079(dzu)004:4974: zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:4975: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub byung 'jug
NK079(dzu)004:4976: bral ba'i yon tan gyi tshad ni sangs rgyas bya
NK079(dzu)004:4977: ba zhing khams bye ba'i rdul gyi grangs dang mnyam
NK079(dzu)004:4980: thob par bya ba med pa'i ngang las cir yang thob pa ltar snang ba'i dgyes pa chen po'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4981: dngos grub len pa zhes le'u'i mtshan te /
NK079(dzu)004:4982: ngo bo bzhin du dngos grub kyi grangs thob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4983: le'u nyer gcig pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////thabs
NK079(dzu)004:4984: kyi lam dang dkyil 'khor drug pa bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:4985: / le'u nyer gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsams par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4986: de nas de bzhin gshegs brgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
NK079(dzu)004:4989: gsang sngags phyi pa gsum dang bstan chos kyis gtsug
NK079(dzu)004:4990: lag las yul dbang po shes pa drug gsum bco
NK079(dzu)004:4992: tshe ba 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:4993: nyi shu rtsa gcig du bstan pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:4994: gsang ba'i khams gsum bsnan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:4995: 'o na 'dir rtsa ba'i khams gsum po kho na gtso bstan pa ci dgos che na /
NK079(dzu)004:4996: bco brgyad 'byung ba dang bstan pa 'byung ba chos
NK079(dzu)004:4997: mthun bskad zer ba ni thabs kyi lam 'dir gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:4998: ngo bo gcig pa dang las kyis bstan pas rigs
NK079(dzu)004:4999: kyi cig shos 'thad pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:5000: de bas na byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i dgos ched gnyis yod pas gsungs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5001: de bas na gsum gyi nges tshig kyang las dang ngo bos rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:5002: dbang gi don du na gsang dbang gi nges tshig dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5003: thabs kyi che ba thun mong du bstan pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:5004: kye ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos //
NK079(dzu)004:5005: thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:5007: 'di ni byang chub snying po'i mchog /zhes pa khams
NK079(dzu)004:5008: gsum 'dod chags kyi spyod pa nyid thabs kyi dam
NK079(dzu)004:5009: pa rang chas su yod pa ma mthong ba la
NK079(dzu)004:5011: dper sgram po spyod log byed pa la ya mtshan skyes pa lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5012: 'dod chags kyi khu ba brgyud pas bde ba myong
NK079(dzu)004:5013: ba gdod nas rang chas su yod kyang thabs med
NK079(dzu)004:5014: pas mig gis mig ma mthong ba dang 'dra'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5016: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis gsum bzhi dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5017: bzhi lnga'i don ma rtogs pas rang gsang thabs kyis bcad de /
NK079(dzu)004:5018: bdag nyid kyi phyir shin tu'ang mthong bar rka ba'i nges tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5019: spyod yul du med pa'i don dang ngo bo gzung
NK079(dzu)004:5020: rka ba'i don gyis gsang ba'i gzhir gyur par ston
NK079(dzu)004:5022: de bas na khams gsum nye bar bstan pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:5023: thabs dang 'bras bu'i gzhi rtsar gyur pas che ba
NK079(dzu)004:5024: ste / khams gsum zung du 'brel bas dgyes pa
NK079(dzu)004:5025: chen po skye ba ni ngo bo dang sdud pa
NK079(dzu)004:5027: gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5028: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5029: dbang po yul dus gsang ba'i rnams /
NK079(dzu)004:5030: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5031: bco brgyad kyi rtsa ba phyag rgya'i yon tan ril
NK079(dzu)004:5032: dang bar byed pa'i rten gyis las can rdo rje
NK079(dzu)004:5033: dang / yon tan gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i pad+mo dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5034: rlung gi thabs mnyam du gyur pa las skyes pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:5035: ye shes ni rten dang rten can gyi sgo nas
NK079(dzu)004:5036: nang dang gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:5037: te / las kyi dpa' bar brjod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5038: de las thabs kyis ma zin pa la snang ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:5039: rtog tshogs ril lha'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:5040: / phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga //
NK079(dzu)004:5041: rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru sbyor //
NK079(dzu)004:5043: rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ngo bo bos rig
NK079(dzu)004:5044: pa nyid kyi phyir lha'i ngo bo nyid mtha' bral
NK079(dzu)004:5045: ye yin pa de dag dman pa ngo sprad de
NK079(dzu)004:5046: pri ra ta bstan pa'ang byas par thal ba med
NK079(dzu)004:5047: pa'o // lhag ma ni ngo bo dang 'grel te de 'dis snang bar byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5048: khams gsum gyi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5049: thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang //
NK079(dzu)004:5051: zin pa dang ma zin pas dngos po gnyi ga
NK079(dzu)004:5052: 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje ste nges tshig bshad
NK079(dzu)004:5053: zin to // des ris su bcad pa'i dbang du
NK079(dzu)004:5054: bya ba'i yul ni las dang ngo bos shes rab
NK079(dzu)004:5055: ste 'dab brgyad tshang ba yon tan kun gyi rgyur
NK079(dzu)004:5056: zin to // gyur pa'o // de bas na gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:5057: sprad bskyod las skyes pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje
NK079(dzu)004:5058: lnga'i ngo bor gsal ba mi yo ba'i las kyis
NK079(dzu)004:5060: de dag las kyis gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs su 'dogs pa'ang rigs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5061: khams gsum gyi che ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5062: thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5063: thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:5065: dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5066: ji ltar ba'i thabs kyis zin na mi zad rgyan
NK079(dzu)004:5067: gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub zad 'phel med pa 'char
NK079(dzu)004:5068: bas kun gyis grub pa'i mtha' 'ar ye shes so
NK079(dzu)004:5069: // 'khor ba'i chos kyi'ang rtsa bar gyur pas khams
NK079(dzu)004:5070: gsum thabs dang ldan mi ldan las ril 'byung ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:5071: // phyir / rgyal ba kun gyi sku phyag rgya
NK079(dzu)004:5072: yi ge 'khor lo'i sa snang ba'i yang yongs su
NK079(dzu)004:5073: rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang gsal byed kyi rgyu gnyi ga'o
NK079(dzu)004:5074: // phyir / // de bas na nyi zla gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:5075: dga' ba gsum las 'phags pa'i dgyes pa chen po
NK079(dzu)004:5076: 'grub pa'i yo byad pas rten kyang bzhi las 'phags
NK079(dzu)004:5078: de bas na dngos po gnyis kyi rgyu gnas kyang yin la /
NK079(dzu)004:5079: lam pas dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang sprul pa spro ba'ang de'i khyad par las bya ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5080: dbang yul pad pa las rab 'bring gsum gyi'ang 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:5081: thabs dbang bzhi pa dang lnga thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5082: dbang po rdo rje pad+ma ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:5083: gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro na //
NK079(dzu)004:5085: yon tan dang chas par 'chad de //
NK079(dzu)004:5086: zla ba rnam gnyis 'dzag pa'i dbang yul phrad pas
NK079(dzu)004:5087: 'gres te khyams la ma lhung bas gnas gnyis su
NK079(dzu)004:5088: sleb pa ni 'phro ba'i dus te /
NK079(dzu)004:5089: de'i rol rtog pa med pa'i bde ba dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5090: dgyes pa chen po'i longs spyod dang cir yang snang
NK079(dzu)004:5091: ba'i sprul pa'i sku gsum rdzogs pa'i phyir mi dmigs
NK079(dzu)004:5092: pa de dang longs spyod spro /
NK079(dzu)004:5094: lnga'i don tu na nyi zla shar ba'i dus su
NK079(dzu)004:5095: dbang po dang yul 'byor pa'i thig le 'phrad pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:5096: tshe / sku gsum rdzogs par 'dod pa ni thun mong pa'i bzhi lnga ris su bstan pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5098: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5099: de'i tshe sgo gsum dang khams lnga'i bcud gnas su
NK079(dzu)004:5100: zin pa las sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lngar
NK079(dzu)004:5101: shar ba ni dpe'i bde ba mtshon byed sha stag
NK079(dzu)004:5103: sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho gsang ba bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:5104: bcu gnyis sa la nyi shar tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:5105: lus kyi chos bzhi 'dus spyad pas //
NK079(dzu)004:5106: thig le kha bsgyur phan tshun du //
NK079(dzu)004:5107: 'god pa'i stobs kyis gnas phyin tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:5108: gsum sku mi zad 'khor lo sogs //
NK079(dzu)004:5111: tha dad rgyu med dus cig 'thob //
NK079(dzu)004:5112: thabs kyi'ang dam par nga yis brjod //
NK079(dzu)004:5114: lha mo brgyad rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5115: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5116: mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi //
NK079(dzu)004:5118: rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur bas 'dir mdo tsam ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5119: l+ya s+ye la sogs pa bzhi ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5120: grags pa'i dbang du sbyor ba'i mchod pa'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5121: du be la sogs pa bzhi ni phyi'i mchod pas mnyes par byed pa'i phyir te /
NK079(dzu)004:5122: de dag skabs 'dir rdzogs par ldan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5123: de dag gi rim pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5124: gang zhe na sems lngas ston pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5125: 'jig dang gnas dang ldang smon pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:5126: g.yo dang bskyod dang 'jug dang bde gnas pa zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5127: 'dir grol lam ma yin phyir gsang ba'i byang chub sems te /
NK079(dzu)004:5128: bdag gis bstan par mi nus kyang sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud las /
NK079(dzu)004:5129: lnga bzhi bye brag chas bskul bas //
NK079(dzu)004:5130: gnas nas ldang zhing bde g.yo ba //
NK079(dzu)004:5132: rang gi 'phro bas sa gnas tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:5133: phyi mi'i bde ba skye bar 'dod //
NK079(dzu)004:5134: goms thabs rlung mthus slar bskyed de //
NK079(dzu)004:5135: sa gsum bde bar rang gsal ba //
NK079(dzu)004:5136: khams gsum las kyis 'thob pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5137: thabs la yon tan kun rdzogs bas //
NK079(dzu)004:5138: yi ge sa dang blo ma'ang rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:5140: gsang ba'i dbang po zhes pa gsum gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5141: de bzhin nyid kyi gsang ba las //
NK079(dzu)004:5142: zhes pa dag rgyud 'di khams gsum bstan pa'i khungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5143: rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang po dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5144: zhes pa dag ngo bo dang grangs te go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5145: khas blangs ba'i rgyas par bstan pa ston pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5146: skabs 'di na mar mi mthun pa 'di skad kyang 'byung /
NK079(dzu)004:5147: 'jig dang zhes pa dag rgyas par ston pa ste go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5148: dgug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te //
NK079(dzu)004:5149: zhes nas bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcu sgrogs zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5150: sgo ma bzhi'ang tshang bar 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:5152: shes rab thabs kyi g.yas bzungs ste //
NK079(dzu)004:5153: stod smad dgug pa kyo ga ta //
NK079(dzu)004:5154: dbang po yul bsdus 'khyud pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:5155: gsang ba chen po'i zhags pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5156: stod smad shin tu bsdam byas te //
NK079(dzu)004:5157: ma skyes mi gtong sgrog gi las //
NK079(dzu)004:5158: bskyod pa ha sa'i bde sgra ba srogs //
NK079(dzu)004:5159: kun tu grag cing bde myong ho //
NK079(dzu)004:5161: gsang ba'i lha mo bstan pa'i phyir shin tu bsgegs pa'i gzi brjid 'bar zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5162: gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo zhes pa phyi rol tu yum chas gnyis kyis mdzes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5163: chags pa'i gdung ba 'phreng ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5164: dbyangs kyis skul bas shes pa rang dbang med pa skye ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5165: cha dang bskyod pas bababa pa la bshad zer 'dir
NK079(dzu)004:5166: na thabs dam pa'i bde ba nyid la 'dod de
NK079(dzu)004:5167: de nyid las / nyi ldan h'u phata dang m+au //
NK079(dzu)004:5168: bskyod 'dres bde ba ngoms pa med //
NK079(dzu)004:5169: thig le 'pho ba'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK079(dzu)004:5171: brjod dang 'dra bar kun gsal ba //
NK079(dzu)004:5172: rig pa'i gsung sbyangs gnyis med rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:5173: nyi zla mdzes pa slad bskyod pas //
NK079(dzu)004:5174: sa ya bcu gsum bcu gsum ltar //
NK079(dzu)004:5175: phyogs ris med par kun nas ldang //
NK079(dzu)004:5176: dgyes pa chen po'i ga yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:5178: mchod pa'i lha mo rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5179: kun tu tshim byed bro bsrung thim //
NK079(dzu)004:5181: bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings zhes pa de nyid las 'byung bzlog bde ba dgyes pa che /
NK079(dzu)004:5182: mu gi sgo phye las 'byung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5183: kun d+ha ra ga'i me tog dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5184: gnas su 'phros pa'i chu skyes dga' //de nyid slar bstims thabs las skyes //
NK079(dzu)004:5185: de tshe ye shes gnyis gsal me //
NK079(dzu)004:5186: bde ba chen por kun tu gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:5187: mtha' gnyis ro mnyam lhun rdzogs pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:5188: ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi thugs zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5190: zhes pa khams gsum la lha mo bzhi gsum rdzogs pas dgyes pa'i don do //
NK079(dzu)004:5191: khams gsum la rgyu 'bras kyi chos kun rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5192: gsang ba'i dbang po pad+mara ldan 'gyur nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5193: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su //
NK079(dzu)004:5195: bzhi lnga'i tshe khams gsum spyod pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:5197: spyod la ma chags pa'i tshul gyis //
NK079(dzu)004:5198: rgyu 'bras rdzogs pa'i tshul gnyis te //
NK079(dzu)004:5199: bye brag bstan pa'i man ngag las //
NK079(dzu)004:5201: dang po bzhi rnams tshogs yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:5202: gnyis cig sbyor ba'i gnyis pa gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:5203: rab dga' mi mtha' dang por ni //
NK079(dzu)004:5204: pha rol phyin dang sa mtshan nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:5205: rims mtshungs las kyis bshid pa yin //
NK079(dzu)004:5206: gang mthar de las slar bzlog pa //
NK079(dzu)004:5207: sangs rgyas dang po brgyad tshogs lam //
NK079(dzu)004:5208: bdun po'i sa ni sbyor lam ste //
NK079(dzu)004:5209: yas bzlog gnyis pa'i gnyis pa sogs //
NK079(dzu)004:5210: bcu rim mtha' nas sprul pa'i bar //
NK079(dzu)004:5211: bcu gcig gnyis kyi bde ba'i sar //
NK079(dzu)004:5212: des myong sprul pa nas bkye ba //
NK079(dzu)004:5213: bcu gsum snang ba'i phyag rgyar gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:5214: de nyid rang 'byung ye shes gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:5215: sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pas na //
NK079(dzu)004:5216: rim pa rtsol bas ma bsgrub rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:5217: thabs chen theg par 'di lung bstan //
NK079(dzu)004:5219: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol ces pa'i bar du gsungs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5220: thabs chen po'i 'bras bus dgyes par ston pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5222: de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las //
NK079(dzu)004:5224: khungs dang che ba ste bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:5225: khams gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5226: gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:5227: zhes pa bzhi gsungs te go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5228: dbang lnga'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5229: dbang po yul sems ldan 'gyur na //
NK079(dzu)004:5232: khams gnyis rang gi bcud dang ldan pa'i tshe sbyor bas //
NK079(dzu)004:5233: sems mtha' 'gro 'ong bskyod pa la gnas na //
NK079(dzu)004:5234: yon tan dang 'bras bu cir yang 'char te gang zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:5235: lha'i dkyil 'khor tshad las 'das pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5236: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'bras bu'i bye brag ma 'dres
NK079(dzu)004:5237: la yongs su rdzogs pa de khams gsum gyi las
NK079(dzu)004:5238: kyi dus cig tu snang bar byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5240: gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni //
NK079(dzu)004:5241: zhes pa nas le'u'i mthar gtugs par /
NK079(dzu)004:5242: snod ngan la byin pa'i nyes pa gnyis yod pas spang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5243: snod bzang po la bstan pa ste go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5244: thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus //
NK079(dzu)004:5245: zhes pa le'u'i mtshan te dngos po'i gnyis kyi rgyur khams gsum bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5246: le'u nyer gnyis pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////cig char ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5247: lta ba thun mong du lam bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5248: le'u nyer gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa la 'jug par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5249: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
NK079(dzu)004:5250: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5254: tshig mgo 'jug gi don bsdus nas brjod /
NK079(dzu)004:5256: chos thams cad dbyings dang dbyings gyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5258: dbu zhabs kyi tshig gis mngon gsum dang brgyud pa
NK079(dzu)004:5259: rten gyis thabs kyis snyad pa'i don kho na'i gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:5260: su med pa'i byang chub sems yin pa de bstan
NK079(dzu)004:5263: chos thams cad yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5264: shes rab thams cad yum bzhir 'dus //
NK079(dzu)004:5266: skye bo pa'i chos kyi rtsa ba yid chos gnyis mtha' las grol ba /
NK079(dzu)004:5267: dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba kun bzang yab yum yin pa'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:5268: rang rgyud pa'i lam yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:5269: gcig dang sum las grol ba yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5270: gdul bya'i snang ba la lha mang po'ang yab yum brgyad nyid yin la /
NK079(dzu)004:5271: brgyad kyang gnyis med yin pa de grangs la 'phel 'grib yod pa min te /
NK079(dzu)004:5272: de nyid ma skyes pa nyid ye shes su gsal ba'i don bstan par dgongs nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5274: de dag gi don rgyas par bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:5275: gnyis med kyi don bstan pa'i phyir don gyi rtsa ba mchog yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:5276: thams cad ma lus mi lus mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de /
NK079(dzu)004:5278: shes grub kyi gzhir gyur ba ni gnyis su med pa dam pa yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:5279: de nyid ji ltar zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:5280: dngos po 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5281: yab dang yum gyi ris ma spangs bral ba ngo
NK079(dzu)004:5282: bo mi rnyed pas ngo bo nyid yul med pas
NK079(dzu)004:5283: 'du shes kyi zin chags dang ngang gis bral ba'o
NK079(dzu)004:5284: // 'o na snang ba 'gog go bar dog pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:5285: de bzhin nyid dbyings sna tshogs mang po thabs su snang /
NK079(dzu)004:5286: zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid mu
NK079(dzu)004:5287: mtha' med pa nyid 'byung khungs rnam par bcad de
NK079(dzu)004:5288: / rigs dang yab yum dang bye brag gi chos
NK079(dzu)004:5289: thams cad du cho 'phrul nyid rang snang bas stong
NK079(dzu)004:5290: pa'i mtha' 'ang med la thabs 'dus pa'ang de nyid
NK079(dzu)004:5291: / do // 'o na snang ba du ma'i chos 'ba' zhig go snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:5292: thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin /
NK079(dzu)004:5294: de ltar rig pa nyid bye brag chos su snang
NK079(dzu)004:5295: tsam nyid na rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las byung ba
NK079(dzu)004:5296: ma yin / mi bden pa ma yin /
NK079(dzu)004:5298: rten las 'byung ma yin pas mi mthun pa'i dpes ma grub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5299: yang cir yang snang la cir yang mi zin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5300: snang ba nyid na med pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5302: gsal stong pas mthun pa'i dpe ma grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5303: don cig la mtshon pa bzhi mtshon lugs mi mthun pa dang bsam pa'i dbang gnyi ga'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5304: de bas na snang ba grol ba dang shes rab 'dus pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5305: de bas na gnyis su med par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5306: de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang //
NK079(dzu)004:5308: snang stong gi mtha' dang bral bar bstan pa'i don
NK079(dzu)004:5309: nyid ye shes drug pa yul dang bral ba gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:5310: ldan bsam brjod las 'das par rang snang ba la
NK079(dzu)004:5311: tha snyad tsam du yid chos dbyer med pa zhes
NK079(dzu)004:5312: bya'o // don rtogs pa la bag chags mi sogs par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5313: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa mchog gi gnas gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5314: ji ltar spyad kyang zag med gnyis grub sgrib mi 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:5316: don de su la yod pa'i skyes mchog ni sku
NK079(dzu)004:5317: dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas 'du
NK079(dzu)004:5319: spyod pa ci byas kyang zag pa gsum mi 'byung zhing /
NK079(dzu)004:5320: tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sgrub gnyis 'byang bar gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5321: de byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5322: shes rab thabs chen mchog wa ye nas rol pa yin //
NK079(dzu)004:5324: rang rig pa cir yang shar la zin chags med pa ye yin pa'i phyir de ltar gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5325: des na lam rim pa med pas cig char gyi don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5326: de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste //
NK079(dzu)004:5328: ye ci yin pa'i don rtogs pa'i rig pa nyid
NK079(dzu)004:5329: skad cig la dbugs 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor zhi khro
NK079(dzu)004:5330: la sogs pa du mar snang ba'i rig pa nyid
NK079(dzu)004:5331: snang ba'o // rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas //
NK079(dzu)004:5332: 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus cig mnyam par sbyor /
NK079(dzu)004:5333: zhes pa rang bzhin ye nas rgyu 'bras dbyer med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5334: dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid yin pa ni gtan tshigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5335: des na lam bas kyang de shes pa mthar phyin nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5336: 'jug pa la rim pa bzhi med de /
NK079(dzu)004:5337: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor skad cig mas skyed pa
NK079(dzu)004:5338: rang rig snang ba nyid mngon du byas pa tsam
NK079(dzu)004:5339: gyi phyir / snga phyi dang che chung med par chud pa ni sa non pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5340: de'i che ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5341: 'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas /
NK079(dzu)004:5342: thams cad 'dus pa'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod /
NK079(dzu)004:5344: gnyis med du rtogs pa'i don rang rig pa nye bar bstan pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5345: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo 'phel 'grib med pa'i bdag nyid pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5346: ril gyi gzhi rtsa dang ngo bo nyid de /
NK079(dzu)004:5348: rig pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid snang gzhir bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5349: gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad mnyam nyid kyi dbyings /
NK079(dzu)004:5351: ngang gis mtha' dang bral ba'i ye shes la 'khor
NK079(dzu)004:5352: ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i ris med de
NK079(dzu)004:5353: / ril rang byung gi ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:5354: nga dang bdag med sna tshogs mtshan ma dbyer med pa zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5355: thams cad bdag la bdag thams cad pa'i phyir rnam pa med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5356: rang bzhin la rtog pa dang de kho na nyid
NK079(dzu)004:5357: la rtog pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i bye brag
NK079(dzu)004:5359: de kho na nyid 'ba' zhig pas //
NK079(dzu)004:5360: stong dang mi stong mi gnas de nyid du rdubs //
NK079(dzu)004:5362: 'on kyang nyi tshe ba'i stong pa dang snang ba bsal ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5363: rang 'byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mi zad ster chen 'phro //
NK079(dzu)004:5365: de nyid gdul bya la rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil
NK079(dzu)004:5366: 'khor tha dad du 'gro 'ong med par rang snang
NK079(dzu)004:5367: ba'o // de nyid dang mthun par dang po'i rnal
NK079(dzu)004:5368: 'byor gyi don du dbu zhabs kyi don 'dus lugs
NK079(dzu)004:5369: ba'o // bstan pa'i phyir / 'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5371: chos ril 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis su 'dus la /
NK079(dzu)004:5372: de nyid ngo bo tha mi dad pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5373: dkyil 'khor rnam pa bdun gyi bye brag ji snyed
NK079(dzu)004:5374: pa yang ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:5375: / sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lnga rigs
NK079(dzu)004:5376: kyi bdag po dang drug pa 'phel 'grib bral ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:5378: mi zad par ldan rgyan kyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5379: skye med dbyings kyi rang 'byung 'od gsal 'phreng ldan mgo /
NK079(dzu)004:5380: ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig ngang gis gsal /
NK079(dzu)004:5381: thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen nang du bsdus //
NK079(dzu)004:5383: gang rgyu rkyen bral bas dngos gzhi yongs su mi zin pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5384: sems rang 'byung gi ye shes te //
NK079(dzu)004:5385: nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid kyis kyang bsgrun du
NK079(dzu)004:5386: med pa nyid rgyan gyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad
NK079(dzu)004:5388: de ni legs pa chen por bzhugs pas byed pa
NK079(dzu)004:5389: po med pa dang rgyu rkyen 'dus pa ma yin
NK079(dzu)004:5390: dus glo bur par min par gdod nas rang gi
NK079(dzu)004:5391: mtshan nyid rig par gsal ba'ang rang bzhin gyi gtan
NK079(dzu)004:5392: tshigs kyis te ngo bo'i sgrib byed dang bral ba'o
NK079(dzu)004:5393: // de'i phyir dngos po 'gro 'ong dang shes pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:5394: sgyu 'phrul la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid rig pa
NK079(dzu)004:5395: lhun grub tu bye brag med pas ma bsdus rdzogs
NK079(dzu)004:5396: // pa ni / 'dra ba'i cig pa tsam ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:5397: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang ba'i snying po'ang de nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:5398: de bas na dngos po gnyis gnyis med du bstan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5399: phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5401: bcu'i chos phyi nang snod bcud mtho ris ngan song
NK079(dzu)004:5402: la sogs pa 'khor ba'i chos ril ngo bo ngang
NK079(dzu)004:5403: gis mtha' dang bral ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'i ye
NK079(dzu)004:5404: shes ming bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:5405: zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen mchog chen yin zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5406: gzhi la ming la zhen pa'i las nor ba tsam
NK079(dzu)004:5407: las 'khor ba med pa'i phyir 'khor ba nyid rgyal
NK079(dzu)004:5408: ba'i zhing sa phyogs nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:5409: de'i phyir skye med dbyings dang rang rig gnyis su yang dag 'ub /
NK079(dzu)004:5410: zhes pa yid dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid tha
NK079(dzu)004:5411: snyad kyis phye bas dbyings dang ye shes su bsnyad
NK079(dzu)004:5412: kyang ngo bo de gnyis byas pa min par dbyer
NK079(dzu)004:5413: med pa ni ril gyi dngos gzhi ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5414: lta ba dang rigs dang po bshad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5415: lam gyi chos rnams dus cig rdzogs par bstan pa ni phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5416: mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas sbyangs mi dmigs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5418: thun mong dang khyad par gyi mos pa spyod pa
NK079(dzu)004:5419: drod rtse mo bzod pa 'jig rten gyi chos kyi
NK079(dzu)004:5420: mchog dang / snang ba thob pa dang mched pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5421: de kho na nyid kyi don kyi phyogs cig la zhugs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5422: bar chad med pa'i lam yan chad nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5423: chos kyi sprin man chad du pha rol phyin pa bcu dang sa bcu zhe'am /
NK079(dzu)004:5424: sa de dag nyid gsal bya gsal byed dang rten
NK079(dzu)004:5425: dang ba rten pa'i rgyu 'bras su gyur pas rim
NK079(dzu)004:5426: par lam gsum skabs su 'bab pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5427: kun tu 'od chos sku mi dmigs pa chen po thob pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5428: ye nas 'od gsal chags ma chags dkon mchog gnas /
NK079(dzu)004:5430: de ltar mi dmigs pa 'od gsal sa dang po
NK079(dzu)004:5431: las gzhan pa rig pa yul dang bral ba ci
NK079(dzu)004:5432: spyad kyang thogs pa med pas thogs pa dang bral
NK079(dzu)004:5434: sku dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas rnyed dka' ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5435: ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs /
NK079(dzu)004:5436: zhes pa snyad du 'gro don mi 'gog par mdzad
NK079(dzu)004:5437: pa'i sku phyag rgyar snang ba'i yi ge 'khor lo'i
NK079(dzu)004:5438: sa'o // de nyid na ngo bo btsal bar dka' bar gsal ba /
NK079(dzu)004:5439: yes drug pa ni mtshan lnga'i bdag nyid pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5440: de ye shes bla ma'i sa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5441: de dag gi yid dang chos dbyer med pa nyid
NK079(dzu)004:5442: bul dam pa yin pa'i don gyis rdzogs pas lam
NK079(dzu)004:5444: thun mong gi lam bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5445: lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5446: 'di dang lnga phan chod du song ba dang ched du bdag gzhan don du brtsam pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5447: sngon du bya ba'i las kyang yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:5448: don de sus bshad pa'i ston pa po bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5449: mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan /
NK079(dzu)004:5450: 'gro med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad /
NK079(dzu)004:5452: bden pa gsum pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:5453: ni mtshan nyid dang ngo bo dang las kyis rdo
NK079(dzu)004:5454: rje lta bu chen po ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5455: de nyid bdag nyid yin pa ni tha dad pa'i ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5456: ston pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan nyid ye shes rgyud cig nas mi skye ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5459: de'ang phan tshun bsgos pa med pa'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'i ston pas gsungs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5461: yid chos dbyer med pa'i don to //
NK079(dzu)004:5462: le'u'i mtshan bshad par ngos gzung ba go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5463: drug cu ro gnyis zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5464: sgyu 'phrul brgyad cu pa'i le'u shor bas mtshan nges pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5465: le'u nyer gsum pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////rdo rje zhing chen bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5466: le'u nyer bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5467: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi 'chi ba rdo rjer bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5469: ston pa kun tu bzang pos skye shi med par bya ba'i thabs gsungs pa'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:5470: sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i man ngag nyid du shes par bya ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5471: khungs kyis bla ma la mnyes pas phog par gyis la zhus shig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5472: 'dir man ngag yod pa'i phyir rgyud kyi rim pa spang ma dgos te /
NK079(dzu)004:5473: gnas dang sgrub pa po dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5477: bsnyen bsgrub bya ba'i las kyi rim pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5479: rtag dang las la sbyar ba dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5481: las mngon du dbyung dus dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5482: yon tan tsam du re zhig shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5483: de la dang po sngon du bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5484: rdo rje zhing chen bsgrub 'dod pas //
NK079(dzu)004:5485: zhes pa la sogs pa sngon du sgo nas tshe
NK079(dzu)004:5487: ba'i don dam pa'am bden pa gsum pa rtogs nas
NK079(dzu)004:5488: goms par bya'o // bsnyen bsgrub kyi lha bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5489: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i zhes pa ljang nag rgya gram dbyug to can du bsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5490: de gsal nas phyag rgya bzhis shes pa rol dbab pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5491: dza h'u bam hos dgug par bya zhes gsungs gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5492: bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par /
NK079(dzu)004:5493: zhes pa la sogs pa sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5494: dang ni gdams ngag ste phyag rgya cig pa'i rnal
NK079(dzu)004:5495: 'byor yan chad thob dang bsnyen pa rtags phyin nas
NK079(dzu)004:5497: zhing chen 'og tu gzhug par bya zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5498: dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas //
NK079(dzu)004:5499: khro bo khro mo 'khor du bsgom zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:5500: rang rang gi rtog pa'i gnas sam yan lag lnga la tshom bu lnga bkod /
NK079(dzu)004:5501: de'i phyi skor du h'u chen nyi shu dgos pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5502: mngag pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur gtang //
NK079(dzu)004:5504: ye shes dang las dang ting nge 'dzin gyi pho
NK079(dzu)004:5505: nya bkye la mthon dman gyi 'gro ba kun bkug
NK079(dzu)004:5507: bsgrub pa'i grangs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5508: bsgrub pa cig gam yang na gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:5510: sgra ji bzhin te spyod mthun pa sran tshugs shing dpa' bas bya ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5511: gzhan du na ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas 'grub pa lo zla'i dus nas 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:5514: snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung //
NK079(dzu)004:5517: de nas ting 'dzin bdud rtsi yis //
NK079(dzu)004:5519: bkug pa'i rjes su las kyi lha bdud rtsi 'khyil bar gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis /
NK079(dzu)004:5520: bzlas pa'i tshad khri phrag bcu pa'am //
NK079(dzu)004:5521: 'bum phrag bdun dang bcu la sogs par bzlas ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5522: sngags ni khro bo de nyid kyi las dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5523: bcas pa'i sngags te srog dang ldan par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5524: tshul ji ltar bzlas snyam pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:5525: bzlas pa'i tshul ni rnam gsum dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5527: gsal ba gsum bshad zin te /
NK079(dzu)004:5528: smra byed gsum rdo rje gsum pa'i bar nas sgra 'byung bar bsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:5529: de nyid la ye shes lnga'i 'od zer dang ldan par bsam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5530: zhing de ltim ltem zhes bdag mnyen par gyur pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5531: dam rdzas a mri tas byug ste bgegs mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:5532: de nas yi ge 'bru lnga 'god zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5533: yan lag dang dbang po lnga la 'god pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5534: dbang po lnga la dbang po'i tshul zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5535: dbang po g.yas g.yon la phyi nang gi sems pa yab yum 'god pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5536: spog pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5539: phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa bstan zhes pa la sogs pa go sla ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5540: bsam pa goms pas dbang du bya ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5541: thod pa dngos sam phyag rgya 'jug nub phyogs su
NK079(dzu)004:5542: bstan te bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las ma grub na
NK079(dzu)004:5544: bsnyen pa'i tshad mthun te de nyid kyi las dang bcas pa'i sngags so //
NK079(dzu)004:5545: ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcur 'phro zhi zhing la bstim /
NK079(dzu)004:5546: zhes pa gsal ba gsum gyi ngo bo las /
NK079(dzu)004:5548: shes pa bkug ste rol bstim par bsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:5549: ro 'gul nas sems bstan par bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5550: bar chad du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5551: de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas zhes pa gsum gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5553: de nas bar bar byed pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5555: ro 'phar ba dang ting nge 'dzin pas ri la
NK079(dzu)004:5556: rdo rjes drag tu brdab cing khyod lam du rgyud
NK079(dzu)004:5558: dngos grub blang ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5559: thod pa kha nas hri byung na //
NK079(dzu)004:5560: zhes pa dag /thod pa'i kha nas lce brkyang nas //
NK079(dzu)004:5561: bsgrub pa pos rdo rje rtse gsum par bsams pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:5562: sos bcad de mid na bdag dang gnyis su med
NK079(dzu)004:5563: par gyur te / rkang 'gyogs dang rdzu 'phrul kun bdag gis thob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5564: yang sems cig pas bka' nyan par yang 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:5565: lce ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur te nor bsgrub bo //
NK079(dzu)004:5566: de nas zhing de langs pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5568: rtags lnga pa dngos su langs na /
NK079(dzu)004:5569: rdo rje lag du gtad de las kyis shig par dbang bskur /
NK079(dzu)004:5570: dam chu blud de dam las mi 'da' bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5572: der ro yis kyang khas blangs pa bsgrub pa po mi dgos pa dang mi 'chi ba'i tshe dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5573: skye ba med pa'i chos 'grub pa la sogs pa
NK079(dzu)004:5574: khas blangs par yang rgyas pa'i rgyud las 'byung ngo
NK079(dzu)004:5575: // yon tan ni de ltar bsgrubs pa'i zhes pa gnyis gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:5577: myu du 'grub pa'i ched yod pa'i phyir zhes so //
NK079(dzu)004:5579: dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5580: zla grangs mtshan bzhi ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5581: brtson pa'i rim pas phye ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5583: phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:5585: 'bru sman dang dam rdzas sha lnga lnga'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5586: gzhan yo byad gnyis po dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5587: lam rgyud lnga'i ro dang sha dang sman dang 'bru
NK079(dzu)004:5588: dang khyad par du bsgrub rdzas rma rmen med pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:5589: bkra shis pa'i zhing bsam pa btsal lo //
NK079(dzu)004:5590: rtag tu tshogs chen mchod pa bya zhes pa dag de ltar gtsor bya /
NK079(dzu)004:5591: de ma lcogs na zhag re la gsum mam lnga ru bya ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5592: tshogs skyed pa dang lha nye ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5593: kha zas rnams kyang thod pa bza' zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5594: bdag ni pan glang can la yod zhes pa'i go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5595: mtshams bcad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5596: rdo rje bsgrub pa bar chod kyis rtag tu mtshams ni gcad par bya zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5597: dgos ched yod pas bsrung ba'i 'khor los gcad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5599: de byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5600: phur bu'i sngags dang khro sngags kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:5602: badz+ra ki la ya badz+ra kro ta h'u ka ra h'u gar rdza gar rdza h'u phata /
NK079(dzu)004:5603: zhes pa sogs pa phur pa lan re la lan
NK079(dzu)004:5604: 'bum 'bum bzlas te sngon du mtshams phur gdab pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:5605: // lag pa g.yas g.yon thal sor la /
NK079(dzu)004:5607: lag pa gnyis kyi mthil sor la a ma las
NK079(dzu)004:5608: nyi zla'i steng du h'u zung bcu bkod pa yongs
NK079(dzu)004:5609: su gyur pa las khro bo skur gyur pa'i bar
NK079(dzu)004:5611: de la sbyor ba'i sems skur gyur pa dang bcas pa phur pa la thim nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5612: bsgrub pa pos phur pa rdo rje phur bu ki
NK079(dzu)004:5613: la ya yab yum gyi sku mi zad par bsgoms
NK079(dzu)004:5614: te / bdag cag ma yin pa gzhan mi ma
NK079(dzu)004:5615: yin pa'i bar chad mtshams bcad de phyogs bcur btab
NK079(dzu)004:5619: de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis //
NK079(dzu)004:5621: rdo rje theg pa bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen yid la
NK079(dzu)004:5622: ci 'dod pa re des 'byin pa yan chad gsum
NK079(dzu)004:5623: mo // rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni //
NK079(dzu)004:5626: rkang 'gyogs dang 'phul pa la sogs pa'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:5628: lus sbed nus nas bar chad du mi 'gyur bas /
NK079(dzu)004:5630: le'u nyer bzhi pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o ////lam gyi rnal 'byor gnyis bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5631: le'u nyer lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5632: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
NK079(dzu)004:5633: ting nge 'dzin gyis rim par sbyor zhing dngos grub
NK079(dzu)004:5634: myur du len pa'i thabs dra ba las 'di skad
NK079(dzu)004:5636: rgyud gzhi las skabs su bsgom lam rim pa bzhis sbyong ba gtso ston pa'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:5637: sbyor lam thabs sgyu 'phrul dra ba las mang na yang /
NK079(dzu)004:5638: 'dir lam gnyis dang gsum gyi rim pa nyer bar bka' stsal pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5639: cig char 'jug pa dang mdor bstan pa thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5640: dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub pa //
NK079(dzu)004:5641: mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin te //
NK079(dzu)004:5642: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ji
NK079(dzu)004:5643: snyed pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub don du
NK079(dzu)004:5644: gnyer bar bya'ang gang gis thob ce na /
NK079(dzu)004:5645: mi dmigs pa gsum mngon du byas pa'i rig pa nyid 'bras bur rang char te /
NK079(dzu)004:5646: de bas na blo ched du bya ba'i rtsol bas
NK079(dzu)004:5647: ma bslad par rang bzhin gyis de ltar rang gsal
NK079(dzu)004:5648: ba'o // gdam ngag ni bsgom pa las dngos grub 'byung bas bsgom pa la bskul pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5649: cig char ba'i mi rtog pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5650: lhar bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5651: mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las //
NK079(dzu)004:5653: rig pa yul dang bral ba ye shes lha'i dkyil
NK079(dzu)004:5654: 'khor gsal ba mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin no
NK079(dzu)004:5655: // 'byung khung skad zer yang de nyid rig pa
NK079(dzu)004:5656: cir yang ma 'gags par ye gsal bar rtogs pa
NK079(dzu)004:5657: nyid lhar rang shar ba ni da'ang sgyur ba ste
NK079(dzu)004:5658: // / gnyis pa med pas mi zad pas brgyan
NK079(dzu)004:5659: gyi 'khor lo 'grub pas cig car dang rim pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:5660: mdor thun mong du ston te bskul ba'i phyir ro
NK079(dzu)004:5661: // / // spyod yul thams cad man 'da' la //
NK079(dzu)004:5663: spros bcas kyi rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas spyod yul dag pa ni mthar phyin pa'i lam pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5664: de'i 'phrin las ni thugs rje chen pos thar bskur zhing ngan song sbyong ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5665: longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing zhes pa 'bras bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5666: ji ltar 'dod pa smon na 'grub zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5667: dang du blangs na 'grub par smra ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5668: logs su smon pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:5669: de bas na 'chad pa'i lam rim la 'bod cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5670: mtshan nyid dang po mthong lam bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5671: yang shing rgya che lhun grub ni //
NK079(dzu)004:5673: 'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin no zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5674: lhun grub bden pa dbyer med ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5675: mi shong ba dang ma khyab med de /
NK079(dzu)004:5676: dngos po gnyis gdod nas mtha' gsum dang bral ba ni shes bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5677: de las shes byed mi gzhan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5678: de mthong ba med par mthong ba'i rig pa ngo bo nyid mnyam pa'i dbyings yin pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5679: yul dang yul can mi phyed pa ni spyan lnga'i
NK079(dzu)004:5680: mchog mngon sum par rtogs pa ste thog mar rdeng
NK079(dzu)004:5681: chud par bya'o // rim gyis 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid bsgom pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5682: dngos grub myur du sgrub 'dod pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5683: shin tu 'phra zhing zab par bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:5685: yang dag pa'i sa tshe 'di la grub par 'dod
NK079(dzu)004:5686: na yan lag gnyis pa mtshan nyid dang po'i rjes
NK079(dzu)004:5688: bsgoms shig par gdam pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5689: 'jug pa'i thog mar mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor la /
NK079(dzu)004:5693: ngo bo gzung zhing brtag par dka' ba de bsgom mo //
NK079(dzu)004:5694: de yang yul du min pa'i phyir shes pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5696: gnyi ga tha dad pa med pas rang gi ngo
NK079(dzu)004:5697: bo gang yang dang du len pa med pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:5698: bsgom pa'o // de yang skyon dang bcos thabs dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5699: nyams drug gsum gnyis kyis brtan par bya ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5700: lam skabs su mthar phyin nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5702: bsgom pa la ldang ba'i dus ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5703: ting nge 'dzin de ni goms pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5704: zhes pa don gyis gdams ngag tu 'chad do //
NK079(dzu)004:5705: thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5706: sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:5708: rgyu de brtan pas bdag gzhan gyi rnam pa ril /
NK079(dzu)004:5709: sgyu ma ltar med bzhin snang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5711: ma nges pa cir yang snang ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5712: cig shos de dag gi sgyu ma ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:5713: rig pa nyid bye brag gi chos su rang shar
NK079(dzu)004:5714: ba la gnyis med la ma 'gags pa'i snying rje
NK079(dzu)004:5715: chen po ye shes sgyu ma'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5716: de ltar thag chod nas de nyid du rang gsal
NK079(dzu)004:5717: ba las spong len gyi 'du shes med pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:5718: bsgom pa'o // de bzhin yang dang yang goms nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5719: zhes pa ting nge 'dzin gnyis goms pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5720: mthar phyin pa'ang phra mo'i rgyu dang ldan pa'i dus so //
NK079(dzu)004:5722: phyi nang snod bcud h'u du bsdu //
NK079(dzu)004:5724: rjes thogs su rgyu des stong gsum nyungs 'bru ltar
NK079(dzu)004:5725: phra ba gsum bsgom pa'ang ril ther zug spangs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:5726: phyir h'u gi rnam pa cig tu gsal ni rnam
NK079(dzu)004:5727: pa gzhan pa med pa'i phyir bsdus pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5728: rigs gang byed pa'i yi ge la slob kyis kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:5729: 'dir gtso bo'i dbang du rdo rje sems dpar bsgom pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5730: yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:5731: yi ge h'u du shin tu bsdu /
NK079(dzu)004:5733: dngos po drug gi chos rtog pas phye ba las
NK079(dzu)004:5734: ngo bo rang rig pa'i phyir de nyid h'u du
NK079(dzu)004:5735: byung ba rig pa'i dngos po ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5738: n+ri'i dmigs zhes su gnyis gsungs te /
NK079(dzu)004:5740: 'od zer mang po spro bar bya zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5741: h'u gi 'phro 'dus h'u nyid yongs su gyur pa mi dmigs par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5742: gdan bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5743: thim 'gyur dbyings nas a dkar 'bar zhes pa la sogs pa bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:5744: rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5745: gdan gyi rgyu las rin po che 'od sna lnga gzhal yas su rang rig pa nyid shar ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5746: nyi zla'i gdan dang gzhal yas khang /
NK079(dzu)004:5749: rgyun tshang ba la phab ste snod phra ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5750: phra mo ngo bo gsum bstan pa'i phyir de dkyil 'khor yi ge h'u gnas pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5752: cho ga gsum sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:5753: 'dzin tshon gang tshad rgyan tshang ba go sla ste
NK079(dzu)004:5754: bshad zin to // phyag rgya cig pa'i nges tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5755: de bzhin gnyis med gsal gyur nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5757: rdo rje cho ga tha ma bstan nas /
NK079(dzu)004:5758: de gyur pa las mi skyod pa'i sku mthing ka rdo rje dril bu can du bsgom pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5759: de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5761: de goms nas thar chags su slob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5762: yang na bshad pa ltar de la tshul gnyis te /
NK079(dzu)004:5763: dang po nyid nas rags pa sgom du'ang rung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5765: rgyu des spros bcas rnal 'byor la bslab pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5766: zhal gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom /
NK079(dzu)004:5768: de'i tshe nyid ni bsgom pa'ang 'gog pa min na /
NK079(dzu)004:5769: spros bcas dkyil 'khor la slob pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5770: rigs kyi grangs las slob pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5771: dbu dang phyag gi rim pa las slob pa'i tshul gyis 'dir spros bcas la slob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5772: lam de tshad du phyin pa stong gi dkyil dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5773: bzhi bcu gnyis re re'ang de nyid ldan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5774: rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i lha gsum ldan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:5775: ye shes sems pa dang dbang gi lha lnga lnga'i
NK079(dzu)004:5776: grangs la sogs pa ri rab til 'bru'i tshul du
NK079(dzu)004:5777: gsal ba'o // khro bo'i bslab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5778: gzhan yang 'khro 'dul sna tshogs bsgom zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:5779: rim pa de kho na ltar bslabs pa'i mtha' spros
NK079(dzu)004:5780: bcas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po bsgom pa ste
NK079(dzu)004:5781: / rgyas pa'i rgyud las gsal ba tshom bu'i grangs kun ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:5782: de dag kyang sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:5783: lnga dang lnga zhing sbyor ba yang //
NK079(dzu)004:5784: skabs kyis bzhi dang bzhi sbyor ba //
NK079(dzu)004:5785: bzhi dang mthar phyin dus 'pho ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:5786: ting 'dzin spyod pa la sogs te //
NK079(dzu)004:5787: snang ba dang ni nub pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:5788: bar ma ming gzugs rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK079(dzu)004:5789: srid pa skye ba'i rim pa nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:5790: log rtog ngo bo ming tsam nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:5791: lhun grub rgyal ba'i mdzad phyir gzhi //
NK079(dzu)004:5792: las dang slob mthong goms mthar phyin //
NK079(dzu)004:5793: 'bras bu mthar phyin dus kyang de'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5794: de thob de dus gsum du'ang 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:5795: bar ma de gnyis rnam bzhir 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:5796: gang dag rkyen gyis lam bcad pa //
NK079(dzu)004:5797: 'pho ba'i bsam pa de nyid dam //
NK079(dzu)004:5798: yang na skabs kyis rnam par phye //
NK079(dzu)004:5799: rjes thogs lam phrad gdon mi za'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5800: rjes mthun spyod sogs ldan 'gyur 'thob zhes gsungs pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5801: lam gnyis su dbye ba'i dgos ched bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5802: blo'i shes rab che chung las /
NK079(dzu)004:5804: cig car 'jug pa'i bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5805: yang na cig car bsgom par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:5807: mi mthun pa'i rim pa las khyad par du ston pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5808: sbyangs pa sngar byas pa dag 'di la dang po
NK079(dzu)004:5809: nas skad cig mas dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dwangs bar
NK079(dzu)004:5811: bsgom pa ni spros bcas nyid la thog ma nas zhugs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5812: gzhan dag spros bcas rjes su 'dod pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:5813: mi mthun pa'i tshig gis 'gog pas mi rigs te /
NK079(dzu)004:5814: 'di'i ngo bo ni mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:5815: mthar phyin pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:5816: de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des //
NK079(dzu)004:5818: lam gnyis kyi mthong sgom mthar phyin pa'i gang zag ni rgyud du nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te /
NK079(dzu)004:5819: rigs brgyad kyi dam pa des /
NK079(dzu)004:5820: tshogs la spyad dam bshad pa'i bsgrub pa bstsams pas /
NK079(dzu)004:5821: bsam pas ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub ste /
NK079(dzu)004:5822: nam mkhar 'gro ba dang tshe'i rig 'dzin la sogs pa 'grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5824: cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:5825: chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul zhes pa'i tshig bshad bco lngas /
NK079(dzu)004:5827: cho 'phrul gsum dang yang ldan pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:5829: lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa zhes pa //
NK079(dzu)004:5831: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis //
NK079(dzu)004:5832: dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub //
