NK079(dzu)004:7241: rgyud dang ltos pa'i theg dman yang thabs kyis 'dir
NK079(dzu)004:7242: gzung ngo // phyogs bsdus gnyis med zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7243: phyogs bcur dus bzhi thams cad kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:7246: bcu bzhir 'khrul sems snang ba nyid na mtha' bzhi
NK079(dzu)004:7247: las grol ba'i rig pa 'gro 'ong med bral bar
NK079(dzu)004:7248: gcig pa'i mtshan nyid cir yang ma zin pa rten
NK079(dzu)004:7249: dang bral ba'o // thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7250: chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing //
NK079(dzu)004:7251: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7252: rtogs pa'i 'bras bu dang sgom pa'i yon tan 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:7253: mthong bsgom por 'brel te go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7254: thabs nyid shes rab zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7255: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:7258: rang rig cir yang snang ba ni rang bzhin gyi thabs kyi phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7259: thabs la thabs rol pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:7261: snang ba nyid na zhen mtha' las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab ste dbyer med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7262: shes rab nyid na thabs su sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7263: de bzhin nyid kyi lam gyi dbyings nyid las /
NK079(dzu)004:7265: ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba la rang bzhin med pa nyid cir yang snang ba /
NK079(dzu)004:7266: dbyer med pa de rtogs par bskul ba de so so ba'i zhen pa mi skye'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7267: de nyid thabs kyi lam gyi dbang du sbyor ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7268: zla ba las mi dmigs pa'i chos skye ba'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7269: nyi ma las sna tshogs su snang ba'i phyir te bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:7270: gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7271: thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur na /
NK079(dzu)004:7273: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa rtogs pa gzhi las de nyid thams cad du snang ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7275: de'i mtshan nyid ci'ang yin pa'i phyir rnam pa gang yang min pas brtag dka' ste mi rtogs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7277: yul du med pas dmigs gis dmigs mi mthong ba
NK079(dzu)004:7278: lta bu'i phyir gzhan pas rigs par mi 'gyur ba
NK079(dzu)004:7280: phyogs gzhan du sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i le'u drug pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:7281: thams cad thabs la bcu drug rgya //
NK079(dzu)004:7282: bcu gnyis bzhi yis rol pa'i tshe //
NK079(dzu)004:7283: rag ta byang chub dus gcig 'bar //
NK079(dzu)004:7285: rgyal ba sems dpa' kun kyi mes //
NK079(dzu)004:7286: thams cad thun mong ma yin pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7287: dman pas rnyed par ga la 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7288: thams cad sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7289: ye nas lha dang lha mo yis /
NK079(dzu)004:7291: gsang chen la sbyor ba'i ldem dgongs kyis gzhan gzud
NK079(dzu)004:7292: pa dang dngos su'ang spyad pa'i dam tshig 'chad de
NK079(dzu)004:7293: / rang bzhin gyi sbyar ba mdo gnyis dang rgyas par bzhi sa 'grel te /
NK079(dzu)004:7294: dbang po yul du bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:7295: thams cad ma lus ces pa gnyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor pa'i cha'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7296: yang na shes rab dbyings ma las //
NK079(dzu)004:7298: mngon du byung ba'i sbyor ba ste //
NK079(dzu)004:7299: yum byin gyis brlabs ste rol pa thabs kyis zin
NK079(dzu)004:7300: pa'i nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le gnas su zin
NK079(dzu)004:7301: pas +amo mum rtse mor sleb pas spras pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7302: yon tan rang bzhin gnyis dang lhag pa'i ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:7303: 'dzin gyi lha rnams dgyes pa chen po'i ros mnyes
NK079(dzu)004:7305: rtog tshogs ye shes kyi skur shar ba'i bde ba'i rtse mor skyes nas /
NK079(dzu)004:7306: slar gnas su drangs pas yi ge 'khor lo'i sa
NK079(dzu)004:7307: thob pa'i tshe ye shes bla ma'i sa'ang thob la
NK079(dzu)004:7308: rigs lnga dang rgyal ba drug pa'i sku'ang 'thob ste
NK079(dzu)004:7309: / sku gsum mngon du byas pa'i sbyor bas /
NK079(dzu)004:7310: phyir mi ldog pa chen po'i phyir sbyor sgrol dbyer med pa'i don to //
NK079(dzu)004:7311: gnyis ni go sla ris su lta ba bzlog pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7312: thams cad ma lus par bsgral ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7313: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7315: rang bzhin dang ting nge 'dzin thun mong du ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:7316: shin tu khro bo chen po yis zhes pa bzhi
NK079(dzu)004:7317: thabs kyis bsgral thabs sngon byung dang rjes 'jug tu
NK079(dzu)004:7318: 'grel to // thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:7320: mngon sum pa'i sgrol ba lam lnga zhing la bstims te bsgral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7321: ri rab chen po gling bzhi la zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7322: rang rig spyod yul lhar gsal ba'i gtso bo'i thugs
NK079(dzu)004:7323: ka'i ram las ye shes mes bsgral ba'i ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:7325: dbyings su yang ni btim par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:7327: mngon byung gi tshe chos nyid du ra ya kha
NK079(dzu)004:7328: gis bsgral nas shes pa mkhas la chos gsum gyis
NK079(dzu)004:7329: lhar bskyed / 'og min du 'phangs nas byang chub
NK079(dzu)004:7330: sems kyis dbang byin te rigs nges pa'i sras su
NK079(dzu)004:7331: lhar bskyed / bya ba'o // de ltar bsgral ba zhes pa gnyis kyis mi sogs par sten to //
NK079(dzu)004:7332: phung po lnga po bshigs pa las //
NK079(dzu)004:7336: bsgral bya rang rig ngo bo med pas bsgral lo
NK079(dzu)004:7337: ba'i zin chags med pa'i phyir bsgral tsam na bsgral
NK079(dzu)004:7338: rgyu med pa'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:7339: sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7340: bsgral bya mi dmigs pa's bsgral du med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7341: 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na //
NK079(dzu)004:7343: sgrol ba'i nges tshig du 'grel te /
NK079(dzu)004:7344: ma rangs pa'i sgras gang bsgral dris pa'i lan du
NK079(dzu)004:7345: phyin ci log gi bag chags rkyen gsum la goms
NK079(dzu)004:7346: pas yang dgas la bsgral ba la bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7347: bsgral ba nyid na spyod pa yod //
NK079(dzu)004:7349: sbyor sgrol tha med rang ngor ston pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7350: bdag gzhan du lta ba dgrol ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7351: ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7352: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7354: rang rigs par bye brag med par ngo bos blangs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7355: de rtogs pas thag bcad nas spyod pa bslangs la ma gos par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7356: ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang blangs te spyod yul dabye'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7357: spyod pa'i yon tan tshogs gnyis su gyur pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7358: thams cad ye nas stong pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:7359: zhes pa la sogs pa drug gsungs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7360: ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings zhes pa bzhi ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7361: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:7362: rang rig par gcig par rtogs pas blangs kyang bag
NK079(dzu)004:7363: chags mi sog ste spyod yul dag par 'gyur ro
NK079(dzu)004:7364: // ther drug nges par lta bas dgrol ba'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7365: rdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7366: ngo bo nyid dang dngos gzhi cir yang ma nges pa'i rdzun dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7368: don bzhi'i phyir spyad pa tshig gi rdzun du 'grel te go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7369: grub par bya ba'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7370: rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7371: thog ma med nas phyin ci log zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7372: rtsom pa med pa nas dngos po rtog pa ma
NK079(dzu)004:7373: grub bzhin nan gyis 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma gzhom pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:7374: ched du bden pa dbyer med du rtogs pa'i ye
NK079(dzu)004:7375: shes ni las dang ngo bos gnyen po ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7376: de bag chags lnga dang zhen pa gnyis bcom nas skye shi med pa'i sal 'god pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7377: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7379: rang gis bslad pas 'khor ba dag grol bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7380: ston pas gsungs pa'i bka' dam pa'i rgyud 'di lta bu nyon la /
NK079(dzu)004:7381: 'khor ba nyid sangs rgyas kyis yin pa'i don 'dris pas de bzhin du son par 'gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7382: rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7383: zhes pa la sogs pa bshad 'chad kyi dkor bdun
NK079(dzu)004:7384: gzhan nas mi 'byung ba'i phyir chos so cog gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:7385: su med pa sku dang ye shes su sangs rgyas
NK079(dzu)004:7386: pas mtha' dang bral ba'i don zin chags bral bar
NK079(dzu)004:7387: rig na rig pa de nyid brtan pas yon tan
NK079(dzu)004:7389: de nyid la yon tan no cog rdzogs par yod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7390: pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7393: dngos po gnyis kyi chos ril la yul dang shes pa tha dad ngang gis med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7394: dag pa chen po dpe pad+ma 'dra ba'ang /
NK079(dzu)004:7395: thams cad rang rig la rang rig mtha' las 'das pas rgyal ba'i zhing nyid yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7396: don rnams grub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7397: rdo rje rigs kyi thams cad bcom //
NK079(dzu)004:7399: rang 'byung gi ye shes nyid cig dang du ma
NK079(dzu)004:7400: las grol ba'i yon tan lnga'i phyir rigs lngar gsal
NK079(dzu)004:7401: bas / rigs kun tu'ang grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7402: de bas na 'bras bu lnga dang ye shes lnga'ang lhun gyis grub ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7403: sgyu 'phrul yon tan rgyas pa'i rgyud las /
NK079(dzu)004:7404: mi rtogs chos kyi me long gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:7405: gnyis su med par thams cad mnyam //
NK079(dzu)004:7406: sor sor rtog pa ma 'dres gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:7407: bya ba nan tan mthar phyin pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7408: mtha' gnyis bral bas stong pa che //
NK079(dzu)004:7410: de bas na don gnyis ma brtsal grub par mdzad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7411: ye shes drug pa'i nyid las 'bras bu lnga rnams gzhan na med par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7412: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs te //
NK079(dzu)004:7414: log rtog dang yang dag pa'i spyod yul du zhen
NK079(dzu)004:7415: pa gnyi ga bral bas rig pa mnyam pa'i dbyings
NK079(dzu)004:7416: su gsal ba ni spyod dam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7417: de'i 'bras bu skye 'jigs pa lnga'ang rang rig las gzhan nas mi 'byung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7418: rig pa rang byung ye shes nyid de dag tu rang shar ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7419: de dag rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7420: nor bdun chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7421: mthon dman kun gyis gzugs snang dang //
NK079(dzu)004:7424: dpe me long ltar rang rig pa'i cho 'phrul nyid
NK079(dzu)004:7425: sku sna tshogs kyi ngo bor yul med par shar
NK079(dzu)004:7426: ba'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7429: rgyal ba'i gsung lnga'i ngo bo nyid tshig gis mtshon
NK079(dzu)004:7430: pa las grol zhing byin rlabs kun la brda' mjal
NK079(dzu)004:7431: ba grags stong las grol bas brjod med pa brjod
NK079(dzu)004:7433: thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7434: zhes pa la sogs pa thugs 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:7435: ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas ma ltas na /
NK079(dzu)004:7436: chos so cog rgyu rkyen med par cir yang go mi 'gogs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7437: mtha' las 'das pa'i rig pa ngo bo nyid kyi
NK079(dzu)004:7438: rgyu de nyid byed pa po dang rgyu rkyen la
NK079(dzu)004:7439: rag ma lus par rang gsal yul las grol ba
NK079(dzu)004:7441: dngos med kun la dbang sgyur zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:7442: ngo de dkor ni rin po che //
NK079(dzu)004:7445: rang rig cir yang ma yin la cir yang snang
NK079(dzu)004:7446: ba 'bras bu gsum gyi bdag nyid du rtogs na
NK079(dzu)004:7447: / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin pas yon tan
NK079(dzu)004:7448: tshad med de spyod yul dag pas 'bras bu bsams
NK079(dzu)004:7449: bzhin 'phel 'grib med par snang ba la /
NK079(dzu)004:7450: bdud kyis kyang glan ka mi rnyed pa ni yang dag pa'i rin po che'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7451: thugs rje chen po byin rlabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:7453: byed pa nyid na chu zla ba'i tshul /
NK079(dzu)004:7455: 'phrin las bzhi lhun gyis grub pas cir yang 'dul
NK079(dzu)004:7456: bzhin snang ba'i rtsal ba med par don mdzad kyang
NK079(dzu)004:7457: / gzhi bya byed las grol bas rtog med du
NK079(dzu)004:7458: cir yang don mdzad pa la mi dgos pas 'phrin
NK079(dzu)004:7459: las 'gro 'ong med par don mdzad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7460: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:7462: de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yin //
NK079(dzu)004:7465: dbyings ye shes nyid du'ang 'dzin pa med pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7466: ma rtogs pa'i ye shes te /
NK079(dzu)004:7467: ye shes kyi grangs bsdus pa lngar brjod kyang ngo
NK079(dzu)004:7468: bo du ma las grol cig las kyang grol bar
NK079(dzu)004:7469: gsal rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so
NK079(dzu)004:7470: // kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7473: mtshan nyid kun khyab bkol med gzung ba las 'das pa 'di /
NK079(dzu)004:7474: mnyam pa'i dbyings te rig pa rang dbang du gyur
NK079(dzu)004:7475: pas de mngon du bya ba ni bsam pa'i yul
NK079(dzu)004:7476: las grol ba'o // shes par bya ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba lnga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7477: nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7478: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:7480: rang bzhin gyi rtags dang dpes rtogs par bya ba 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:7481: chos so cog de bzhin nyid kyiii nam mkhar gsal
NK079(dzu)004:7482: bas mtshan nyid brtag dka' ba nam mkha' lta bu
NK079(dzu)004:7483: de'i ngo bo ni rang rig pa'i nam mkha' 'o
NK079(dzu)004:7484: // rten byed sa chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7485: ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la //
NK079(dzu)004:7487: dpe sa gzhi lta bur theg pa chen po /
NK079(dzu)004:7488: gsang sngags nges pa'i lung gi ngo bo ni rgyal
NK079(dzu)004:7489: ba sems pa'i yul theg pa'i 'byung gnas te rgyud
NK079(dzu)004:7490: kyi che ba'o // sreg byed ye shes me bzhis bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7491: bdag med ye shes rang rig kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:7493: me lta bur ngo bo nyid kyi mngon du byas
NK079(dzu)004:7494: pa'i shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mes bag
NK079(dzu)004:7495: chags dang rtog pa phra rags ril sbyangs nas ye
NK079(dzu)004:7496: shes su gsal ba ni nang gi ha mo /
NK079(dzu)004:7497: thams cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7498: sems can ma lus thams cad ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7500: dag par bya ba ni 'khor ba'i sgrib pa cha 'phra ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7501: chu lta bu'i khrus ni gsum las 'byung ba'i lhag
NK079(dzu)004:7502: mthong gis sbyin sogs bcu dus gcig tu rdzogs shing
NK079(dzu)004:7503: sa bcu dus gcig non pa'i rig pas sa gsum
NK079(dzu)004:7504: thob pa'i sa gzhan rnams thun mong lam bcu dang
NK079(dzu)004:7505: 'bras bu la bstan pa ni khrus kyi dam pa
NK079(dzu)004:7507: g.yeng byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7508: sems can ye nas dag pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:7510: tha snyad du gtor bya ba rang bzhin dag pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:7511: don ma rtogs pa'i rtog drul de nyid rang rig
NK079(dzu)004:7512: pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa'i lta bas brlag par
NK079(dzu)004:7513: byas pas kun rdzob rlung gi las dang 'dra'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7514: dpe rlung gi mtshan nyid mi zin pa ltar /
NK079(dzu)004:7515: chos so cog ci yang yin pa yi yin pa'i don rig pa gdam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7516: thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7517: rang rig phyin ci ma log pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:7519: lta ba mtha' phyin pas ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba'i tshe /
NK079(dzu)004:7520: spyod yul rang rig tu gsal bas ci sbyong pa tshogs gnyis su 'gyur ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7521: cig car ba dang tshogs kyi spyod pa ste spros bcas thob pa'i spyod yul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:7522: shes bya 'dod yon lnga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7523: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7524: thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:7525: zhes pa la sogs pa rig pa snang la rang
NK079(dzu)004:7526: bzhin med pa nyid kun gyi gzhi'i phyir ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:7527: nyid snang la rang bzhin med pa ni chos kyi
NK079(dzu)004:7529: de'i byin rlabs dag ma dag cir yang snang ba'i dbyings /
NK079(dzu)004:7530: kha dog nyid rtog med kyi rig pa rang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7531: chos rnams thams cad sgra ltar shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7532: sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa'ang //
NK079(dzu)004:7534: sgra'i dpe ltar brjod med brjod pa kun 'byung gi
NK079(dzu)004:7535: ngo bo grags stong gral bar chos kun rig par
NK079(dzu)004:7536: gyis shig par gdam pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7537: sgra don gcig tha dad las grol bar bstan te /
NK079(dzu)004:7538: bsam pa'i dbang dang ngo bos phyes pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7539: chos rnams dri'i dam tshig tu shes pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7540: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:7542: chos so cog la ro'i ngo bo med pa las
NK079(dzu)004:7543: rang rig ror shar ba bro stong las grol bzhin
NK079(dzu)004:7544: rtogs pa'i shes yul phrad pas ro sna tshogs su
NK079(dzu)004:7545: grub pas ro dang lce'i shes par snang la /
NK079(dzu)004:7546: de nyid na bshad pa bzhin ma grub pa ni
NK079(dzu)004:7547: de nyid du'ang 'dod pa med pa'i don mtshan nyid
NK079(dzu)004:7549: chos thams cad reg bya ltar shes pa bzhin bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7550: gzugs rnams dbu ba brdos dang 'dra //
NK079(dzu)004:7552: gzugs snying po med pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7553: tshe rab skye 'jig can dang 'du shes med pa las mtshan mar byed pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7554: rnam shes rkyen bzhis skye ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7555: rgyu des 'du byed rdzab ltar las sna tshogs byed
NK079(dzu)004:7556: par skyes pa'i phung po lnga nyid dpe de nyid
NK079(dzu)004:7557: kyis mtha' las grol bar yang ston pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7558: reg tshogs ril reg stong las 'das pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7559: nyams su myong la ma chags pas tshogs gnyis dus
NK079(dzu)004:7560: cig tu rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dod lnga'i ngo bo rig
NK079(dzu)004:7562: des na lnga'ang rig pa'i ye shes nyid rang snang gi 'dod yon lnga'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7563: 'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7564: yang dag nyid la gnas bcas nas //
NK079(dzu)004:7566: lta ba ste rtogs nas gzhal bya 'byung ba phra rag sangs rgyas la /
NK079(dzu)004:7568: rtogs pa'i thabs re re la lnga lnga tshang bas
NK079(dzu)004:7569: gcig tu ma las grol ba'i chos nyid mthong ngo
NK079(dzu)004:7570: // 'dus ma byas kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7571: gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang //
NK079(dzu)004:7573: sangs rgyas sems can gyi sku gzugs //
NK079(dzu)004:7574: gzhi la tha dad med pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7575: rang rgyug bral ba'i ngo bo rang rig pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7576: de nyid mthon gzugs su snang ba ni snang ba
NK079(dzu)004:7577: dang po'i phyir chos sku ste mtshan nyid ma nges
NK079(dzu)004:7578: pa'i phyir don dam pa rgyu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7579: glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7581: bsgom lam dang po'i sems bcos thabs 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:7582: dper 'jig rten byis pa'i bya byed ltar skye bo
NK079(dzu)004:7583: pa che phra'ang rtog pa'i dus byed kyis g.yengs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:7585: rtsa ba'i skyon gyis rang bzhin gyi rgyu dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7586: rkyen gyis bslang ba rnams dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7588: shugs kyis snang ba'i skyon gyis rnal du ma phebs pa ni g.yeng ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7589: de bcos thabs ni yid kyi glang po klog dang 'dra bar 'gro ba de /
NK079(dzu)004:7590: thabs gsum gyis 'dogs pa las 'dir thag chod pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:7591: rgyus rnga rol du skyon shes pas skye ma thag
NK079(dzu)004:7592: shugs kyis ngos zin pas de nyid lhag mthong gsal
NK079(dzu)004:7593: ba'i stobs kyis me la shing bsnan pa ltar mnyam
NK079(dzu)004:7594: par gsal bas mi ldang ba'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7595: dman pas dran ma thag rtsad bcad pas ngo bo shes pas mi ldang ba'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:7596: thabs kyis lam bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7597: dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7598: chos rnams thams cad skye med pas //
NK079(dzu)004:7599: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7600: bdag gis bstan par mi nus kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:7601: rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma nyid las /
NK079(dzu)004:7602: dbang lnga rang la mngon rdzogs par //
NK079(dzu)004:7603: kun tu rgyal ba nyid kyi bshad //
NK079(dzu)004:7604: rang rig lhun grub bzhi bral ba //
NK079(dzu)004:7605: ngo bo gzung rka gdod nas brtan //
NK079(dzu)004:7606: de phyir de la snang bar 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:7607: sems kyi ye shes bzhi bral ba //
NK079(dzu)004:7608: ye nas min phyir thams cad mkhyen //
NK079(dzu)004:7609: chos kun rang rig dbyer med pas //
NK079(dzu)004:7610: blang dor med pas kun spyod phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7611: khu ba brgyud pas snang bar 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:7612: theg chen don gnyis lhun grub phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7613: bdag gzhan don dbang lnga thob 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:7614: byas la zin chags bral ba mchog /dbang bcu bdag la rdzogs pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7615: thabs kyis slod pa'ang rigs par 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:7616: lnga'i rim pa bzlog brtsams pas //
NK079(dzu)004:7617: mngon rdzogs sa la gdon mi za //
NK079(dzu)004:7618: thabs chen theg pa breg pa'i mchog /zhes gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7619: thams cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7622: ril rang 'byung ye shes pas ngo bo gzung rka
NK079(dzu)004:7623: ba nyid thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:7624: nyid kyi rgyu'o // rgyu de blos reg dka' ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7625: yul med pas dag pa'i zhing las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:7626: chos rnams dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7628: grub mthas ma bsgyur blo la lta spyod gnyi ga'i gdam pa ste go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7629: thams cad 'jig byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7630: shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:7631: zhes pa la sogs pa mthong lam gyi rgyu so
NK079(dzu)004:7632: sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis don tshol ba ste
NK079(dzu)004:7633: snang stong mtha' las grol bar rtogs pa dngos po
NK079(dzu)004:7634: gnyis bshig pa'o // g.yu rung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7635: chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas //
NK079(dzu)004:7637: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis skye 'jig bral ba la gsad bya med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7639: ji lta bar rtogs na skye shi bardo'ang 'pho 'gyur
NK079(dzu)004:7640: med pa kho na ste ngo bo dang lam gnyi
NK079(dzu)004:7641: ga ste / mthong lam yan chad kyi yul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:7642: thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7643: zhes pas spyod pa blang dor med pa ste go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7644: thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7645: thams cad kun tu bzang po yis //
NK079(dzu)004:7647: spyod pa cir yang rim pas spyod lam khyad par bsgoms lam bzhi pa'i spyod pa ste go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7648: thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7650: lta ba dman pa sa bcu bzhi'i mnyam pa'i don
NK079(dzu)004:7651: mi rtogs pas ngo bo nyid kyi phrag dog go
NK079(dzu)004:7652: // spyod pas dman pa gnyis la gsang ba'i thabs kyi phrag dog ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7654: thams cad bsrung du med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7656: gzhi ril snying po byang chub kyi /
NK079(dzu)004:7657: rang la gnyis med pa'i bya byed ci'ang med pa ngo bo nyid kyi rlung ngo //
NK079(dzu)004:7658: 'dir rlung gsum ldan pa'i skyes mchog la ril tha
NK079(dzu)004:7659: dad med cing dag mnyam gsum bzhir gnas pas bsdom
NK079(dzu)004:7660: bsrung med pa skal ba mchog gi yul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:7661: thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7665: 'dir skye bo pa'i le lo gnyis dang bral ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:7666: mis bdag nyid gdod nas grol bas 'dzin pa med
NK079(dzu)004:7667: pa'i phyir che chung dang bral ba'i ngang las mi
NK079(dzu)004:7668: mnyam par bya ba dang po'i rgyun gyi ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:7671: blo dang spyod pa rtsing po la /
NK079(dzu)004:7672: 'di dang phyi ma'i nyen bstan pas bsrung bar bskul ba ste go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7673: dam rdzas so sor sbyang nas bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7676: phyag brgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi che rigs phye la bsten pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7677: spyir dang du blangs te bza' ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7678: de ltar bsams te spyod dam /
NK079(dzu)004:7679: yang na mi rtogs pas rol te lam gyi skabs bsgyur la spyod do //
NK079(dzu)004:7680: ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7681: ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom //
NK079(dzu)004:7682: de nas 'khor lo rnam par bsam //
NK079(dzu)004:7683: zhes pa la sogs pa rim gyis 'jug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7684: yang na cig char bsgom par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:7685: thams cad rang rig phyag rgya che //
NK079(dzu)004:7688: bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun //
NK079(dzu)004:7690: gsum gyis rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyar 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:7691: de'i phyir yi dam lha'i skur 'khor dang bcas pa don du gnyer ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7693: lha spangs pa'i skyon du 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:7695: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas //
NK079(dzu)004:7696: zhes pa la sogs pa bsgom pa'i tshul 'chad do //
NK079(dzu)004:7697: sku rang rig snang bas mtha' gnyis las grol bar bsgom zhing sku gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7698: de'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7699: lha'i sku ni gsal bsgoms pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7701: 'bras bur sku lnga thob par 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:7702: gzhan nyams su blangs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7704: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcod pa'i don ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7706: de nyid dus kyi rgyun du bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7707: yon tan gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7708: ngo bo dang las dus byad par mnyam pa nyid
NK079(dzu)004:7709: las mi 'da' ba de dag gsum sgrib pa 'joms
NK079(dzu)004:7710: pa'i phyir nges tshig 'grub pa dang du blang ngo
NK079(dzu)004:7711: // yang dag don chen rlung 'dod pas //
NK079(dzu)004:7713: dus kyi rgyun du brtson pa bskyed pa'i yon tan
NK079(dzu)004:7714: dang thabs ni phyag rgya cho ga'i yan lag gis
NK079(dzu)004:7715: bskyed de / sngags bden pa gsum pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa sa bon byas te bzlas so //
NK079(dzu)004:7716: rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7718: bla ma la bsdus pa'i yon tan brgyad yod pa'i phyir bkur ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7719: de sgo gsum gyis mnyes par bya ba'i yon tan du 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:7720: rdo rje mched dang lcam dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7722: spun yin pa'i gtan tshigs dang bkur thabs dang nyes skyon du 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:7723: gsang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7724: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni zhes pa la
NK079(dzu)004:7725: sogs pa rang bzhin gyi gsang ba dpe gnyis kyis
NK079(dzu)004:7726: mtshon pa ste / de'i phyir phal gyis go bar dka' bas gsang ba'i dgos ched dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7727: nyes pas don du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gsang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7728: sgo kun la mkhas pas gsang ba spel thabs chud mi gsan par byas pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7730: de dag brda' phrad slab dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7731: yi ge mngas pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ma bkod de /
NK079(dzu)004:7732: zhib tu ni sgyu 'phrul chen po'i slob dpon 'bu ta ku ga ta'i trika lam 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:7733: dang du blang dang mi blang ba //
NK079(dzu)004:7734: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu sbyar //
NK079(dzu)004:7736: yan lag bcu nyid 'dir rtsa ba bcur bstan pa de lam pa yongs kyis spyad pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7737: las su rung mi rtog pa rnyed pa'i dngos grub rtsa ba bco lnga'i le'u las bstan zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:7739: yang na dam tshig 'di lta bu zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:7741: rtogs pas gang ltar spyod kyang mi nyams pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7742: ma nor ba'i blo can gyis spyod lam du mi 'bral bar bya bar gdams pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7743: lta ba'i gdam ngag bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7744: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:7746: blo'i gting du sbos zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7747: dpe gsum gyi sgo nas rtog pa gsum gyi zin
NK079(dzu)004:7748: chags med par rig pa rang gsal du gyis shig
NK079(dzu)004:7750: rdeng can du byas te btsa' bar gdam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7751: rdo rje zhes pa dag gis skyon ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:7752: mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu //
NK079(dzu)004:7753: zhes pa ngo bos mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid ci'ang ma yin pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7754: de rtog pa dang 'dzin rtog las grol ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7756: ci la'ang mi gnas kun la spyod //
NK079(dzu)004:7757: zhes pa dag 'dzin rtog med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7758: blang dor med par spyad la /
NK079(dzu)004:7759: yul dang yul can med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7760: de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7763: cig char ba dang bsgom lam tha ma'i yul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:7764: de dag gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7765: rgyu'i theg pa'i rigs gsum dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7766: lha mi'i theg pa rnams dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7767: mi spang ba nyams bas ngan 'gro'i rgyu dang rigs sgra ji lta ba nyid de go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7768: lta ba tha dad par snang ba'i gzhi sems kyi de kho na nyid la snang ba /
NK079(dzu)004:7769: gang gi yul yin pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7770: theg mchog mtho dman thams cad dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7772: shes rab chen po'i dmig lta ba //
NK079(dzu)004:7774: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas gzhi ci'ang ma yin pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:7775: theg pa mtho dman dang 'gro ba drug so sor /
NK079(dzu)004:7776: rtsol ba dang sdug bsngal gyi kha 'khor bar gzigs te /
NK079(dzu)004:7777: 'di nyid kyi lta ba'i che ba ma 'dres par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:7778: 'o na gzhan las spags pa'i lta ba ji lta bu snyams pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:7779: sngags mchog bla na med pas ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7782: theg pa chen po bas snang stong reg 'jog gi lta ba gang du yang mi lnga ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7784: lta ba so sor ji snyed pa //
NK079(dzu)004:7785: tha snyad tsam las spang blang med pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7786: tshig tu mi brjod don du tha dad par mi bsam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:7787: spyir ni log rtog zhes pa la sogs go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7788: kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang zhes pa nas gnyi ga med zhes pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7789: ya cha bas mi 'grub pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7790: dbu ma dang yo ga khyi pa lta ba mnyam
NK079(dzu)004:7791: par smra yang spyod pa blang dor med pas ya
NK079(dzu)004:7792: cha'o // mu stegs dag spyod pa blang po byed kyang lta ba yo ga ste ya cha'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7793: nyan thos rang rgyal ba la lta spyod zab mo gnyi ga med de /
NK079(dzu)004:7795: de bas na ma nor ba'i lta spyod ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7796: yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:7798: theg pa chen po gnyis kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7799: bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7803: man ngag las theg pa chen dman pa sgyu ma smig rgyu'i tshul /
NK079(dzu)004:7804: dge sdig las kyang spong dang len par byed //
NK079(dzu)004:7805: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i lam yang spun //
NK079(dzu)004:7806: rang bzhin don dam skye 'gag med pa ste //
NK079(dzu)004:7807: ci yang mi 'dod pa nyid skyon mi 'dod //
NK079(dzu)004:7808: de ni 'khrul pa yin pas btub ma yin //
NK079(dzu)004:7810: thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7814: 'dir bden pa gnyis ming tsam gyis phye yang re mos med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7815: rgyu dge sdig dang 'bras bu 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7816: don dam pa chen por tha mi dad pa lta ci smos kyi /
NK079(dzu)004:7817: kun rdzob nyid du yang sku dang ye shes su yang sangs rgyas pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7818: spong len mi byed pas 'phags so //
NK079(dzu)004:7819: de bas na bden pa gnyis kyang sgra gcig kyang don tha dad pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7820: thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7822: ltos pa'i bla na med pa'i theg pa dbu ma'i
NK079(dzu)004:7823: bden pa gnyis las lhag pa don dam pa skye
NK079(dzu)004:7824: med zang ma ma yin pas bshad pa'i dkor bdun
NK079(dzu)004:7826: kun rdzob bdun ni sku dang ye shes su mnyam
NK079(dzu)004:7827: par rdzogs par rang rig pa las ma g.yos pa
NK079(dzu)004:7828: lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7829: mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin //
NK079(dzu)004:7831: de bas na theg pa chen po bden gnyis med
NK079(dzu)004:7832: par las snang ba bsal mi dgos par spyod yul
NK079(dzu)004:7833: dag pa'i phyir / thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag /zhes pa bzhi gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7834: de'i phyir thabs dang grol lam gnyi ga'i lta spyod grub pa'i mthas dpags te che bar bzhugs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7835: de lta bu la dus deng sang gi gsang sngags
NK079(dzu)004:7836: ba rgyu la kha lce byang ba bdag thabs la
NK079(dzu)004:7837: ni khyad par can gyi lta ba dang grub pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:7838: mtha' mnyam mo zhes smra ba sha stag 'byung ste
NK079(dzu)004:7839: / de dag ni rang gi tshig gis 'gal te /
NK079(dzu)004:7840: gnyis mnyam na thabs kyi khyad par ci zhig dgos te don med do //
NK079(dzu)004:7841: de bas na de dag rgyal dmangs su babs pa lta bu'i phyir shin tu gol te mdongs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7842: grub par bya ba'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:7843: dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las //
NK079(dzu)004:7844: rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa yi //
NK079(dzu)004:7846: rtsa ba bco lnga mdor bshad pa'i le'u las /
NK079(dzu)004:7847: rigs kyi bdag po rgyal ba drug par 'dus te /
NK079(dzu)004:7848: de nyid gcig tu ma las grol ba'i yon tan cha lnga rigs lngar snang ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7849: ye shes drug po nyid skye 'jig med cing sgrib pa'i phung po 'joms pa'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7850: lhun grub nyid yon tan cir yang snang ba 'phel 'grib med pa'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7851: de nyid yul shes med pas bag chags kyis bdag gzhan gyis ma gos pa'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7852: bya ba rtsal med par las zhes don gnyis grub
NK079(dzu)004:7853: pa dang ji bzhin par son pa'i phyir rigs lnga
NK079(dzu)004:7854: ste / ci kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin //
NK079(dzu)004:7855: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7856: shes par bya ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba lnga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7857: snang srid ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:7858: zhes pa nas bshad zhen pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7859: rang rig pa cir yang ma 'gags pa ngo bo nyid kyi me ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7860: las mtha' gdod nas bsregs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7861: de rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi me //
NK079(dzu)004:7862: goms pa ting nge 'dzin gyi me //
NK079(dzu)004:7863: sgrib pa bsregs pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:7864: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:7866: chos so cog ngang gis rang rig par sdud pa'i las so //
NK079(dzu)004:7867: cir yang snang bas mnyes zhing rgyun dang bral bar mi rtag pa med pa mtshan nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:7868: des rtog tshogs kyi sdug bsngal dag pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7869: ye shes kyi chu gsum gong gi rjes su mthun par sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:7870: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:7872: chos so cog cir snang yang rang gi ngo bo gzung du med pa rlung gi mtshan nyid /
NK079(dzu)004:7873: ngo bo nyid skad cig mas cir yang mi gnas
NK079(dzu)004:7874: par thams cad du snang zhing sgra brjod mi 'gog
NK079(dzu)004:7875: pa las te chen po ni ye shes kyi rlung
NK079(dzu)004:7876: 'dod pa de ltar shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7877: dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams la //
NK079(dzu)004:7879: rang 'byung ye shes chos so cog gi mtshan nyid dam ngo bo skye 'jig med pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7881: sa dngos po nyid kyi ngo bo de lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7882: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:7885: chos so cog ma bcos pa'i skad cig mas //
NK079(dzu)004:7886: go phyes nas rang snang ba las so //
NK079(dzu)004:7887: ngo bo med par rang gsal bas //
NK079(dzu)004:7888: stong pa chen por gcig pas mtshan nyid ste //
NK079(dzu)004:7889: nam mkha' chen por shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7890: de bas na gsang sngags mtshon pa'i sgor ma gyur
NK079(dzu)004:7891: pa med pas kun kyang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud
NK079(dzu)004:7893: de nyid kyi rjes su bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7894: nyon mongs pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7896: thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7898: ngo bo nyon rigs pa rang snang la /
NK079(dzu)004:7899: phyin ci log lnga ming med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7900: ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga yin pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7901: ma rig pa dang nyon mongs pa ka nas dag pa nyid rtogs na /
NK079(dzu)004:7902: ma nor ba'i lam nyid yin la /
NK079(dzu)004:7903: ma rtogs na sgo lngar ltung bas /
NK079(dzu)004:7904: shes rab gsum gyis rdeng chud nas bsgoms shig par spyir gdams pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7905: 'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:7906: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa ru skye //
NK079(dzu)004:7907: zhes pa log pa'i 'dod chags nyid mtha' gsum las 'das pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7908: thams cad kyang bden pa gnyis med du gsal bas yang dag pa'i 'dod chags ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7909: yul med pa shin tu chags pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7910: de ltar shes pa'i 'bras bu go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7911: zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7913: zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin //
NK079(dzu)004:7915: khyad par gyi sgras log pa zhe sdang mtha' las
NK079(dzu)004:7916: grol bar rtogs pa yang dag pa'i zhe sdang gi
NK079(dzu)004:7918: log rtog gi lta ba dang zhe sdang rang kham gnyis su 'joms pas rdo rje'i rigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7919: de bas na rtogs pa yang dag zhe sdang thugs
NK079(dzu)004:7920: rje chen po la ma rtogs pas rang khar mthong
NK079(dzu)004:7921: ba 'khrul te / gti mug rmongs pas zhes brjod pas zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:7922: de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7924: skye bo pa'i ma rigs par brjod pa nyid /
NK079(dzu)004:7925: chos so cog bden pa gnyis gar dbyer med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7926: de nyid ye shes gsal ba la spyod yul du 'byed pa med pa ni ngo bo nyid do //
NK079(dzu)004:7927: de mthong ba ni lta ba'i gti mug ste //
NK079(dzu)004:7928: de nyid du son pas 'bras bu de bzhin rigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:7929: nga rgyal gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7931: de bzhin yang dag shes par byos //
NK079(dzu)004:7933: tha mal ba'i nga rgyal ma spangs dag pa'i don
NK079(dzu)004:7934: la gnas pas spang len bral bar rtogs pas yul
NK079(dzu)004:7935: gnyis zil gyis gnon cing spags pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7937: ngo bo gnyis med par rtogs pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7939: phrag dog mtshan nyid brjod pa ni zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:7940: de nyid shes pas las dbang 'grub zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7941: log rtog gi 'phrag dog mtshan nyid ma grub par shes pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7942: log lta mi chung bas nges tshig 'grub ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7943: de spyod pas kyang snod med la mi bstan pas /
NK079(dzu)004:7944: log rtogs gi dog pa las sbags te dog yangs
NK079(dzu)004:7945: med par lhun gyis rdzogs pas las kyi rigs kyang
NK079(dzu)004:7946: 'grub pa'o // shes bya phung po lnga bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7947: phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7949: ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:7951: lnga phung log pa'i kun rdzob tu rang gi bya
NK079(dzu)004:7952: byed cing yul gnyis nyams su myong ba de nyid
NK079(dzu)004:7953: / rang gi lo rgyus mtshan nyid kyis gzhal bas
NK079(dzu)004:7954: don dam par snang la ma grub pas bden gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:7955: dbyer med pa'i mtha' gsum las 'das pa'i don la
NK079(dzu)004:7956: zhen pa log na 'khor ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7957: ma rtogs pa'i skyon gyis bstan pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:7958: shes pa la bskul ba'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:7959: re re nas rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:7960: de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7961: snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med //
NK079(dzu)004:7963: gzugs tha mal pa kun rdzob tu rang spyi'i mtshan nyid du snang tsam na /
NK079(dzu)004:7964: don dam par rang rig mtha' las grol ba ni rgyu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7965: de gnyis dbyer med pa ma nor ba'i lam yang yin la /
NK079(dzu)004:7966: ye shes kyi sku'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'ang yin par shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7967: tshar ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi //
NK079(dzu)004:7969: tha mal pa'i tshor ba dang bde sdug gnyi ga ma yin pa nyid na /
NK079(dzu)004:7970: tshor stong las grol bar rtogs pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:7971: stong pa'i go cha can te bdud kyi klag ka mi rnyed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7972: 'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:7974: rang gi mtshan nyi rgya che ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7975: yul tshad med pas yul kun la mtshan mar byed bzhin na mtshan stong dbyer med par rtogs na /
NK079(dzu)004:7976: ye shes kyi 'du shes yin pas rig par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7977: 'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas rtsa ba brgyad po glang 'gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:7979: 'du byed kyi rtsa ba sems rnam par shes pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:7980: tshogs brgyad las byung ba'i ngo bo lnga bcu rtsa
NK079(dzu)004:7981: gnyis kyi bo bal skye ba nyid dang /
NK079(dzu)004:7982: ngo bo ma grub pas gzhil med kyang log rtog
NK079(dzu)004:7983: can la snang bas 'khor ba nyid kyi don ji
NK079(dzu)004:7984: ltar bar rtogs pa rnal 'byor pas brtags pa rtsa
NK079(dzu)004:7985: ba shes pa nyid ji bzhin pa yin pas tshogs
NK079(dzu)004:7986: brgyad skye ba'i skad gcig ma'i rgyun 'chad pa ltar
NK079(dzu)004:7987: ye shes lngar dag pas chos nyid dang dbyer med
NK079(dzu)004:7988: par 'du byed kyang 'byung yang sprul sku'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7989: kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te //
NK079(dzu)004:7991: de ni ye shes chen po yin zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:7992: 'du byed du chos kun gyi rtsa ba sems la
NK079(dzu)004:7993: ngo bo gang yang med par cir yang snang ba
NK079(dzu)004:7994: las mtho ris ngan song skye bar snang ba rig
NK079(dzu)004:7995: ma rig gi khyad par te /
NK079(dzu)004:7996: ngo bo la skye ba mang pas tshogs bzhi'i shes pa nyid rtogs na ye shes drug pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:7997: kha dog lnga'i dam tshig ni zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:7998: nag por bstan zhes pa spyi'i dgos ched do //
NK079(dzu)004:7999: so so nas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8000: chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8002: kha dog gis mthas gtugs pa'i bar du cig gis chod par 'grel te /
NK079(dzu)004:8003: rang rig pa mi gnas pa'i ye shes nyid mtha' rnams ngang gi dag dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8004: chags pa'i spyod yul grol ba'i chags chen dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8006: ril yang dag pa'i sa la bkod zin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8007: ngo bo nyid rtags pa chen po rnams mtshon pa'i phyir dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8008: de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir kha dog lngar bstan te /
NK079(dzu)004:8009: rig pa rang snang ba'i kha dog de ltar shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8010: rigs kyi sku mdog gi yang don to //
NK079(dzu)004:8011: phyogs lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni zhes pa nas /
NK079(dzu)004:8012: phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya //
NK079(dzu)004:8014: phyogs spyir bstan pa'i dgos par 'dren to //
NK079(dzu)004:8015: sems nyid ma rig mdongs pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:8018: sems nyid phyogs lnga'i rngos gzhi rang snang bas rbog
NK079(dzu)004:8019: gos ched lnga'i phyir rang rig pa gdod nas gsal
NK079(dzu)004:8020: ba dang / sgrib pa nub pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8021: bdag 'dzin nyon mongs byang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8022: des na yon tan rdzogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8023: kun lhun gyis grub pa'i thig ler gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'dres pas phyogs te /
NK079(dzu)004:8024: de ltar rtogs pas de ltar gyur pa shes pa'i mtshan nyid lnga'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8025: don de nyid la zhen blos ris su bzung na 'byam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8026: dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8028: nges tshig dang zhen pa'i skyon du 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:8029: gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad kun /
NK079(dzu)004:8030: snang zhing dngos po med pa dang //
NK079(dzu)004:8032: dbang po mthar thug gi bar du 'dod yon dbang
NK079(dzu)004:8033: po lnga'i yul du snang ba nyid na mtha' las
NK079(dzu)004:8034: grol bzhin rang rig ma 'gags rang snang ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:8036: de nyid dam 'dod yon lnga'i lhar gsal bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8037: dbang yul phrad pa de nyid kyi sbyor sgrol te longs spyod chen por rig par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8038: mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8039: spyod yul rang khar gyur pa'i skyon dang tshogs kyi spyod pa'i don du 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:8040: mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8041: zhes pa dag rnams grangs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8042: de la don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8044: chos so cog de kho na nyid yin pa'i yon
NK079(dzu)004:8045: tan cha re'i tshul nas rnam grangs kyi don dam
NK079(dzu)004:8046: par sangs rgyas pa'i tha snyad nyid las kyang grol
NK079(dzu)004:8047: te / mtshan nyid gang yang ma spangs pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8048: gang du'ang gzung du med pa nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8049: kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8051: log pa'i kun rdzob skye la bden par snang ba nyid na /
NK079(dzu)004:8052: rang rig pa'i gzugs brnyan yin pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8053: lha'i dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas pas 'gro don byed
NK079(dzu)004:8054: pa nyid snang la rang bzhin med par mnyam pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:8055: // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med par mnyam pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8056: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:8058: rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa'i cho 'phrul cir yang shar tsam na /
NK079(dzu)004:8059: ngo bo med pas gnyi ga ma spangs bral bar bye brag med pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8060: 'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8061: sa chu me rlung nam mkhar las //
NK079(dzu)004:8063: 'byung ba lnga rgyu nas dag pa'i phyir 'byung ba
NK079(dzu)004:8064: la las gyur pa dang bcas pa rang rgyud med
NK079(dzu)004:8065: par rang rig pa lhun gyis grub pa ngang gi
NK079(dzu)004:8066: sa lngar snang bas lnga'i 'phra rags yab yum du
NK079(dzu)004:8067: sangs rgyas pas spang blang ye bral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8068: rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8069: rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa //
NK079(dzu)004:8071: tshogs brgyad ka'i rang bzhin dran stong las grol ba'i rig pa gsal ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8072: rang bzhin med pa'i rnam par shes pa tshogs dgu ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8073: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ste kun gzhi'i rgyu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8074: gzhan kun gzhi bag chags kyi gzung 'dzin dang bral bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8075: rang rig gsal la rtog pa med phyir me long lta bu ye yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8076: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kun la bdag tu rtog pa nyid na /
NK079(dzu)004:8077: zhen pa'i spyod yul las grol phyir blang dor che chung med pa'i ngo bo yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8078: yid kyi rnam shes spyi dang khyad par gyi yul gsal ba nyid na /
NK079(dzu)004:8079: ngo bo rang rig spyod yul med par /
NK079(dzu)004:8080: zhen pa dag pa'i ye shes rang spyi dus cig tu gsal ba yin pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8081: sgo lnga blun pa'i shes pa yul so so la
NK079(dzu)004:8082: dmigs pa'i nyid ngang gis mtha' las 'das pas bya
NK079(dzu)004:8083: ba thams cad dus cig tu rdzogs pa'i ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:8084: su byas pa med par gsal ba ni mnyam pa
NK079(dzu)004:8085: lnga'o // de bas na chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun /
NK079(dzu)004:8087: sgo lnga yul dang bcas pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin pas go rims bsgyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8089: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8092: dang po gsum gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8093: rang bzhin nyid kyi nges tshig tu 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:8094: yang gsum gyis lhag pa gnyis dang gzugs brnyan dang
NK079(dzu)004:8095: rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i nges tshig tu
NK079(dzu)004:8096: 'grel to // tha ma gnyis rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nges tshig tu 'grel te /
NK079(dzu)004:8097: tshogs kyang dbu mar bshad do //
NK079(dzu)004:8098: tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8099: thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cig /zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8100: khyad par du'ang spros bcas thob pa tshogs bsgrub pa'i yul du 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:8101: dang po bzhis yon tan ston pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8102: grol lam du 'dod yon lnga snang stong dang grags stong dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8105: reg stong grol ba'i lta bas zin chags med par mchod pa stobs na tshogs gnyis 'grub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8106: yo byad lnga'i dbang du a li ka li'i yo
NK079(dzu)004:8107: byad thabs shes rab kyi sa bon gnyis 'dres pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8108: sa gar thabs kyis mchod pa'i yon tan no //
NK079(dzu)004:8109: 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang //
NK079(dzu)004:8111: gzugs ril lha yab bam 'dod yon lha mor brlabs la dbul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:8112: thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8113: sgra ril mtshan nyid grags stong gnyis su med pas
NK079(dzu)004:8114: gdul bya gnyis la 'tsham pa bzhin du go mjal
NK079(dzu)004:8115: du chos ston pa'ang yin la tshogs gnyis su'ang 'gyur
NK079(dzu)004:8116: bas sgra'i lha mor yang dbul ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8117: chos nyid dngos po med pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:8118: dri yi mchog tu tshim byed pa //
NK079(dzu)004:8120: dri nyid mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8121: ye shes kyi dris zer ba bskul zhing ngan song sbyong ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8123: dri'i lha mor yang dbul lo //
NK079(dzu)004:8124: bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus la /
NK079(dzu)004:8125: bde ba'i ro yis tshim par 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:8127: ro'i lha mor phul bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8128: ye shes kyi ro'i byin rlabs bkres skom sel ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8130: rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:8132: bsgom lam tha ma las su rung bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8133: gos rgyan gyi reg bya reg gi lha mor phul bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8134: lus la me dpung 'bar ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8135: sngo bas mi thub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8136: yang na 'dod yon lnga nyid rtsa ba nyid rgyud
NK079(dzu)004:8137: kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'i yo byad lnga'i don 'bras
NK079(dzu)004:8138: bu dang bcas par sbyor ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8139: tshogs kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8140: bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8142: spros bcas kyi ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pas tshogs bsgrub pa'i tshe las bzhi bya ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8143: ci la yang zin chags spong len med par spyod pa'i tshe /
NK079(dzu)004:8144: spyod pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhi dus
NK079(dzu)004:8145: cig tu 'grub pas lhun gyis grub pa yang yin
NK079(dzu)004:8146: te / gang la'ang longs spyod du mdzad la bsgom pa med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8147: dbyings su bsdu bas dkyil 'khor yin te zhes pa gnyis nges tshig ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8148: tshogs kyi longs spyod ril rig pa mnyam pa'i dbyings
NK079(dzu)004:8149: su dbyer med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:8151: de nyid rang bzhin gyi tshogs chen po'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8152: mnyam pa chen po zhes pa gnyis gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8153: 'khor gyi 'phra men tshim byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8155: rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u bco lnga pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8156: nyi shu pa'i lhag ma'i lha mchog de tshim par bya ba'i thabs ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8157: bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu //
NK079(dzu)004:8159: bdag rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bas lhag ma'i snod du khro bo'i gzhal yas khang bskyed de /
NK079(dzu)004:8160: 'khor gyi sgom yan chad bskyed de /
NK079(dzu)004:8161: rtsa ba'i sngags 'tshang bar brjod la sku phyag rgya gsal bar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8164: ta ka'i phyag rgya bcas la sngags brjod de dbang
NK079(dzu)004:8165: phyug ma 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la sogs
NK079(dzu)004:8167: rang rang gdan thog tu phyogs kyi grangs nges par bzhag go //
NK079(dzu)004:8168: dbang du bsdu dang bsgo ba'i thabs //
NK079(dzu)004:8170: rta gdong gi sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8171: khyu gshogs gi sngags dang phyag rgyas srog dang ldan
NK079(dzu)004:8172: par brtsams pas dbang du bsdus te zil gyis gnon
NK079(dzu)004:8173: no // de nas dam rdzas gsang ba'i longs spyod kyis tshul bzhin du mchod pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8174: las kyi dbang byin te las bsgo ba byas te /
NK079(dzu)004:8175: las la dkyil rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la lhag ma'i mchod sbyin bsdu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8176: gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:8178: gtor ma nyid rang rig pa longs spyod thams cad kyi bdag nyid pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8179: 'dod yon la sogs pa ci 'dod pa 'byung bar bsams la gtor ma brtsams pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8180: de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8181: de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8182: zhes pa la sogs par bsngo ba'i yan chad rdzogs pa'i rjes su /
NK079(dzu)004:8183: dkyil 'khor bla mas gong nas bzung ba gsal btab la /
NK079(dzu)004:8184: dkyil 'khor phyi nas rim bzhin bsdu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8185: bdag kyang rim bzhin ma dmigs pa las lhar bskyed de go bgo lus bsrung dbang bskur bshags pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8186: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8187: rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8188: 'bras bu'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8189: de ltar bsgrub pa'i ngang 'chang bas //
NK079(dzu)004:8190: ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8192: bskal pa mchog gis gzhung bzhin bsgrubs nas tshogs la spyad pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8193: 'di nyid la tshe'i rig 'dzin thob bo //
NK079(dzu)004:8194: brtson pa chung ngu zhig na /
NK079(dzu)004:8195: tshe gsum las mi thogs par 'grub ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8196: de'i phyi mar 'di nyid kyi rgyus dman pa'i theg pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8197: ngan song brgyad du mi skye bar gsang sngags spyad
NK079(dzu)004:8198: pas yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas 'pho 'gyur med pa
NK079(dzu)004:8200: lam las su ma rung bar 'pho na 'da' ka'i
NK079(dzu)004:8201: ting nge 'dzin yang mi 'dod pa yin te des
NK079(dzu)004:8202: sbyor ba skabs dang sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8203: des 'gro don byed pa'i tshul ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8204: sangs rgyas zhing yang sbyong bar byed //
NK079(dzu)004:8207: bdag gzhan gyi bsgrub bya rdzogs pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8208: mthar phyin pa nyid kyi tshe na /
NK079(dzu)004:8210: le'u nyer dgu pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8211: lam dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8212: le'u sum cu pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8213: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba snying po
NK079(dzu)004:8214: de kho na nyid nges pa las 'di gsungs so
NK079(dzu)004:8216: ched gang gi phyir zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:8217: bdag dang rdo rje sems dpa' ngo bos mi phyed
NK079(dzu)004:8218: pas rang rig pa'i mngon sum du mthong ba bdun
NK079(dzu)004:8219: gyi don bstan pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8220: mthong ba dang bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8221: kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:8222: thams cad mi g.yor sgyu ma'i tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:8224: lta spyod mthun pas zhal mthong yin //
NK079(dzu)004:8226: rang rig pa nyid kyi cho 'phrul bye brag gi chos cir yang snang la /
NK079(dzu)004:8227: rang bzhin med pa ye shes sgyu ma ther zug bral ba ni lhag pa'i kun rdzob bo //
NK079(dzu)004:8228: des na chos sa cig 'gro 'ong med par rang
NK079(dzu)004:8229: rig snang ba nyid yul dang bral bar rtogs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8230: rig pa / rgyu rkyen bral bas ye shes skad cig ma'i rgyun med pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8231: de nyid gnyis su med pa de bzhin nyid yin pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8232: mi phyed 'joms pa mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8233: de nyid rdo rje sems pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8234: don mthong ba de rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnal
NK079(dzu)004:8235: 'byor pa lta spyod gcig pas zhal mthong ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8237: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag zhing chos dbyings dag dang dbyer med pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:8239: de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8240: bdag nyid gdod nas ming tsam las ngo bo ci yang min pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8241: chos ji bzhin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8242: tha mi dad pas thams cad sems nyid du cig pa'i /
NK079(dzu)004:8243: don spyod yul med par rig pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8244: don dam pa mthong ba'i spyan dang ldan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8245: rig pa de nyid rdo rje lta bur mtshan nyid gnyis su gsal mi g.yo bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8246: mtha'i lta ba bcos pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8247: rdo rje sems pa nyid yin pa'i don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8248: mthong ba'ii lam pa'i zhal mthong lugs su 'grel te /
NK079(dzu)004:8249: bsgom lam gyis mthong ba gsum pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8250: de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:8251: de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga //
NK079(dzu)004:8253: rang bzhin rtogs pas bsgoms pa'ang tshul gnyis gang yang rung ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8254: thog mar ye shes lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i ye
NK079(dzu)004:8255: shes drug pa rang snang ba'i rigs lnga bsgom pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8257: rtag gnyis bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:8259: ched du byas pa dang ma byas pa'i zhen pa
NK079(dzu)004:8260: gnyis dang bral ba'i skyes bus spyod lam kun tu'ang
NK079(dzu)004:8261: sku snang la rang bzhin med par bsgoms na drug
NK079(dzu)004:8263: rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na //
NK079(dzu)004:8265: rang rig lhar gsal bas lta nyid kyang mtha' gnyis las grol ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8266: ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis //
NK079(dzu)004:8268: lo rgyus ston pa ste sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK079(dzu)004:8269: bdud kyi dpung gi dkyil du byang chub shing btsugs
NK079(dzu)004:8270: 'gro ba ril yang dag pa'i lam la bkod pas
NK079(dzu)004:8271: / bdud 'khrugs nas tal de bcad pas mchod pa ltar /
NK079(dzu)004:8272: lha bsgom pa las su rung ba'i rig pa skye 'jig dang bral ba nyid mi bskyod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8273: de bas na rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa'ang rang
NK079(dzu)004:8274: rig lhar gsal ba'i gnyis med de nyid las tha
NK079(dzu)004:8275: snyad du mthun pa mthong zhe'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8276: bzhi pa goms pas mthong ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8277: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bsgoms te //
NK079(dzu)004:8280: bdag rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms pa las su rung na /
NK079(dzu)004:8281: spyod yul rdo rje sems dpa' 'ba' shig tu gsal zhing /
NK079(dzu)004:8282: bdag nyid de nyid du gyur nas skye 'jig med par 'gyur du btub pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8283: dper na kun rdzob kyi sems can zhen pa mthun
NK079(dzu)004:8284: pa rnams spyod yul mthun par snang du 'dod pa
NK079(dzu)004:8285: bzhin no // de phyir bdag de nyid du gsal
NK079(dzu)004:8286: bar gyur ba mthong ba med pa mthong ba dam
NK079(dzu)004:8287: bzhin no // pa'o // gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8288: chen po rags pa thabs su gtogs //
NK079(dzu)004:8290: lnga pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bden pa gnyis
NK079(dzu)004:8291: med kyi rigs gcig par rtogs pas zhal mthong bar
NK079(dzu)004:8292: ston te / gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ma nor ba ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8293: dngos po 'phra rags rig pa snang ba nyid rang
NK079(dzu)004:8294: rig pa'i gzugs brnyan lha'i dkyil 'khor du ye sangs
NK079(dzu)004:8295: rgyas pas thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8296: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:8297: ril ngo bo nyid rang bzhin med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8298: de'i mtshan nyid bden pa gnyis med nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8299: snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:8301: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis mtha' bzhi dang bral
NK079(dzu)004:8302: bas mnyam pa'i dbyings su bdag dang sems pa dbyer
NK079(dzu)004:8303: med pa'o // 'dus nyid gnas su phebs pa'i thams cad de lta bu'i ngang /
NK079(dzu)004:8305: don de nyid yul ma yin par rtogs pas spyod
NK079(dzu)004:8306: yul dag pa'i rig pa nyid mtshan nyid gnyis kyi
NK079(dzu)004:8307: phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8308: rigs gcig tu rtogs bas mthong ba zhes bsnyad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8309: drug pa ting nge 'dzin mthun pas spyod yul dag pa'i sgo nas zhal mthong bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8310: sgyur byas phung po khams rnams la /
NK079(dzu)004:8311: gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8312: 'byung ba lngas rgyur byas pa'i phung po bzhi dang
NK079(dzu)004:8313: khams bco brgyad skye mched bcu gnyis ril ngang gis
NK079(dzu)004:8314: rang rig pa de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so
NK079(dzu)004:8315: // de nyid ma bcos pa'i skad cig ma snang
NK079(dzu)004:8316: ba ye shes sgyu mar snang tsam na ngo bo'ang
NK079(dzu)004:8317: // med la / de nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs su'ang snang bas mtha' dang bral ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8318: phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs //
NK079(dzu)004:8320: rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8322: dman pa'i dbang ngo sprad pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8324: ngo bo nyid gcig du ma las grol ba'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:8325: rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lha bzhi bcu rtsa
NK079(dzu)004:8328: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje'i rtog pa'i le'u las /
NK079(dzu)004:8329: phung po 'byung ba'i gsal lam nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8330: bcud rnams 'dus pa'i thig le che //
NK079(dzu)004:8331: bzlog pas gnas thim de nyid gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:8332: las dang ngo bos yab yum 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:8334: gnas su phebs pas spyod yul rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:8335: lhar gsal thig le che 'phra yi //
NK079(dzu)004:8336: rten dang bde ba'i ngo bo dang //
NK079(dzu)004:8337: las kyi gtso 'khor rang bzhin snang //
NK079(dzu)004:8338: dus bzhi rlung gi 'pho ba yis //
NK079(dzu)004:8339: las dang ngo bos yum du 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:8340: bdag 'dzin gzhi las thabs spyod pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:8341: khams bzhi las kyi khro bor bshad //
NK079(dzu)004:8342: de dag mtshan ma bzhis bskyed phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8343: btsun mo 'joms ma nyid du nges //
NK079(dzu)004:8345: de sems rang rig nyid ces bya //
NK079(dzu)004:8347: rtog tshogs dkyil 'khor du gsal ba'ang sems nyid bas
NK079(dzu)004:8348: ril mnyam pa'i ngang mu mtha' med pa'i spyod yul
NK079(dzu)004:8349: dag par mjal ba rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8350: rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa'ang de nyid kyi ngo bor bzhugs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8351: de bas na bshad pa dang 'chad pa ril gzhir ngar rtogs pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8352: bdun pa rang rig mtha' las grol bar rtogs pa
NK079(dzu)004:8353: nyid zhal mthong ba yin pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:8354: / chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:8356: chos so cog mtshon byed bzhi yis mtshon pa'i don btags pa tsam las /
NK079(dzu)004:8358: med pa nyi tshe ba ma yin pas cir yang
NK079(dzu)004:8359: snang bas mtha' gnyis ga las grol ba nyid skye
NK079(dzu)004:8360: 'jig med la mi g.yo gsal zhing mtha' dang bral
NK079(dzu)004:8362: bden pa gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis bdag dang rdo
NK079(dzu)004:8363: rje sems dpa' ngo bos tha mi dad pa'i rang
NK079(dzu)004:8364: bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8365: dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang //
NK079(dzu)004:8366: zhes pa la sogs pa brgyad gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8367: gang gis de ltar rtogs pa de //
NK079(dzu)004:8369: su zhig gis don de rang rig pa'i mngon sum du byas pa ni zhal mthong ba ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8370: bdag dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8371: rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8372: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8373: kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te //
NK079(dzu)004:8375: shes rab mchog tu gyur pas lta bas bshad pa ltar rdeng chud pa des /
NK079(dzu)004:8376: de ltar gyi tshe 'di nyid kyis tshe'i rig pa rig pa 'dzin pa thob ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8378: gal te brtson pa chung ngam rkyen gyi dbang gis 'bras bu tshe 'di la ma thob kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:8379: thon de dang ma bral bas srid pa bar ma
NK079(dzu)004:8380: la thob pa ni seng ge dang khyung phrug ltar
NK079(dzu)004:8382: 'da' ka'i man ngag kyang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:8383: de'i yon tan bstan pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8384: 'bras bu dang 'phrin las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8385: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:8386: dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:8387: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8388: sangs rgyas gnyis pa des mthun par don yang mdzad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8389: lhun grub rnams la rdo rje'i dbyings //
NK079(dzu)004:8391: theg pa chen po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dul ba la de nyid du snang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8392: dgongs pa ma g.yos bar cir yang don mdzad spyod pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8393: pha rol phyin pa'i theg par bcu ba'i sems dpa'
NK079(dzu)004:8394: chen pos mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi don spyod pa
NK079(dzu)004:8395: las khyad par du gyur te /
NK079(dzu)004:8396: de lta bur yang 'di'i byin rlabs ston te /
NK079(dzu)004:8397: yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rtsal ba med
NK079(dzu)004:8398: pa'i mdzad spyod du yang mi 'dod ba ma yin
NK079(dzu)004:8400: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:8402: mtha' bral lhun grub tu dus gsum du mi 'gyur bar ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8403: le'u sum cu pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8404: mtshan nyid gsum pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8405: le'u so gcig pa'i spyan rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8406: dbang po yul 'dus snang ba kun /
NK079(dzu)004:8407: yul rnams yod pa ma yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:8409: log rtog gi yul snang ba ril rang rgyud du yod pa min te /
NK079(dzu)004:8410: 'khrul pa'i rnam shes snang ngo zhes //
NK079(dzu)004:8412: spyod yul 'khrul snang de nyid ngo bo'i snang ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8413: dag mnyam dang lo rgyus kyis gtan tshigs sam rnam
NK079(dzu)004:8414: par dbye ba 'i gtan tshigs kyis gzhigs na snang
NK079(dzu)004:8415: ba nyid na 'byung ba'i gzhi kun tu brtags pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8416: mtshan nyid gzhi'i ngo bo med de mtha' las grol
NK079(dzu)004:8417: lo // nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na //
NK079(dzu)004:8419: kun brtags kyi nam mkha' nyid la 'byung ba lnga tshad bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8420: nam mkhar brtags pa dang bral te mi dmigs pa ni don dam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8421: 'o na yul ni ma grub kyi shes pa ni skad cig mar yod do snyam pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:8422: thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8423: gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma //
NK079(dzu)004:8425: kun gzhi 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par
NK079(dzu)004:8426: rtogs ma rtogs kyi snang ba'i rgyu bstan pa nyid
NK079(dzu)004:8427: / rigs rgyud dang gzugs med pa'i phyir rang 'byung gi ye shes /
NK079(dzu)004:8428: rnam shes dgu pa'i ngo bo rgyu rkyen dang bral
NK079(dzu)004:8429: bas nyid cir yang go mi 'gog pas ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:8430: nyid kyi skad cig ma rang snang ba ni thabs
NK079(dzu)004:8431: yin mtha' gang gi yang ngo bo med pa shes
NK079(dzu)004:8432: rab ste gnyis su med pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8433: nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8434: kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la //
NK079(dzu)004:8435: zhes pa nas khams gsum brtson rar rtogs par 'khor zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8436: nyon mongs pa'i yid khyad par gyi yul kun gzhi
NK079(dzu)004:8437: la 'khor ba bzhi nang bcas pas bdag bde sdug
NK079(dzu)004:8438: tu rtog pa'i zhen ma grub ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8439: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dgu ba'i ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:8440: rgyun dang bral bas gtan tshan la rtsi spur bzhin
NK079(dzu)004:8441: bag chags bsag pa'i gzhi med pas nyon mongs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8443: kun gzhi dang bag chags gnyis su med pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:8444: zhen pa'i shes pas bsgor med de //
NK079(dzu)004:8445: ngang gis rnam par dag pa la //
NK079(dzu)004:8446: rtog pa po ni thar dka' ba'i gnas su 'khyam mo //
NK079(dzu)004:8447: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8448: snang dang mi snang gnyi ga la //
NK079(dzu)004:8450: 'di ni kun tu 'byung ba yin zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8451: yid khyad par gyi yul 'dus byas dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8453: se gol dang nyungs kar bsgor ba'i yun la gsum gyis rim pas gcod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8454: de ltar zhen rtog brdo ba'i rtog pa nyid ngo bos ma grub pa'i tshul ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8455: yid rang 'byung ye shes rang snang ba la /
NK079(dzu)004:8456: chos brgyad rang rgyud pa med phyir yul dang shes pa gnyis med do //
NK079(dzu)004:8457: de nyid ma grub pa'i tshul ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8458: dus gsum du rang rig ngo bo mtha' dang bral ba'i phyir rnyed par daka'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8459: snang la ma grub pa dpe rlung lta bu'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8460: rtog pa'i dbang du skad cig ma rgyun gyi yid
NK079(dzu)004:8461: de shes pa lnga'i rjes su 'byung ba'i skad cig
NK079(dzu)004:8462: ma med par rgyun dang bcas pa de dus bzhi
NK079(dzu)004:8463: chos kun tu rang snang ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8465: de ltar don rnams dngos po med //
NK079(dzu)004:8467: chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba //
NK079(dzu)004:8468: zhes pa nas so so min zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8469: shes pa gsum cig dang du ma las grol bar ston to //
NK079(dzu)004:8470: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8471: shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo dbyings gnyis dang ye
NK079(dzu)004:8472: shes chen po'i ngo bor tha mi dad pa du
NK079(dzu)004:8473: ma med la / de'ang tshul gyis ma 'dres pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8474: ngo bo cig tu 'ang smar med pas cig las kyang grol bas mtha' bral brjod las 'das pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8475: de spyod yul gang gi yin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8476: byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8477: shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba //
NK079(dzu)004:8479: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid rang gi ngo bo mi rnyed pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8480: yul du ma gyur pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8482: ngo bo blos dka' bas rtog par rab tu daka'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8483: 'o na mi rnyed dam zhe na /
NK079(dzu)004:8484: skal pa rab kyis yul ba bden pa gnyis su
NK079(dzu)004:8485: med pa de da lta nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro
NK079(dzu)004:8488: rtogs par bya ba'i sems nyid kyang rkyen dang bral
NK079(dzu)004:8489: bas 'gro 'ong dang bral te 'bras bu bdag nyid
NK079(dzu)004:8490: kyi phyir ro // des na bshad pa bzhin pas
NK079(dzu)004:8491: mtha' gsum bral bar rang gsal ba mthong lam mo
NK079(dzu)004:8492: kyi phyir ro // // sgom lam dang po bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8493: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid //
NK079(dzu)004:8495: dbyings dang ye shes tsam du yang 'dzin pa med
NK079(dzu)004:8496: pa nyid kyi rig pa ji bzhin par rang gsal
NK079(dzu)004:8497: ba la yul du bsgom pa med do //
NK079(dzu)004:8499: dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:8502: nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8504: thabs mkhas tshad med kyi spyod pa gnyis pa'i dbang bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8505: sems can ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:8506: snying rje thag pa ma chad pa //
NK079(dzu)004:8507: nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing //
NK079(dzu)004:8509: byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid ni 'byed pa med pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8510: las ni 'gro ba nyams thag pa bsgral te phan 'dogs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8511: snying rje chen po'i las dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8512: mtshan nyid ni bdag nyid du shes pa'i ye shes gang dang yang ma bral ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8513: yang dag pa'i sa la bton te skyob pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8514: dga' ba chen po'i las dang mtshan nyid ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8515: gdul bya sangs rgyas sa la bsgral bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8518: btang snyoms chen po'i las dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8519: mtshan ni bdag gzhan gnyis med du rig pas bu
NK079(dzu)004:8520: cig pa ltar gang yang yal bar mi 'dor ba
NK079(dzu)004:8521: dang / brtsal ba med par 'gro don rgyun ma chad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8522: sgo bzhi thar pa'i lam yin no rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8523: chos rnams thams cad stong pa las //
NK079(dzu)004:8524: de la dngos dang rtag pa med //
NK079(dzu)004:8526: mtshan ma med pas mi dmigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8528: chos so cog ngo bo mtha' gnyis bral ba'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:8529: de lta bu la yul dang yul can gyi zhen
NK079(dzu)004:8530: pa bral ba nam mkha' lta bur ye nas ma
NK079(dzu)004:8532: shin tu brtag dka' ste snang stong gi mtha' gang
NK079(dzu)004:8533: du yang mi dmigs par gsal la mi g.yo ba
NK079(dzu)004:8534: de bzhin nyid / stong pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8535: smyon pa med pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8537: chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang //
NK079(dzu)004:8539: rgyu 'bras kyi chos so cog bdag nyid pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8540: rang rig sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du gsal bas re ba dang bral ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8541: sgom lam gsum dang bzhi pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:8542: rang gi lhar bskyed de bsgom pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8543: byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8544: shin tu brtags dka' gting zab pas //
NK079(dzu)004:8546: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8547: rang rgyud pa dang ltos pa'i rtog ge ba'i yul ma yin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8548: ma dmigs mi dmigs su med /
NK079(dzu)004:8551: rang rig pa dus gsum du ngo bo mi rnyed
NK079(dzu)004:8552: pas bsgom bya dang sgom byed sgom pa'i ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:8553: bral ba ji lta ba de nyid ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8554: byang chub sems yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8555: chos so cog byang chub sems su tha mi dad pa ni sdud pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8556: sdus pa med par rdzogs par ston pas gsungs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8557: bsgom lam dang po'i spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8558: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas //
NK079(dzu)004:8559: ci la'ang thob pa med par spyad //
NK079(dzu)004:8561: spyod pa ci'ang mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis zin
NK079(dzu)004:8562: chags med par spyod pa spyod lam bzhir ma nyams
NK079(dzu)004:8563: par bya ba'o // 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:8565: skye bo pa'i tshad mar rtag par mthong thos kyi
NK079(dzu)004:8566: chos ril de kho na nyid du brtags pa las
NK079(dzu)004:8568: mtshan ma med pa'i sgo bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8569: gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces //
NK079(dzu)004:8570: med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa ste //
NK079(dzu)004:8572: mtshan ma bzhi las 'dir stong pa nyid du rtogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8573: mtshan ma'i phyir stong par mi rtog pa'i shes pa
NK079(dzu)004:8574: ye shes sgyu mar gsal ba bsgom lam gnyis pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:8575: // rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8576: thams cad ma lus stong zhes ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8577: dran med gdos pa ma yin pas //
NK079(dzu)004:8579: stong pa slun pa'am brgyud pa'i brdos chos ngang gis
NK079(dzu)004:8580: med de rang rig pa rang bzhin gyis ma 'dres
NK079(dzu)004:8581: la yongs su rdzogs par 'od gsal ba'i ye shes
NK079(dzu)004:8583: bsgom lam tha ma dang mthar lam rang rig dkyil 'khor thams cad du shar ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8584: cig car ba la lam bzhi dus cig tu rdzogs par brjod do //
NK079(dzu)004:8585: mthong lam rtogs par bya ba'i thabs bsnyan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8586: thams cad gnyis med rtogs 'gyur na //
NK079(dzu)004:8587: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8589: rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste //
NK079(dzu)004:8591: mtha' gsum ma spangs bral ba'i rig pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8592: thams cad du 'dzin rtog med par gsal ba spyan lnga'i dam pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8593: cig car ba'i bsgom lam bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8594: rnal 'byor lta ba da lta ba //
NK079(dzu)004:8596: bsgo bzhi dus gcig tu gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8597: spyod lam ni 'gro nyal 'dug sdod ces pa gnyis gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8598: spyod lam bral ba'i skyon spyod pa rtsings na ltung ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8599: gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:8600: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8601: tshig tsam la rten pas mi 'grub pas gdam ngag bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8602: som nyi med pas 'grub pas bsgom pa la bskul ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8604: bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:8605: des ni byang chub snying po len //
NK079(dzu)004:8607: bshad pa ltar gsum du ma mthong bas bsgrims pa
NK079(dzu)004:8608: med la yengs pa bral ba ni brtson 'grus mchog
NK079(dzu)004:8609: ste / des snying po byang chub 'grub par the tshom med pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8610: bsgom lam dang po'i spyod pa'i yon tan dang cig char ba thun mong du bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8611: le'u sum cu gcig pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8612: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor gsum gyi char bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8613: le'u so gnyis pa rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8614: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po
NK079(dzu)004:8615: de kho na nyid nges pa las 'di brjod do
NK079(dzu)004:8617: dgos ched lam pa'i grub pa chud mi za ba'i ched du /
NK079(dzu)004:8618: don thabs ni rang bzhin phyag rgya thams cad gcig pa'i don rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8620: phyag rgya 'bras bu'i gzhi yin pas lhag pa ting
NK079(dzu)004:8621: nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i 'phro 'du bya ba dag
NK079(dzu)004:8622: bka' stsal ba'o // gsang ba de nyid nges pa las //
NK079(dzu)004:8623: zhes pa gnyis khung dang rtogs thabs bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8624: thams cad phyag rgyar bsdu ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8625: mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8626: phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus bar //
NK079(dzu)004:8628: chos so cog gdod nas mnyam pa chen po la
NK079(dzu)004:8629: mi mnyam pa ngang gis mi dmigs pa'i phyir mnyam
NK079(dzu)004:8630: pa'i tha snyad las kyang grol bar dbyer med pa'o
NK079(dzu)004:8631: // de'i mtshan nyid smra brjod kyi yul las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8634: gzhi la 'khor ba ngang gis ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid smra dka' ba'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8635: phyi nang snod bcud de ltar shes par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8636: phyag rgyar bsdu zhing spro ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8638: de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te //
NK079(dzu)004:8640: sku phyag rgya ji snyed par gsal yang rang rig pa'i phyir bdag nyid du gcig par rtogs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8641: don nyid yul du mi byed par bsgom pa rnam gsum rim par bsgoms /
NK079(dzu)004:8642: sku phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bskyed bstan pa las spros te gdug pa 'dul ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8644: bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su //
NK079(dzu)004:8645: zhes pa la gsum gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8646: dam tshig gi gnas yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8647: bdag nyid phyag rgya sku yi mchog /ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
NK079(dzu)004:8649: phyag rgya bdun po ril rang rig pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8650: bdag nyid chen po ril gyi snying por gsal bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8651: las dang dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba las mi 'da' ba'i phyir gnas te /
NK079(dzu)004:8652: 'bras bu lhun grub tu bzhugs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8653: rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa //
NK079(dzu)004:8654: bcu gsum don grub bde gnas pa //
NK079(dzu)004:8655: mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub //
NK079(dzu)004:8657: rgyu 'bras dbyer med pas rnam pa med pa'i pad+ma spyan dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8659: kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i sa ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo //
NK079(dzu)004:8660: rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8661: phyi nang snod bcur thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:8663: rnal 'byor dang bcu chad de snod bcud ril rang
NK079(dzu)004:8664: rig snang stong dbyer med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir
NK079(dzu)004:8665: / 'phra rags yab yum bcur ye nas sangs rgyas
NK079(dzu)004:8666: pas thabs shes rab dbyer med pa'i ngo bos rgyas
NK079(dzu)004:8667: btab pa'i don ye zin chags dang bral bar btab
NK079(dzu)004:8668: / pa la / sku gsum dang lnga'ang ma rtsal
NK079(dzu)004:8669: bar de lta bu'i phyag rgya la lhun gyi rdzogs
NK079(dzu)004:8670: / pa la / pa'o // thams cad phyag rgyar
NK079(dzu)004:8671: bsdu zhing spro ba yang yin pa'i don bstan pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8673: lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8674: nang gi rtags ni phyi ru ste //
NK079(dzu)004:8676: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bzhi dang bcas pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8677: rang rig pa la lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i rtags phyir snang ba'ang bden pa re mos pa med de /
NK079(dzu)004:8678: de'ang grangs kyi mdo rigs lnga kun tu bzang po dang drug gi phyag rgya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8679: de las spros bcas kyi lha sgru 'phrul zhi khro'i sku mang po'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8680: lhag ma ni bca' ba'i phyag rgya ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8682: rang bzhin nyid kyi de ltar gnas //
NK079(dzu)004:8684: yan lag la tshom bu lnga bkod pa'i bro gar
NK079(dzu)004:8685: la sogs pa'i bskyod do cog phyag rgya yin pa
NK079(dzu)004:8687: rang rig pa la g.yo bsgul med kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:8688: phung sogs lha'i phyir bskyod pa phyag rgyar ye gnas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8689: rigs drug rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8690: 'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i //
NK079(dzu)004:8693: rtogs pa'i rig pa ye shes drug pa'i ngo bo ni sgrib pa'i dra ba gcod pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8694: skad cig mi rtog pa bral bas rdo rje rigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8695: las dang las kyis mi gos pa'i //
