NK079(dzu)004:8696: gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing //
NK079(dzu)004:8698: rtogs pa'i ye shes chen po spyod yul 'das pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8699: las kyi bag chags dang rnam smin mi thob pas
NK079(dzu)004:8700: kun dang mi phyed bral ba'i phyir pad+ma'i rigs su
NK079(dzu)004:8701: 'grel to // de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la //
NK079(dzu)004:8702: sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes //
NK079(dzu)004:8704: lhun grub kyi ye shes 'phel 'grib dang bral ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:8705: phyir de mngon du byas pa'i ye shes 'bras bu
NK079(dzu)004:8706: lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid can rin po che'i
NK079(dzu)004:8707: rigs so // rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8708: thams cad kun la chags med rol //
NK079(dzu)004:8710: rnam par rtog pa med par 'gro don gyi bya
NK079(dzu)004:8711: ba mtha' yas pa rdzogs pa las kyi rigs so
NK079(dzu)004:8712: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8717: rigs bzhi rang rig pa ji bzhin bar son pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8718: bye brag med par gzhir yang snang ba'i phyir rgyal ba'i rigs kho na'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8719: rigs drug pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8720: rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:8721: mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus //
NK079(dzu)004:8723: rigs bzhi yab yum dang rgyas pa'i rigs la sogs
NK079(dzu)004:8724: pa ril ye shes drug par tha mi dad pas
NK079(dzu)004:8725: rigs kyi bdag po spyi'i gzugs can du gcig pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:8726: phyir / rigs kun cig dang tha dad pas grol
NK079(dzu)004:8727: ba'ang lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du gcig pa dang
NK079(dzu)004:8729: phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8730: thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yi //
NK079(dzu)004:8732: mi 'da' ba dang mtshon pa las 'dir mtshon pa'i phyag rgya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8734: dper na rgyal po btab pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8736: dpe ste rgyal po'i phyag rgya bdun las dmangs mi 'da' ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8737: de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yis //
NK079(dzu)004:8739: rtogs pa'i rigs pas ril de nyid las mi 'da' bar snang ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8740: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi phyag rgya ril gsal na log sdes mi tshugs pa ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8741: rdzas la brten te bsgrub pa'i skabs su'ang rigs pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8742: phyag rgya rtogs pa yod med kyi skyon yon bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8743: rdo rje sems dpa' rigs nges na //
NK079(dzu)004:8745: le'u so gnyis pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8746: thabs kyi lam dang tshogs bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8747: le'u sum cu gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8748: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:8752: glu tshig bro gar dang a li ka li rtse
NK079(dzu)004:8753: 'jo la sogs pa yo byad lngas tshogs bsgrub pa
NK079(dzu)004:8755: tshogs dang byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor yang ston no //
NK079(dzu)004:8756: phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi //
NK079(dzu)004:8757: thams cad dbyer med man 'da' la //
NK079(dzu)004:8759: spros bcas rnal 'byor thob pas spyod yul yongs su dag par /
NK079(dzu)004:8760: phyogs bcu gzhal yas khang du gsal ba la gdan bzhi rtseg gam sum rtseg bsams /
NK079(dzu)004:8761: gzhal yas khang rgyu rin po che las byas pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8762: rtse mo ngar khyod blos dpag par dka' ba /
NK079(dzu)004:8763: rgyan sna tshogs can gyi dkyil 'khor du lha rnams bkod de /
NK079(dzu)004:8764: spyod yul ril ngo bo der gsal bas /
NK079(dzu)004:8765: gnas khang sum rim lcogs tshad du brtsigs /
NK079(dzu)004:8767: yo byad lnga bsog /ras kyi pe par stan be teng ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8769: dga' bde ba'i gnas su longs spyod lngas tshogs bsgrub pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8770: phyogs gzhan du thal ba'i rgyud 'ga' na'i le'u las /
NK079(dzu)004:8771: yon tan bcu dang ngar ldan zhing //
NK079(dzu)004:8772: yid 'ong rigs bzhi'i thig le ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8773: pad+ma dang ni ha sti ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8774: shang ka dang ni tsi ta ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8775: lo grangs bcu drug lon pa yis //
NK079(dzu)004:8776: nub phyogs 'og min bde ldan du //
NK079(dzu)004:8777: mi chags pad+ma'i gdan gting ba //
NK079(dzu)004:8778: nyi ma shar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
NK079(dzu)004:8779: yungs dkar tshad kyi bum pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8780: yon tan zad med 'byung ba'i gter //
NK079(dzu)004:8781: las dang ngo bos tshad bral bar //
NK079(dzu)004:8782: bdag nyid ngo bor tsan ldan pas //
NK079(dzu)004:8783: bcu drug bzhi chas bde bskul te //
NK079(dzu)004:8784: gzhi ga'i gnas su yab yum dag /phyag rgya dgu
NK079(dzu)004:8785: gnyis mtshan mas gdag /sa ya bcu gsum gnyis kyi
NK079(dzu)004:8786: bcur // bskyod bsgul bro thabs gar gyis dbab //
NK079(dzu)004:8787: nyi zla dus cig 'dres shar ba //
NK079(dzu)004:8788: de nyid gzhi la slar bsdus na //
NK079(dzu)004:8789: dbang po spyod yul thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:8790: bcu gsum phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal //
NK079(dzu)004:8793: lus bskyod yan lag bsgul gsigs ni //
NK079(dzu)004:8795: yan lag lnga rigs lngar gsal ba'i bsgul bskyod phyag
NK079(dzu)004:8796: rgyar gsal ba lta bas thag bcad pa dang spros
NK079(dzu)004:8797: bcas thob pa ste tshogs sgrub pa sbyor ba'i dus
NK079(dzu)004:8798: so // yo byad lnga la spyod pa'i spyi'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8799: gong gi dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8801: lhag pa'i ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8803: spyod yul lhar gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsal nas /
NK079(dzu)004:8804: yo byad la spyod pa'i tshe mi rtog pa chen
NK079(dzu)004:8805: po'i ngang las lha'i dkyil 'khor spros bcas ting nge
NK079(dzu)004:8806: 'dzin rang rig pa nyid bskyed de bro gar bya'o
NK079(dzu)004:8807: // bro gar thabs kyi phyag rgya dang //
NK079(dzu)004:8808: glu dbyangs tshig gi sgra bsgrags na //
NK079(dzu)004:8812: yo byad gnyis la srog dang ldan par spyad pa'i yon tan ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8813: bdag gzhan gyis yo byad kyi go rim bzhin lhun
NK079(dzu)004:8814: grub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku mthong gsung thos te
NK079(dzu)004:8815: / grags pa dang bde mthong ste sgrib gnyis bral ba'i tshogs gnyis 'grub pa'ang so sor sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:8816: a li ka li yo byad bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8817: thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8818: thams cad gnyis med dbyings su sbyor //
NK079(dzu)004:8819: gnyis med dbyings nas byang chub 'bar //
NK079(dzu)004:8823: dgongs pa can gyis 'grub par ston pa go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8826: las kyi rim pa tshang bar bya ste rol pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8827: thig le gnyis 'dres pas brgyad phyed mtha'i gnas su /
NK079(dzu)004:8828: bden pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba'i dpe'i tshul skye'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8830: zhes pa 'khyud pa'i gar thabs kyis slar bzlog pa'i dus na /
NK079(dzu)004:8832: don gyis bde ba bzlog pa'i brgyad phyed mtha'i gnas su phyin pa'i tshe /
NK079(dzu)004:8833: sangs rgyas dang po kun tu 'od kyi sa thob /
NK079(dzu)004:8834: de nas gnas kun de lta bur gsal ba ni dbang bzhi pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8836: sangs rgyas zhing sbyangs rig 'dzin bskul //
NK079(dzu)004:8837: ngan song gnas rnams dag par byed //
NK079(dzu)004:8838: zhes pa rgyud tha dad pa'i dbang du go sla'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8839: bdag gi dbang du spyod yul dag pas rig pa
NK079(dzu)004:8840: bskyed du gyur te zhen pa dag par sbyangs ba'o
NK079(dzu)004:8841: // 'bras bu ni thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur ni /
NK079(dzu)004:8842: zhes pa gnyis bshad zin to //
NK079(dzu)004:8844: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:8845: zhes pa gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'i rtog pa bcu bzhi dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8846: lnga thabs thams zin na lha'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs par gsal ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8847: de bas thabs chen thabs kyi mchog /shes rab bde mchog bstan ldan rdzogs //
NK079(dzu)004:8849: lnga pa'i dbang dgyes pa chen po ye nas rang la rdzogs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8850: byed pa sdom pa'i man ngag thabs khyad par can
NK079(dzu)004:8851: gyis bcu gsum sa dang ye shes bla ma thob
NK079(dzu)004:8852: pa ni shin tu brtan pa'i mthar phyin par 'gyur
NK079(dzu)004:8854: rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:8855: zhes pa bzhi gsungs pa go sla ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8856: gtso bo'i yo byad 'dis sa la sbyor te /
NK079(dzu)004:8857: de'i yan lag yid du 'ong bar byed pa gsum
NK079(dzu)004:8858: dang bcud skyed par byed pa cig gis cha rkyen
NK079(dzu)004:8859: byas te / thabs kyi dam pas tshe la'ang sbyar nas 'tshang rgya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8860: gos brgyan gyi yo byad bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8861: rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:8862: rgyan mchog mdzes pas kun brgyan nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8864: rnal 'byor pho mo'i tshom bu du yod pas lus rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te /
NK079(dzu)004:8865: tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor zhi khro gang yin pa bskyed de /
NK079(dzu)004:8866: sprul pas phyogs bcur don bya zhing spyod yul dkyil
NK079(dzu)004:8867: 'khor du gsal bas rang rig snang bas de ltar
NK079(dzu)004:8868: gsal na / lus la 'od 'bar ba dang mi thub pa 'grub bo //
NK079(dzu)004:8869: bza' btung gi yo byad bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8870: mi dmigs dbyings nas dkyil 'khor mchod //
NK079(dzu)004:8871: spyan gyis gzigs dang snyan gyis gsan //
NK079(dzu)004:8873: de'i tshe bdag nyid lhar bskyed rang bzhin spyan drangs
NK079(dzu)004:8874: bstims te brtan par byas nas longs spyod kyis mchod
NK079(dzu)004:8875: pa'ang / bza' btung nyid 'dod yon gyi lha mo nam mkha' gang bar byin gyis brlabs te /
NK079(dzu)004:8876: mchod pa'ang bza' btung nyid gdod nas snang stong gi
NK079(dzu)004:8877: mtha' las grol ba'i ngo bo spyod pa'i tshe tshogs
NK079(dzu)004:8878: gnyis ma brtsal bar rdzogs pas tshogs la spyod pa
NK079(dzu)004:8879: zhes kyang bya'o // tshom bu'i gnas dang spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8880: bru dang tsag kra'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK079(dzu)004:8881: nyi zla 'phrugs pa'i sa gzhi la'ang //
NK079(dzu)004:8883: grol thabs gnyis ka'i dbang du bshad pa yin no //
NK079(dzu)004:8884: tshom bu'i spyi don bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8885: yan lag lnga po thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:8887: ye nas ma bcos yongs kyis ste //
NK079(dzu)004:8889: yan lag lnga nyid rang rig mtha' gsum las grol
NK079(dzu)004:8890: ba'i ngo bo bas lam pas lnga la tshom bu
NK079(dzu)004:8891: lnga bkod de / bsgom pa'ang 'phral du byas pa ni ma yin te /
NK079(dzu)004:8892: ye nas yin pa nyid rang gsal bar byas pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8894: dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor //
NK079(dzu)004:8897: lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje'i rigs /
NK079(dzu)004:8899: rkang pa g.yon pa pad+ma'i rigs /
NK079(dzu)004:8901: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan gsal bar 'khor yan chad yab yum gsal bar bsgoms te /
NK079(dzu)004:8902: spro bsdu ni don gnyi ga sbyar to //
NK079(dzu)004:8906: dngos po gnyis pa ril yang dag pa'i sa la 'khod par mdzad pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8907: yan lag lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyi'i las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8908: yan lag chen po lnga bskyod na //
NK079(dzu)004:8910: dus dang tshe dang las dang zas dang sems can dag dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8911: de nyid du zhen pa lnga sbyong ba ni sprul pas byed pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8912: bzang mdzes legs pa'i go bgos na //
NK079(dzu)004:8916: mi 'dod de 'dir rgyan dang bgo ba'i longs spyod la rol pas lus la 'od 'bar ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8917: ye shes drug pa mngon du byed pa ni ye yin pa mthar phyin pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8918: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas //
NK079(dzu)004:8920: mthar nye ba'i lam pa la gdam pa gnyis dang 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8921: pad+ma rigs kyi tho stabs bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8922: thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8923: shar phyogs su ni kha bltas te //
NK079(dzu)004:8926: mngon shes grub pa'i tshul 'chad de /
NK079(dzu)004:8927: spros bcas thob ba'i pho mos bro seng ge 'gyings stabs kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:8929: lce la hri gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus chos kyi dngos grub thob ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8930: kun dang mthun pa'i skad thob pas thar ba dang
NK079(dzu)004:8931: mthar pa'i gdul bya la so so skad dang mthun
NK079(dzu)004:8932: par brda' mjal ba'i chos ston pa thob ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8933: ngo bo brjod du med par mngon du 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8934: rin po che'i bro bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8935: rna ba'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK079(dzu)004:8936: tra gi yi ge gsal bsgoms nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8938: rna par gzhal yas bskyed trang ser bo bsams /
NK079(dzu)004:8939: de las phyogs bcu'i rna par spros bcud bsdus slar tram la thim yongs su gyur pas /
NK079(dzu)004:8941: rna ba'i mngon shes thob kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:8942: thun mong ma yin pas spyod yul las grol bar thos par 'gyur ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8943: rigs gsum po'i bro bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:8944: de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams //
NK079(dzu)004:8945: so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8947: dbang po gsum la khang pa bskyed pa'i steng du /
NK079(dzu)004:8948: dbang po gsum nyid rigs kyi yi ger gsal bar bya ste /
NK079(dzu)004:8950: phyogs bcu'i dbang po gsum la spros te bcud bsdus 'bru gsum yongs su gyur pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:8951: sangs rgyas sems can gyi dbang po gsum bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8952: mngon shes gsum shar nas ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin don byed par 'gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8953: de ltar bdag gzhan bya ba zin nas bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK079(dzu)004:8955: rdo rje lta bu chen po grub pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8956: kun byas byang chub nyid du 'ong //
NK079(dzu)004:8958: tshom bu'i grangs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8959: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje rigs //
NK079(dzu)004:8960: ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan //
NK079(dzu)004:8962: rnal 'byor pho mos tshom bu lnga pa la rigs
NK079(dzu)004:8963: lnga dang yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor so so'i sems pa
NK079(dzu)004:8964: yab yum brgyad dang bcas pa bsgom /
NK079(dzu)004:8965: khro bo la gtso bo bsgyur ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8967: tshom bu gcig pa ni rdo rje'i rigs dang drug pa gang rung ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8968: gsum tshom bu pa la sku gsung thugs kyi rigs so //
NK079(dzu)004:8969: de la khro bo dang khro mo 'khor lo'i tshul du bsgom pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8970: rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa ltar bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8971: thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du //
NK079(dzu)004:8972: zhes pa sbyor ba'i mchod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8973: go sla bas ma sbyar to /
NK079(dzu)004:8974: de nas rigs lnga'i bro bstabs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8975: de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis //
NK079(dzu)004:8977: gsum yab yum du yod pas yan lag dkyil 'khor bskyod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8978: de'ang rdo rje rigs kyi bro gar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:8979: dbus nas shar phyogs kha bltas nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8981: yan lag bskyod nas bro gar bya ba ni spyod pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8985: sku mdog ni tshig don du 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:8986: cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yi zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:8987: rigs kyi bro tshig gi don te rig 'dzin du gyur cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:8988: mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yi //
NK079(dzu)004:8990: ye shes kyi sgo nas blang ba'i bro tshig go //
NK079(dzu)004:8991: nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas //
NK079(dzu)004:8993: phyogs kyi sgo nas don brjod pa'i bro tshig go //
NK079(dzu)004:8994: shin tu sra zhing skye shi med //
NK079(dzu)004:8996: tshad med bzhi'i thugs rje las byams pa chen pos don bya ba'i bro tshig go //
NK079(dzu)004:8997: de ltar rnam par bcad pa drug drug 'chad pa'i rigs gzhan la yang cha sbyar ro //
NK079(dzu)004:8998: 'jug gi thabs dang shes rab bde 'grub shog ces pa /
NK079(dzu)004:9000: chags spyod pa'i pho mos bro tshig gi 'bras bu
NK079(dzu)004:9001: gang yin pa de lta bu grub par shog cig
NK079(dzu)004:9002: par smon pa kun mthun par 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:9003: rin po che rigs kyi bro gar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9004: thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas //
NK079(dzu)004:9005: yon tan phyogs su kha bstan te //
NK079(dzu)004:9007: pho mo du yod pas srog dang ldan pa'i bro gar bya ba'i thabs dang po bzhis 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:9010: yon tan gyi rigs thob par shog pa'i tshig blang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9011: nam mkha'i dkyil gyi mdog bstan pa //
NK079(dzu)004:9013: sku mdog sngo ser gyi yon tan grub par shog cig par blang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9014: bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus la //
NK079(dzu)004:9016: rig 'dzin thob par shog cig pa'i tshig go //
NK079(dzu)004:9017: bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus pa //
NK079(dzu)004:9019: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes myur du thob par shog cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9020: bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che //
NK079(dzu)004:9021: zhes pa dag zhing khams phyogs kyi don thob par shog cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9022: pad+ma rigs kyi bro gar bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:9023: thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur nas //
NK079(dzu)004:9024: nub kyi phyogs su kha bstan te //
NK079(dzu)004:9026: pad+ma rigs kyi bro gar bya ba'i thabs kyi spyod pa spros bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9027: chos rnams ma lus kun bskyod kyang //
NK079(dzu)004:9029: pad+ma rigs kyi rnal 'byor thob par gyur cig pa'i glu tshig go //
NK079(dzu)004:9030: las dang nyon mongs nub gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9032: phyogs kyi yon tan grub par gyur cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9033: byang chub sems med dkyil 'khor ni //
NK079(dzu)004:9035: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes spyod yul dang bral ba grub par gyur cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9036: sgyu 'phrul phyi ma las ni sku mdog dang thugs
NK079(dzu)004:9037: rje dga' ba tshad med pa'i tshig kyang gsungs te
NK079(dzu)004:9038: / chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:9039: spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:9040: pad+ma ra ga zhes brjod pa //
NK079(dzu)004:9041: thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:9042: chos rnams pad+ma'i zhing sbyor ba'i //
NK079(dzu)004:9043: dga' ba chen po chags bral ba //
NK079(dzu)004:9044: thabs dang shes rab bde grub shog /ces gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:9045: las kyi rigs kyi bro gar bstan pa'i phyir //
NK079(dzu)004:9046: thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas //
NK079(dzu)004:9047: byang phyogs su ni kha bstan nas //
NK079(dzu)004:9048: zhes pa la sogs pa srog dang mdzad spyod kyis thabs so //
NK079(dzu)004:9049: yang dag rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:9051: byang phyogs kyi yon tan thob par gyur cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9052: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:9055: thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa //
NK079(dzu)004:9057: sku mdog dag gi don to //
NK079(dzu)004:9058: thams cad ma lus don 'grub pa //
NK079(dzu)004:9060: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes thob par smon pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9061: sdug bsngal dra ba tshar bcad de //
NK079(dzu)004:9063: 'phrin las kyis don byed pa thob par smon pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9064: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bro gar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9065: bder gshegs ma lus thams cad kun //
NK079(dzu)004:9067: ye shes bzhi po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes su gcig pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9068: rigs kyi rtsa bar ston pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9069: thabs chen dkyil 'khor yang dag pa zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:9070: srog dang mdzad spyod kyis don bya zhing /
NK079(dzu)004:9072: thams cad ma lus rigs bzhi yi //
NK079(dzu)004:9075: rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dbus bsdus shing //
NK079(dzu)004:9077: dbus phyogs kyi don 'grub par smon pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9078: de bzhin rigs mchog 'dzin pa ni //
NK079(dzu)004:9080: khyad par gyi rig 'dzin thob par smon pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9081: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:9083: thugs mtshan 'khor lo'i don 'grub par ro //
NK079(dzu)004:9084: 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la //
NK079(dzu)004:9087: sku ni sna tshogs cir yang snang //
NK079(dzu)004:9088: theg chen rnams la mnyam pa'i tshul //
NK079(dzu)004:9090: theg pa mchog gsang sngags kyis 'dul ba la /
NK079(dzu)004:9091: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang rdo rje dbyings kyi
NK079(dzu)004:9092: dkyil 'khor bden pa gnyis med kyi sku snang ba
NK079(dzu)004:9093: la sogs pa las dag ma dag la 'tsham par
NK079(dzu)004:9094: don mdzad pa'i 'phrin las grub par smon pa'i glu
NK079(dzu)004:9095: tshig go // chos dbyings dam pa dag med pa //
NK079(dzu)004:9097: mnyam pa'i dbyings bdag nyid dang bral bas spyod yul
NK079(dzu)004:9098: med pa'i ngang du tha mi dad pas tha snyad
NK079(dzu)004:9099: mthon dman dang bral ba'i ye shes ming lnga pa
NK079(dzu)004:9100: 'grub par smon pa'i glu tshig go //
NK079(dzu)004:9101: bder gshegs dkyil 'khor dgu bskyod na //
NK079(dzu)004:9103: tshom bu so so 'phrin las grub par smon pa'i glu tshig ste /
NK079(dzu)004:9104: tshom bu bsgoms gnas kyi gral rim gyis gzhag gi
NK079(dzu)004:9105: las la nus mthu che chung tshom bu la yod
NK079(dzu)004:9107: thams cad ma lus de bzhin te /
NK079(dzu)004:9108: de ni yang dag dmigs pa med zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:9110: de ltar gsal bas ci byas ci spyad pa ril 'phrin las su mi 'gyur ba med de /
NK079(dzu)004:9111: de nyid kyang rang rig pa'i phyir byas 'dzin med pa la /
NK079(dzu)004:9113: ngo bo nyid rtag pa dang /
NK079(dzu)004:9114: mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang /
NK079(dzu)004:9115: spyod yul med pas phyin ci log bzhi las grol
NK079(dzu)004:9116: ba'i bro gar zin chags bral bas don byed pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:9117: yon tan grub par gyur cig par blang ba'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9118: longs spyod pa'i yon tan 'grub par blang ba'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9119: rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:9120: de lta bu yi longs spyod na //
NK079(dzu)004:9122: yo byad lnga la longs spyad na /
NK079(dzu)004:9123: spyad bya spyod byed spyod pa gsum ma dmigs pas /
NK079(dzu)004:9124: sangs rgyas sems can ril dang rang rig par bye
NK079(dzu)004:9125: brag mi phyed pa'i phyir mchod sbyin rnam gnyis 'grub
NK079(dzu)004:9126: pa dang / lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa //
NK079(dzu)004:9128: 'di ltar spyod pas mthar phyin pa'i lam tshogs la sbyor ba'i yon tan dang /
NK079(dzu)004:9129: des bsnur zhing bsgrubs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ting
NK079(dzu)004:9130: nge 'dzin 'bras bu mthar thug thob nas thun mong
NK079(dzu)004:9131: ma yin pa'i mtshan dpe dang mngon shes drug rdzogs
NK079(dzu)004:9132: pa'i chos kyi rgyal po drug pa'i sku bcu gsum
NK079(dzu)004:9133: pa rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK079(dzu)004:9134: sa 'grub pa'i yon tan 'grub pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9135: bla med rdo rje sems dpa'i sa //
NK079(dzu)004:9136: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:9137: rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis //
NK079(dzu)004:9139: gal te brtson pa'ang 'bring la bar chad rnams kyi dbang du gyur kyang /
NK079(dzu)004:9140: 'di ltar spyod pas rnam par smin pa'i rigs cher 'grub /
NK079(dzu)004:9141: gal te ma grub na yon tan dgu gnyis thob sgra ji lta bas 'grel to //
NK079(dzu)004:9142: de ltar skye ba ngan pas bar ma chod par
NK079(dzu)004:9143: gsang sngags spyad pa'i tha ma rgyal ba yang dag
NK079(dzu)004:9144: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9145: mthar phyin skye shi med pa'i sa //
NK079(dzu)004:9146: sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che //
NK079(dzu)004:9148: gdul bya'i snang ba la phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i zhing
NK079(dzu)004:9149: so sor bkod pa rgyu rin po che sna tshogs
NK079(dzu)004:9151: mnan na nem pa bteg na 'phar zhing wob /
NK079(dzu)004:9152: rin po che dmigs mngas ris su sbras pa la
NK079(dzu)004:9153: sogs pa kun tu rang rig pa nyid snang ba'i
NK079(dzu)004:9155: rgyud pa 'di bshad pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9158: rgyud 'di lta bu ma nor bar gzhan dag la ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni /
NK079(dzu)004:9159: ston pa mngon du byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9160: sa ba las kyang khyad par du gyur pa yin pas de lta bu grub par gyur cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9161: bla med byang chub thor tshugs can //
NK079(dzu)004:9162: mu stegs rlung gis tshugs mi 'gyur //
NK079(dzu)004:9163: theg mchog rdo rje de lta bu //
NK079(dzu)004:9165: gsang ba'i snying po'i bstan pa sgro skur bral ba ni tshad ma'i tshad mar gyur pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9166: rgol ba ngan pas mi tshugs pas bstan pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9167: de'i grub pa'i yon tan ni /
NK079(dzu)004:9169: yid bzhin nor bu rin po che zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK079(dzu)004:9170: bro gar la spyad pas dkyil 'khor kun gyi dngos gzhir gyur pa ni /
NK079(dzu)004:9171: yon tan 'phel 'grib med pa'i sku nor bu rin po che /
NK079(dzu)004:9172: mun sel ltar shin tu gsal zhing /
NK079(dzu)004:9173: gzhon tshul can tshe'i rigs grub na /
NK079(dzu)004:9175: skye shi med pa'i rdo rje yi //
NK079(dzu)004:9176: thams cad 'byung ba'i gter yin te //
NK079(dzu)004:9177: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK079(dzu)004:9178: tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol //
NK079(dzu)004:9179: thams cad kun kyang ston pa po //
NK079(dzu)004:9180: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes //
NK079(dzu)004:9181: sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog /zhes pa yang
NK079(dzu)004:9182: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa thams cad
NK079(dzu)004:9183: mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9184: de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs /
NK079(dzu)004:9185: sku gsung thugs kyang grub par shog zhes pa bshad
NK079(dzu)004:9186: pa ltar rgyud 'di don mthong ba'i rnal 'byor ril
NK079(dzu)004:9187: phyir mi ldog pas rigs nges pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9188: des na bdag gzhan ril gyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos su thob par gyur cig pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9189: de dag rang rig pa ltar gsal ba thob bas spyod pa'i phyir /
NK079(dzu)004:9190: 'di dag che sbubs kyis lus lta'i cha byad du bsgyur bdag las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9191: rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa rnams kyis /
NK079(dzu)004:9192: dus thams cad du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad cing /
NK079(dzu)004:9193: glu gar dang bro thabs bya'o //
NK079(dzu)004:9196: mthar nye lam pa pho mo tshom bu ji ltar
NK079(dzu)004:9197: dam bca' pa kun gyis tshogs bsgrub pa'i dus khyad
NK079(dzu)004:9198: par yo byad lnga la re mos su spyad cing
NK079(dzu)004:9199: bro gar de ltar 'bad de yon tan de dag
NK079(dzu)004:9201: de bas na tshig de dag la gzhan don du smon gyi /
NK079(dzu)004:9202: bdag nyid kyi grub pa la sogs nas ngo bo
NK079(dzu)004:9203: rnam par chad pas brjod du zad pas thun mong
NK079(dzu)004:9204: ma yin pa'o // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK079(dzu)004:9205: bro gar dang rtse 'jo'i le'u ste zhes pa /
NK079(dzu)004:9207: le'u sum cu gsum pa'i spyan rnam par 'grel pa'o //
